62b2('dul ba): dang ches gnyis la ma rnyed kyang /ches gsum dang /tshes bcu tshun chad kyis gos gnyis shig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snya ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /khyi ma
62b3('dul ba): gnyis gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /snga ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/
62b4('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na/spang
62b5('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis chos la gos mang po rnyed na/dge slong des gos de dag zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtang bar bya ba
62b6('dul ba): 'am/rlong ba bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung por mi byed dam/gzhon la sbyin par mi byed na nyam
62b7('dul ba): bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//chos la gos mang po ma rnyed kyang chos gnyis som/chos gsum 'am/ches dbu 'am ni ches bcu tshun tshad kyis
63a1('dul ba): gos mang po rnya na/dge slong des gos de dag zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya bA 'am/gtung bar bya ba 'am/rlung bar bya ba 'am
63a2('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rnyeng shwar nA/
63a3('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis tshes la gos mang po dag cig rnyed cing /des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan mong po dag cig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid
63a4('dul ba): nang du snga ma dag byin gyis bslab par bya zhing /phyi ma dag gtung bar bye ba 'am/rlung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang ni bye ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya na
63a5('dul ba): snga ma dag kyang gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan lo sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dom+b+ha/gtong bar mi byed dum/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la
63a6('dul ba): sbyin par mi byed na/nyi mo bcu gcig pa'i spyi rang shar nA spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//ches dang tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang /tshes gsum dang /chos bcu tshun chad
63a7('dul ba): kyis gos mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhog bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dge byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /phyi ma dag kyang btang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/
63b1('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /snga ma drag gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/
63b2('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam//gzhan la phyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rang shar no//spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi gos spang bar 'gyur na
63b3('dul ba): de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags bor gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis gos spang bar 'gyur na//de spangs shing bral
63b4('dul ba): bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshogs par gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma
63b5('dul ba): bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig
63b6('dul ba): rnyed na/de la ltung ba med do//de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing /so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/chos gos sam/dra ba'am/
63b7('dul ba): ngor bu'am/ska rags sam/dge sbyong gi 'tshe ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na//de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyuraro//las dang po pa dang /
64a1('dul ba): smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag ginyen pa la ltung ba med do//'chang ba'i rlung bste dang pa rdzogs so//
64a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la chos gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/
64a3('dul ba): dge slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos rnyed nas des de bkrus shing dras te/drubs nas kha bsgyur te/gtur bu'i bam po bsgres nas dge slong gnas pa dang /
64a4('dul ba): gnyug mor gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing de dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs
64a5('dul ba): dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ma sbas pa dang sbeng du ma bcug par gyur to//dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /brtsang ba dang /
64a6('dul ba): 'ding ba dang /smrig pa dang /rtul ba dang /sbed pa dag byed par bya ba mang ba dang /byed pa mang bar gyur cing /lung mnor pa dang /klag pa dang /kha ston dang /rnal 'byor
64a7('dul ba): dang /yid la bya ba dang /nang gi sems kyi zhig nas gtong bar byed nas/dge slong dan nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la chos gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/dge
64b1('dul ba): slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos rnyed nas des de bkrus shing dras te/drubs nas kha sbyar te/btur bu'i bam po bsgres nas/dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug
64b2('dul ba): mar gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing /de dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang
64b3('dul ba): bcas pas ljongs rgyar 'dong ba na/ma sbas pa dang /sbed du ma bcug par gyur/dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mer gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /gsang ba dang 'ding
64b4('dul ba): ba dang /sprug pa dang rtul ba dang skyed pa dag byed pas bya ba mang ba dang /byed pa mang bar gyur cing //lung mnod pa dang /klag pa dang /kha ton dang /rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba
64b5('dul ba): dang /nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed ces smod par byed/phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas
64b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
64b7('dul ba): ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mang po dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed la chos
65a1('dul ba): gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste//dge slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos snyed de bkrus shing dras te/drungs nas kha
65a2('dul ba): sbyar te/gtur bu'i bam po bsgres nas/dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang
65a3('dul ba): bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing khyed cag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na/ma sbas pa dang /sbed du ma bcug par gyur la/dge
65a4('dul ba): slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /bsrung ba dang /'ding ba dang sdug pa dang /rtul ba dang /sbed pa dag byed pas bya ba
65a5('dul ba): mang ba dang /byed pa mang bar gyur cing /lung mnod pa dang /klag pa dang /kha ton dang /rnal 'byor dang /yid la bye ba dang /nang sems kyi zhi ga nas gtong bar byed pa
65a6('dul ba): bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso bka' ba dang /dgang dka' ba dang /'dod pa che ba dang /chog mi shes pa rnam par smad po mdzad//
65a7('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso bla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /chogs shes pa dang /phri ba dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon
65b1('dul ba): tan dang /mdzes pa nyid dang /tshod shes pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/phan yon bcu yang dag par rje su gzigs
65b2('dul ba): pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' bar
65b3('dul ba): bya ste/dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na/gal te nub cig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na/spang
65b4('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka
65b5('dul ba): lan di ka'i gnas na bzhugs//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyas ste na sde can ma'i phug na gso slong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang 'thun par 'dug go/de
65b6('dul ba): nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag de nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga po'i tshe/gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing 'thun par gyur nas/gtso cher tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'ong ba
65b7('dul ba): la sdod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na/chu klung dbyar bzang ldan rgal ba dang /chu rlabs chen po byung ba des de'i snam sbyar
66a1('dul ba): byu rgyu /nas mad stan pa d+mo sa na pasnam sgra gyu ba da snyoms pan+da sman hU~M phyogs par gyu //dem tsho dang ldan pa
66a2('dul ba): 'od phyung chen po sa snum sbyar de bcir cing gyiskams nas//sa snying gi//nas gal ba der song ste/sbyin nas/dge slong gi da /'dun gyi ga du bstan pa shams pa nyid
66a3('dul ba): la 'dug go/de nis dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa 'od srung chen po mkhyen rer mdzod cig/'di na bdag ca/
66a4('dul ba): deni slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing 'thun par gyur nas/gtso che'i tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la sdod cing 'khod na/'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
66a5('dul ba): byis par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na bdag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na/ rlu dbyur ba nga ldan nal ba de/chu nangs chen po byung ba des bdag gi sbyi
66a6('dul ba): sbyang gsher bar gyur nas/bdag snam sbyar 'chir ba dang /'ding ba dang skems pa na yun ring zhig thogs par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar bdag dge slong 'od srung chen
66a7('dul ba): bai nan po nas pa dodog tu gyur pa lags mi/bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bam yongasu sbyong bar rdzob zag na/bdon gis 'i lta ba gyi zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnam
66b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong 'od srung chen po nas pa dgog tu gyur pa dang /gzhan yang de lta bu gang
66b2('dul ba): yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin cig/'di ltar sbyin par bya s+ho/gnas mal po shams pa byas nas/gauN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong
66b3('dul ba): rnams la yid dag par bsgo nas/dkyil 'khor bar dge slong bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa laM/dge slong 'od srung gis bla gos drug
66b4('dul ba): pab cig tu byas te/rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas/rgan pa'i mtha' log su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te/'di skad ces brjod
66b5('dul ba): par bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol//bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la/bdag gi snom sbyar ni lci bas yongasu skyong bar rngom
66b6('dul ba): thogs nas bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/thugs rtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
66b7('dul ba): kyis/thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan pa na pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyor dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum
67a1('dul ba): du bzlas/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong 'od srung 'di rgan pa rgas pa//
67a2('dul ba): dgog tu gyur pa lpags la/'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun las snum sbyar dang 'bral
67a3('dul ba): bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na//dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po
67a4('dul ba): rgas pa dgag tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
67a5('dul ba): gsol/dge slong 'od srung 'di rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la/'di'i snum sbyar ni lci bas yongasu skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa
67a6('dul ba): dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to//de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la
67a7('dul ba): snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'od srung rgan pa rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la/snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi
67b1('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/rkang drag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shog/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gaun nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung
67b2('dul ba): rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//dge 'dun gyis dge/
67b3('dul ba): slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur pa'i gnang ba byin par gyur na/des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste/
67b4('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dug cing 'thun par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa
67b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags na/bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongasu sbyong bar mi thog ni/bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i skabs de
67b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa drang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dge khyed kyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can+da dang gzhan yang de lta bu
67b7('dul ba): gang yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin cig/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/gnas mal bsham pa byas nas//gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge
68a1('dul ba): slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/dkyil 'khor bar dge slong bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/
68a2('dul ba): dge slong shA ri'i bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te//rgan rim bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas/rgan pa'i mtha' log su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/dge 'dun la
68a3('dul ba): snam sbyar nye bar bstan te/'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol//bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags la/bdag gi
68a4('dul ba): snam sbyar ni lci bas yongasu skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can dge 'dun pa las snam sbyar dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur pa'i gnang ba gsol na//
68a5('dul ba): thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal du
68a6('dul ba): gsol/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong shA
68a7('dul ba): ri'i bu 'di rlung nad can lags la/'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
68b1('dul ba): ba'i gnang ba gsol na/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing brjod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang //dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar
68b2('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di rlung nang can lags la/'di'i snum
68b3('dul ba): sbyar ni lci bas yongasu sbyong bar rngo ma thog nas/dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nang can 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te/deng du da dun ni dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung
68b4('dul ba): nond can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snum sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa
68b5('dul ba): de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi
68b6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sprul lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//dge 'dun gyis dge slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba phyin
68b7('dul ba): par gyur na/des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste rgyu 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa
69a1('dul ba): rnams kyi bsngags pa da du/smrab mas pa U dang / sa ngarnams dang / rnams dang /sa man
69a2('dul ba): rnams dang /mdzes pa rnams dang /tshed shes pa rnams kyi yon tan brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/'di ni
69a3('dul ba): gnang ba yin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba rnams la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na/gal te nub cig kyang chos
69a4('dul ba): gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di
69a5('dul ba): pa'o//chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni chos gos zin la sra brkyang mi phyung ba yang yod/chos gos ma zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/chos gos zin cing sra brkyang //
69a6('dul ba): byung ba yang yod/chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang mi byung ba yang yod/snga ma bzhin du mu bzhir rgyas par sbyar ro//gal te nub gcig kyang zhes bya ba ni nub cig gi mthar yang ngo //chos
69a7('dul ba): gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/snam sa re dang bla gas dang mthang gos la so gang yang rung ba dang ngo //mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na zhes bya
69b1('dul ba): ba ni gzhan du skya rang 'char bar byed na'o//dge 'dun gyis gnang 'am gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni/dngos po du spangs nas
69b2('dul ba): ltung ba bshegs par bya ba ste/des na spungs pa'i ltung byed de zhes gsungs///de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/bar sdom la/khyim gcig
69b3('dul ba): pa dang khyim gnyis dang //khyim gyis tshogs dang ldan pa dang //rtsig pa rib ma 'obs bskor dang //rnam bzhir bya ba grong dang khyim//sten 'gro mu stegs tshong rdal dang //tshong khang
69b4('dul ba): dgra khang g.yul dang ni//g.yul tshoms glu dang shing rta dang //shing ljon kun dga'i ra ba yin//lam du 'gro sdod 'dug nyal dang //thor kar yang ni de bzhin te//mtshams gzhan nyal ba
69b5('dul ba): tha ma yi/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin//khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong dang khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong dang /khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan
69b6('dul ba): pa'i grong dang /rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong dang /rib mas bskor ba'i grong dang 'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong dang /rnam pa bzhir bya ba dang /gong nye 'khor gcig pa dang /grong
69b7('dul ba): nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang /khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /khyim
70a1('dul ba): rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcog pa dang /khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor ba dad pa dang /stan 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang /snron 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor
70a2('dul ba): tha dad pa dang /sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang /
70a3('dul ba): mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyo 'khor gcig pa dang /mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /
70a4('dul ba): tshong rdal nye 'khor gcig pa dang /tshong rdal nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'a bar gcig pa dang /tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /tshong
70a5('dul ba): khang nye 'khor gcig pa dang /tshong khang nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /tshong khong rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /tshong khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /dgra khang nye
70a6('dul ba): 'khor gcig pa dang /dag khang nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /dag khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /dgra khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /g.yul nye 'khor
70a7('dul ba): gcig pa dang /g.yul nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /g.yul rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /g.yul rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /g.yul gyi tshoms nye 'khor
70b1('dul ba): gcig pa dang /g.yul gyi tshoms nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /g.yul gyi tshongs rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /gru nye
70b2('dul ba): 'khor gcig pa dang /gru nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /gru rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /gru rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /shing rta nye 'khor gcig pa dang /
70b3('dul ba): shing rta nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /shing ljon pa nye 'khor gcig pa dang /shing ljon pa nye 'khor
70b4('dul ba): tha dad pa dang /shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /kun dga' ra ba nye 'khor gcig pa dang /kun dge' ra ba nye
70b5('dul ba): 'khor the dad pa dang /kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang /kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang /lam du 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /thad kar 'gro/
70b6('dul ba): ba la sogs pa dang /mtshams gzhan dag gi gnas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bye brag gis dge slong chos gos dang mi 'bral ba dang /'brel ba'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i bye
70b7('dul ba): brag rgya cher ston to//de la khyim gcig pa dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ri khrod pa rnams dang /bod rnams dang /kla klo rnams kyi grong ngo //de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams
71a1('dul ba): /cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang dum/gang du de dag rung bar byed pa dang /jo bar bye pa dang /zag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang //'thung
71a2('dul ba): bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag bzhog ste/nyi 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag
71a3('dul ba): bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhon du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//khyim
71a4('dul ba): gnyis dang ldan po'i grong gang zhe na/'di lta ste/khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong ji lta ba bzhin du/khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong yang de bzhin no//khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i grong gang
71a5('dul ba): zhen/'di lta ste/grong sgro sna tshogs nas kun nas gnas pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/sos tha dad pa'i//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//rtsig pas/
71a6('dul ba): bskor grong grang zhe na/'di lta ste/grong rtsig pas bskor ba gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zho na//nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du ba lang drug dang
71a7('dul ba): ldan pa'i shing rta smig ma can byas khyab cing 'dug pa dang /bya dag nas 'dug pa'i bar de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du
71b1('dul ba): skye dang 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nad dam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du
71b2('dul ba): skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//rib mas bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/'di lta ste/grong rib mas bskor ba gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams
71b3('dul ba): snod dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du ra lug bton pa dag gis rmig pas bslang ba'i rdul 'bab pa dang /mi rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha dang ldan pa bshang sar 'gro ba'i bar de ni de'i nye 'khor
71b4('dul ba): yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dge bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na
71b5('dul ba): yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhug ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/
71b6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/grong 'obs kyis bskor ba gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang Sh+pe nu/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du skas rdang bu bcu gnyis pas khyab cing
71b7('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /phyag dar bor ba'i bong ba rags pa 'drel ba'i bar de ni/de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed
72a1('dul ba): na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
72a2('dul ba): gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//grong nye 'khor gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/grong gang na bskyed mos tshal lam/'dun sa 'amalha'i
72a3('dul ba): gnas gcig yod pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nye'i khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/lha'i gnas so//dge slong gis grong du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
72a4('dul ba): lha'i gnas su skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/grong du skya rang 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//grong ngam lha'i gnas su
72a5('dul ba): chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//grong nye 'kho tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/grong gang na bskyed mos 'tshal lam//
72a6('dul ba): 'dun su 'am/lha'i gnas rab tu mang po dag yod pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//grong rab
72a7('dul ba): tu mang po nye 'khor cig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/grong gang dag na bskyed mos tshal lam 'dun sa 'am/lha'i gnas gcig yod pa gang yin pa'o//de dam go nye
72b1('dul ba): 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/lha'i gnas so//dge slong gis grong du tshe sngagos dag bzhag ste/lha'i gnas su skya rong 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//
72b2('dul ba): lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/grong du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//grong ngam lha'i gnas su chos gas bzhag ste/gzhon du skye reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i
72b3('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//grong rab tu mang po nyi 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe ni/'di lta ste/grong gang dag ni bskyed mos tshal lAm/'dun sa 'am/lha'i gnas rab tu mang po drag yod pa gang
72b4('dul ba): yin pa'o//de dag gi nyi 'khor grang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi cig gi 'am/
72b5('dul ba): spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi khyim gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /
72b6('dul ba): 'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag
72b7('dul ba): ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba medo//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya rong 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos
73a1('dul ba): gong dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya rengadu 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag
73a2('dul ba): gi'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi khyim gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na sgro'o//dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag
73a3('dul ba): bzhag ste/sgor skya reng 'char ba byed na ltung ba med do//sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med de//nang ngam sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/
73a4('dul ba): gzhan du skya ring 'tshor bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gcig gi 'am/spun sgom bye ba dag
73a5('dul ba): gi khyim rab tu mang po dag gang yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang //'thag
73a6('dul ba): par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
73a7('dul ba): nye 'khor du skya rang 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dge bzhag ste/nang du skya ring 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dang /
73b1('dul ba): bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa de dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba de dag
73b2('dul ba): gi khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na ci yang ma yin no//sten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/
73b3('dul ba): 'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am spun sgom bye ba dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dngaphyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag gi gling du
73b4('dul ba): 'jog par byed pa dang /rnga pa Ta ha dang /bi bang dang /rdza rba kha gcig pa dang /kha ra rnga dang /su g+ho sha ka 'jog par byed pa dang /mong phong dang /phang lo 'jog par byed pa dang /gang
73b5('dul ba): du rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yino///
73b6('dul ba): dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya rang 'tshor bar byed na yang ltung ba
73b7('dul ba): med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'tshor bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//sten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
74a1('dul ba): mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bya ba dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/
74a2('dul ba): rgyal mtshan gyi shing ngo //dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/rgyal mtshon gyi shing la skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dag bzhag ste/
74a3('dul ba): nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dgo bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//sten 'gro'i
74a4('dul ba): khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi cig gi 'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi stan 'ana' khyim rab tu mang po gang dog yin pa'o//de dog gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/
74a5('dul ba): nond thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag gi gling bu 'jog par byed pa dang /rda pa Ta ha dang /pi bang dang /rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /kha ra rnga dang /su g+ho sha ka 'jog par
74a6('dul ba): byed pa dang /mang phang dang /phang lo 'jog par byed pa dang /gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar
74a7('dul ba): byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyo 'khor yin no//dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos
74b1('dul ba): sa drug bzhag ste/nang du sgyu rang 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba mod//nang ngamanyo 'khor du chos gos dag bzhug ste/gzhan du sbya nga 'chang bar byed na spung ba'i lung byed du 'gyur ro//spyan/
74b2('dul ba): gro'i sa rlu tu meng po 'i 'a khor ba dang pag shin/'dri lta ste/ me dad pa dgan ma/na sku bye ba dag gi sbyin 'grol mi rob tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o// dag gi nyi 'khor
74b3('dul ba): zhen/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mu stegs can gyi khyim lte ba gcig pa dang /
74b4('dul ba): bzod pa gcig pa dang /'dod pa gcig pa dang /bsam pa gcig pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nyo 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gdangam/gang du de dag lci ba
74b5('dul ba): dag 'ding bar byed pa dang /yam sreg shing dag 'jog par byed pa dang /ga yang gzhi dag dang /shing shun dag dang /dbyig gu dag dang /ril bdag dang /grugs gzar dag dang
74b6('dul ba): dgang gzar dag 'jog pa dang /mi sbar bar byed pa dang /yam sreg shing dag sreg par byed pa dang /gang du de dag rjong bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /
74b7('dul ba): 'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dge bzhag ste/nye 'khor du reng
75a1('dul ba): 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhug ste/nang du skya reng ba char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang dum nye 'khor du chos gos
75a2('dul ba): dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mu stegs can gyi khyim lta ba tha dad pa dang /
75a3('dul ba): bzod pa tha dad pa dang /'dod pa tha dad pa dang /bsam pa tho dad pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/lha'i gnas so//
75a4('dul ba): dge sbyong gis mu stegs can gyi khyim du chos gos dag bzhag ste/lha'i gnasu skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//lha'i gnas su ches gos dag bzhag ste/mu stegs
75a5('dul ba): can gyi khyim du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//mu stegs can gyi khyim mam/lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na srung ba'i
75a6('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa grang zhe na/'di lta ste/mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po sta ba gcig pa dang /
75a7('dul ba): bzod pa gcig pa dang 'dod pa gcig pa dang /bsam pa gcig pa gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nong thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/
75b1('dul ba): gang du de dag lci bdag 'ding bar byed pa dang /yam sreg shing dag 'jog par byed pa dang /g.yang gzhi dag dang /shing shun dag dang /dbyig gu dag dang /ril ba dag dang /glugs gzar dag dang /
75b2('dul ba): dgang gzar dag 'jog par byed pa dang /me sbar bar byed pa dang /yam sreg shing sreg par byed pa dang /gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha'
75b3('dul ba): par byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar
75b4('dul ba): byed ni ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya ring 'char bar
75b5('dul ba): byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po lta ba tha dad pa dang /bzod pa tha
75b6('dul ba): dang ba dang /'dod pa tha dad pa dang /bsam pa tha dad pa gang yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//tshong rdal nye
75b7('dul ba): 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/srun sgom bye ba dag gi tsho rda ga yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/
76a1('dul ba): gang de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed pa dang /'brang bar byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /'jog par byed pa de
76a2('dul ba): ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skye reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char
76a3('dul ba): bar byed na ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshong rdal nye 'khor tha dad po gang zhe na/
76a4('dul ba): 'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bya ba dag gi tshong rdul gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so the dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/gzhag stegs//
76a5('dul ba): dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhag stegs su skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//gzhag stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang
76a6('dul ba): ltung ba med do//nang dum gzhag stegs su chos gos dag bzhog ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na sbrang po'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//tshong rdul rab tu mang po dag nye 'khor gcig
76a7('dul ba): pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshang rda la rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol
76b1('dul ba): 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed pa dang /'grang bar byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /'jog par byed pa de ni de dag gi
76b2('dul ba): nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nong du skya reng 'char bar
76b3('dul ba): byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'tshor bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad
76b4('dul ba): po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi tsheng rdal rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag go nyo 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong
76b5('dul ba): yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//tshong khang nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi cig gi'am/spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong khang gang dag yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang
76b6('dul ba): zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /gro dag dang /nas dog dang /mon sran gre'u dag dang /sa lu dag dang /'bras
76b7('dul ba): dge dang /til dag dang /'bros thug po che dang /bu ram dag dang /mar dag dang /ras bal dag dang /skud pa dag dang /gos dag 'dzeg par byed pa dang /'bru spung bar byed pa dang /
77a1('dul ba): dre'u chung dang /gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /'jal bur byed pa dang /rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed
77a2('dul ba): dang /'grang bar byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /'jog par byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'tshor bar
77a3('dul ba): byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang de ni ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya
77a4('dul ba): rluru 'chir bar bye na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshong khang nyi 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong khang gang yin pa'o//
77a5('dul ba): de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'i//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/'dug stegs su dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/'dug stegasu skya reng 'char bar byed
77a6('dul ba): na ltung ba med do//'dug stegasu chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang dram 'dug stegasu chos gos dag bzhig ste/gzhan du
77a7('dul ba): skye reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshong khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi tshe
77b1('dul ba): khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /gro dag dang /nas dag
77b2('dul ba): dang /mon sran gre'u dag dang /sa lu dag dang /'bras dag dang /til dag dang /'bras thug po che dag dang /bu ram dag dang /mar dag dang /rasau bal dag dang /skud pa dag dang /
77b3('dul ba): gos dag 'jog par byed pa dang /'bru spung bar byed pa dang /bre'u chung dang /gle 'jog par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa
77b4('dul ba): dang /'tshong bar byed pa dang /'grang bar byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /'jog par byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
77b5('dul ba): nye'akhor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhug
77b6('dul ba): ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshong khang rab tu mang po nyo 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong
77b7('dul ba): khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag go nyo 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//dgra khang nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta
78a1('dul ba): ste/mi gcigs ma/spyan sgom bye bdag gi yang gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhen/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gdang ma kung du de dag glang da//
78a2('dul ba): 'dogs par byed pa dang ni rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /zag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /gang du rdung ba dag dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /
78a3('dul ba): 'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag
78a4('dul ba): bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du sa reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nad ngam nye 'khor
78a5('dul ba): du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya red 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dgra khang nye ba khar tha dad pa gang zhe na//'di lta ste/mi tha dad ba dag gi 'am/
78a6('dul ba): spun sgo bye ba dag gi dgra khang gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mod yin zhe na/ya gad do//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
78a7('dul ba): la gang la skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//ya gang la chos gos dag bzhag ste/dgra khang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med de//dgra khang dam/ya gang la
78b1('dul ba): chos gos bzhug ste/gzhan du skya rang 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dgra khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi'am/spun sgo
78b2('dul ba): ma bye ba dag gi dag khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nyo 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol tu 'dom ganga'am/gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs pa de byed
78b3('dul ba): pa dang /rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /zag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed
78b4('dul ba): pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thong bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag
78b5('dul ba): ste/nye 'khor du skya rong 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang dam nye 'khor du chos
78b6('dul ba): gos dag bzhag s+ho/gzhan du skya rong 'chir bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi
78b7('dul ba): 'am/spun sgo bya ba dag gi dgri khong rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//
79a1('dul ba): g.yul nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nad thams//
79a2('dul ba): cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gad dam/grad du de dag 'bru rdung bar byed pa dang /'phyar bar byed pa dang /'khro ba par byed pa dang /smyung bar byed pa dang /bre'u chung dang /gle ba
79a3('dul ba): 'jog par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /rlung yor 'jug par byed pa de na de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gom dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char
79a4('dul ba): bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang dra ma nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du
79a5('dul ba): skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//g.yul nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o///
79a6('dul ba): de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/g.yul gyi dkyil lo//dge slong gis g.yul gyi dkyil du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du sgyu
79a7('dul ba): reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/g.yul gyi dkyil du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//g.yul gyi dkyil du 'am nye 'khor
79b1('dul ba): / k+Sha/kun ba na nga rgyas gyur //gsu ga yang pa shA tsug pa gshan/oMk+Shak+Sh+ma/m-igano slad du/
79b2('dul ba): sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nad thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang dam/gang du de dag 'bru rdung bar byed pa dang /
79b3('dul ba): 'phyar bar byed pa dang /'khrab par byed pa dang /srung bar byed pa dang /bre'u chung dang /gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /rlung lor 'dzugs par byed pa
79b4('dul ba): de ni de dag gau nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'chang bar byed na ltung ba med do//nyi 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste//nang
79b5('dul ba): du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nad dam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya red 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//g.yul rab tu mang po nye
79b6('dul ba): 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig
79b7('dul ba): thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//'dul ba rnam par 'byed do//bam po nyer drug pa//g.yul gyi tshoms te 'khor khwa cig pa gang zhe na/
80a1('dul ba): 'di lta ste/mi gcig gi'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/
80a2('dul ba): gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /lci ba dag 'dor bar byed pa de ni de'i
80a3('dul ba): nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar
80a4('dul ba): byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dgra bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//g.yul gyi tshems nye 'khor tha dad pa
80a5('dul ba): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun skyo bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na
80a6('dul ba): sgo'o//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/sgor skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med/
80a7('dul ba): do//nang ngam sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya rang 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//g.yul gyi choms rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/
80b1('dul ba): 'di lta ste/mi gcig gi'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang
80b2('dul ba): du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /lci ba dag 'dor bar byed pa de ni de dag gi nye
80b3('dul ba): 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya rang 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang
80b4('dul ba): ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mngo bo nye 'khor tha dod pa gang
80b5('dul ba): zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgro bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun
80b6('dul ba): mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//glu nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgro ma bye ba dag gi gru gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/'gro ba'i ni nang
80b7('dul ba): thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngo //'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/bang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /gru rtod par byed pa dang /gdos pa
81a1('dul ba): dag 'jig par byed pa dang /glu sgyu dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /zag pa da/la kha lnga bar byed pa dang /glang du rung bar byed pa dang /
81a2('dul ba): rdojo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du
81a3('dul ba): chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye
81a4('dul ba): 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhon du skya reng 'char ba ri byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gru nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/spun sgo bye
81a5('dul ba): ba dag gi gru gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gong zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/gru gdong ngo //dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gru gdong du
81a6('dul ba): skya rong 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//gru gdong du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam gru gdong du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
81a7('dul ba): gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gru rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gtsag gi 'am/spun sgo ma bye ba
81b1('dul ba): dag gi gru rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/'gro ba'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang
81b2('dul ba): dam/gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /gru stod par byed pa dang /gdos pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /gru skya dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /
81b3('dul ba): thug pa dag 'khal par byed pa dang /gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha'o bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /
81b4('dul ba): khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/
81b5('dul ba): nang du skya rong 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'tshar bar byed ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gru rab tu mang po nye
81b6('dul ba): 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi glu rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig
81b7('dul ba): thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//shing rta nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgom bye ba dag gi shing rta gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/
82a1('dul ba): 'gro ba'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngo //'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag phur ba 'dengs par
82a2('dul ba): byed pa dang /glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dze dag rdung bar byed pa dang /zag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /
82a3('dul ba): rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis
82a4('dul ba): nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag sde/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//
82a5('dul ba): nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dgra bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shing rtanye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa
82a6('dul ba): dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi shing rta gang yin pa'i//de'i nye 'khor gang zhi ni/soso pa dad pa'i//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/kha lo ba'i gnas so//dge slong gis na
82a7('dul ba): du chos gos dag bzhag ste/kha lo ba'i gnas su skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med de//kha lo pa'i gnas su chos gos dge bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung
82b1('dul ba): ba med do//nang ngam kha lo ba'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skye reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di
82b2('dul ba): lta ste/mi gcig gi'am/spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi shing rta rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/'gro ba'i nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngo //'dug
82b3('dul ba): bla'i ni nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /mun dza dag rdung
82b4('dul ba): bar byed pa dang /'thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /rdo bar byed pa dang /'thag par byed pa dang /'cha' bar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /'thung
82b5('dul ba): bar byed pa dang /khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du ska reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos
82b6('dul ba): gos dag bzhag ste/nang du spyi ring 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngamanye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhon du skya reng 'cha rlo bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//
82b7('dul ba): shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi shing rta rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/
83a1('dul ba): so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//shing ljon pa nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shing ljon pa yal ga'i
83a2('dul ba): tshogs 'breng ba gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang yin zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/gang du lo ma lkugs pa rlung gris ma bdas pa dag 'bab pa
83a3('dul ba): dang /char chad pa'i thigs pa sbom po dag 'bab pa dang /gang du gung tshigs kyi shing ljon pa'i grib mas khyab cing 'dug pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos
83a4('dul ba): gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor
83a5('dul ba): du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shing ljon pa nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shing ljon pa yal ga'i
83a6('dul ba): tshogs ma 'brel pa gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/rtsa ba'o//dge slong gis rtsa bar chos gos dag bzhag ste/yal
83a7('dul ba): gar skya reng 'char bar byed na/ltung ba med do//yal gar chos gos dag bzhag ste/rtswa bar skya rang 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//rtsa ba'am yal gar chos gos dag
83b1('dul ba): bzhag ste/gzhan du skya reng 'char bar byed na spung ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shing ljon pa rab tu mang po'i yal ga
83b2('dul ba): tshogs 'brel pa gang dog yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nung thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom grang ngam/gang du lo ma lhag pa rlung gis ma bangs pa dag 'bab pa dang /char
83b3('dul ba): chad pa'i thigs pa sbom po dag 'bab pa dang /gang du gung tshigs kyi tshe shing ljon pa'i grib mas khyab cing 'dug pa don de dag gi nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag
83b4('dul ba): bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du ches gos drag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam nye 'khor du chos
83b5('dul ba): gos dag bzhag ste/gzhon du skya reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shing ljon pa rab tu mang po
83b6('dul ba): yal ga'i tshogs ma 'brel pa gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ci yang ma yin no//kun dga'i re ba nye 'khor
83b7('dul ba): gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi'am/spun sgo ma bye ba'i ngag gi kun dga'i re ba gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang
84a1('dul ba): ngam/gang du dag me tog dag thu bar byed pa dang /skon pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /phreng ba dag rgyud par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /nyo bar
84a2('dul ba): byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed pa dang /bre'u chung dang /phul 'jog par byed pa de ni de'i nye 'khor yin no//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng
84a3('dul ba): 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nong du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngamanye 'khor du chas gos dag bzhag ste/
84a4('dul ba): gzhan du skya rang 'tsher bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//kun dga'i ro ba nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun
84a5('dul ba): dga'i ri bo gang yin pa'o//de'i nye 'khor gang zhe ni/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/khron pa'o//dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/khron par skya rang
84a6('dul ba): 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//nang ngam khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du skye
84a7('dul ba): reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi gcig gi 'am/spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun
84b1('dul ba): dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/nang thams cad dang /phyi rol 'dom gang 'am/gang du de dag me tog dag thu bar byed pa dang /skon pa dag
84b2('dul ba): 'jug par byed pa dang /phreng ba dag rgyud par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed pa dang /bre'u chung dang /phul 'jog par byed pa de ni/de dag gi nye
84b3('dul ba): 'khor yin no//dge slong gi nang du chos gos dog bzhag ste/nye 'khor du skya reng 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do//nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/nang du skya reng 'char bar byed na yang
84b4('dul ba): ltung ba med do//nang ngame nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/gzhan du spyi reng 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//kun dga'i ri ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/
84b5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/mi tha dad pa dag gi 'am/spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun dga'i ri bo rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o//de dag ki nye 'khor gang zhe na/so so tha dad pa'o//ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/
84b6('dul ba): ci yang ma yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos dag dge slong la gtad de/'dron lam du mchi na/
84b7('dul ba): btsun pa de ni de'i nye 'khor gang legs/nye bar 'khor ngas bram ze gro zhin skyes la a mra'i sdong po shin tu me tog phun sum tshogs pa/'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/yal ga'i tshogs
85a1('dul ba): chos ma smyan smra dang ma stong po bdun dublang dug yin par dag la nam yod par bstan pa de ni/
85a2('dul ba): slong la ma du zhugs pa'i chos gos dag gi 'khor yin no//greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyel bya'i ste bar na 'a dmag pa dor bar smrig go//bdakar 'gri ba'i 'a
85a3('dul ba): yid 'du mi gang khor khyor yug go// kar 'greng ba dang /nyal ba ni te 'khri ru yang 'dam gang khor khor yug go//btsun pa dge slong gis mtshams gzhan du mchis nyal
85a4('dul ba): bar bgyidu na/de'i chos gis dag gi nye 'khor gang lags/nye bar 'khor ji nam du chos gos kyis grwa lus dang ma bral ba tshun tshad do//dge slong gi rgyas spros spang bar
85a5('dul ba): gyur na/de ma smras shing bral bar ma byas la byung bam bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang rdza ma'i rnon kyi smyung bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gi chos gos snang bar
85a6('dul ba): b+hir ni//de skyengs shing brel bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan ni gaun+thi ni de yang sgyu ma'i spyod kyis sbyang bar 'gyuraro//dge sbyong gi chos pos spyang bar
85a7('dul ba): //de skyes shing bral bar byas la srung bim pa shags par gzhan ni du dz+nyA /de yang sde ma da kyis ngas pa /dge slong gi zas gos spang
85b1('dul ba): bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do//de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing /so sor ma
85b2('dul ba): bshags par lhung bzed dam/chos gos sam/dra ba 'am/phor bu'am/ska rags sam/dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na/de yang snga ma'i
85b3('dul ba): rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor po dag gis nyen pa lo ltung ba med do//'bral ba'i spang ba skye gnyis pa rdzogs so//
85b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de'i tshe ni dge slong rnams la gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/dge slong
85b5('dul ba): gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/des de byed du mi 'jug par de ga na /'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshogs byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing //sngon
85b6('dul ba): byaji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /smyig po dang /srab mo yang de bzhin no//dge slong don nyung ngu dag N+DI'i phyir dge slong rnams gos mad pa nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/dge
85b7('dul ba): slong gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tsho gas byed du gzhug go snyam du rabs de 'dzag par byed cing
86a1('dul ba): sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /stug po dang /srab mo yang de bzhin no zhes smod par byed/d+yA ra ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed
86a2('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad
86a3('dul ba): do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas
86a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed la gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/dge slong gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/
86a5('dul ba): des de byed du 'jug pa de gang gi tshe 'di 'dra rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing /sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /
86a6('dul ba): stug po dang /srab mo yang de bzhin bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /cho ga mi shes pa dang /gso dka' ba dang /dgang
86a7('dul ba): dka' ba rnam par smad par mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa brjod cing /chog shes pa dang /gso bla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /phri ba dang /
86b1('dul ba): yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /mdzes pa nyid dang /drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na par
86b2('dul ba): yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang sgyu ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la
86b3('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gden par bya ste/dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na/dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na/dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o//blangs nas
86b4('dul ba): gal te langs na myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang par bya'o//gal te mi longs la kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i gos lA re ba yod na/dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar
86b5('dul ba): bzhag par bya'o//de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o//chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni/chos gos zin pas sra
86b6('dul ba): brgyad ma byung ba yang yod/chos gos ma zin la sku brkyang byung ba yang yod/chos gos zin cing sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang ma phyung ba yang yod de/
86b7('dul ba): mu bzhir bcad pa snga ma bzhin no//dus ma yin pa'i gos shig ces bya ba la/dge slong gigs kyi dus ni gang yin/dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na/sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas
87a1('dul ba): nA ni/ston nu 'bring po'i nyanas dpyid zar ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba de dag ni gos kyis dus yin la/de pan chad ni dus ma yin no//swA brgya ma gting ba'i gnas
87a2('dul ba): nani thams cad dus ma yin/rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so//'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o//dge slong des gis de srung bar bya'o//zhes bya ba ni bdag gir
87a3('dul ba): bya'o//gal te langs na zhes bya ba ni gal te cho ga na'o//myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o//zhes bya ba ni/mi bskyang ba kho nar byin gyis brlab tu rung bar byas
87a4('dul ba): tI'o//kha mo langs pa kha skong ba'i zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar ram/bla gos sam/mthang gos kha mo langs pa kha skong pa'o//gos lA re ba yod na zhes bya ba
87a5('dul ba): ni/dge slong la mas bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re baM 'amo/pha 'am/bu nu 'am/sring mo 'am/slob dpon nam/mkhan pos bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba 'am/lo lnga'i
87a6('dul ba): dus ston gyi che 'am/lo drug gi dus ston gyi tshe 'am/gtsug phud 'deg pa'i dus ston gyi tshe 'am/gnas khang gi dub ston chen po'i tshe rnyed du re paM yod na'o//dge slong dres gos
87a7('dul ba): de zla ba gcig gi mthar bzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/zla ba gcig gi mtha' tshun chad du'o//de las 'das par 'jig na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar ro//spang ba'i ltung
87b1('dul ba): byed do zhes bya ba ni/dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung babashags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/bar sdom la/
87b2('dul ba): dogs bcus dogs pa med pa dang //nyams gyur grub par ma gyur dang //rgyun chad gos lnga gos gnyis dang //sbyar ba dang ni chad rnams so//dge slong gis tshes la gos
87b3('dul ba): sngon po zhig rnyed nas/des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go snyom du re ba de 'jog par byed cing /des tshes de nyid la gos
87b4('dul ba): sngon po dogs pa dang bcas pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtong bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba
87b5('dul ba): 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na
87b6('dul ba): smad pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//chos la ma rnyed kyang chos gnyis sam/tshes gsum mam/chos bcu tshun cad kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/dge slong des gos de zhag bcu po de nyid
87b7('dul ba): kyi nang du byin gyis brlabs par bya ba 'am/gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung
88a1('dul ba): bar mi da dam/smanan margyun du d+hA na/ts+tshom bcu gcig pa'i shA na snang ba'i byung byed du 'gyur ro//chos bskul ma rnyed kya ma cu
88a2('dul ba): dbu rgyun chad kyis rnyed na/dge slong des gos de nyi ma nyi shu po de nyid kyi rlung du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtang bar bye bo 'am/rung bar bya ba'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//
88a3('dul ba): byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dom/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma nyi shu pa'i skya reng shar na spang po'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nyi ma
88a4('dul ba): shu ba la ma red kyang /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na/dge slong ngas gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba
88a5('dul ba): 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i
88a6('dul ba): skya reng shar na sprang po'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta bu bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /stug po dang /slob mo yang de bzhin no//dge slong gis chos
88a7('dul ba): lo gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/des de byed du mi mdzad par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i che gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re ba med pas de 'dzag par byed cing //
88b1('dul ba): de chos de nyid la gos sngon po dogs pa med pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi rlung du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/gtang b+hAr bya ba 'am/rlung /
88b2('dul ba): bar bya ba'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dma?/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i
88b3('dul ba): skya shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshos la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/tshes bcu tshun chad dam/nyi ma bcu dgu tshun chad dom/nyi mo nyi shu rtswa dgu tshun chad kyis/
88b4('dul ba): gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyis nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'amo/gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis
88b5('dul ba): rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed du mau/gzhan la sbyin pa mi byed na/nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skye rang shau rA na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gos
88b6('dul ba): sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du sder po dang dmar po dang /stog po dang /srab mo yong de bzhin no//dge slong gis ches la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/des de byed du mo 'dzud par dgos la
88b7('dul ba): re de yod par de 'jog par byed cing /de'i gos la re ba gos stan po de nyams par gyur/'gyangs par 'gyur/nyam chung bar gyur cing /des ches de nyid la gos sngon po gzhan
89a1('dul ba): zhig rnyed par gyur na/dge slong des nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya bla'am/gtang bar bya ba 'am/
89a2('dul ba): rung bar bya ba'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dmA/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcig
89a3('dul ba): pa'i skya rong sha ra na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//chos la ma rnyed kyang chos gnyis sam/tshe so bcu tshun chad dam/tshes bcu la ma rnyed kyang nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun tshad kyis gos
89a4('dul ba): sngon po zhig rnyed na/dge slong des gis de zla bu de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtang ba bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin
89a5('dul ba): gyis brlob par mi byed dam/gtang bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya reng sha ro nA spang ba'i ltung byeng du
89a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro//gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /stug po dang /slob mo yang de bzhin no//dge slong gis tshes la gros sngon po zhig rnyed nas/des
89a7('dul ba): byed du mi mdzud par de ra bas de 'jog par byed cing /de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa grub par ma gyur/rgyun chad par ma gyur par des tshes de nyid la gos sngon pa gzhan zhig
89b1('dul ba): rmed par gyur na/dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//
89b2('dul ba): byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan lo sbyin par mi byed na/nya ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//
89b3('dul ba): chos la ma rnyed kyang chos gnyis sam/nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na/dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/gtang bar bya ba
89b4('dul ba): ma/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la smyon par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/
89b5('dul ba): nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya rang shar na spang po'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /stug po dang /srab mo yang de bzhin no//dge
89b6('dul ba): slong gos chos la gos sngon po zhib rnyed nas/des de byed du mi 'jug par de rabs de 'jig par byed cing /de'i gos la me dang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur na/
89b7('dul ba): dge slong des gos de nyi me bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/btang bar bya bo'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlab par mi byed dam/
90a1('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//chos
90a2('dul ba): la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed nas/des de byed du mi mdzud par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing /de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de thams
90a3('dul ba): cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur na/dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rung bar bya ba 'am/gzhan
90a4('dul ba): la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rung bar mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na
90a5('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gos sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /dmar po dang /stug po dang /srab mo yang de bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
90a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa gos dag du mchis/nye bar 'khor lnga ste/gos bdag po yod pa dang /gos bdag po med pa dang /gos por blangs pa
90a7('dul ba): dang /gos dur khrod pa dang /gos phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni lnga pa'o//de la gos bdag po yod pa dang zhe na/gang la bdag pa skyes pa 'am/bud med dam/ma ning yod pa
90b1('dul ba): den gis dadag pa yod pags bya//naslo ba ba med pa gang shod/dngul bdag bzlas pa 'am/bud med dum+b+ha/ma ning med pa de ni gos bdag po myed pa zhes bya'o//gos
90b2('dul ba): blangs bA she na/'di lta ste/nye du dag gis te du nyams pa dang shrI ba dang dus lo bab par rig nas/de'i rgyab nas gos kyis pakab ste dur khrod du khyer nas/de dag gis gos
90b3('dul ba): de yang / sa nas dge 'dun la 'dril bde ni/gos por blangs shes bya'o//gos dur khrod pa gang zhe na/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i drod grad nas blangs pa gang
90b4('dul ba): yin po de ni gos dur khrod pa zhes bya'o//gos phyag dar khrod pa gang zhe na/phyag dar khrod pa rnam pa lnga ste/lam po che'i gos dang /dgon par bor bu dang /chu 'gram pa dang /
90b5('dul ba): sril zan dang /ril rus nyid na lnga pa yin to//ral rul zhes bya ba ni ha n+dang zugs pa gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang phyag dar khrod pA lnga ste/mes tshig pa dang /chus reg pa
90b6('dul ba): dang /byi bas zos pa dang /be'us zos pa dang ma ma'i gos nyid ni lnga pa yin no//gzhan yang gos gnyis te/sor pa dang dus tshigs su spyad pa'o//gos sar pa gang zhe
90b7('dul ba): na/thogs pas gsar du btags pa/dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su mi spyad pa gang yin pa de ni gos sar pa zhes bya'o//gos dus
91a1('dul ba): tshigs su spyad pa gang zhe na/dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshig su spyang pa gang yin pa ste/dus tshigs shes bya ba ni
91a2('dul ba): zla bzhi ste/de ni gos dus tshig su spyod pa zhes bya'o//dge slong gis gos sar pa rnyed na/gal te dge slong des bcag pa dang gding ba dang dra ba dang btsem pa dang kha bsgyur bar
91a3('dul ba): nus nA/dge slong des gos de las snom sbyar ni nyi rim du bya//gding ba yang nyi rim du bya//bla gos ni tshig rkyang du bya/mthang gos kyang tshig rgyung du bya'o//dge slong gis snum
91a4('dul ba): sbyar nyi rim la rim pa gsum pa klon par byed na/de klon par byed pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis snum sbyar nyi rim
91a5('dul ba): las gzhan du klan no snyam nas rim pa 'bigs par byed na/de 'bigs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/nyi ma bcu 'das na spang po'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis snom sbyar
91a6('dul ba): nyi rim las bkrus shing kha bsgyur te/de nyid la klan no snyam pas rim pa 'bigs par byed na/de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
91a7('dul ba): snam sbyar la ji lta ba bzhin du gding ba la yang de bzhin no//dge slong gis bla gos tshig rkyang la rim pa klon par byed na/de klon pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la//nyi ma bcu 'das ni/
91b1('dul ba): spyo ba'i ltung spyod du 'gyur ro//blugs la ji lta ba bzhin du mtha gos la du bzhin no//dge slong gis gos dus tshogs su spyad ba zhig rnyed lta/gal te dge slong des byacag drung
91b2('dul ba): gding ba dang 'dra ba dang /bcom pa dang kha bsgyur bar nus ni/dge slong des gos de las snam sbyar ni bzhi rim du byA/gding ba yang bzhi rim du b+hA/bla gos ni nyis rim du
91b3('dul ba): mthang gos kyang nyis rim du bya'o//dge slong gis snam sbyar ba ni rim la lnga pa smin par byed na/de glen pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i
91b4('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi sa sum sbyar bzhi ri ma las gzhan du klan no snyam pas rim pa 'phrogs par byed na/'bogs pa nA nyes byas su 'gyur la/nyi ma bcu 'das na
91b5('dul ba): spring ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis snum sbyar bzhi rim las klas shing kha bsgyur te/'di nyid klan par bya'o snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/de 'bugs pa na
91b6('dul ba): ltung ba med lanyi mo bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//snam sbyar la ji lta ba bzhin du gding ba la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim
91b7('dul ba): le rim pa gsum pa klon par byed na/de klon po ni nyes byas su 'gyur lo/nyi ma bcu 'dis na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim las gzhan du klan no
92a1('dul ba): snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la//nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis
92a2('dul ba): bla gros nyi rim las 'di nyid bkrus shing khwa bsgyur te/'di nyid du klan no snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/nyi ma bcu 'das na spang
