92a3('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du mthang gos la yang de bzhin no//phyag dar khrod la ni ji tsam 'dod pa klan par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
92a4('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa rnam sbyar dag gi snum phran du legs/nye bar 'khor/snam phran dag na dag ste/snam phran dgu pa dang
92a5('dul ba): snam phran bcu gcig pa dang /snam phran bcu gsum pa dang /snom phran bco lnga pa dang /snam phran bcu bdun pa dang /snum phran bcu dgu pa dang /snam phran
92a6('dul ba): shu gtsug pa dang /snum phran nyi shu gsum pa dang /snum phyin nyi shu lnga pa'o//nye bar 'khor de la snam phran dgu pa ni/gsum sbyar gsum mo//snam phran
92a7('dul ba): btsu gcig pa ni gsum spyir gsum dang /snam phran gnyis so//snam phrin bcu gsum pa ni/gsum sbyar bzhi dang snam phran gcig go/snam phran bco lnga pa na
92b1('dul ba): /gsum sbyar lnga sa'o//snum phran bcu bdun pa ni/gsum sbyar lnga dang snam phran gnyis so//snum phran bcu dgu pa ni/gsum sbyar drug dang snum phran gcig go//snam phran nyi shu gcig
92b2('dul ba): pa ni/gsum sbyar bdun no//snam phran nyi shu gsum po ni gsum spyir bdun dang snam phran gnyis so//snam phran nyi shu lnga pa ni gsum sbyar brgyad dang snam phran gcig go//
92b3('dul ba): nye bar 'khor de lo snam sbyar snam phrin dgu pa gang yin pa dang /snam phrin bcu gcig pa gang yin pa dang /snam phran bcu gsum pa gang yin pa de gsum ni/glegs bu phyed dang gsum
92b4('dul ba): par byas te bcang bar bya'o//snam sbyar snam phran bco lnga pa gang yin pa dang /snam phran bcu bdun pa gang yin pa dang /snam phran bcu dgu pa gang yin pa de gsum ni/glegs bu
92b5('dul ba): phyed dong bzhi par byas te bcang bar bya'o//snam sbyar snam phran nyi shu gcig pa gang yin pa dang /smram phran nyi shu gsum pa gang yin pa dang /snam phran nyi shu lnga pa gang yin pa
92b6('dul ba): do gsum ni/glegs bu phyed dang lnga par byas te btsang bar bya'o//nye bar 'khor de yan chad ni tshem bu'o//btsun pa snam sbyar gyi tshad ji tsam legs/nye ba 'khor gsum ste/
92b7('dul ba): snan sbyar chen po dang /'bring dang /chung ngur rig par bya'o//de la chen po ni khru gsum dang lnga'o//chung ngu ni khru phyed dang gsu mo dang phyed dang lnga'o//'bring gi ni de gnyis kyi
93a1('dul ba): bar ma'o//snam sbyar ji lta ba bzhin du bla gos dang 'thang gos kyang de bzhin no//gzhan yang mthang gos rnam pa gnyis /khru do dang lnga pa dang khyu do dang
93a2('dul ba): bzhi pa'o//mthang gos tha ma ni 'khor gsum khebs pa gang yin pa'o//spang ba rnams kyi gos tha ma ni khru gang khor khor yug go/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/desnga
93a3('dul ba): shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong ga gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar ma
93a4('dul ba): byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma
93a5('dul ba): bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba po shags nis gzhan
93a6('dul ba): zhig rnyed na/de la ltung ba med do//de bzhin du ji tsam du dge slong gis snang ba'i dngos po de nyid kyis ma bshags shing /so sor ma bshogs par lhung bzed dmas
93a7('dul ba): gos sam/dra ba 'am/ber bu 'am/ske rigs sa ma/dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar
93b1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//'jog pa'i spang ba ste/gsum pa rdzogs so///
93b2('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs nas gzigs pa lnga po rigs dang /yul dang /dus dang /rus dang /bud med la gzigs pa dag gis
93b3('dul ba): 'jig rten la gzigs nas/glang po cher snang bar bsgyur te/yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe na/sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing /'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang
93b4('dul ba): na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyis 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun gnag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin
93b5('dul ba): pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na/snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas/sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang /'od des
93b6('dul ba): sems can cig gis cig mthong nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so//shes ldan dag sems can gzhon yang 'dir skyes so zhes shes par gyur to//
93b7('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu 'das nas yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing //'jig rten gyi 'jig rten
94a1('dul ba): /gyi ba rA gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun gnag mun par byed pas
94a2('dul ba): gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na/snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur na/sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gi rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong
94a3('dul ba): ba de dag gis kyang /'od des sems can cig gis cig mthong nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so//shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes//
94a4('dul ba): zhes shes par gyur to//gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' deltam par gyur pa de'i nyin mo rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gi bu yang bcas par gyur te/mnyan yod
94a5('dul ba): na rgyal po chen po rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btsas nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu bcos pa na 'jig rten gsal ba ltar snang bas gzhon nu 'di'i ming
94a6('dul ba): gsal rgyal du gdags so snyam nas/bu de'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar btag so//rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po chen po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas nas/de 'di snyam du sems
94a7('dul ba): te/'dog gi bu btsas pa ni 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar pa ltar snang zhing /'di btsun mo gzugs can gyi bu yin pas/gzhon nu 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po
94b1('dul ba): gdags so snyam nas/bu de'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar btags so//ko'u sha ma bi na rgyal po chen po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi
94b2('dul ba): bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming shar pa gdags so snyam nus/bu da'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar btags so//'phags rgyal na
94b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang bas snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming rab snang zhes
94b4('dul ba): bya bar gdags so//snyam nas/bu de'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar btags so//rgyal po re res bsams pa yang bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no//bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no snyam mod kyi/
94b5('dul ba): de ni de lta ma yin te/'di ltar de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin pa'i phyir ro//gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa de nyid kyi nyin mo
94b6('dul ba): shAkya gzhon nu bzang ldan la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas so//bsnyen bskur ba 'dun byed la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas so//rta rgod ma lnga brgya las kyang rde'u bsngags ldan la
94b7('dul ba): sogs lnga brgya 'brangs so//lha rnams kyis kyang gter lnga brgya nye bar bstan to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de bram ze ltas pa dang /mtshan mkhan dag gis lung
95a1('dul ba): bsan pa/gal te gzhon nu ba brang gnang na bzhugs par gyur na/la lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po na T+TA bul+lIr rtul ba/chos kyi rgyal chos dang ldan ga/
95a2('dul ba): rin pa che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyurate/de'i rin po tshe sgra bdun pa de dag ni 'di lci bAr 'gyur te/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po rje dang /glang po rin po che dang
95a3('dul ba): rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che da /khyim bdag rin po che dang /dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no//'di la bu dpa' brtul
95a4('dul ba): spyod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyuraro//de rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par
95a5('dul ba): sngosdob med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chud pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te
95a6('dul ba): skye dang khe sgyu bregs te/gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
95a7('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro//zhes lung bskrun to//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du
95b1('dul ba): byung ba de'i tshe na/thams cad du grangs kyi ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti glanas dang ha cang mi ring bar shakya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/do bram
95b2('dul ba): ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa
95b3('dul ba): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /
95b4('dul ba): nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no//'di la bu dpa' brtul pod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs
95b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi snga rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro//de rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo bar med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa
95b6('dul ba): med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig dag bgros nas/
95b7('dul ba): yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang
96a1('dul ba): ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes sgra grags par gyur to//nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis kyang grangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i
96a2('dul ba): 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs
96a3('dul ba): par gyur na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bdun po de
96a4('dul ba): dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur to/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po dang /khyim bdag rin
96a5('dul ba): bopo che dang /dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no//'di la bu dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong chang
96a6('dul ba): ba yod par 'gyur ro//de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par spro ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la//chos dang mthun
96a7('dul ba): zhing snyoms pas legs pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/hos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/yang dag par kho nar dad pas khyim nas
96b1('dul ba): khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to///
96b2('dul ba): thos so//thos nas kyang nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/de gzhon nu bsten na dus su 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur bas gang bsten par 'gyur snyam mo//de dag
96b3('dul ba): gis bsams pa rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par bya ste/de bsten na gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur ro//snyam nas/de dag gi rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par brtsams te/dus
96b4('dul ba): dang 'thun pa'i dus su 'dud pas pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag skur bar byed do//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang /las kyi
96b5('dul ba): mtha' thams cad grub pas de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so snyam nas/de'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar btag so//gang gi
96b6('dul ba): tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen por 'khrungs shing des rgan po dang /nad pa dang /shi ba gzigs nas thugs phyung ste/nags kyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe/
96b7('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang dang shAkya legs par rab rtogs kyi bka' mchid gsol ba'i mi nyis brgya lnga bcu nyes brgya lnga bcu bkye ste/de dag gis nyi ma re zhing deng ni gzhon nu til 'bru gcig
97a1('dul ba): dam/'bras thugs ngo che 'bru gcig gam/mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gam/maun sran gre'u 'bru gcig gam/rgya shug gi 'bru gcig gam/
97a2('dul ba): rgyasan 'bru gcig gis 'tsho bar mdzad do//zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mching khyer te 'ang ngo //nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis de ltar gzhon nu don
97a3('dul ba): thams cad grub pa rgan po dang /nad pa dang /shi ba gzigs nas thugs byung ste/rab tu 'byung ngo zhes thos nas/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir bdag cag rgyal ba
97a4('dul ba): zas gtsang la bsten par byed pa'i gzhon nu de rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis 'dud pa dang /phonya
97a5('dul ba): dang /dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bcad par gyur to//de'i tshe na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon de'i mchog sbed pa ni bya ba zhig yod la rgyal po zas gtsang la ni mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char
97a6('dul ba): zhes bya ba yod de/gang gi tshe ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya gtong bar byed pa de'i tshe na/blon po'i mchog sbed ba gtong bar byed de/des
97a7('dul ba): rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /rgyal po'i byed pa dag kyang byas nas/'char kha'i khyim du 'jug par byed do//gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ka sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gyi gan
97b1('dul ba): du pho nya gtong bar byung ba de tshon ni/mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char ka gtong bar byed de/des kyang rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas/blon po'i mchog sred pa'i khyis
97b2('dul ba): du 'jug par byed do//sbed pa la chung ma sbed ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa mdzes pa skyes bu dga' ba zhig yod de/'chab 'awang ma dang ldan cig kha dum par gyur to//
97b3('dul ba): sbrid pas ji ste chang 'arlud ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur par shes nas/des bsems pa/'dra gsad par bya'o snyam mo//yang bsams pa/gal te 'dagasad par gyur
97b4('dul ba): na/yul 'khor gnyis 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur bas/bdag gis bud med kyi lus kyi phyir ci'i phyir bram ze bsad par bya snyam nas/da kan bsnyomasu bzhag go/de nas 'char
97b5('dul ba): kha 'di snyam du sems te/bdag sbed pas 'phrog so snyam du rig nas/skrag ste/khyim nas byung zhing gzhan na 'dug pa dang /sprad pas smras pa/'char kha khyod ci'i phyir
97b6('dul ba): rang gi khyim spangs te/gzhan na 'dug tshur shog/'di khyod rang gi khyim yin gyis ci bder 'dug shig/de nas 'char kha 'di snyam du bsems te/don gyis na 'dis bdag la
97b7('dul ba): rjes su gnang ngo snyam du rig nas/de nyid ni 'dag go/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa///bam po nyer bdun pa//de nas dus ma
98a1('dul ba): gzhan zhig na/blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab nas/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bu med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rang
98a2('dul ba): gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug go/sbeng mas 'char kha la gang gi tshe bdag gi khyim thab gson zhing 'dug ste/'tsho zhing sdod pa de'i tshe na khyod rtag pa kho nar byon na/dra de dus la
98a3('dul ba): bab ste/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu ma mchis pa'i slad du nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar stsal na/da khyod kyis bka' mchid tsam
98a4('dul ba): yang mi spring ngam zhes yi ge spring ngo //de nas 'char khA spring yig gi don thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag der song bar gyur na bzhi de las 'char kha bud med la
98a5('dul ba): chags pa bud med kyi phyir der song ngo zhes gzhan dag kha zer bar 'gyur gyis/bdag gi thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o//snyam nas/des lan gnyis sam gsum rgyal po'i bya
98a6('dul ba): bdag dang /rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas/rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so//lha gang gi tshe gzhon nu don
98a7('dul ba): thams cad grub pa bltam pa de'i tshe ni/nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po thams cad 'dud cing thams cad kyis pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag gsol nas/gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad
98b1('dul ba): grub pa rgan po dang /nad pa dang /gum pa gzigs nas thugs byung ste/nags su gshegs pa de'i tshe'i na/nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma
98b2('dul ba): gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis pho nya dang dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bkum nas/lhas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag bka' stsal cing bskur nas/
98b3('dul ba): de lta de ltar rkyen par gyur pa las de yal bar bor na slad kyis gnod pa chen por 'gyur bas/de skal dang mtshams 'brel par mchis pas de dag lhan cig rkyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so///
98b4('dul ba): 'char kha gal te de lta na khyod nyid pho nyar song shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas 'char khas dkor sgrom dag khyer te mnyan yod ga la ba der 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du
98b5('dul ba): phyin to//de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/bsten pa la bsten par mi bya bar sten pa la bsten par bya ba yin pos ji dang por blon pa rnams blta bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu rgyal po blta
98b6('dul ba): ste/sbed ma'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o snyam nas/des blon po rnams blta bar brtsams te/smras pa shes ldan dag khyed kyis kho bo ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes pa de
98b7('dul ba): mi shes sam/de'i khyim thab dus la bab nas/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu med pa'i phyir de'i nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug pas de'i phyir/
99a1('dul ba): kha bo rgyal po la gsol ba byed kyis khyed kyis grogs gyis shig/de dag gis de bzhin du khas blangs//de nas 'char kha ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal
99a2('dul ba): rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/lan gnyis sam gsum du
99a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas te/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so//lha bdag gi gnas stsol cig/'char kha khyod sngon
99a4('dul ba): gang du zhugs/lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i sdum par mchis so//'char kha song la de nyid du zhugs shig/lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab bo//gal te de dus
99a5('dul ba): la bab na/ci de'i khyim yang dus la bab bam//lha de'i sngam pa ni dus la ma bab mod kyi 'on kyang de na stan tsam yang ma mchis so//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/
99a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag khyed kyis 'char kha'i gnas byin cig/'char kha phyir byung ba dang blon po rnams kyis sgrub pa/lha ci lags 'char kha la gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/
99a7('dul ba): 'di ltar 'char khi sbed ma dang lhan cig mchid mjal bas don gyis ni 'char khas sbed ma'i slad du lha la gsol ba bgyis kyis/lha 'char kha ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bu
99b1('dul ba): lags pas/bram ze ni mi 'dod bzhin du dgang bar bgyis pa lags te/'di legs par bzung na rgyal po zas gtsang legs par bzung bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal pos 'char kha bos te
99b2('dul ba): smras pa/'char kha ngas khyod ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes par sngar ma shes kyis/da song la sbed ma dang /de'i khyim dang nor thams cad khyod khyer cig/lha bka' stsal pa
99b3('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/'char kha sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /sbed mas 'char kha 'ongs so zhes thos nas sgo khang du 'dug ste ngu bar brtsam so//'char khas
99b4('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/srid ma khyod ci'i phyir du/des smras pa/bdag 'tshal ba'i khyim thab dus la bab na/ci khyod kyis kyang yongasu btang ngam/de nas 'char kha 'di snyam du sems
99b5('dul ba): te/gal te bdag gis mthun par smras na/'di shin tu ngu bar 'gyur bas/bdag gi 'di char bcad par bya'o snyam du rig nas/'tshar khas sbed ma la smras pa/sbed mi byang chub
99b6('dul ba): sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa gang bris btsun mo grags 'dzin dang sa 'tsho ma dang /ri dgas skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te/rab tu byung ba dag gis rkang pa'i rdul tsam du
99b7('dul ba): yang khyod kyis mi phod do//de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /'char khas smras pa/kho bos khyod ma btang bas khyod nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'ongs pa yin no//kho bos rgyal po las khyod
100a1('dul ba): dang khyim dang nor thams cad thob na ci khyod 'di nyid du 'dug gam/ser skya'i gnas su 'gro des bsams pa/gal te ser skya'i gnas su song na/bram ze ma las
100a2('dul ba): srog kyang mi thob bo snyam du rig nas/'di nyid du mchis so zhes smras te de de nyid du 'dug go/de'i tshe na 'char khwa la khyim gnyis yod de/gcig ni mnyan yod na'o//gcig ni ser
100a3('dul ba): skyespyi'i gnas na'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de/dka' ba byed po ci yang med par rig nas/ci bder dbugs dub par mdzad
100a4('dul ba): tso bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing 'bras can dang zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol bar mdzad/zhun mar dang 'bru mar dag gis sku dag kyang skud par mdzad//
100a5('dul ba): chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing /grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas/grong pa'i bu mo dga' bo dang dga' stobs ma gnyis las lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsrel
100a6('dul ba): ba gsol te/klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na/rtswa bkra shis 'ching ba las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas/byang chub kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te
100a7('dul ba): byon nas/nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas/skyil mo krung bcas te/sku drang por bsrangs nas/dran pa phyogs par gzhag ste bzhugs nas/thugs
100b1('dul ba): skyed cing gsung brjod pa/ji srid zag med ma thob par//de srid skyil krung gzhag mi bya//de yis ji srid zag med pa//ma rnyes skyil krung 'jig mi mdzad//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
100b2('dul ba): kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang /bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par bdul te/bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa
100b3('dul ba): thugs su chud nas/tshangs pas gsol te/bai ra na ser gshegs lan gsum du bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang /
100b4('dul ba): nye lnga dag dang /grong ba'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba lnga bcu btul to//kar ba so'i gsub tu gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug nu bden pa dag la bkod do//grong sde 'dod du gshegs
100b5('dul ba): nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do//lteng rgyas su gshegs nas ral pa can stong rab tu byung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do//ga
100b6('dul ba): yi'i mgo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po dag tshe 'phrul gsum gyis gdams pa mdzad nas/'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/shin tu mthar thug pa grub pa dang /
100b7('dul ba): bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//shar pa'i tshil gseb tu gshegs nas/ma ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /
101a1('dul ba): ma ga d+har byung ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la gzhug go/rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal
101a2('dul ba): bzhes te/shA ri'i bu dang /me'u dgal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa rab tu byung zhing rdzogs par bsten par mdzad do//mnyan yang du gshegs nas rgyal
101a3('dul ba): byed kyi tshul bzhes te/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul nas/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
101a4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya btang ste/lho dgyes pa
101a5('dul ba): skyed cig/khyod ky-i sras kyis bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing /mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
101a6('dul ba): bzhugs so zhes spring ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/gzhon nu bdag gis ring du ma mthong ste/bdag gzhon nu
101a7('dul ba): mthong bas yongasu skom mo zhes gsol pa dang /pho nya de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo //pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang /de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis
101b1('dul ba): 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir/gang dang gang po nyar btung ba de dang de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo //de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang gis de thos nas lag pa la
101b2('dul ba): 'gram pa gtad de/sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char khrus mthong nas smras pa/lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de/thugs khongs su chud cing bzhugs/'char kha
101b3('dul ba): gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba dag spyod pa de'i tshe/ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag gtang na de dag nyi ma re re zhing gtam khyer te 'ongs nas/gzhon nu don thaMd grub pa
101b4('dul ba): gnas pa 'dis gnas so zhes gtam skyod par byed na/da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugasu chud de/bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing /mnyan yod na rgyal
101b5('dul ba): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso zhes thos nas/ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag gtang na/'gas kyang gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i gtam khyed
101b6('dul ba): te mi 'ong bar gang dang gang po nyor gtang ba de dang de de nyid du 'dug par gyur na/da ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/sems khongs su mi chud cing mi 'dug tu rung //'char
101b7('dul ba): khas smras pa/lha bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/khyod kyang der 'dug par 'gyur ro//lha bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi'o//rgyal po zas gtsang
102a1('dul ba): gis rang nyid kyis 'phrin yig 'di skad ces/mal rum bzhugs pa tshun chad nas/bdag gis legs par khyod basmras te//nyon mongs gdu du
102a2('dul ba): rab gdungs pas//rgyal ba'i lhun shing snod cing mchis//slob ma'i yal ga ca lag gis//de ltar khyod ni rgyas gyur pas//gzhan dge bde bas dga' mdzad na//bdag ni sngog
102a3('dul ba): bsngal sbyin par gyur//gang tshe dang po khyed 'khrungs che//shin tu don chen mdzad nas ni//nyi du rje su gzung mdzad ces//de tshe khyod kyis thugs dam bcas//de skad go 'drang ni
102a4('dul ba): brnyes spyod//bdag dang nyaM du'i tshogs rnams la//rjes su thugs pa rtse nyer bzung ste/byon pa'i blo gros mdzad du gsol//zhes bris so//de nas 'char kha 'phrin yig de blangs te
102a5('dul ba): mnyan yod du 'phags nas de thar gyis mnyan yod ci tsam ni 'char khas bcom ldan 'das la 'dren yig phul ba dang /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'phrin mig dgu pa mdzad duH/
102a6('dul ba): 'char las gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs sum/'char kha 'ong ngo //'char khas sngon gyi gcugs pa de nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
102a7('dul ba): gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs ni bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/gang la khrid pyod srung
102b1('dul ba): yi//dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa//spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de//gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed//gang la khrid byed sred pa yi//dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa//rtul
102b2('dul ba): yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de//gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed//gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni//'jig rten ma rgyul yong med po//spyod yus gzhi med sangs rgyas de//gang gi
102b3('dul ba): gzhis ni khrid par byed//gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni//'jig rten ma rgyal yong med pa//rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de//gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed//'char khas
102b4('dul ba): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po zas gtsang la brjod du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'char kha rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ni de lta bu ma yin no//
102b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'o na rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ji lta bu lags/skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa rab tu byung ba dag yin no//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la
102b6('dul ba): slar mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab tu byung ste song shig/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon tshe rabs
102b7('dul ba): brjes pa de dang de dag tu yab dang /yum dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcag pas/bka'
103a1('dul ba): /stsal ma thag tu 'char khrus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/
103a2('dul ba): shA ri'i bu 'char kha rab tu phyung shig dang /de ni 'di la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
103a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/'char kha rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/de la 'di ni khyod kyis bya ba yin no//'di ni khyod kyis bya ba ma yin/'char
103a4('dul ba): kha khyod kyis deng phyin chad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun tu spyad pa'i chos thams cad brjod do//'char khas mkhan po bka'
103a5('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgos pos phyag 'tshal te song nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der stong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
103a6('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
103a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/'char kha khyod kyis tsham tshom med par rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par mi bya bar/sgor 'greng ste shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o///
103b1('dul ba): gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes 'drin/shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te zhugs shig ces zer na 'jug par bya'o//gal te gzhon
103b2('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam zhes drin/cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par bya'o//khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par mi bya'o//
103b3('dul ba): gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas 'cha' bar mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/gnas 'tsho' bar mi byed do zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te gong du gnas
103b4('dul ba): 'cha' bar byed ces 'dri na dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam zhes 'drin/'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o//
103b5('dul ba): gal te yun ji tsam na 'ong zhes 'dri na/zhag bdun 'das nas so zhes brjod por bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan//
103b6('dul ba): 'das las mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas spong ngo //'char khA 'ong ba'i tshe mnyan yod du nyi
103b7('dul ba): ma mang po dag gis phyin na phyir 'phro ba'i tshe/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha rnams kyis mthus nyi ma gcig gis ser skya'i gnas su
104a1('dul ba): /phyin to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas rgyal po zas ga tsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/kye nang rje khyod song la
104a2('dul ba): rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes sbrosgron cig/des smras pa/shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mchis sa mo/'char khas smras pa/shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag
104a3('dul ba): kyang yod do//sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/shAkya 'jug du chug shig/su zhig shAkya bzlog par byed/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha sgo
104a4('dul ba): bas ngo shes nas/rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po khyod la bcom ldan 'das a ro kha
104a5('dul ba): zhes gsung ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'char khwa skad las ngo shes nas smras pa/khyod 'char khA yin nam/lha bdag skya bos de ltar 'tshal to//rgyal pos smras pa/
104a6('dul ba): gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam/lha cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid lags so//rgyal po seng ge'i khri las brgyal te sa la lhung nas chus
104a7('dul ba): dbang bskur bas srog phyir 'ongs nas dris pa/gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam/lha mchi'o//yun ji tsam na 'ong /dgung bdun 'das nas so//rgyal pos
104b1('dul ba): blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag deng lha rgyal po'i pho brang dang /btsun mo'i 'khor dag byi dor gyis shig/lha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de rgyal po'i pho brang ngam
104b2('dul ba): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas 'cha' bar mi bgyid do//'o na gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed/dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o//gtsug lag khang ci 'dra bar
104b3('dul ba): 'char khas mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba brjod do//de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang la bskyed mos 'tshal skye yod dang /n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /
104b4('dul ba): tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod pas/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed deng la bskyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang /
104b5('dul ba): n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu bskyed mos tshal re re yang rgyal byed kyi 'tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang dang /khong chen bcu drug dang /khang pa'i gzhi
104b6('dul ba): drug cu yod pa dag myur du byed du chug la/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang /rdo dreng gseg ma dang gyo mo med par gnas par gyis shig/rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub
104b7('dul ba): pa yin la/lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin/rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas/blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin
105a1('dul ba): 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas/bskyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang /n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /tshangs pa'i gnas dag
105a2('dul ba): tu bskyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang /khang chen bcu drug dang /khang pa'i gzhi drug cu yod pa dag byed du bcug cing //grong khyer ser
105a3('dul ba): skye'i go nas thams cad kyang rdo dang gsog ma dang /gyo mo med par gnas par byas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa
105a4('dul ba): rnams la ni chos nyid kyis gdon mi za bar bgyi ba bcu mnga' ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du sangs rgyas su lung ma bstan pa dang /ji srid du sems can
105a5('dul ba): gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ma bskyed pa dang /ji srid du sku tshe'i cha lnga pa ma lus pa dang /ji srid du mtshams gcad pa ma mdzad pa
105a6('dul ba): dang /ji srid du nyan zung tsog mchog tu ma bstan pa dang /ji srid du grong khyer kun 'od du lha lis 'bab pa ma bstan pa/ji srid du mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam
105a7('dul ba): bar ma bsten pa dang /ji srid du mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos rnams dang thabs gcig sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung ma bstan pa dang /ji srid du yab yum gnyis
105b1('dul ba): bdon pa dag la ma bkod pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan lngas mi 'da' ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/rgyal po chen po bas gcong dang /shAkya 'bum/
105b2('dul ba): phrag du ma dag gdul ba'i dus nye bar gnas par gyur cing /'di lta ste/yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la gzhag pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gdon mi za bor mdzod
105b3('dul ba): pa yin no snyam du dgongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgel gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod song la dge slong
105b4('dul ba): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ser sna'i gnas su gshegs kyis/khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang /yab dang
105b5('dul ba): sras mjal ba ltar bang spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las
105b6('dul ba): mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis khyed cag lnga gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ser skya'i gnas su
105b7('dul ba): 'gro ba dang yab dang sras mjal ba lte bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o//dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs par gyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa
106a1('dul ba): mau'u dgal gyi bu chen po las mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khar
106a2('dul ba): grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa/'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/thul ba 'khor thul pa dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa 'dod
106a3('dul ba): tshigs dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/glang pa
106a4('dul ba): che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dang pa'i rgyal po ltar dang ba'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor
106a5('dul ba): ba/na mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis
106a6('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ded dpon ltar tshangs pa'i
106a7('dul ba): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshigs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'khor lo
106b1('dul ba): bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/yul
106b2('dul ba): 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor bar
106b3('dul ba): nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zag bzangs ris ltar lha ma yan gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis
106b4('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/spyod lom drang spyod pa me 'khrugs pa/chu ga te
106b5('dul ba): ltar ting nge ba/sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa
106b6('dul ba): dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus sku rnam par mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gi sa gzugs can brgyan panyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun
106b7('dul ba): tu bzong po/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhog pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan par zhugs /
107a1('dul ba): srung ba gcig pu ba/nyag cig dpa' ba/gnyis su pa med pa/gnyis su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/rig pa gsum
107a2('dul ba): gsal bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
107a3('dul ba): bzhin spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba
107a4('dul ba): yan lag lnga spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas pa drug gis
107a5('dul ba): gnas pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i
107a6('dul ba): stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/brgya phrag bcur dbang bskyer ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa
107a7('dul ba): stestong rgyas 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung dang /chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa tsan stong dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu la sogs pa
107b1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar tI/ser skya'i gnas ga la bder rgyu zhing gshegs so//de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma bdun pa la grong khyer ser skya'i gnas
107b2('dul ba): thams cad rdo dang /gseg ma dngagyo mo med par bzhog cing /bdug pa dang /phye ma 'khrigs pa dang /me tog sna tshogs dkram pa dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bo dan
107b3('dul ba): bsgreng ba la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen po dag bA shams shing /n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla ga ma lta bu ba shams te/
107b4('dul ba): n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi bar lam thams cad mdzes shing /rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /g+ho mr-i med par bzhag ste spos chu'i chag chag
107b5('dul ba): btab cing /bar bar du dar gyi chun po mang po sbyangs shing /me tog gi tshogs dag kyang bshams/bdug spos dri zhim po'i du ba 'khrigs pa dang /me tog sna
107b6('dul ba): tshogs bkram pa dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bo dan bsgreng ba dag rnam par bzhag go/rgyal po zas gtsang nyid kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos n+ya
107b7('dul ba): go d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das la sdong cing 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu klung re ha ka'i 'gram du gshegaso//
108a1('dul ba): de nas dge slong kha cig ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag 'khru bar byed/kha cig so shing 'dor bar byed/kha cig ni chu 'tshag par byed/kha cig ni khrus byed/grong khyer
108a2('dul ba): ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis/gzhon du don thams cad grub pa 'ongs shing /rgyal po zas gtsang gis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par
108a3('dul ba): gnas mal bshams shes thos so//thos nas kyang shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'dus par gyur cing /de nas kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis
108a4('dul ba): bskul cing lhags so//kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes te/je dang porwa yab kyis sras kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad dam/'on te sras kyis yab kyi zhangs la phyag 'tshal bar
108a5('dul ba): mdzad pa blta'o snyam pas lhags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis ser skya'i gnas phu gshegs na shAkya nga rgyal
108a6('dul ba): can dag/gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas chen po ma rnyid de/'di ltar 'od sngon byang chub sems dbur gyur pa na/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas lha 'bum phrag du mase bas te/
108a7('dul ba): steng gi na mkha' las byung ste song nas/da 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs kyang rkang par 'ongs so zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bso/bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis ser skya'i gnasu
108b1('dul ba): 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed ni rkang pa dag gis chu klung ngo ha ka la rgol cig/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu
108b2('dul ba): 'phrul gyiso gshegs so//dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka rgal te/n+ya gro d+ha'i
108b3('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas/ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par
108b4('dul ba): zhugs te/ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/rdzu 'phrul gyis chu klung ro ha ka'i pha rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur cing /steng gi na mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma
108b5('dul ba): brkyang pa ltar mngon par 'phags nas ser skya'i gnas kyi steng n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/n+ya go d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i steng gi na mkha' la dkyil mo
108b6('dul ba): krung bcas te bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su spyod lam bzhi pa 'di lta ste/'chag pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal ba dag mdzad do//
108b7('dul ba): me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug par 'dzad de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/sngon po
109a1('dul ba): dag dang /ser po dag dang /dmar po dag dang /dkar po dag dang /btsod ka dag dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta du dag byung ngo //cho 'phrul zung
109a2('dul ba): drug kyang rnam par ston par mdzad de/sgra'i smad nas me 'bar zhing sku'i spyod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do//sku'i stod nas me 'bar zhing /sku'i smad nas chu dang
109a3('dul ba): mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do//shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs su yang de bzhin mdzad de/de ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul
109a4('dul ba): gyi cho 'phrul rnam par bzhi ston par mdzad do//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po zlas gtsang gi rkang pa gnyis
109a5('dul ba): la gtugs par gyur na ni/de'i spyi bo chel pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur la/gal te rgyal po zas gtsang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs par
109a6('dul ba): gyur na ni/shAkya nga rgyal can dag ci'i phyir yub tu gyur pas sras kyi rkang pa gnyis la 'thug par byed ces ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas/bdag gis kyang rgyal po zas
109a7('dul ba): gtsang gis lus ma btud bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal por 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bar mngon par 'du
109b1('dul ba): bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas tA la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi na mkha' la gzhes shing /ta la drug dang /lnga dang bzhi dang /gsum dang /gnyis dang /lnga dang bzhi dang
109b2('dul ba): gsum dang /gnyis dang /gcig srid tsam na gzhes so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus ma btud bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
109b3('dul ba): nas/shAkya rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa smras pa/gang tshe khyod blta ma dog sa rab g.yos dang //'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku ma btang dang //'di dang lan gsum kun
109b4('dul ba): gzigs mkhyen ldan pa//sangs rgyas khyod kyi zhabs la bdag 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ltar bsdu ba mdzad nas/n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
109b5('dul ba): ra bar gshegs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang dang /bre bo zas dang /zas dkar dang /bdud rtsi zas dang /
109b6('dul ba): shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//shAkya kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su
109b7('dul ba): thal mo sbyar te mtha' cig tu 'khod do//shAkya kha cig ni thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/cang mi smra bar mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
110a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis zhu ba zhus pa/dpa' bo bcibs pa glang po dang //tsha bas dang shing rtas khab gshegs na//cher bcas
110a2('dul ba): dogs sa'i gzhi dag la//ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs par mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdag ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang //yang dag brtsol ba'i bzhon pa
110a3('dul ba): yis//nyon mongs tsher mas ma rmas par//sa gzhi kun tu rnam par rgyu//rgyal pos gsol pa/dpa' bo sngon chad ka shi ka'i//na bza' gsol bas rnam mdzes na//
110a4('dul ba): bur smrig na bza' rtsub po dag/ji ltar khyod skus bzod par mdzod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po bdag gi khrel 'dzem pa'i//snam sbyar gos gyon
110a5('dul ba): mdzes pa yin//gang gi thub pa'i gos gyon pa//zhi ba'i nags nas mdzes par 'gyur//rgyal pos gsol pa/bstan pa sngon chad gser snod nas//zhal zas ro mang
110a6('dul ba): ldan gsol na//da ltar bsod snyoms ngan pa dag ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos ldan dga' ba bdag gi zas//nges 'byung
110a7('dul ba): ldan zhing mnyam bzhag yin//zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun//rje su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed//rgyal pos gsol ba/blo bzang khyod ston yang thag gi/gzhal med
110b1('dul ba): khang sbyang dus 'thun bzhugs//nyagacig nags na khyod bzhugs na/ji ltar bskyod dang bral bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/go'u tum 'jigs kun rtsa
110b2('dul ba): dang srid//de bdag bag nyal bcos sbyangs pas//mya ngan 'jigs bral nags gnas te//de na bdag 'jigs ci yang med//rgyal pos gsol pa/thub dbang khyod sngon rib
110b3('dul ba): dgyes pa'i//khab nA rtag tu khrus mchog mdzad//nags na nyag gcig khyod bzhugs na//de na 'byor khrus su dag bgyid//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal phyi
110b4('dul ba): go'u tam chos rdzing bsad nams 'gram//rnyog med dam pas bsngags pa ste//mi lus mig shor dwe bkrus pa//rlig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/rgyal pos gsol
110b5('dul ba): pa/dpa' bo rang gi pho brang na//gser dngul bum bsdu khrus mdzad na/chab tshan rtog dang bcas pA yis//ji ltar khyod kyis sku khyus mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
110b6('dul ba): stsal pa/go& tAm dang klu tshul khrims 'gram//rnyed pa bsil ba mkhas pas bsngags//mi lus mig sher der dkrus pa//reg byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/rgyal po zlas
110b7('dul ba): gtsang gis gsol pa//zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing //'jigs skrag gang na pa'i byung bar 'gyur//'ad 'byung gang ni'i skyeng gyur ba//nus pa de ni bdag la gsung sa//bcom
111a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing //'jigs skyugs glang nas 'byung 'gyur dang //yid 'byung grang nas skye 'gyur ba//gson
111a2('dul ba): cig bdag gis khyod la bshad//rga dang na dang 'chi 'gyur ba//gal te de gsum yod min na//bdag kyang shin tu yid 'ong ba'o//yul rnams la ni dga' bor 'gyur//rgyal
111a3('dul ba): bos gsol pa/shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa//dpa' bo 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis//khyod la gos pa mi mnga' ba//legs par 'khrungs pa legs pa lags//de nas
111a4('dul ba): rab dga' dang rgyas pas//drang srong dge 'dun bskor byas te//thub dbang rlabs la mgos gtugs nas//bde gshegs kun nas rtog cing sdod//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
111a5('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs pa ni/bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i
111a6('dul ba): tshogs de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /lhas byin sdig pa nga rgyal los kyang nga rgyal
111a7('dul ba): can ma gtogs pa/zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur la/de ltar chos bstan pa mdzod do//de nas srog chags stong phrag
111b1('dul ba): mang po kha cig gi ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis
111b2('dul ba): ni rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang //
111b3('dul ba): dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag pa mdzad do//rgyal po zas gtsang bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma
111b4('dul ba): mthong ngo //lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa da /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal bden pa ma mthong ngo //lhas byin bden pa ma mthong zhing khro ba'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/gal
111b5('dul ba): te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes su 'jug par bya ba la rag go/shAkya gAcugs par
111b6('dul ba): gyur pa dga' bo ston pa dag gis de la smras pa/lhas byin thong shig bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis du skad mo zer cig/de nas de cing mi smra bar 'dug
111b7('dul ba): nyi ma gnyis pa la bskyed mos tshal skye yod du sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gden thabs zla gam lta bu bsham pa byas nas/der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba phal po che'i
112a1('dul ba): tshogs de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /lhas byin sdig pa 'dod
112a2('dul ba): pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa/bre bo zlas la sogs pa shAkya 'dun khri drug stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos ston pa mdzod do//de na srog
112a3('dul ba): chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong
112a4('dul ba): ba'i 'bras bu kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba
112a5('dul ba): dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do//rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba yin no//
112a6('dul ba): sgyum du hA cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo //lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang /nga rgyal lngas kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo //lhas byin+d+he bden pa ma mthong zhib
112a7('dul ba): khro ba'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjesu 'jug
112b1('dul ba): bar bya ba la rag go//shAkya gcugs pa dag 'i skyon pa dag pa de la smras pa/g+has byin thong shig/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma zer cig/de nas de cang ma
112b2('dul ba): smra bar 'dug go/nyi ma gsum pa la bskyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa byas nas/der yang
112b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /
112b4('dul ba): lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa ngo rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa/bdud rtsi rdzas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis bden pa drug mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa
112b5('dul ba): mdzad do//de nas srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis
112b6('dul ba): ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas
112b7('dul ba): la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do//rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba yin no/
113a1('dul ba): snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo //lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom
113a2('dul ba): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam dgongs na/rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mi mthong ste/sems ha cang mtho ba dang /
113a3('dul ba): ha cang zhum pas so//da ltar rgyal po zos gtsang gi sems gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa sngon chad lha dang mis mchod par gyur na/da ni mi mchod cing lhas mchod par
113a4('dul ba): ma gyur to snyam du ha cang zhum par gyur par thugs su chud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang 'dul ba'i phyir/lha'i
113a5('dul ba): 'khor 'ba' shig la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas/'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te
113a6('dul ba): 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad na ni/tha na srog chags grog sbur gyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes la/ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs
113a7('dul ba): bskyed par mdzad na ni/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bugs sems kyis mi shes na/nyan thos la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas tshangs pa dang /
113b1('dul ba): brgya byin la sogs pA lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang
113b2('dul ba): gdul ba'i slad du lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston gzhed par mthong ngo //de nas 'dod pa na spyad pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
113b3('dul ba): sems kyis shesI nas/'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu'i lag ngar bskums pa las rkyong bar byed po 'am/brkyang ba las bskums par byed pa de bzhin du 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang /
113b4('dul ba): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams lho'i 'jig rten nasngo mi snang bar gyur te/bskyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar lhag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
113b5('dul ba): kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khang bzangs sgo bzhi pa sprul pa mdzad de/sgo bzhi po dag tu 'jig rten skyong bzhi po dag sgo srungs su rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do//
113b6('dul ba): de nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis zha bos gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/gal
113b7('dul ba): phyogs su nye bar rten te 'khod do//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
114a1('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal nas/g.yon phyogs su nye bar rton to 'khod do//rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni nyon mo ldan gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba/
114a2('dul ba): dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nang par sngar langs te/khang bzangs kyi shar sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /yul 'khor srung bris smras pa/
114a3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khang por ma 'jug par sdod cig/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas/'dir ming tsam gyi tshod kyis mi chud do//
114a4('dul ba): bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yin no//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi lho sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /
114a5('dul ba): 'phags skyes pos smras pa/rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig/ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston pa mdzad pas 'dir ming tsam gyi
114a6('dul ba): tshod kyis mo chud do//bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po legra skyes pa yin no//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi nub sgo ga la ba dang
114a7('dul ba): song ba dang /mig mi bzang gis smras pa/rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston par mdzad pas/'dir
114b1('dul ba): ming tsam gyi tshod kyis mi chud do//bzhin dazangs khyod su zhig yin/rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yin no//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi byang sgo ga la ba der
114b2('dul ba): song ba dang /rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir ming tsam
114b3('dul ba): gyis tshod kyis mi chud do//bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu yin no//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma bdag gis
114b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston par mdzad pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so//bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po nas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis
114b5('dul ba): mkhyen nas/khang bzangs shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul pa mdzad pa dang /'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' shig la chos ston pa me long gi
114b6('dul ba): gzugs kyi nang na 'dug pa ltar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te su la yang 'di lta ste/da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam mo//de nas
114b7('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas/rgyal po zas gtsang la chos
115a1('dul ba): bstan par brnam pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du da gongs te/ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du
115a2('dul ba): dgongs te/da ltar rgyal ba zas gtsang su la yang 'di lta ste/da lta re bdag gi don thams cid grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam du ha cang dga' bste sems kyi rgyud mthe bar
115a3('dul ba): gyur par thugs su chud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang
115a4('dul ba): lo snyoms shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag gyi bu chen pos btsun po bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba
115a5('dul ba): der song ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi
115a6('dul ba): bu tshur gshegs/btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu byon pa la shes so//btsun pa mo'u dpal gyi bu gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
115a7('dul ba): gyi blo chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bo mdzad pas/ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mo
115b1('dul ba): sbyo bar gyur cing /shar phyogs kyi stong gon mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/'gro ba dang /'greng bya dang /'dug pa dang /nyal bya dag byed do//
115b2('dul ba): mi'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/sngon po dag
115b3('dul ba): dang /ser po dag dang /dmyur po dag dang /dkar po dag dang /btsod kA dag dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ngo //cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston te/
115b4('dul ba): lus kyis smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do//lus kyis stong nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi spyad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do//
115b5('dul ba): shar phyogs su ji lta bu bzhin du lho dang /nub dang byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin te/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas/rdzu 'phrul mngan
115b6('dul ba): par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus te/stan bshams po nyid la 'dug go/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
115b7('dul ba): btsun po mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
116a1('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pasmras pa/thub pa'i nyan pos mthu che ba//gsum rig sems kyi rnam grangs shes//zag pa zad par
116a2('dul ba): gyur pa dang //ngagra rnams bcom pa mang du yod//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das nyug gcig rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che bar ma zud kyi/'di
116a3('dul ba): ltar nyan thos rnams la yang rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba dag yod do snyam nas/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud snyoms par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
116a4('dul ba): bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu
116a5('dul ba): 'dug go/dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang
116a6('dul ba): gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos
116a7('dul ba): bstan pa mdzad do//de nas bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge yi shes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
116b1('dul ba): ga mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis byung ma
116b2('dul ba): bgyis/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang /mdza' bshes dang rtswa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrig dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
116b3('dul ba): bskams/rus pa'i ri dag lngas ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkram/mtho rnyis dang thar bI'i sgo drug ni phye/sems can+da dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yoM dgas dag
116b4('dul ba): nasu ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang drin bzhag/'khor ba ni mthur bgyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lte ba'i rang rtse mo nyidashu
116b5('dul ba): mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lag so//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lpags
116b6('dul ba): te/btsun pa bdage bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng sman tshad nas ji srid
116b7('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du glo ba theg pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o//tshogs su bcad pa yong gsol pa/bu po bzang pos pa li ni//len du phan gdags gang bgyi ba//de ni
117a1('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag la bgyis//sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur//bu pho bzang pos pha la ni//lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba//de ni khyod kyis
117a2('dul ba): bdag la bgyis//sems ni thar la gzhol bar gyur//ngan song dag las legs phyung zhing //khyod kyis mtho ris thar pa la//rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste//khyod
117a3('dul ba): kyis bka' ba legs par mdzad//tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar//mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni//nye bar rten pa bzang ba
117a4('dul ba): lags//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bden pa mthong nas/zas dkar la smras pa/gzhon nu khyod kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig/nga ni rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs
117a5('dul ba): par spyad pa spyod do//lha ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/ngas bden pa dag mthong ngo //lhas nam gzigs/deng nyid do//lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi bdag gis
117a6('dul ba): gang gi gdugs la/bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa nyid kyi gdugs la bden pa dag mthong ba lags so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas
117a7('dul ba): la smras pa/gzhon nu gnyis byed kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig/nga ni rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/ngas
117b1('dul ba): bden pa mthong ngo //lhas nam gzigs/deng nyid do//lhas deng nyid gzigs kyis/bdag cag gis cher sngar mthong lags so//rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu rnams kyi bu thu bo
117b2('dul ba): gang yin/gzhon nu bzang ldan lags so//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal por dbang bskur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
117b3('dul ba): bcas pa nyin cig ma chad par rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol ba dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba dka' thub kyis lus mi sdug par snang ba
117b4('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag nyid chen po 'di dag sems ni bzang ba yin na/lus mi bzang ste/dka' thub drag po dag gis lus mi sdug par snang
117b5('dul ba): ba dag yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ci 'dra ba 'khor yang de 'dra ba nyid du gyur na/de lta na bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de
117b6('dul ba): nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams bsdus te smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu ngan thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/lha 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
117b7('dul ba): rgyal por 'gyur ro//khyod kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/lha zham ring bar 'gyur ro//'o na da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par
118a1('dul ba): mdzad na/khyod kyi bu dag ci'i phyir zham ring mi byed/lha ci lags de dag rab tu byung ngam/rab tu byung shig/lha shAkya'i rigs rgyun chad par
118a2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig/lhas bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo//rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyi khyim
118a3('dul ba): re re nas re re rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so//gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril bsgrags pa de'i tshe nu bzang ldan dang /ma 'gags pa dang /nom
118a4('dul ba): gru la sogs pa shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu byung ngo //gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/
118a5('dul ba): rigs mthon po lngas rab tu byung ba ni rnyed pa'i phyed dang /nye ba yin no zhes gsungs pas/de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis
118a6('dul ba): dgongs pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gzhan gyi phyi kho na rab tu byung ba yin na/gzhan kho na la chags so snyam du dgongs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rnyed pa dang /
118a7('dul ba): bkur bsti chen po byung ba gcad par bzhed nas/ser skya'i gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas/mnyan yod ga la ba der gshegs te/mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na
118b1('dul ba): mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//
118b2('dul ba): bam po nyer brgyad pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha snga dro sham thabs dgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/mthar gyis
118b3('dul ba): mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo //khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha thag ring po kho na nas
118b4('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang brang brdungs te smras pa/'char kha ci'i slad du khyod kyis bdug spangs te rab tu byung /'char khas smras pa/byang chub sems dpas btsun mo
118b5('dul ba): grags 'dzin ma dang /sa 'tsho ma dang /r-i dgas skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khre spangs te rab tu byung ba ni shin tu dka' ba yin gyi/rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod
118b6('dul ba): 'char kha bdag kyang rab tu byung ngo //de ltar gyis shig/khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdu bar bgyi'o//'char khe de der dus dang 'thun pa'i dus su 'ong zhing smras pa/sbed
118b7('dul ba): ma rab tu mi 'byung ngam/sbed mas smras pa/da dung khyim gyi bya ba legs par ma bsdus so//sbed ma dus de tsam gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i khyim gyi bya ba yang legs par bsdus
119a1('dul ba): par 'gyur ro//'char kha dong legs par bsdus te sang rab tu 'byung ngo //'char kha 'di snyam du sngon yang bdag cag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis
119a2('dul ba): zil gyis mnan par gyur pas/gal te bdag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung bar gyur na/drug sde dag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung ngo zhes rgya cher zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/
119a3('dul ba): snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas/mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/
119a4('dul ba): de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs te 'dug go//spod ma yang phyi de nyin par khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te/rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas/de dge slong
119a5('dul ba): rnams kyi gan du song ste dris pa/'phags pa dag de gar mchis/de su yin/'phags pa 'tshor kha'o//de rgyal po'i khab du song ngo //sbed mes ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
119a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/sbed ma ci'i phyir du/'phags pa 'char kha'i mchid nas/khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi shig dang /bdag gis rab tu dbyung rje
119a7('dul ba): zhes mchi nas/bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchi na/de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas nga ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/rab tu byung ba
119b1('dul ba): yang ma lags//dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/sred ma 'char kha spu sI'i phyir rgyal ba'i khab tu spong bas/spu gri sa rapas khyod kyis 'dreg par 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gso sbyong
119b2('dul ba): 'bul ba dag rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas/de dag gi sred ma ngu ba mthong nas smras pa/sbed ma ci'i phyir du/'phags pa 'char kha'i mchid nas/khyim gyi bya ba legs
119b3('dul ba): par bsdus la mtsho shig dang /bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas/bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na/de rgyal po'i khab tu mtshos pas
119b4('dul ba): da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lag so//g.yengs ma dge slong dag su dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed/'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge
119b5('dul ba): slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed kyis tshur shog dang /'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis khyed rab tu 'byin par 'gyur//de dag gis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
119b6('dul ba): go'u ta ma'i gno du khrid nos smras pa/'phags ma khyim bdag gis mchis brang sbed ma 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo//skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gi'u ta mis de rab tu
119b7('dul ba): byung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so//'char kha 'di sgom du bdag gis lhung bzed nag po can rnams rjes su bsrung bas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'di rab tu ma phyung bas/rgya
120a1('dul ba): cang dang /lhag po dang /shur bu dang /shur bu bre'u dag go bar chad kyang byas la/de yang lhung bzod nag po can 'ga' zhig gis/rab tu byung
120a2('dul ba): bar gyur na/de dang 'phrad du yang mi ster ro snyam du 'byod pa skyes nas de mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so//mnyan yod na rgan zhugs shig mi dga' bzhin du
120a3('dul ba): dbyu r+ya gnas par khas blangs pa des lhung bzed dang chos gos mtshon khung du bcug ste dgagi dro byas pa na/dag gang dbye legs par byas so//dag gi dbye shin tu byas so zhes de rgyal
120a4('dul ba): po'i khab ga la ba der song ste/mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha gtsug lag khang gi sgon la mo la rnam par lta zhing 'dug pa
120a5('dul ba): des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spa bo'i me tog ltar skye ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas/'char khas bsams pa/dge slong 'ong ba 'di gnas brtan gang
120a6('dul ba): yin gsu'o snyam nas/des spros pa/gnas btsun byin pa logs so//byon pa legasaso//phyag 'tshal lo//des smras pa/slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo//'char khas
120a7('dul ba): 'di ni rgan zhugs shig ste/slob dpon yang maM shos mkhan po yang ma shes pa zhig go snyam du shes nas 'char khas de gtsug lag khang du 'jug tu bcug ste smras pa/
120b1('dul ba): rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs te smras pa/mnyan yod nas so//'char khas bsams pa/gal te dang po kho nar sbed ma'i gtam dris na 'phya bar 'gyur bas/'di ltar snga phyir byas/
120b2('dul ba): te dri bi bya'o snyam nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa ji lta/bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung bdud/nyam bya ba chung ba dang /bde ba dang /sman mi mnga' ba dang /stobs drang ljon
120b3('dul ba): par mnyon yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes sam/btsun pa 'char kha de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang /nyam nga ba chung ba dang /bde ba dang /
120b4('dul ba): spyan mi mnga' ba dang //stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so//tshe dang ldan pa ji lta/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /
120b5('dul ba): dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /dge bsnyen nA'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang /nyam nga ba chung ba dang /bde ba dang /nud med pa dang /stobs dang ldan pa mnyan yod na gnas sam
120b6('dul ba): ston pa la blta bar 'dod dum dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod dam/btsun pa 'char kha de bzhin te/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /dge bsnyen
120b7('dul ba): gyi 'khor dang /dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang /nyam nga po chung ba dang /bde ba dang /nad med pa dang stobs deng ldan par mnyan yod na gnas shing /ston pa
121a1('dul ba): m+b+habar 'a pa dang /dag pa mas nyan par 'ad na//dang ldan pa /gsasu brtan kun sa ka don dang /gnas da 'du
121a2('dul ba): chen po dang /gnas pan mo dgas kyi bu chen pa dang /gzhan yang dge slong gnas brnya gnas brnya dag gnad pa chung ba dang /nyam nga bzung ba dang /bd-i pa /
121a3('dul ba): nad med pa dang /stobs dang ldan par mnyan yad na gnas sgram btsun pa 'ar 'di de bzhin /gnad pa rlung ba dang /mang ba rdung ba da /bde /
121a4('dul ba): nI med pa dang / sa da ldan pa mnyan yod ni gnas so//tshad nga ldan pa de lcags la byung ba'i rgyal byi gsal rgyal da /zlum da m+b+hi na
121a5('dul ba): rnying pa da/khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dgas 'dzin gyis ma sa gdang /legs skyes dag shes sam/btsun pa 'tsho lnga de bzhin to shes so// dang ldan pa
121a6('dul ba): na khyod kyis khyim bdag gi rlung ma skyed ma shes sam/btsun pa 'char kha shes ti ni btsun pa 'char kha'i sngon gyi chung ma yin no//rgan zhugs gtam shes so//
121a7('dul ba): de dadung yang khyod kyis khyim 'dag gi chung ma yin snyam mas /de ni rab tu byung ngo //sus rab tu byung /skye dbu'i bdag mtshan ma garu tu mas sa//'cha
121b1('dul ba): bsams pa/da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/rgan zhugs tshur shog/rkang pa dag khrus shig ces des de la rkang pa bslu ba dang /lag pa bsku ba
121b2('dul ba): mang po byin nas/des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ya gang gtsugs ste/zung mthon pa la bzhag nas smras pa/rgan zhugs gtsug lag khang 'di ni zas dang bcas pa rnyed pa
121b3('dul ba): dang bcas pa yin gyis/gtsug lag khang 'dir mngon par dga' bar gyis shig/des smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha bdag ni mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te 'gro ba yin
121b4('dul ba): pas bdag gnas 'di mi 'dod do//'char khas de'i mdun du sgo lcags dang lde mig kyog po dag bzhag ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bco mo ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
121b5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gnas pa dang bcas par bya'i mi gnas par mi bya'o zhes smras nas/mig lam du mi snang bar song ste/de mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yong du phyin nas
121b6('dul ba): 'char khas rang gi gtsug lag khang chag cho ga btab legs par byugs/lci ba sngar pa'i byug pas byigs te sgro bcad na/khri steng na phyinan du nyal zhing skad kyi gdangs kyis
121b7('dul ba): kha thon byed cing 'dug go/dge slong ma 'dun pa 'bul ba dag lhags nas/de dag gis de'i skad kyi gdengs nas de dag gis de la phyag 'tshal to smras pa/'phags pa 'char kha khyod
122a1('dul ba): gar bzhud/'char khas smras pa/rgyal po'i khab tu'o//de dag dbyar khang du dong nas/sbed ma la smras pa/sbed ma dga' ba skyed cig/khyod
122a2('dul ba): kyi slob dpon 'ongs so//kho mo'i slob dpon gang /'char kha'o de ji ltar kho mo'i slob dpon ci kho mos de'i gan nas blags sam/g.yengs ma khyod kyis mi shos kyis
122a3('dul ba): dge slong ma rnams ni dge slong la rag/mang du las kyis khyod song la ltos shig/sbed mas nas kyi ngar phye dang /khrus kyi chal dang / 'bru mar thogs te/'char kha'i
122a4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du song nas/sbed mas 'char kha'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo bdungs pa dang /'chaHkhas smras pa/de su yin/sbed mas smras pa/bdag sbed
122a5('dul ba): ma'o//khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'ongs pa leg so//bdag da dung yang khyod kyis khyim bdag gi chung ma lags sam/'o na ci yin/bdag rab tu byung ngo //
122a6('dul ba): khyod sus rab tu phyung /'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mas so//kho bo re shig bya ba de lta bu zhig byung nas/de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po'i khyab tu song na/
122a7('dul ba): khyod la brtad po tsa byung na de'i phyir khyod rab tu byung /khyod kyi zhal nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la shog shig dang kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes gsung
122b1('dul ba): nas/bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na/khyod rgyal po'i khab du bzhud de/gal te bdag 'ang bsnga mas rab tu ma byung du lags na/bdag khyim na gnas
122b2('dul ba): par yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags par 'gyur ro//'char khas smras pa/sbed ma ci kho bo bdag nyid kyi lag ngar la sos 'debs par byed dam/skye dgu'i bdag mo
122b3('dul ba): chen mo go'u ta mas rab tu phyung yang rung /kho bos rab tu phyung yang rung ste/legs kyis nang du zhugs shig dang /chos bstan par bya'o//sred mas 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis
122b4('dul ba): la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/des de la chos bstan par brtsams te/des de la ji tsam pa de tsam du chos bstan nas/sngon gyi bgad pa dang /
122b5('dul ba): dgo' bar byas pa dang /rtses pa dang /dga' dgur spyad pa dran par bya bar brtsams te/sbeng ma bdag cag gnyis kyis bskyed mos tshal dang /'dun sa dang /lha'i
122b6('dul ba): gnas ga ge mo zhig tu zas 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang /btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dran nam zhes smras
122b7('dul ba): pa dang /'char kha kun tu chags par gyur te//ji lta ji lta dun tu chags par gyur pa de lta de ltar dral to//bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dris pa'i chos lnga
123a1('dul ba): yod de/lnga gang zhe na/skyes pa chags par gyur ba de shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /dus shes shing zla mtshan shos pa dang /mngal na
