123a2('dul ba): gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la
123a3('dul ba): gal te bu mo yin na dgu g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o//sbed ma des 'char kha chagaso snyam du shes nas/sbed mas smras pa/slad rol tu mchis/'char khas bsams pa
123a4('dul ba): 'di bshad pa byed 'dod dam/gtso ba byed 'dod gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa song shig/sbed ma phyir byung nas shing dpung bcad brdzes te brgyug par brtsams pa dang /'char
123a5('dul ba): kha de sgra la mkhas pa yin pas/de nas de'i sgra thos nas/de'i phyi bzhin du byung ste/dge slong ma mgo reg mo gar 'bros shes de de'i phyi bzhin brgyug par brtsams pa dang /
123a6('dul ba): de la brla'i rigs pas khu ba byung nas de kun nas bkris pa dang bral te/glang po che chags pa dang bral ba bzhin du gzhi dag nyid na 'dag go/skad mas de kun nas dkris pa dang bral
123a7('dul ba): te/phyir log pa mthong nas 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral lo snyam du rig nas/drung du song ste/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kho la 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa gal te bdag gi
123b1('dul ba): dang du bladab par gyur na/bdag kyang dge slong mar mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur la/khyod kyang dge slong du mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur ro//sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag nyid srung na gzhan
123b2('dul ba): srung bar byed la/gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes pa legs par gsungs so//ji ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed ce na/sten par byed pa dang /goms pa
123b3('dul ba): byed pa dang /lan mang du byed pa dang /rjes su srung bar byed pa dang /reg par byed pa dang /mngon sum du byed pa ste/de ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed do//
123b4('dul ba): ji ltar gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed ce na/tho mi 'tsham pa dang /mi gshe ba dang /mi 'tshe ba dang /rjes su brtse ba dang /rjes su snying brtse ba dang /byams pa
123b5('dul ba): sems kyis te/de ltar gzhan srung ni bdag nyid srung bar byed do//'phags pa sham thabs 'di chur stsol bkru bar bgyi'o//'char khas sham thabs de sbeng mA la byi na//sbed mas
123b6('dul ba): khu ba de mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te/bdag gi lus kyi phyogs btsun pa 'char khas sngon ma mthong ba 'am/sngon ma mnabs pa 'am/sngon ma byugs pa ci zhig yod na
123b7('dul ba): bdag gis dang du ma blangs po ni ma legs pa zhig byas so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes so//sbed mas de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/de kun tu chags shing dral bar gyur pa'i sems kyis
124a1('dul ba): khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi sgor blug so//sems can rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de la sems can zhugs par
124a2('dul ba): gyur to//de dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa sbed ma kho mo cag go khyod chos bzang po'i chos kyis 'phags pa 'char kha'i gan du 'gro bar sems kyi/kho mo
124a3('dul ba): cog gis des khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas par mi sems so//sbed mas smras pa/phu nu mo dag dge slong de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/gang tshun chad
124a4('dul ba): rab tu byung nas/des kho mo sngan chad lan 'gro' yang lag gis kyang byugs so//de dag gis smras pa/ma byugs na yang des khyod gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar byas
124a5('dul ba): na/gal te byugs na des khyod gnas skabs ji ltar byas par 'gyur zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyi dge slong rnams la brjod do//dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
124a6('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong ma de ni bam par mi gyur gyis/'di ltar phyogs dben par bzhag ste/bsod
124a7('dul ba): snyoms kyis 'brel pa med par gyis shig dang /bu gzhon nu 'od srung zhes bya ba btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
124b1('dul ba): pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/dge slong gzhon nu 'od srung de ni nga'i gtam sna tshogs dang /gtam snyan pa dang spobs pa dge ba can rnams kyi
124b2('dul ba): mchog tu 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa dge slong rnams nyes dmigs byung ba gang yin pa de ni/dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'ang gos snying pa 'khrur 'jud pa las gyur pa
124b3('dul ba): yin no snyam du dgongs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das byung ba 'di dang /gling gzhi 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la tshogs bsnga ma bzhin no//
124b4('dul ba): nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ba ste/yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos snying pa 'khrur 'jud dam/'tshed du 'dzud dam/
124b5('dul ba): 'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/'char kha 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba'o//nye du ma yin
124b6('dul ba): pa la zhes bya ba ni/phyi mo dang mes po//thugs las rten po'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no//gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po ngal gos dang /
124b7('dul ba): sha gos dang /zar mo'i gos dang /du ku la'i gos dang /ras bal gyi gos dang /ko tam pa'i gas dnganyi thog mi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o//rnying pa zhes bya
125a1('dul ba): ba ni dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang yin pa'o//'khrur 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur skyug par byed du 'jud na'o///
125a2('dul ba): 'tshed du 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni/tha na chen skyug par byed du 'jud na'o//'chag du 'dzud na zhes bya ba ni/tha na thal mos rdebs par byed du 'jud na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed
125a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni/dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so////de la
125a4('dul ba): ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'ched du 'jud
125a5('dul ba): na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'khrur 'jud pa dang /'tsheng du 'jud dam/'tshig tu 'jud dam/'tshed du 'jud
125a6('dul ba): pa dang /'khrur 'dzud dam/'tshed du 'jud pa dang /'chag tu 'jud pa dang /'khrur 'jung dam/'chag tu 'dzud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /
125a7('dul ba): 'tshed du 'jud dam/'chag tu 'jud pa spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong ma nyi du ma yin pa la yid gnyis ze bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i
125b1('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'tshod du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'khrur 'jud pa dang /'tshed du 'jud dam/
125b2('dul ba): 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/'tshod du 'jud pa dang /'khrur 'jud dem/'tshod du 'jud pa dang /'chag tu 'jud dam/'chag tu 'jud pa dang /'khrur
125b3('dul ba): 'jud dam/'chag tu 'jud pa dang /'ched du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /'chad du 'jud pa dang /'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis
125b4('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'tshed du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'chag tu 'jud ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
125b5('dul ba): 'khrur 'jud pa dang /'chad du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /'chag tu 'jud dam/'tshed du 'jud pa dang /'khrur 'jud dam/'tshed du 'dzud pa dang /'chag
125b6('dul ba): tu 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud dmA/'chag tu 'jud pa dang /'tshed du 'dzud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /'chad du 'jud pa dang /'chag tu 'jud na nyes byasu 'gyuraro//
125b7('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong ma he du la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'tshad du 'jud na nyes bya su 'gyur ro//'chag tu 'jud na nyes bya su 'gyu ro//
126a1('dul ba): na du/ du sa/ du ga 'du/da du nga/byung sa smras du/
126b1('dul ba): du dgongs te/ci'i phyir shAkya rab tu byung ba dag bden pa dag mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs nas/de dag shin tu gos kyis chab la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing /de dag

126b3('dul ba): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag pa zla ba
126b4('dul ba): gsum po 'di la nga nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcoM lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong

127b1('dul ba): gang gi tsho dral bar gyur pa de'i tshen des byed du gzhug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang du dal bus khad kyis khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang /bcom
127b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de la chab sgro dbye ba mdzad de//de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/sangs rgyas
127b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis ni dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la dge slong khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs/gang las dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bya ba'i so sor kun dka'
127b4('dul ba): bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la/nye sde khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs
127b5('dul ba): shes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes gsol pa/btsun pa bdag da ltar ldongs nas mchis so//bdag ljongs su dbyar gnas par mchid kyis 'tshal
127b6('dul ba): to//nye sde ljongs su dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas sam/btsun pa bgyis so//TI sde gang gis khyod mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang yin/rkyen ni gang yin//btsun
127b7('dul ba): pa 'di na dal te bdag gis g.yer sngar rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhig mchi na/bdag de la 'di skad ces bzhin bzangs khyed chur mchi/dgon pa ba 'tshol cog ces mchi zhing
128a1('dul ba): dgon pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid/bsod snyoms pa dang /chos gos gsum pa dang /phyag dar khrod pa dang /shing drung ba 'tshal
128a2('dul ba): cig ces mchi zhing /shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid do//gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi na/de rab tu 'byin par bgyid do//gal te rdzogs par
128a3('dul ba): bsnyen par 'tshal ba dang /gnas la zhugs pa dang /klag pa la zhugs pa dang /mchod rton la zhugs pa dang /yid la bgyi ba la zhugs pa zhig mchis na/bdag
128a4('dul ba): de la yang 'di skad ces bzhin bzangs khyod tshur mchi/dgon pa pa 'tshal cig ces mchi zhing /dgon pa pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid//bsod snyoms dang
128a5('dul ba): chos gos gsum dang /phyag dar khrod pa dang /shing drung ba 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing /shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid do//gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes
128a6('dul ba): mchi na/de la yid la bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/btsun pa gang gis bdag mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de lagasarkyen ni de lags so//nye sde
128a7('dul ba): khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dnga'ajig rten la brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs
128b1('dul ba): // sdi gang la la zlog sbyangs pa man tan dadag kyi 'asugs pa ba ba du rlung ba ngan para'i bsngags pa badzod par ma nadan ston no//gang la la snangs pa ma yon tan de dgag
128b2('dul ba): gas pa brjod par byed pa dun gas pa da per byed pa yin//na son tan dag sa bskyed pa dang /ra ba da /

128b4('dul ba): lag su ma 'tshal to//nye sde 'di na dus dge slong rnam stsa la 'di skad ces/dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la rlung du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/nga'i spyan sngar
128b5('dul ba): dge sbyong bsod snyoms stabs pa gcig da /'di nyid kyi gas sbyong bcwo lnga pa'i tshem gtogs par/dge slong gang gis kyang 'ong bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa da
128b6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang drag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stabs pa gcig da /'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i chu ma gtogs par/bdug
128b7('dul ba): cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong ngas snyoms stobs po gcig dang /'di nyid kyi gos sbyong bco lnga pa'i
129a1('dul ba): ma gtogs par/bdag cag las gang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba da bdag cag gis ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas//
129a2('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni blo bur du mchis pa lags te/don de ni dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi bsrung bar dgyi ba lags so//nye sde dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang na/gnyug mar
129a3('dul ba): gnas pas kyang dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba srung bar bya ba kho na yin no//nye sde 'di ltar ngas dge slong glo bur du lhag pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste//dge
129a4('dul ba): slong glo bur du 'ongs pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/dge slong dag la gnas 'di ni khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yod ces dri bar bya'o//gal te 'drin de lta na legs/gal te mi
129a5('dul ba): 'drin 'gal tshabs su 'gyur ro//nye sde de lta smod kyi ngas dge slong dkon pa pa la dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
129a6('dul ba): phyir ltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do//dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang /rnyed pas chod pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /zas phyis mi len pa dang /stan gcig pa dang
129a7('dul ba): chos gos gsum pa dang /bying ba ba dang /phyag dar khrod pa dang /shing drung ba dang /dur khrod pa dang /cog pu pa dang /bla gab med pa pa dang /gzhi je bzhin pa la gzhi ji
129b1('dul ba): bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes
129b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa dang /rjes su yi rang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi
129b3('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas drug sde dag tshe dang ldan pa nye sde ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa nye sde je skabs phye shig/ltung ba sde
129b4('dul ba): lnga po dag la skabs che'o//khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar gyis shig/ltung ba ma mthong ngo //khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ma dral ta ma/dge 'dun gyi khrims
129b5('dul ba): su bya ba ji lta bu yin/drug sde dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis nye sde
129b6('dul ba): de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la/dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/dge slong dgon pa pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro ba'i
129b7('dul ba): dus ma yin pa med do//dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang /rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa /zas phyis mi len pa dang /stan cig pa dang /chos gos gsum pa dang /
130a1('dul ba): bying ba pa dang /phyag dar khrod pa dang /shing drung pa dang /dur khrod pa dang /cog pu pa dang /blag pa med pa dang /gni ji bzhin pa la
130a2('dul ba): gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do//
130a3('dul ba): zhes gsungs so//de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba rnam par smad cing 'dod pa chung ba bstod pa ni don gyis na/
130a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag smad pa mdzad pa yin gyis/bdag cag gis lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /ska rags lhag pa dag khyer te
130a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad de/rgyud dag pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong ngo snyam mo//de nas dge slong de dag lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang dri ba dang
130a6('dul ba): por bu dang /ska rags lhag pa dag khyer to/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la der dong nas byin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//
130a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag las lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang dra ba dang per bu dang /ska rags lhag pa 'di dag bzhes shig/
130b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus/de'i bar du sdod cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/bcom
130b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de bcom ldan 'das la
130b3('dul ba): rgyas par gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir long la blangs nas kyang gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu
130b4('dul ba): spungs te zhog la/dge slong gang des brel ba'i dge slong de la de sbyin par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/
130b5('dul ba): shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams las lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag blangs nas/gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu spungs te bzhag go//de nas shAkya
130b6('dul ba): rab tu byung ba de dag lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang dra ba dang por bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag nang ji lta ba dang /'bras ji lta ba dang /zug rngu ji lta ba bzhin du spangs nas/chos gos
130b7('dul ba): gsum pa lhur len cing rgyud dag pa dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
131a1('dul ba): rba /ma gag tug dang //ban+d+ham sa ma las byung ba d+ma dag bsas pa dang /drug /rnams nga/
131a2('dul ba): rang bzhin drug su chud nas/'di ltar shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya ba de dag gis sbyin de dag nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri rtse mo nyi shu mtho pa ye gas kyi
131a3('dul ba): rjes bcwa ma /rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chus bstan par mdzad do//de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsal pa/btsun pa bdag cag nas
131a4('dul ba): dge ba'i bshes gton bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di ste bu ni/bdag cag la pas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang
131a5('dul ba): sa/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyu ma bgyisasngon gyis mas dag gis ma bzlasadage slong dang /blam pa dag gis
131a6('dul ba): bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang mi bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskamasarus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgrum/
131a7('dul ba): ngan sang gi sgo dag ni bkum//mtho ras dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni bye//sems can dmyal ba der/dud 'gro dong yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa srung /lha dang mi rnams
131b1('dul ba): sbyin du na bzhu//'khor ba las na mapar bsngos/thog ma sa mdzes p+ta'o ngas nas/bsag skye ba 'jug tshogs stsalta pa'i ri coM ma nyo shu man pa yo shem
131b2('dul ba): sa/rkyen tu klag+sas grus na ma na u d+ha mas / na sa rgyam smras /rnams ca gcod pas su rgyas
131b3('dul ba): sbyin 'das lta smras patsun pa tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis sh+tsa na ba rgya bo da dang na pa d+hi b+h+re l+ya brten te/'dod pa che ba dang bral nong 'dang bachu
131b4('dul ba): ts+tshed la bak+ko de/na tu mapa thugs pa'i grub pa dang /bdeb myongan mas des pa la banag pa mdzad pa ni ngo ma //dge sbyong dgud ste rlung 'dod tshigs
131b5('dul ba): bral te/sred pa med pa/len pa med pa/thams cad mkhyen pa dang shes bya thams cad la mngar rgyas pas/shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po dag rigs kyi bu snre la ban+d+ha te/
131b6('dul ba): 'dod bache bdang bral zhi /2du baglang brjid la ga/ na tu ma na pa'i dang /'di byung na mas 'das pa la ga zhig po mdzad pa ma
131b7('dul ba): sna 'das pa'i na pa 'ad chags dang bcas pa/zhe sde dang bcom mun da da pa bcas pa/len pa dang thabs pa/skyab dang /rnab dang/
132a1('dul ba): na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dag las rnam par ma grol bas
132a2('dul ba): kyang /shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la rten te/'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la gzhag par
132a3('dul ba): mdzad pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer ba zhin rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/rgyas pa/bde ba lo legs pa/skye bo dang mims
132a4('dul ba): pos gang ba/'thab mo dang 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /'khrug long dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rab tu zhes byed du
132a5('dul ba): bcug ste/des bu gcig pa rnying du sdug pa dang 'dra bar rgyal srid skyong du bcug go/rgyal po tshangs sbyin la btsun mo tshangs ldan zhes bya ba dang /rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya
132a6('dul ba): ba yod de/rgyal po tshangs sbyin de la bu med nas/de bu 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang /lus ngan dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /gzhan yang lha'i bye brag
132a7('dul ba): 'di lta ste/kun dga'i ra bo'i lha dag dang /tshal gyi lha dag dang /gzhi mdo'i l+li dag dang /sum mdo'i lha dag dong /gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /lhan cig
132b1('dul ba): skyes pa dag dang /chos 'thun pa dag dang /rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so//'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dag dang /bu mo
132b2('dul ba): dog skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/de ni de lta ma yin te/gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/re re la yang 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu
132b3('dul ba): stong yod par 'gyur ro//'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las ma'i mngal chags na gnas pa 'jug par 'gyur te/gsum po de dag gang zhe na/pha ma gnyis
132b4('dul ba): chags par gyur cing phrad pa dang /ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las
132b5('dul ba): bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro//de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len pa la zhugs pa na/sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa
132b6('dul ba): yi dam brtan pa zhig sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas/btsun mo tshangs ldan gyi mngal du zhugs so//bud med kyi yul mkhas po'i rang bzhin can la la la ma
132b7('dul ba): 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod do//lnga gong zhe na/skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang
133a1('dul ba): mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /gang las mngal na gnas po zhugs pa de shes pa dang /khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/gal te khyo'u
133a2('dul ba): yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o//de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas rgyal po tshangs byin la smras pa/lha
133a3('dul ba): dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni/'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'u ra 'gyur ro//rgyal po tshangs
133a4('dul ba): byin yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas 'di skad ces kye ma kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /kho bo dang 'thun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye
133a5('dul ba): ba dang /kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /bsgo skal la spyod pa dang /kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur pa dang /bdag cag
133a6('dul ba): shi zhing dus las 'das pa dag la nyung ngu 'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/'did gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar
133a7('dul ba): gyur cig ces ming gis yon tan bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do//de la sems can zhugs par rig nas/'di lta ste/
133b1('dul ba): mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhar gtogs pa na/grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /sman pas
133b2('dul ba): bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /ho cang mi sbyar ba dang /ha cang lan tshwa mi tsha ba dang /ha cang mi mngar ba dang /ha cang me che ba dang /ha tsong mi bska ba dang /kha ba dang /
133b3('dul ba): sbyar ba dang /lan tshwa ba dang /mngar ba dang /tsha bo dang /bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /do shal dang /se mo do dang /rgyan gyis rlubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga'
133b4('dul ba): ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /khyi nas khrir dang /khri'u nas khri'ur dang /shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par
133b5('dul ba): gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jud do//de nas dus gzhan zhig ni btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'dri skyes te/kye ma lhas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag
133b6('dul ba): byin par gyur cing /bsod nams dge byed par gyur cing lho sgo dang /nub sgo dang /byed sgo dang /dbus kyi gzhi mdor yang sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byed cing /
133b7('dul ba): btson thams cad thar par byed par gyur cig/snyam mo//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa de lta bu de skyes par thos nas/grong khyer gyi
134a1('dul ba): shar sgor sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do//de bzhin du b+h+yo skr-i dang /nub b+h+yo dang /byang sgo dang /dbus kyi bzhi mdar yang sbyin pa
134a2('dul ba): dag sbyin/bsod nams dag byed kyi/can thams cad zer bar byas so//yang btsun mtshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/kye ma bdag lha dang lhan cog bskyed
134a3('dul ba): mos tshal dang /dka' thub kyi nagasu zhugs te/rtse ba dang /dga' ba dang /dga' dgur spyad par gyur cig snyam mo//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan la
134a4('dul ba): 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu de skyes par thos nas/btsun mo tshangs ldan dang lhan cig bskyed mos tshal dang /dka' thub kyi nag su zhugs te/rtse ba dang dga' ba dang /dga' dgur
134a5('dul ba): spyod pa dag byas so//yang btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/kye ma bdag lnga dang thabs gtsog rngur 'jug pa'i glur zhugs te/rdzing bu tshangs
134a6('dul ba): ljin du rtse ba dang /dga' ba dang /dga' dgur spyod par gyur cig snyam mo//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis btsun mo tshas ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar
134a7('dul ba): thos nas/detsun mo tshangs ldan lhan cig tshur 'jug pa'i grwa me tog/ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /su mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos bkab pa zhugs te/rdzi buM tshangs ldan
134b1('dul ba): dun+na byA dang /dga' ba dang /dga' dgur spyad pa byas so//da na nyid du bcas pa las khyo rabs dran pa gzugs parang ba bstan sdug pa mdzes pa gas pa pa/gsor gyi mad//'ad/
134b2('dul ba): mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'dzar la sna'i bzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //de'i nyi du dag 'dus shing lhags nas/nyi ma bdun gsum
134b3('dul ba): nyi shu gcig tu bcas pa'i bcas skyon rgya cher byas nas/khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes ming 'degs par byed do//de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir khye'u 'di chu'i nang
134b4('dul ba): du bcas pa de'i phyir/khye'u yi ming chu skyes shes bya'o zhes de'i ming chu skyes shes bya bar btag so//gzhon nu chu skyes ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i
134b5('dul ba): mA ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phya ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtsed phyogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do//dom ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /zho dang zhun mar dang /mar
134b6('dul ba): gyi snying bu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do//de nas gzhon nu
134b7('dul ba): chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gong nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes snyam na/sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes so//las ci byas na des
135a1('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes snyam na/lo drug cur rgyal chab kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug pas de dag tu skyes par shes so//da ltar gang du skyes
135a2('dul ba): snyam na/mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po'i rigs su skyes par shes nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag kyang rgyal srid byed du btsug na/yang sems can dmyal po rnam su
135a3('dul ba): dgro bar 'gyur na ma legs kyis/bdag gis sgyu thabs cung zhig bya'o snyam nas des bdag nyid 'phye bo nyid du bstan te 'dug go/gang gi nyin mo gzhon nu chu skyes bcas
135a4('dul ba): pa de nyid kyi nyin ma blon po lnga brgya dag gi bu dag kyang btsas te/de dog kyang rang rang gi rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming dag btags par gyur to//blon po de dag gi kun tu spyod pa
135a5('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing rgyal po tshangs byin dang /gzhon nu chu skyes ltar 'ong ngo //de nas dus gzhan zhig nA/gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag mchongs pa dang dkyus mo byed nus par gyur to//
135a6('dul ba): denas rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/gal te nga'i bu gzhon nu nu skyes kyang phyi bor ma gyur du zin na/de yang de tsam mchongs pa dang /dkyus mo byed nus pa
135a7('dul ba): 'gyur gyis/'di ltar bdag gis de 'bye bo yin yang blas rgyal srid kyi dngang phyug lo bzhag par bya'o snyam mo//de nas gzhon nu chu skyes kyis de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/
135b1('dul ba): rgyal po 'di ni bcugs med par gnod pa byed pa yin gyis/bdag gis sgeg pa nyid du bstan te 'dug par bya'o snyam mo//des ched du bsams te lkug pa nyid du bstan te 'dug go/de na dus gzhan
135b2('dul ba): zhig na/gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag smra nus par gyur to//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag gi bu gzhon nu chu skyes kyang lkug par ma gyur du zin no/de
135b3('dul ba): yang da tsam+ba sma nus par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de'i tshe na gzhon nu chu skyes kyi ming gzhon nu chu skyes gzhon nu skyes bya ba gA yin pa de nub par gyur cing /gzhon nu lug 'phye gzhon nu lkug 'phye
135b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i mong chags par gyur to//de nas dus gzhan zhog na/rgyal po che ngas byin log po la 'gram pa gtad de/sems khongs su chud cing 'dug nas/blon po
135b5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs khongs su chud cing bo zhugs/rgyal pos smras pa/'di ltar nga'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba
135b6('dul ba): le bu yang med bu mo yang med pas nga 'das nas gdung chad par 'gyur la/bu cig bdog pa de yang lkug 'phyer gyur na/da ji ltar sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug du
135b7('dul ba): rung /blon po rnams kyis sman pa gnyer te/smin pa la rmas na/smras pa/lha gzhon nu 'di'i dbang po gsal bar gda' ste/'di la bro nad kyi rnam pa ni cung zad
136a1('dul ba): kyang ma mchis pas bsdigs par bgyi ba'i rigs so//rgyal po chungs byin gyi bshud ma dag bkug nas gsang ste ts+tsha ba/ngas gzhan nu
136a2('dul ba): lhag 'phye 'di skye bo phal po che'i mngon sum du yongs su btang bar byas/khyed kyis gsad par mi bya'o//lho bka' bzhin 'tshal rgyal po chungs byin 'khor gyi nang du song ste
136a3('dul ba): gshed ma rnams la bsgo ba/ngas gzhan nu 'di yongs su btang gos khyed kyis 'or cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po tshangs byin las
136a4('dul ba): mnyan nas/gzhon nu lcug 'phye shing rtar bcug de/grong khyer ba ra na se'i nang nas phyir khrid do//de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes grong khyer ba ra na sa 'byor pa dang rgyas pa mthong nas
136a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so//ce bar na si 'di stong pa yin na me/'on te gnas pa yin/ga shed ma'i mi rnams kyi gzhon nu lcug 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/lha gzhon nu lkug
136a6('dul ba): 'phyes tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod do zhes smras so//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis gzhon nu lcug 'phye bang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so//gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/gzhon nu
136a7('dul ba): gang gsod du gzhug par bya/gang srog dang dbral bar bya/gang la ci zhig sbyin par gyi/de skad smras kyang gzhan nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o//rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yang
136b1('dul ba): /shod ma rnams la smras pa/ngas gnon nu 'di yongs su btang gis/khyed kyis 'or cig/gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/yang gzhon nu lhag 'phye shing d+hA
136b2('dul ba): bcug ste/grong khyer ba ra na si'i nang nas phyir khrid pa dang /gzhon nu lhag 'phyes mi'i ro me bzhis khyer ba zhig mthong nas smras pa/ciraro 'di shi ba nyid kyi yin nama'on te gson
136b3('dul ba): po'i ro yin gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkug 'phye rgyal po lo phul nas/lha gzhon nus tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod do zhes smras so//rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yang gzhon nu lkug
136b4('dul ba): 'phye bang du gzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so//gzhin nu gang gsad par bya/gang gsod du gzhug par bya/gang srog dang dpral bar bya/gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/de skad smras kyang
136b5('dul ba): gzhon nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o//yang rgyal po tshangs byin gyi gshed ma rnams la smras pa/ngas gzhon nu yongs su bting gis/khyed kyis 'or cig/gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis
136b6('dul ba): lha bki'i bzhin 'tshal zhes/yang gzhon nu lkug 'phye shing d+hAr bcug ste/grong khyer bar na se'i nang nas phyir khrid pa dang /gzhon nu lkug 'phyes 'bru'i phung po chen po zhig mthong nas
136b7('dul ba): smras pa/gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung mo zos na chen por 'gyur ro//gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/lha gzhan nus tshig
137a1('dul ba): 'di lta bu brjod do/zhes smras so//rgyal po tshangs byin gyis kyang gzhon nu lcug 'phye bang du bzhag ste/'di skad ces smras so//gzhon nu gang bsad
137a2('dul ba): par bya/gang gsod du gzhug par bya/gang srog dang dbral bar bya/gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o//rgyal po tshangs byin gyis
137a3('dul ba): yang bshed ma rnams la smras pa/ngas gzhon nu yongs su btang gis/shes ldan dog song la gzhon nu nags khrod dus thams su chug shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshalo zhes/
137a4('dul ba): gshud ma'i mi rnams kyis yang gzhon nu lkug 'bye shing rtar bcug ste/nags khrod ga la ba der so nas phyin pa dang /dong rko bar brtsams so//de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes
137a5('dul ba): de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/kha lo sgyur ba ci'i phyir khyed//brtad dang bcas pa dong rko byed//ci'i phyir khyed cag dong rko ba//dris pa nga la myur du smros//kho lo sgyur bas
137a6('dul ba): smras pa/rgyal po'i sras bu mi smra ba/lcug 'phye btsos nas de yis ni//myur bar 'di ni nags khrod du//dong du chug ces bka' stsal to//de nas gzhon nu lkuga'i'aphye 'di
137a7('dul ba): snyam du sems te/'di dag ni drag shul can/lag pa dmar ba/snum pa dang rab tu snum pa la zhugs pa/gnan gyi srog gcod pa/gzhan gyi srog gcod pas
137b1('dul ba): 'tsho bar byed pa dag yin pas/gal te na 'di dag gis bdag gsad par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam du rig nas/de skrag ste gshed ma rnams la smras pa/gal te lhas bdag la dam pa
137b2('dul ba): cig stsal na bdag rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug cing /tshig kyang smra'o//gshed ma rnams kyis rgyal po'i gan du song ste rgyas par brjod pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu
137b3('dul ba): gal te nga rgyal srid 'dod na/ngas de yang gzhan nu la sbyin no//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yid dga' nas blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer
137b4('dul ba): thams cad myur du rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang gyo mo med par zhog la/bdug spos dang /phye ma 'khrigs pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang /me tog sna tshogs
137b5('dul ba): dgram pa gyis shig rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub la lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub/rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pas//blon po
137b6('dul ba): rnams kyis lha bka' stsal bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po las mnyan nas/grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang gyo mo dang /gse gro ma med par bzhag cing /bdug spos dang
137b7('dul ba): phye ma 'khregs pa dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan sgreng ba dang me tog sna tshogs dgram pa byas so//ljongs kyi mi 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye rkang
138a1('dul ba): pas grong sbyor du 'jug cing /tshiklung smra bar 'gyur zhes ya mtshan skyes nas 'dus par gyur te//dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/
138a2('dul ba): bam po nyer dgu pa//de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du zhugs nas/rgyal po tshangs byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po chungs byin gyi rkang pa gnyis
138a3('dul ba): la gtugs te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa smras pa/bdag lhag ma lagos 'bye ma lags//glen pa ma legs blo med min//gsal bar bgyid pa'i tshig rnams kyis//
138a4('dul ba): smra ba bdag lags mi dbang po//bdag lcags ma lags 'phya ma lags//glen pa ma lags blo med min//dbang po chang ba gsal ba dang //ldan pa bdag lags mi
138a5('dul ba): dbang po//rgyal pos smras pa/bu khyod ci'i phyir tshig smra bar mi byed cing /rkang pas 'gro bar mi byed lnga de'i skad du/gson cig/bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rab su//dgung lo
138a6('dul ba): drug cur bdag gis ni//mi rnams nang du rgyal chab kyi//rgyal srid rigs 'thun bgyid stsal pas//dgung la stong phyag drug cu ru//sems can demyal bar rab tu bsregs/
138a7('dul ba): mas dmyal sdug bsngal mi bzad pa//drag po 'jigs rung dran gyur nas//rgyal srid mngon pa'i 'tshal zhing //smon chad sems dmyal mchi mi bgyid//ya
138b1('dul ba): bdag ni rab 'byung bar//rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol//rgyal pos smras pa/bu drang srong dag gang gi phyir dka' thub kyis gdud pa dang sbyin bsreg dang /mchod sbyin byed pa ni
138b2('dul ba): rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na/khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid lag mthal na 'dug pa spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/de na gzhan nu lcuga'i phyes/de'i tshe tshegasu bcad pa smras pa//'khon
138b3('dul ba): bcugs 'thab brtsod bgyid pa yi//'dod la spyod pa bdag mi 'chil/khon btsugs 'thab rtsod 'jig bgyid pa'i//tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad par bgyi//kim pa'i
138b4('dul ba): 'bras bu 'dra ba yi//'dod pa spyod par bdag mi 'tshal//'bras bu bdud rtsi'i ro bdar ba'i//tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad par bgyi//rgyal pos smos pa/bde ba gang dang
138b5('dul ba): glang dag nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni rgyal po nyid yin na/khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes de'i tshe
138b6('dul ba): tshigs bcad pa smras pa/glang las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur ba'o//bde ba de la bder mi sems//gang las bde ba skye 'gyur ba'i//sdug bsngal de la bde ba sems//
138b7('dul ba): yab kyis bdag ni dka' thub kyi//nag su mche ba gnang bar mdzod//rgyal pos smras pa/bu 'di ni yang tog gi steng bdug spos dang phye ma 'khrigs par me tog sna tshogs
139a1('dul ba): bkram zhing gnas mal 'jam pa lags par bshams pa dag tu gang nus kyang 'jigs pa med par nyal bar bya zhing /sil snyan gyi sgra snyan pa dag
139a2('dul ba): gis sad par bya ba dang /gos 'jam po bgo bar bya ba dang /zhim po bza' bar bya/zhim po gtung bar bya ba yin na//dgon par rab tu byung bas rtag tu shing drung
139a3('dul ba): du rtsa bting ba 'am/lo ma bting ba la bred ngas kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ri dgas bdug pa dag dang lhan cig nyal bar bye ba dang /wa'i skad kyis
139a4('dul ba): sod par bya ba dang /g.yang bzhi dang shing shun bgo bar bya ba dang /rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag bza' bar bya ba dang /chu dron po rnyog pa can dag btung bar bya dgos
139a5('dul ba): na/ci'i phyir khyod rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/de nas gzhon nu lcags 'phyes de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/nags na shing shun rtswa gyen zhing //
139a6('dul ba): rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang //ri dgas gdug pa rnams dang ni//lhan cig gnas pa mchog logs kyi//'jig rten pha rol 'jig bgyid pa'i//mkhas pa rgyal srid slad du ni///
139a7('dul ba): gsod dang 'chi dang rdeg pa dag/bgyid pa de lta ma lags kyis//yab kyi bdag ni dka' thub kyi//nag su 'chi ba gnang bar mdzod//rgyal pos smras pa/bu je kho bo'i the tsom
139b1('dul ba): gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang /de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung ba mi dka'o//khyod kyi grong khyer ba ra na si 'byor pa dang rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces ci bar na si 'di stong pa yin
139b2('dul ba): nam/'on te gnas pa yin zhes smras pa de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/lha de'i slad du gson cig/lhas bdag rgyu ma mchis par khum zhig ces bka' stsal nas/'ga'
139b3('dul ba): yang ci'i slad du gzhon nu 'di dgum par bgyi zhes chos dang ldan pa'i tshig mi smra bas/bdag gis de las bsams te smras so//bu ma nyes so//khyod kyis mi'i ro mo bzhis khyer ba zhig
139b4('dul ba): mthong nas 'di skad ces ci ro 'di shi ba nyid kyi ro yin nam/'on te gson po'i ro yin zhes smras pa/de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/lha de'i slad du gson cig/gang nongs pa
139b5('dul ba): bgyid pa'i las kyis pa'i ro de ni gum pa nyid kyi ro lag pa la/gang leg pa bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa'i ro de ni gson po'i ro lags pas/bdag gis de las bsams te smras so//bu ma nyes so//
139b6('dul ba): khyod kyis 'bru'i phung po chen po zhig mthong ba dang /'di skad ces gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung ma zos na chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/
139b7('dul ba): lho de'i slad du gson cig/lha zhing pa gang dag 'bru skyin po bgyis te/'tshal nas bgyid pa de dag ni 'bru smin pa na 'bru'i phung po chen po bu lon pa dag la 'bul bar bgyid pas/de dag
140a1('dul ba): gis ni dang po nyid nas drung 'tshal pa lags so//de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag gis mi nyid rnyed pa na/gal te de rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi
140a2('dul ba): lam sogs par mi bgyid pa de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang rgyun chad par 'gyur zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad na bde 'gro las yongs su nyams shing ngan 'gro las rten par
140a3('dul ba): 'gyur pas/bdag gis de las bsams te smras so//de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig thos nas mchi mas brnangs pas bu blangs te//tshig smras pa/brtul zhugs nges 'chang
140a4('dul ba): rang gi chos spyod cig/bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas len to//de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu lcug 'phye rab tu
140a5('dul ba): ma byung na ci ro 'gyur/lha rgyal por 'gyur ro//khyed kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/lha zham ring bar 'gyur ro//'o na ded rab tu 'byung na/khyad kyi bu de dag ci'i phyir rab tu mi
140a6('dul ba): 'byung //lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo//de'i tshe na grong khyer ba ra na si dang ha cang mi ring ba na/bsti gnas shig yod pa de na/drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid can
140a7('dul ba): snying rje dang ldan pa brtse ba dang ldan pa sems can la byams pa zhig 'dug na/gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa 'byor pa rgya chen pos drang srong de'i drung du rab tu
140b1('dul ba): byung ngo //drang srong des lkugs 'phyel gdams ngag byin nas/lkugs 'phyes brtsal ba dang /'bad pa dang /bsgrims pa byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so///
140b2('dul ba): de nas dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de dus kyi chos dang ljon par gyur nas/gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes drang srong de'i lus spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi phung por bcer te/bsregaso nas
140b3('dul ba): mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur chen po byas so//gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag yongasu bskyang bar brtsams nas/de'i ming gzhon nu lkugs 'phye gzhon nu
140b4('dul ba): lkugs 'phye zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /ston pa lkugs 'phye ste ni pa lkugs 'phye zhes bya ba'i ming chags par gyur to//de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston
140b5('dul ba): pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dog mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du mi byed snyam nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/'di dag
140b6('dul ba): g.yeng gzhi dang shing shun dang /dbyug gu dang /ril ba dang /blugs gzar dang /dgang gzar lhag po 'chang zhing /shin tu lo me dang khre rgod dang /
140b7('dul ba): ud pa la'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa'i phyir ro snyam mo//de nas ston pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag smad na
141a1('dul ba): rgal pa/ 'gyur razlum nas/rgyu sems dpa rnams ga marnas pa/blun myong ba yin pas/denas spyan pa zhugs bran
141a2('dul ba): ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dge 'jog 'dod kyis nga'i gan du bram ze'i khye'u rje ba dang 'bras bu stabs pa gcig dang /
141a3('dul ba): 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshi ma gtogs par gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o//bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis kyab dbyer gyi nang dag tu/bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang 'bras
141a4('dul ba): bu stabs pa cig dang /'di nyid kyi gas sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshem gtogs par/bdog cag lus bram ze'i khye ru gang gis mkhan po la lhur 'gro bar mi bya'o//dbyar gyi nang dge
141a5('dul ba): tu bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang /'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las bram ze'i khye'u gad mkhan po la ltar 'gro ba de
141a6('dul ba): badreg cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su byas pa bcas so//ston pa lcags 'bye zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na/de'i gan du bram
141a7('dul ba): ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang /de nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u gang yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//ston pa lkugs 'phyes
141b1('dul ba): thag ring po kho na nas ri dgas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//ri dgras tshur shog ri dgas khyod 'ongs pa legs so//khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/khyod kyang
141b2('dul ba): lto khengs pa'i zas kyis chog shes pa dang /kun tu chog pa yin la/kho bo yang lto khengs pa'i bsod nams kyis chog shes pa dang /kun tu chog shes pa yin no//
141b3('dul ba): 'di na kha cig shin tu lo ma dang khre rgod dang ud pa la'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa dag ni ma yin no//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems
141b4('dul ba): te/gor ma chags par mkhan po'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/'di ltar mkhan po ri dgas dang lhan cig phebs par smra bar byed do snyam du rig nas/ston pa lkugs
141b5('dul ba): 'phye ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ston pa lkugs 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//de nas ston pa lkugs 'phye cing mi smra bar 'dug go//de
141b6('dul ba): nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/mkhan po dud 'gro rnams dang /lhan cig phebs par smra bar byed kyi/mi rnams dang /mi byed gor ma chags snyam
141b7('dul ba): nas stan las langs te dong ngo //de nas ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston pa lkugs 'phye ga la der song ba dang /ston pa lkugs 'phyes ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs
142a1('dul ba): can de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can tshur shog/ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can khyod
142a2('dul ba): 'ongs pa leg so//khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang la/kho bo yang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang ngo //khyod kyang shing shun gcig dang /dbyug
142a3('dul ba): gu gcig dang /ril ba gcig dang /glugs gzar dang /dgang gzar gcig 'chang la/kho bo yang shing shun gcig dang /dbyug gu gcig dang /ril ba gcig dang /
142a4('dul ba): gruglugs gzar dang /dgang gzar gcig 'chang ngo //khyod kyang lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang kun tu chog shes pa yin la/kho bo yang lto khengs pa'i
142a5('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi cho ga shes pa dang /kun tu chog shes pa yin no//'di na kha cig g.yang gzhi dang /shing shun dang /dbyug gu dang /ril ba dang /glugs gzar dang /
142a6('dul ba): dgang gzar dang /dgang gzar lhag par 'chang ba dag ni ma yin no//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar mkhan pos 'dod pa che ba smad cing /'dod
142a7('dul ba): pa chung ba nyid bstod pa ni/don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag smad pa yin gyis/bdag cag gis g.yang bzhi dang /shing shun dang /dbyug gu dang /ril ba dang /glugs
142b1('dul ba): gzar dang /dgang gzar lhag pa dag chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du bor te/mkhan po ga la ba der dong ngo snyam nas/de dag gis g.yang gzhi dang /shing shun dang /dbyug gu dang /ril ba
142b2('dul ba): dang /glugs gzar dang /dgang gzar lhag pa dag chu klung zlog byed du bor nas/rgyud dag pa dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis/ston pa lkugs 'phye ga la ba der dong ste
142b3('dul ba): phyin nas/ston pa lkugs 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//de nas ston pa lkugs 'byes bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi bsam pa dang /
142b4('dul ba): bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du byas par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa
142b5('dul ba): byas so//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa lkugs 'phye gang yin pa de ni nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya pa gang dag
142b6('dul ba): yin pa de dag ni shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dwags kyi 'dral zhugos can gang yin pa de ni dge slong nye sde yin te/de'i tshe yang ngas shAkya gzhon nu
142b7('dul ba): lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten nas/'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing /'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la bzhag par byas la/
143a1('dul ba): da ltar yang ngas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag/rigs kyi bu nye ba la brten nas/'dod pa che ba dang bral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/shin
143a2('dul ba): tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa mdzad do//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu
143a3('dul ba): gnag pa yin la//gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/'dres ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dres ma yin no//dge slong dag de
143a4('dul ba): lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dres ma spangs nas/las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtul bar bya/dge slong dag de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o//'khrur
143a5('dul ba): 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bzhi pa rdzogs so////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na//rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
143a6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa ma bkag pa de'i tshe na/dge slong kyang dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste/
143a7('dul ba): bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do//de nas dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog
143b1('dul ba): 'khor lnga brgya drung nags mun pa can ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/shing ljon pa'i drung zhig tu brten te/skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug nas/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa//
143b2('dul ba): dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyam su myong bar byed do//dge slong ma de dag phye bred mnyan yod du 'jug 'dod nas smras pa/'phags ma ud pa
143b3('dul ba): la'i mdog bslang bar bya'o//kha cig gis smras pa/'phags ma ud pa la'i mdog ni mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/dang po kha nar dbyar khang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i
143b4('dul ba): gnas kyang yod do zhes zer nas/de dag gis ma bslangs pa kho nar ding ngo //ud pa la'i mdog kyang phye ma red langs nas dge slong ma de dag thams cad dang bar mthong ba dang /
143b5('dul ba): des bsams pa/cid 'gro 'am 'on te 'di nyid du 'dug snyam nas de de nyid du 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so//g.yon can lnga brgya tsam gyis las dag byas nas/
143b6('dul ba): nags mun pa can du lhags te de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag las nyis brgya lnga bcus ni skal ba dag bgo bar bya'o//nyis brgya lnga bcus ni nags byul bar bya'o//
143b7('dul ba): zhes de dag las nyes brgya lnga bcus ni skal ba dag bsgo bar brtsams/nyis brgya lnga bcus ni nags byul bar brtsams pa dang /de dag gis ud pa la'i mdog 'dug
144a1('dul ba): pa mthong ngo //de na kha cig na re shes ldan dag 'di ni tho yor zhig yin no zhes zer/kha cig na re 'di ni mi zhig yin no zhes zer/kha cig na
144a2('dul ba): re'adi ni dge slong zhig yin no zhes zer ro//de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pa des smras pa/'di ni dge slong ma zhig yin gyi dge slong ni ma yin no//ji ltar shes
144a3('dul ba): dge slong dag ni skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/dge slong ma rnams ni skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug go/de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas shes ldan dag 'di lta bu'i nags 'jigs su
144a4('dul ba): rung ba'i nang na/dge slong ma gcig pu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs pa la ltos shos zer ro//de dag dmag dpon gyi gan du dong ba dang /dmag dpon gyis de dag la
144a5('dul ba): dris pa/shes ldan dag khyed kyis nags mun pa can 'di na ngo mtshar can cung zad mthong ba yod dam/mchis te 'di lta bu'i nags 'jig su rung ba'i nang na dge slong ma gcig
144a6('dul ba): pubu mtshan mo gnas pa khas blangs pa mchis so//de ltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag de'i drung du dong ba dang /dmag dpon gyis dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog gzugs bzang ba
144a7('dul ba): blta na sdug pa mdzes pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang mngon par dad par gyur nas te/de mngon par dad pa skyes pas smras pa/kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyi ga nas bzang ba//
144b1('dul ba): yain te/mtshan mo zla nyi mo ltar 'dug pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa gang yin pas so zhes de bslang bar brtsams pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/
144b2('dul ba): ci'i phyir 'di spong bar byed/zas sbyin par bya'o//dge slong gi rgyus shes pa cig gis smras pa//'di ni dus ma yin par mi za'o//dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ci'i phyir
144b3('dul ba): des smras pa/'di ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa yin no/dmag dpon gyis smras pa/kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyi ga nas bzang ba yin te/gzugs bzang po/
144b4('dul ba): blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa gang yin pa dang /'dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa gang yin pas so//yang smras pa/'di chung klud par bya'o//dge slong gi rgyus shes pa
144b5('dul ba): des smras pa/'di ni myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin no//dmag dpon gyis smras pa/kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyi ga nas bzang ba yin no//gzugs
144b6('dul ba): bzang bya/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa gang yin pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa gang yin pas so//yang smras pa/kho bos yon gnas zhing 'di lta bu
144b7('dul ba): la bsod snyoms kyis bsgrub par ma nus so zhes des ras yu ga chen po la 'os pa gcig dang /bsod snyoms kyi phud cig phul nas/shing ljon pa'i yal ga la btags
145a1('dul ba): te bzhag nas smras pa/'phags ma 'di ltar khyod la mi mkhyen pa dang /mi gzigs pa dang /ma rig pa dang /rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang
145a2('dul ba): mi mnga' bas/bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms dang na bza' 'di 'bul lo//zhes smos te song ngo //ud pa la'i mdog nang par sngar langs pas skye bo phal po che'i rjen
145a3('dul ba): shul mthong nas des bsams pa dang ya/g.yon can lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs par mthong nas/mi mdzes pa 'ga' zhig rig par ma byas sam snyam nas/'ga' yang ma byas
145a4('dul ba): bar mthong ngo //shing ljon pa'i yal ga la ras yug chen dang bsod snyoms btags te/bzhag pa mthong nas/des bsams pa/'di ni dad par gyur pa rnams kyis dang
145a5('dul ba): pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam nas/des bsams pa/gal te sbyin len stobs pa la sdad na/bya 'am spre'us chud gzan par 'gyur pas/bdag ni dge 'dun la
145a6('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi phud 'bul ba yin la/'di ltar dge slong rnams la mi rung ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma rnams la rung ba yin la/dge slong ma rnams la mi rung ba gang
145a7('dul ba): yin pa de ni/dge slong rnams la rung ba yin pas bdag rang nyid kyis 'di khyer te/dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud 'bul du 'gro'o snyam nas//de des de khyer te rgyal
145b1('dul ba): byed kyi tshol du song ngo //drug smra rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/drug ste lus gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshul gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgon 'chag
145b2('dul ba): cing 'dug pa des ud pa la'i mdog mthong nas spros pa/sring mo ci'i phyir nang par sngar mnyan yod kyi sgro dag phyi ste 'ongs//des smras pa/bdag mnyan yod du ma mchis kyi
145b3('dul ba): bdag me dang sum nags mun pa can du mchis par khas blangs so//nye dogs smras pa/nyo dga' ni nyin mo nyid nags mun pa can du zhugs na yang spu dag gyen du 'greng bar 'gyur ro//
145b4('dul ba): sring mo khyer ba 'di ci yin des smras paM/chom rkun pa lnga brgya tsam der mchis nas/de dag dad par gyur pas bdag la dang po'i dbang du bgyis pa stsal to//sring mo khyod ni
145b5('dul ba): chom rkun pas kyang dad par bya ba yin gyi/gal te nye dga' de dag gis mthong du zin na/lcag rgod mang pos btabs te khur tsha bar khrid par 'gyur ro//'di ltar gang la
145b6('dul ba): ras yug chen 'di lta bu yod pa de ni gos sbar pa las snamra sbyar nyi ma byas te/sems las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par 'gyur ro//'phags pa khyod ras
145b7('dul ba): yug chen 'di bzhed dam/lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o//'phogs pa bdag gis dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud phul te/slar mchis kyi bar du gzhes shig
146a1('dul ba): /dang /de'i 'og khyod la ras yug chen gsol lo//nye dgas bsams pa/lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di la bslangs pa dang /
146a2('dul ba): la byin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/sring mo bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag khrid de 'ong gis de'i bar du 'di nyid du sdod cig/nye dga' rgyul byed tshal du zhugs
146a3('dul ba): pa dang /des dge slong bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag snying las chung ngur 'khod pa mthong nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag sbyin bdag dag ni khur gyis ngal zhing
146a4('dul ba): sdod la/khyed cag ni 'di na snyings las chung ngur 'khod na tshur shog/bsod snyoms kyi phung long dang gi/de dag gis gzhong bu thogs te dong ba dang /ud pa la'i
146a5('dul ba): mdog gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi phung phul nas ras yug chen sbags nas nye dga' la phul lo//nyi dgas khyod sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo
146a6('dul ba): byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras so//ud pa li'i mdog gis bsams pa/
146a7('dul ba): de dbyar khang du song ste ci rung /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas ud pa la'i mdog/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
146b1('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/de'i tshe Ta ud pa la'i mdog gi chos gos ldang na cing
146b2('dul ba): snam sbyar yang rnyings par gyur nas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong ma rnams kyis dbyar gyi gos rnyed pa
146b3('dul ba): mAM grub bam/btsun pa grub bo//'on no'i phyir//dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog gi chos gos lnga ngan cing snum sbyar yang rnyings par gyur/btsun pa sring mo 'di ni dad pa ldan
146b4('dul ba): zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can lags te/'dis sangs rgyas sam/chos sam/dge 'dun nas/dge slong yid du 'thad pa dag la ma phul ba 'am/yongs su ma
146b5('dul ba): btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/'di ste deng yang ras yug chen rnyed nas/de yang 'dis btsun pa nye dga' la phul bar gyur to//kun dga' bo dge slong dag/dge slong ma
146b6('dul ba): nye du ma yin pa la gos lhag pa len tam/btsun pa len to//kun dga' bo dge slong nye du ma yin pa ni/'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos lnga chang ngam/'on te mched
146b7('dul ba): snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar thob bo cag len par byed kyi nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
147a1('dul ba): stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos gos lnga byin cig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong ma
147a2('dul ba): ud pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos gos lnga byin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge
147a3('dul ba): 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de//zhes bya ba la sogs pa lA ma bzhin no//pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bsgrub pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gis dge slong
147a4('dul ba): ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bo mdzad do///
147a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs
147a6('dul ba): mnyam pa la chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan no/bdag gis
147a7('dul ba): 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam brgyags cung zhig kyang ma khyer ro snyam nas/lag pa la 'gram pa gta de/soms khongs su chud cing 'dug pa chung mas mthong nas smras pa
147b1('dul ba): /rje'i sras khyod ci'i slad du phyag la 'gram pa gtad de/sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/bzang mo kho bo'i khyim nor du ma dang ldan no/bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam
147b2('dul ba): brgyags chung zad kyang mi khyer te/gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ba shos gsol te/re re la ras bac+doMs bu sar pa phrugs re bskon na/
147b3('dul ba): des bdag gi 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam brgyags khyer bar 'gyur ro//chung mas smras pa/rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig/de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga
147b4('dul ba): la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhobs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas//bcom ldan 'das
147b5('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag de la chas dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad
147b6('dul ba): yang dog par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan//yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par
147b7('dul ba): gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gzung ngo //de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs nas//bla gos praka pa gcig tu ngargya
148a1('dul ba): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das srang bdag gi
148a2('dul ba): sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig gdug chod gsol ba ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag
148a3('dul ba): des/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas snang ba rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /rjes su yi rang bar byas te/bcom
148a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas khyim bdag des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /bza'
148a5('dul ba): ba gtsang zhing bsod pa logs par sbyar nas/nang par sngar langs te/gdan bshoms nas chur bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/btsun pa gdugs
148a6('dul ba): tshod sbyor ba'i dus lags nas/dri bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga
148a7('dul ba): dro shams thabs gsol/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bder te/
148b1('dul ba): khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon no//dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa
148b2('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/stobs par byed do//rnam grangs du mas bca' ba
148b3('dul ba): dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs na/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun re re la ras bcos bu sar pa phrugs re gsol to//
148b4('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag des stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang
148b5('dul ba): ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud par mdzad/yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
148b6('dul ba): de/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
148b7('dul ba): mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin pa zad tsam du song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
149a1('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir log ste/rang gi khyim ga la
149a2('dul ba): ba der song nas phyin pa dang /steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom pa na/chung ma la smras pa/bzang mo bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha
149a3('dul ba): rol gyi sam brgyags mang du khyer gyis mchog tu dga' ba dang /rjes su yi rengs par gyis shig/chung mas smras pa/rje'i sras kyis ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam brgyags
149a4('dul ba): bsnams ni/bdag gis mo 'tshal to//bzang mo bdag cag gnyis kyi longs spyod dag thun mong ma yin nam/rje'i sras 'di ltar skol cag gi longs spyod dag thun mong lags
149a5('dul ba): mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gis kyang ste dgu'i bdag mo chen po go'u ta mi la sogs pa/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bshos gsol te/chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag phul na de lta na/
149a6('dul ba): bdag gis kyang 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gis smras pa/bzang mo ci sngar sbyin pa byin nas/phyis sbyin par byar med dam//de bzhin
149a7('dul ba): gyis shig/de nas khyim bdag gis chung ma de/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/skye dgu'i bdag mo tshon mo gau'u tu mi'i rkang pa gnyis
149b1('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis khyim bdag gi chung ma de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
149b2('dul ba): gyis yang dag par ston par byed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/yang dag por gzeng bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/rnam grangs du mas
149b3('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o//de nas
149b4('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung ma de stan las langs te/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi
149b5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smras so//'phags ma sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang thabs gcig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang //skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
149b6('dul ba): go'u ta mis khyim bdag gis chung ma de la cang si smra bas dang du blangs so//de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des/skye dgu'i bdeg mo chen mo go'u ta mos cang mi smra bas dang du
149b7('dul ba): blangs par rig nas/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /rjes su yi ring bar byas te/skye dgu'i 'dag mo chen mo go'u ta mI'i
150a1('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gauru ta me'i drung nas song ngo //de nas bdag gi chung ma des de nyid kyi mtshan
150a2('dul ba): mo bca' ba dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa legs par sbyar nas/nong par sngar langs te stan bshams na chu ra bzhag ste/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la
150a3('dul ba): spyan 'dren gyis 'phags ma gdugs chod sbyar ba'i dus lagaso na/da 'phags mas de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dro la bos so//de nas skye dgu'i
150a4('dul ba): bodag mo chen mo go'u ta mi snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/dge slong ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun
150a5('dul ba): gyis mdun du bdar te/khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i bkad sa ga la ba der song ste byin nas/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/de nas
150a6('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung ma des skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bde bar 'dug par rig nas/rang gi lag nas bca'i ba dang
150a7('dul ba): bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/stobs par byed do//rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang gza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas/rang gi lag nas tshim par byas/
150b1('dul ba): shing bstabs nas/des chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag gi sprog ma phye nas/chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag thogs te/rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug go/de nas skye dgu'i bdag/
150b2('dul ba): mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad pa/gal te re zhig blangs par
150b3('dul ba): gyur na ni/bslab pa'i gzhi 'khrugs par yang 'gyur/gal te ma blangs na ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i bsod nams kyi bar chad dang /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed
150b4('dul ba): po'i bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam mo//dge slong ma rnams kyis bsams pa/kye ma 'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs par
150b5('dul ba): gyur cig/bdag cag gis blangs par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dus lags pa'i slad du gnang bar 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis
150b6('dul ba): chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas/khyim bdag gi chung ma la yon bshad pa byas te/stan las longs nas song ste/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
150b7('dul ba): ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta
151a1('dul ba): mis skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo/
151a2('dul ba): go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//go'u ta mi ngas gnang ba gang yin pa de khyed kyis shes pa leg so legs so//de lta ba so na ngas dge slong ma
151a3('dul ba): rnams kyis chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas/dge slong rnams dang lhan cig brje bar bya ba rjes su gnang ngo //de nas dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis gos de dag khyer
151a4('dul ba): te drug sde dag gi gan du dong nas smras pa/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad de/bdag cag gis chen po la
151a5('dul ba): 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa 'di dag khyed bzhes la bdag cag la ngan pa dag stsol cig/drug sde dag gis smras pa/sring mo dag bdag cag la dge slong ma'i ras ma dag dgos pa med/de'i
151a6('dul ba): tshe yang bdag cag byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa dag la khur dag bslang bar gyur gyis/bdag cag mi len to//dge slong ma gzhan dag dge slong gnas brtan
151a7('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du dong ste smras pa 'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos ngag dgag pa mdzad de/bdag cag gis
151b1('dul ba): chen po la 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa 'di dag khyed bzhes la/bdag cag la ngan pa dman pa dag stsol cig sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
151b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na brjes pa ma gtogs so//de la brje ba ni 'di yin te/de tsam gyis sam/ji tsam
151b3('dul ba): gyis dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas rje bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa'i bsngags brjod de/bslab pa la gus pa dang //bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs
151b4('dul ba): pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang phri ba dang /drod rig pa'i bsdigs pa brjod de/dge slong rnams la yang de dang 'thun pa dang /de dag 'tsham pa dang /de'i shas che ba dang /
151b5('dul ba): de dag ldan pa'i chos dang 'thun pa'i bka' mchid bka' stsal nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin pa 'di ni gnang ba yin
151b6('dul ba): te nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na/brjes pa ma gtogs te/
151b7('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni nye dga' 'am/gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o//nye du ma yin pa las
152a1('dul ba): shes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /mos pa dang /phrugs bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no//gos shes bya ba ni gos bdun pa
152a2('dul ba): bral gos dang /sha ni gros dong /zar ma'i gos dang /du gu la'i gos dang /ros bal gyi gos dang /ko tam pa'i gos dang /nye 'og gi gos las gang yang rung po'o//
152a3('dul ba): len na zhes bya ba ni bdag gir byed na'o//brjes pa mu gtogs te zhes bya ba ni brnyes pa bzhag ste'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos de spangs nas/
152a4('dul ba): ltung byed ltung ba bshags par bya ste/de na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so////de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis
152a5('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gos yin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las yid gnyis za
152a6('dul ba): bas gos lon na sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du las nye du ma yin po'i 'du shes kyis gos len na/nyes byas su 'gyur ro//dge slong gis
152a7('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du las yid gnyis za bas gos len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba dang /legs par smra ba lo ltung ba med do//rdzogs par
152b1('dul ba): bstan par byed pa dang /por brlag byung ba la ltung ba med do//rin gyis len pa dang brjes pa la ltung ba med do//dge slong ma grags pa bsod nams che ba yin la/des dge
152b2('dul ba): slong gi mdun du gzhag nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa bdag la rdzas 'di lta bu dag mchis kyis/'phags pas bdag la thugs brdzi ba'i slad du bzhes shig ces brjod de/mi
152b3('dul ba): ltos par song ba la ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /sems 'khrug pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//len pa'i spang ba ste lta ba rdzogaso//
152b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//mnyen yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam
152b5('dul ba): pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'o dgur spyod par byed pa des chung ma la smras pa/bzang mo kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du
152b6('dul ba): 'gro'o//rje'i sras ro zhig/gzhon pa'i gnas skabasu rol pa dang /dgyes pa dang /dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod la/bkres pa'i gnas skabasu nor bsgrub pa mdzod cig/
152b7('dul ba): bzang mo ji tsam du gzhon pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni grang ba dang /dro ba bzod pa yin pas/je nor bsgrub par bya zhing /rgas pa'i gnas skabs su bde ba spyod cing
153a1('dul ba): 'dug par bya'o//chung mas bsams pa/bdag gis bsgyur bar bya ba gang yin pa de rang nyid byed do snyam nas smras pa/rje'i sras da ltar mdzod cig/
153a2('dul ba): khyim bdag des chung ma de la kha zaso tsam byin nas/zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ngo //de'i chung ma des bsams pa//de dag gis khyim thab grang ldan tha bas sbrengs bzhin pa dang
153a3('dul ba): tshu ba na chubs gdungs bzhin pa dang /bkres pa dang /rlom pas gnod bzhi ni pa dang /shA sbrang dang /sbrang zla dang /rlung nyim dang /sdig sbrul gyi rig pa drug gi
153a4('dul ba): nyen bzhin du longs spyod dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir spro bar byed/'bad par byedartsol bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi phyir byi'o snyam pa yin pas
153a5('dul ba): bdag las med par 'dug pa ni/bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/des tshong 'dus su song ste ras bal bzang po blangs nas dog po bzang po bkal te/tha ga
153a6('dul ba): ba mkhas pa ras zung bzang po 'thag tu bcug nas/des ras de spos sna tshogs kyis bsgo ste/gos kyi za ma tog tu bcug ste bzhag go khyim bdag des kyang don legs par grub na
153a7('dul ba): khe spogs rnyed de legs par 'ongs nis chung ma dag khyim bdag de khrus byis nas de la ras zung dbul mo//khyim bdag des bsams po/bdag gis 'di la kha mas tsam
153b1('dul ba): bzhag pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang ras zung 'di mi rnyed do snyam du rig nas/chung ma la smras pa/bzang mo ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/rje'i sras je gsol cig/khyim bdag
153b2('dul ba): des de gyon nas yang dris pa/bzang mo rAs zung 'di ga las rnyed/rje'i sras rje bshos bsnoms shig/des zan zos nas yang dris pa/bzang mo ras zung 'dig las rnyed/des
153b3('dul ba): skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /khyim bdag gis smras pa/bzang mo legs so//kho bo ni bsgrub pa yin la/khyod kyang 'di ltar sbed pa yin na/bdag cag gi longs spyod
153b4('dul ba): dag ring por mi thogs pa kho nar 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /yangs par 'gyur ro//chung mas smras pa/rje'i sras 'di dog ni bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs pa lags kyis khyod
153b5('dul ba): kyis su la yang ma stsal cig/khyim bdag de dad pa dang ldan pa bzang ba/dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal
153b6('dul ba): du byung ste/'gro ba na mi spro bas mthong nas des bsams pa/khyim badrag 'di ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na/'dis ni rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin no snyam mo//drug
153b7('dul ba): sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgon 'chag cing 'dug po
154a1('dul ba): des khyim bdag de mthong nus bsams pa/khyim bdag 'di ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na/'dis ni rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin gyis//gal
154a2('dul ba): te bdag gis 'di ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo snyam nas/des de la smras pa/khyim bdag 'ongs pa legs so//'ongs pa legs so//khyod yun/
154a3('dul ba): ri mo ring mo nas zla ba bzhin du ga las 'khor 'khor/'phags pa bdag zongs thogs te/yul gzhan du mchis par gyur to//khyim bdag khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po
154a4('dul ba): grub blam/'phags pa chang chung tsam mo//khyim bdag mtshe'u ni rnyog pa can nam dang ba'i rgyu 'thun pas rig par bya ste/khyod ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na
154a5('dul ba): khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po grub par mngon pas tshur shog chos bstan par bya'o//drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na/nyan pa
154a6('dul ba): po dag bdag cag lha rnams su skyeso snyam du sems la/gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dge byed na/nyan pa po dag rang gi sha gang yin pa de yang bcad cing bcad cing
154a7('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems so//gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyeso snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin no//khyim
154b1('dul ba): bdag des nye dga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang /nye dgas de la chos bstan par brtsams nas des de la ci nas kyang de'i sems
154b2('dul ba): da par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi gtam byas so//de dad par gyur nas smras pa/bdag gis 'phags pa la legs par gsungs pa'i na bza' 'phrugs cig 'bul lo//bzhin
154b3('dul ba): bzangs a rog kha/sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog dang /
154b4('dul ba): lha rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig/bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces/sang dag 'chi yang sus shes kyis//de ring nyid du brtul te bya//'chi bdag
154b5('dul ba): sde chen de de ni//khyed cag pa shes pa ma yin no//zhes gsungs kyis/bzhin bzangs khyed kyis ras zung bzang po gyon pa 'di nyid kho bo la byin cig dang /kho bos 'di la snam
154b6('dul ba): sbyar nyi rim byas te/sems las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs la bde bar tron bya'o//'phags pa khyod 'di bzhed dam/lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin du'o//'phags
154b7('dul ba): po bdag khyod la mi 'bul ba ma lags na/'di ltar 'di ni mchis brang gis bdag la stsal pa lag so//khyim bdag kho bos khyod gzhan la dad par byas na/khyed ko bud med
155a1('dul ba): kho na'i dbang yin nam zhes nye dgas dang na dus kyi phyed kyis de'i bla gos blangs nas/de lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/bzhin sbyar bar byed do//
155a2('dul ba): khyim bdag gis de la smras pa/'phags pa 'di ci'i tha tshig/khyim bdag 'di ni khyod la yongs su btang ba les byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni yod na/yongs su longs
155a3('dul ba): spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni med de/nam zhig na 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed nas/'di las chos gos byed par 'gyur bos/'di chos gos kyi rdang kho na la zad
155a4('dul ba): por 'gyur ro//'phags pa ci bdag sgren mong 'chi bar bgyi 'am/khyim bdag khyod la gos gyon pa ci zhig bya//tshul khrims dang /rigs dang spyod pa gyon pas chog mod/
155a5('dul ba): gcer bu pa ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa nyams pa de dag ni sgren mor 'gro na mi sdug pa yin gyi/khyod lta bung tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod po dang ldan pa la sgren mor
155a6('dul ba): 'gro ba mi sdug pa ci yod/khyim bdag khyod dor thung mi gyon nam/'phags pa 'tshal lo//khyim bdag khyim bdag rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dor thung gyon te shing tshal
155a7('dul ba): thogs nas ba lang gi phyir bzhin 'gro ba yin pas/khyod kyang shing tshal thogs la ba lang gi phyi bzhin song zhog dang /skye bo dag gos po lang sur 'gro ba phyir byung ba zhig
155b1('dul ba): yin par shes par 'gyur ro zhes nye dgas dang na dus kyi phyed kyis de'i smad g.yogs kyang blangs//khyim bdag de shing chal thogs te/ba lang gi phyi bzhin zhugs pa dang /mi skyobs
155b2('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/khyim bdag kho bos da ci khi na khyod chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung phyin par mthong na/ci de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mam/bzhin bzangs/kho bo
155b3('dul ba): chom rkun pa dag gis ni ma bcom mod kyi/'di ltar btsun pa nye dgas kha'i chos kyis bcom mo//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs te
155b4('dul ba): 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba yin pas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang
