179a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so//nye dga' la blo skyes po 'di thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
179a4('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdam pa byas pas/phyin chad ras yug phran skye bo yang su las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis 'di ltar bdag dang lhan cig yi ge mgron na
179a5('dul ba): yig 'bru'i yi ge dge slob slob pa bram ze dbyar tshul yod kyis de'i gan du song ste bltas nas de las cung zad 'thob kyang srid do snyam nas/de de'i khyim du song ba dang /
179a6('dul ba): sgo bas 'phags pa ma 'jug shig ces 'gogs so//nye dgas smras pa/bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi spyod yul ma yin pa ni rnam pa lnga
179a7('dul ba): gsungs te/rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang /'jud 'thun mo'i khyim dang /chang ma'i khyim dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang /gdol pa'i khyim yin na/ci
179b1('dul ba): 'di rol mo mkhan gyi khyim 'am/'jud 'thun ma'i khyim 'am/chang ma'i khyim 'am/rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/gdol pa'i gnas yin nam/'phags pa khyod skyo ba
179b2('dul ba): mang du mdzad de/'di ni rol mo mkhan gyi khyim yang ma lags/'jud 'thun ma'i khyim yang ma lags/chang ma'i khyim yang ma lagasapa/rgyal po'i pho brang
179b3('dul ba): yang ma lags/gdol pa'i gnas kyang mau lags te/'di ltar 'di ni bram ze dbyar tshul gyi sdum pa lags so//kwa'i nang rje song la bram ze dbyar tshul la nye dga'
179b4('dul ba): shes ldan lta bar 'dod cing sgro na sdod do zhes gyis shig/sgo bas smras pa/khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i snying tshoms mchis pa lags snyam 'am/bkren pa
179b5('dul ba): bral te sgron ni sbron cig/mi sbran na khyod la mtshams chen po gcad pa sbyin par bya'o//sgo bas bsams pa 'di 'di ltar 'jigs pa med pa dang /bag tsha ba med par
179b6('dul ba): tshig gtong ba las na ma sbran na gnod pa byed kyis song la sbran no snyam nas/de dor song ste smras pa/jo bo btsun pa nye dga' ngo bo lta bar 'tshal zhing chab sgo na sdod do///
179b7('dul ba): dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' la su 'gog btsun pa nye dga' 'jug du chug shig/nye dga' zhugs pa dang /dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/btsun pa nye
180a1('dul ba): dga' byon pa legaso//btsun pa nye dga' gdan bshums pa nyid la bzhugs shig/nye dga' de'i mdun du 'dug ste des sgra mthon po dang sgra yid du
180a2('dul ba): 'ong ba dang /sgra zab mos sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so//gang gi tshe nye dga' yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas/sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed pa de'i tshe na
180a3('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dang po can dag 'di snyam du kye ma rang gi sha dag kyang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems pas bram ze dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/btsun pa nye dga'/
180a4('dul ba): dbyar gnas pa la kar sha pa na drug cu 'bul lo//a rog kha sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang //don gyi mchog thob
180a5('dul ba): pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod kyang thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo //mnyan yod nas dge slong gnyis shig/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du/
180a6('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab du 'ongs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dag po khyod song la dge slong rnams la/de bzhin gshegs pa
180a7('dul ba): ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig kA sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las
180b1('dul ba): gyis shig ces sgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan
180b2('dul ba): 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig/
180b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las mnyan to//mnyan yod nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong de gnyis
180b4('dul ba): kyis de thos nas/bdag cag kyang mnyan yod du 'gro dgos so snyam nas mi dga' bar gyur to//nye dgas thos nas nyam nga bar gyur te bdag la brgya la brgya lam na rnyed pa byung ba de'i
180b5('dul ba): bar chad byung ngo snyam nas/de bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du song ste sgra dma' ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang /sgra zhum pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang /dbyar
180b6('dul ba): tshul gyis smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' khyod sngon sgra mthon po dang /sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /sgra zab mos sbyin pa'i bsdogs pa brjod par mdzad na/khyod da ltar sgra dma' ba dang
180b7('dul ba): sgra yid du mi 'ong ba dang /sgra mi zab pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par mdzad pa 'di la rgyu ci mchis/chung po grogs bdag cag brgya la brgya lam na phrad pa 'byung na de yang yun mi
181a1('dul ba): ring ba kho nar 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//ma ga d+hA pa zur gyis go/ko sa la ba brjod na shes//pan tsa la ba yig phyed kyi//nub mi ma smras mi
181a2('dul ba): shes so//zhes bya ba yin pas dbyar tshul gyis bsams pa/'di ni shAkya'i rigs rgya chen po de rnyed spangs te rab tu byung ba yin pas 'di bdag dang 'bral ba la mya ngan mi
181a3('dul ba): byed kyi kar sha pa no drug cu 'chor ba'i mya ngan byed do snyam nas smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' gang dang gang du gnas par bdag gis kar sha pa na drug cu bskur bar bgyi'o//a
181a4('dul ba): rog kha de lta na phan phun med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa yin no zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo //de nas
181a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang
181a6('dul ba): ldan pa/thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/
181a7('dul ba): mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshigs kyis yongs su bskor ba/glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/
181b1('dul ba): seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/na mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba
181b2('dul ba): bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/
181b3('dul ba): sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongasu
181b4('dul ba): bskor ba/mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar bu stong gis tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs
181b5('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'phags skyes po ltar grul
181b6('dul ba): bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/thag
181b7('dul ba): zang rigs ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/brgya byin ltar sum curtsa gsum pa'i cho kyis yongs su bskor ba/tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyis tshogs
182a1('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/dbang po rnams ni shin tu dul bya/spyod lam dang /spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/chu gter ltar ting nge ba/sprin
182a2('dul ba): ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po mtshon sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad
182a3('dul ba): nus sku rnam par mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gis gzugs brgyan pa nyi mo stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba
182a4('dul ba): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan par zhugs
182a5('dul ba): pa/srung ba gcig pu pa/nyag gcig dpa' ba/gnyis pa med pa/gnyis su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/rig pa gsum
182a6('dul ba): gsal bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/rdzu 'phrul
182a7('dul ba): gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyangs par mdzad pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis
182b1('dul ba): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/yan lag lnga spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/
182b2('dul ba): rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/byang chub kyi yani lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa
182b3('dul ba): dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyud du 'phags pa/
182b4('dul ba): kun shes ko'u di n+yA dang /rlangs pa dang /ming che ba dang /mi 'gags pa dang /shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /'od srung dang kun dga' bo drang //nam gru
182b5('dul ba): la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs te mnyan
182b6('dul ba): yod du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag zong thogs te/rgyal po'i khyab tu dong
182b7('dul ba): dag gal te don 'thun mang na/de la rgyal po 'am bram ze dbyar tshul sho gam gcod par byed pas/bram ze dbyar tshul gyis sho gam pa dag la smras pa/gang gi tshe mnyan
183a1('dul ba): yod pa 'tshong pa dag mnyan yod du phyir 'gro ba de'i cha na kho bo la sbron cig/sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa dag la bsgo nas/de dag gis zong sgyur te rin
183a2('dul ba): blangs na/bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du dong ste/bdag cag mnyan yod du mchin/bgyi ba ci mchis shes smras pa dang /bram ze dbyar tshul gyis tshong pa gcig la kararu sha
183a3('dul ba): pan drug cu gtad de/khyod kyis 'di btsun pa nye dga'i gan du khyer la phul cig ces bsgo'o//tshong ba des bsams pa/gang bram ze dbyar tshul gyis dad par bya ba'i dge slong de'i
183a4('dul ba): ni gdon mi za bar grags pa yin pas bdag gis kyang de la dga' ba cung zad byas gos dag bskon no snyam nas/de 'od ma'i tshal du song ste/dge slong gi gan du phyin nas dris pa
183a5('dul ba): 'phags pa dge slong gi tshul dang 'thun pa'i gos dag ji lta bu lags/bzhin bzangs ci dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa byed dam/'phags pa dge 'dun la ras yug
183a6('dul ba): chen gyi sbyin pa mi bgyid de/'di ltar bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kar sha pa na drug cu bskur pa dag de'i gos dag tu bsgyur te mchi'o//dge slong des smras
183a7('dul ba): ba/bzhin bzangs gos dag kyang len cing khyod ka rau sha pa na drug cu yang 'bul du 'jug pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro//tshong pa des bsams pa/'di ni
183b1('dul ba): gaur ma chags pa de dang 'khon yod pa yin no snyam nas dge slong gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste dris pa/'phags pa dge slong gi tshul dang 'thun pa'i gos dag ji lta bu lags/bzhin
183b2('dul ba): bzangs ci dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa byed dmA/'phags pa dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa mi bgyid de/'di ltar bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kar
183b3('dul ba): sha pa na drug cu skur ba dag de'i gos dag tu bsgyur te mchi'o//dge slong des smras pa/gal te rgyas ma btab par khyer na khyod kyi kha spogs 'bul du 'jud pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas
183b4('dul ba): yod par 'gyur ro//tshong pa des bsams pa/'di dang de gnyis 'thun no snyam nas de bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gon du song ste smras pa/dbyar tshul kar shra pa na 'di dag rgyas tho
183b5('dul ba): shig/bzhin bzangs yid ches kyis khyer cig dbyar tshul bdag la thugs ches mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis legs par bgyi bar dgyi'o//dbyar tshul gyis rgyas btab nas des
183b6('dul ba): de dag khyer te mnyan yod du song nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/dge slong rnams la dris pa/'phags pa dag 'phags pa nye dga'i gtsugs lag khang dang logs/de dag
183b7('dul ba): gis de'i gtsug lag khang 'di yin no//zhes bstan nas/de der song ba dang nye dga' mi snang nas des dge slong zhig la dris pa/'phags pa btsun pa nye dga' gar
184a1('dul ba): /bzhud/des smras pa/nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir ro//tshong pa des smras pa/bram ze dbyar tshul gyis de la kar sha pa na drug cu skur ba 'di dag zhog la de
184a2('dul ba): mchis na stsol cig/bzhin bzangs khyod kyis sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba mgo bos 'dzin pa 'ga' mthong ngam/des bsams pa/'di ni gdon mi za bar de dang 'khon yod pa
184a3('dul ba): yin no snyam nas de dge slong gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kar sha pa na drug cu skur ba 'di dag zhog la de mchis
184a4('dul ba): na stsol cig bzhin bzangs gal te khyod kyis rgyas ma btab par 'ongs na khyad yul gyi khe spogs 'jal du 'jud pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro//des
184a5('dul ba): bsams pa/'di dang de gnyis su 'thun gyis khyim du song la de nyid du de 'ongs pa bde bar tshig gi lan gdab po snyam nas smras pa/'phags pa btsun pa nye dga' mchis na/
184a6('dul ba): 'di skad ces bdag gi sdum pa ni phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis kyis gal te kAr sha pa na bzhed na gshegs su gsol zhes gsungs shig ces smras te song ngo //nye dga' yang
184a7('dul ba): gtsug lag kha' du 'ongs nas/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub ste/de yang
184b1('dul ba): tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de legs par gsungs pa yin te/khyod de kho na nyin mo spyod yul du song bas deng nyid da kar sha ba na drug cu grub bo//gang gis bcom ldan
184b2('dul ba): 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu re re la kar sha pa na drug cu drug cu byin pa'i sbyin bdag de lta bu de gang yin/btsun pa nye dga' dge 'dun thams cad la ma yin gyi khyod gcig pu la'o//
184b3('dul ba): gang gis nye dga' la kar sha pa na drug cu sbyin pa'i sbyin bdag de lta bu de gang yin/bram ze dbyar tshul gyis skur ro//de ni phyi rol gyi rnyed pa kho na yin na/ma zhu 'am/sgyu ma zhugs sam/
184b4('dul ba): sus brtags/ma brtags pa kho nar blangs sam/sus blangs kho bo ni dgra bo sha stag gi nang na 'dug go//de la dge slong gzhan des smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' yi tshod du ci yod
184b5('dul ba): khyim bdag de na re bdag gi sdum pa ni phyogs ga/mo zhig na mchis kyis gal te kar sha pa na bzhed na gshegs su gsol zhes zer ro//nye dgas snam sbyar blangs te gom pa
184b6('dul ba): skyed de song ba dang /khyim bdag des de thag ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ngos bsams pa/dge sbyong hral po gom pa 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni btsun pa nye dga' yin
184b7('dul ba): gor ma chag snyam nas/des thag ring po kha na nas pa dang de la smras pa/khyod btsun pa nye dga' ma lags sa mo/kho bo yin no//bram ze dbyar tshul gyis khyod la kar sha pa na
185a1('dul ba): drug cu skur bar 'di lags kyis bzhes shig/a rog kha sbyin pa 'dis ni khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor rgya
185a2('dul ba): tshogs dang /don gyi mchog thob pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod kyang thob par gyur cig/'phags pa ci'i slad du bdag gi ming gis yon bshad pa mdzad/bram
185a3('dul ba): ze dbyar tshul gyi ming gis yon bshad pa mdzod cig/bkren pa 'di la dogs pa ci yod/'di ltar khyod kyis kyang mang du byas te/khyod kyis khyer te 'ongs pa'i
185a4('dul ba): phyir ro//gang gis 'di khyer te srang du 'gro ba'i khye'u zhig re shig rnyos shog/'phags pa bdag la khye'u ma mchis so//bkren pa rgyal po'i khab nas thag ring po
185a5('dul ba): 'di srid du khyed te 'ongs ni spang du skyel mi nus sam/des khye'u la smras pa/kar sha pa na khyer te 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin song la/phyi rol du ma byung shig/
185a6('dul ba): 'dis khyod la bca' ba'i rin sbyin du ma gzhug shig khye'u des kar shA pa na de khyer te de'i phyi bzhin srang du song nas/tshong rdal dang por phyin pa dang des smras pa/
185a7('dul ba): 'phags pa kar sha pa na 'di dag 'dir 'jog tu stsol cig/nye dgas khye'u khyod shin tu legs par bslabs so zhes des spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig la smras pa//
185b1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs kar sha pa na 'di dag re shig zhog shig 'phags pa bdag ni bla ma la rag las pa lags so//khyod nam yang rang la rag lus par ma gyur cig/de spos 'tshong/
185b2('dul ba): gi khye'u gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste smras pa/bzhin bzangs kar sha pa na 'di dag re shig zhog shig 'phags pa bdag gi bla ma slad rol du mchis//nam yang 'jug par ma gyur
185b3('dul ba): cig/de spos 'tshong gi khye'u dad pa gasla ro dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste smras pa/bzhin bzangs kar sha pa na 'di dag re shig zhog shig/'phags pa bdag ma la rag
185b4('dul ba): las pa lags so//kho bos khyod ko dad pa dang ldan par shes kyi kho bos khyod ji ltar rtug pa la dad par ni mi shes so//gal te khyod kyis dad pa ma thob tu zin na khyod kyis shi 'tshal
185b5('dul ba): blangs te dge slong skrod par yang 'gyur ro//de skyengs nas smras pa/'phags pa bzhag tu gsol/nye dgas kar sha pa na de dag der bzhag ste/khyim bdag gi khye'u de phyir
185b6('dul ba): btang ste song ngo //tshong ba'i tshogs kyis kyang bdag cag las gang nyi ma shar na 'ong ba de bdag cag gis kar sha pa na drug cu 'jal du gzhug zhes khrims su bya ba bcas pas
185b7('dul ba): spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/bu ci nas kyang bdag nyid kar sha pa na drug cu 'jal du mi bcug pa de ltar gyis shig/nye dga' mtshan mo 'gyod pa skyes te spos 'tshong gi
186a1('dul ba): khye'u de dang phyugs dang ldan pa yin pas kAr shu pa na de dag ston par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas de nang par sngar langs te/
186a2('dul ba): khye'u zhig khrid nas de'i tshong rdal du song ba dang /spos 'tshong gi khye'u de tshong rdal 'byod cing 'dug pa des mthong nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs kar sha pa na de dag byin cig/'phags pa
186a3('dul ba): tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bdag cag las gang gdugs shar na mchi ba de kar sha ba na drug cu 'jal du stsal pa'i khrims su bgyi ba bcas pas bdag cag tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du mchis te/
186a4('dul ba): slar mchis kyi bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol/bkren pa su zhig khyod kyi lto gol pa yin snyam/su zhig skyid pa gnyis sbyangs spangs su sdod par 'gyur/gal te ma byin
186a5('dul ba): par 'gro na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kar sha ba na drug cu 'jal du gzhugs pa'i gyod la bskrin por bya'o//spos 'tshong gi khye'u de khros nas kar sha pa na'i thum
186a6('dul ba): po de 'phangs pa dang de'i rgya gogs so//nye dgas smras pa/rgya ma byid dam/ma zhu 'am/sgyu ma zhugs sam blta'o//ci kho bo la khyod kyis brtags te gtod dam/gal te/
186a7('dul ba): khyod kyis brtags te ma blangs na ci'i phyir rgya gcog par byed/nya dkos spos 'tshong gi khye'u de de srid du bskor gyi bar du 'tshong pa'i tshogs kyis de'i khyim nas kar sha pa na drug cu'i
186b1('dul ba): gta' bcad nas/de la mas smras pa/bu khyod kyis las ci byas na des khyod kyis bdag nyid kar sha pa na drug cu'i gyod la bsnyen par gyur/khye'us smras pa/gang dag shAkya'i sras kyi
186b2('dul ba): dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad par byed pa de dag 'di ltar 'gyurate/dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag pa nyid nyams par byas so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
186b3('dul ba): 'das la gsol to/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gling gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//
186b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'
186b5('dul ba): la rmas pa/nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su 'thun pa/
186b6('dul ba): ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no//zhes rnam par smad pa me tsha //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du
186b7('dul ba): mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi
187a1('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bsgrubs pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon
187a2('dul ba): par bya ste/dge slong gi phyir rgyal po 'am blon po chen po'o ma/bram ze 'am khyim bdag gam/grong rdal gyi mi 'am/yul gyi mi 'am/nor can nam/tshong dpon nam/
187a3('dul ba): ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag tu gos kyi rin dag skur bar gyur la/de nas pho nya do gos kyi rini de dag khyer nas de ga le ba der song ste phyin nas/dge slong de la 'di skad ces daphags
187a4('dul ba): pab mkhyen par mdzod cig/khyod la rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po 'am/bram ze 'am khyim bdog gam/grong rdul gyi mi 'am/yul gyi mi 'am/nor can nam tshong
187a5('dul ba): dpon nam ded dpon nam che ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag skur gyis 'phags pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na dge slong des/pho nya de la 'di skad
187a6('dul ba): ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong dag ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste/bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te pho nya de dge slong de
187a7('dul ba): la 'di skad ces 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa/'phags pa rnams kyi zhal te nyams su len pa gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na dge slong gos 'dod/
187b1('dul ba): pas pho nya 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste/'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa'o zhes kun dga'i ra ba pa 'am dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o//
187b2('dul ba): de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas zhal ta byed pa ga la der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas zhal ta byed pa de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig/khyod
187b3('dul ba): kyis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang de la gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces brjod par bya'o//de nas pho nya des
187b4('dul ba): zhal ta byed pa de la shin tu legs par yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas/dge slong de ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas/dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags
187b5('dul ba): pas zhal te bgyid pa bstan pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis de'i gan du bzhud cig dang des khyod la gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro zhes brjod
187b6('dul ba): par bya'o//dge slong gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song la/tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do zhes lan
187b7('dul ba): gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya dran par bya'o//lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par byas pa na/gal te gos de grub na/de lta na legs/gal te ma grub na lan
188a1('dul ba): bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdud par bya'o//lanan+d+ra bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs mi smra bar bsdad pa na/gal ta gas/
188a2('dul ba): de grub na de lta na legs/gal te ma grub na de'i 'og tu gos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtsal te gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do//gal te ma brub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs
188a3('dul ba): pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o//yang na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge slong che ge mo'i phyi ri gos kyi rin gang dag skur ba de dag ni/dge slong de'i don ci yang ma
188a4('dul ba): grub kyis shes par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gis nor chud ma gzan cig ces spring bar bya ste/de la de ni cho ga yin no//dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ni shAkya'i bu nye
188a5('dul ba): dga' 'am/gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i phyir ro//rgyal po 'am zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/bud med rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur ne/de yang
188a6('dul ba): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la/rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang rje rigs dang dmangs rigs rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na/de
188a7('dul ba): yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin no//blon po chen po 'am zhes bya ba ni/rgyal po las gzhan pa blon po dang rtsis mkhan dang sna chen po la gtogs
188b1('dul ba): brgyal srid byed pa gsang tshig 'thun pas 'tshog/gang dag rgyal po lnga bArten nas 'tsho bar pyod pa dag go/bram ze 'am zhes bya ba ni bram ze gtsang sgra can no//khyim bdag
188b2('dul ba): ga zhes bya ba ni phyug pa'o//grong rdul gyi mi'i zhes bya ba ni grong khyer k+Sh+mI mi'o//yul gyi mo 'am zhes bya ba ni yul gyi minga'o//nor can nam zhes bya ba ni nor bye byas drug
188b3('dul ba): pa'o//tshong dpon nam zhes bya ba ni cod pan bcings pa'o//dod dpon gyis shes bya ba ni glang gis lon gnyis sam gsum don 'thun 'das par gyur pas so//bainy+tsa
188b4('dul ba): lag tu zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang bud med dang ma ning gi'o//gis kyi rin dag ces bya ba ni gser dngul dag go/zer na zhes bya ba ni sma na'o//gos rung ba zhes bya ba
188b5('dul ba): ni spyad bzod po'o//dge slong gos 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o//kun dga'i rab pa zhes bya ba ni rung ba pyod pa'o//dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni gsum
188b6('dul ba): lo skyabs su spong ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga pa'o//phyogs su zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi po dag tu ste/phyogs bzhi po dag gang zhe na/'bod gnas dang /khyim gnas
188b7('dul ba): dang /las kyi mtha' dang /las kyi gnas dgo ga/'a'od gnas rdo rje mkhan gyi gnas da /'dreg mkhan gyi gnas so//khyim gnas ni khyim 'amo chu'i gan sa/
189a1('dul ba): las kyi mtha' ni bu ram shing gi las kyi mtha' dang sA lu'i las kyi mtha' dang lan tshwa'i las kyi mtha' dag go/las kyi gnas ni tshong khang dang tshong
189a2('dul ba): rdal lo//cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gis te/bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gang zhe na/khyod 'ongs sam zhes zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya
189a3('dul ba): ba dang /'ongs pa lags so zhes zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /stan 'di la 'dug shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /rkang pa khrus shig ces zer ba la de'i
189a4('dul ba): phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /bca' ba dang bza' ba dag zo shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /btung ba mthung shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o//bskul ba'i sgo
189a5('dul ba): drug po de dag ha cang myur ba dang thogs pa med par brjod cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs med par byed na bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongs su ma rdzogs par brjod par bya'o//bskul
189a6('dul ba): ba'i sgo drug po de dag ha cang mi myur ba dang thogs pa dang bcas par brjod par byed cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs yod par byed na bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongasu rdzogs par
189a7('dul ba): brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og rol du'o//gos grub na zhes bya ba ni thob na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba
189b1('dul ba): bshags par bya ba ste/des spangs pa'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so//gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/bdag nyid 'gro
189b2('dul ba): bar bya'o//yang na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las shes bya ba ni lhan cig gnas pa 'am nye gnas laso//de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni/de la de ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos yin pa'o///
189b3('dul ba): de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/gal te zhal ta byed pa de dge slong de'i gan du 'ongs nas/'di skad ces 'phags pa gos 'di dag gzhes shig ces zer na/dge slong des zhal ta byed
189b4('dul ba): pa de la 'di skad ces bdag gis 'di dag spangs zin gyis song la de nyid la byin cig ces brjod par bya'o//gal te zhal ta byed pa de dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa bdag gis
189b5('dul ba): de'i sems bsdu ba rjes su bsgrub kyis bzhes zhig ces zer na blang bar bya'o//dge slong gis go rims de lta bu ma byas par gang cung zad len na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
189b6('dul ba): mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang mis rung
189b7('dul ba): bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nyo dang mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na yang nyes byas 'gyur ro//mis sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin
190a1('dul ba): pa'i pho nya dang mi ma yin pas rung ba byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mis sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na yang
190a2('dul ba): nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mis sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang mis rung bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nyi dang mis
190a3('dul ba): rung por byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//mis sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nya dang mis rung bar byed na ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de ma
190a4('dul ba): spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gos gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang sdo ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/de spangs

190a7('dul ba): la ltung ba bshags nas gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ni ltung ba med do//de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du gzhi dam bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam
190b1('dul ba): chos gos sam dra ba 'am phor bu 'am ska rags sam dge slong ga 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba nye bar 'jog na de yang spang bar 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa

190b3('dul ba): drug dang mtho gang lam dang ni//'khru ba dad ni gser da kyi dang /mngon mtshan can dang nyo 'tshong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas

190b7('dul ba): bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod pa byed pa dag ste/srog gcod pa las ma log ma gangs ma spangs so sor ma spang pa deso na glen pal gyi spyan sar pa byed pa dang byed du 'jug ste/de dag
191a1('dul ba): srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang byed du 'jug pas sbyin bal 'byung ba'i srin bu srog chags mang po'i tshogs bsgrubs shing srog gcod par byed de//su zhig
191a2('dul ba): dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems shes smod par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
191a3('dul ba): 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'od dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhino//

192b1('dul ba): mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang klag pa dang /kha don dang /rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba dang nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/lug bal nag

193a1('dul ba): snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams lams pa/dge slong dag lug bal nag po 'bal zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa bden

194a7('dul ba): rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba dang nang sems kyi ni gnas kyang gting bar byed de 'dod pa dang de'i don du 'ongs po dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed
194b1('dul ba): nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bal dkar po dang mkhob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang byed du 'jud de/des kyang de dag

195a2('dul ba): bla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /phri ba dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang mdzes pa dang drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la

195a5('dul ba): bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya/gsum pa ni dkar po las/bzhi pa ni mkhob pa liM las gzhug par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal
195a6('dul ba): nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/gsum pa la dkar po las/bzhi pa la mkhob bral las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge
195a7('dul ba): slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so//stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te nang tshangs can dang blings pa ste don 'dir ni blings pa yin por dgongs so//sar pa zhes bya ba
195b1('dul ba): ni/sar pa gnyis te gsar pas skur pa dang rnyed pas sar pa ste/don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongaso//byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan
195b2('dul ba): byed du 'jud na'o//cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya zhes bya ba la/lug bal zhes bya bo ni lug gi bal lo//nag po 'ba' zhi
195b3('dul ba): ces bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang /sngo bas gnag pa dang /'ad mau kha dang //kham pa'o//gsum pa ni dkor po las zhes bya ba la dkar po zhes bya ba ni/
195b4('dul ba): glo'i bal dang rgyab kyi bal dang gnya' ba'i bal lo//bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la/mkhob bal zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i bal dang /mgo'i bal dang /
195b5('dul ba): lto'i bal lo//ma bcug ces bya ba ni ma bsres par ro//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung
195b6('dul ba): byed do zhes gsung so//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis stan srang bcu pa byed ni des lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las srang lnga dang dkar po
195b7('dul ba): las srang phyed dang gsum dang mkhob pal srang phyed dang gsum gzhug par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma ma chug gam gsum pa dkar
196a1('dul ba): po las/bzhi pa mkhob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na stan zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//srang bcu pa ji lta ba de bzhin du dge slong gis stan
196a2('dul ba): srang nyi shu pa dang /srang sum cu pa dang /srang bzhi bcu pa dang /srang lnga bcu pa byed na des lug bal nag po 'ba' shig las srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang dkar po las srang phyed dang bcu gsum dang
196a3('dul ba): mkhob bal las srang phyed dang bcu gsum gzhug par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/gsum pa dkar po las/bzhi pa 'khob
196a4('dul ba): bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na stan zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dkar po dang mkhob bal las srang gcig gam/srang phyed phyi ste lug bal nag po
196a5('dul ba): 'ba' zhig las stan sar pa byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nag po 'ba' zhig gi mod pa dang rin mnyam pa dang dkar po dang 'khob bal dkon pa dang rin che bar
196a6('dul ba): gyur na ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang //sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyan pa la ltung ba med do//cha gnyis bsre ba'i spangs pa ste/bcu gsum pa rdzog s+ho//
196a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod no rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung
196b1('dul ba): bar gyur te/de dag stan 'di ni ha cang ringaso//'di ni ha cang thung so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud do//stan 'di ni ha cang dog go//'di ni ha cang yangs so//'di ni thad kyi thaman du bug rdol dang /
196b2('dul ba): sha zad pa dang bcos bka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jug pas/dge slong de dag stan byas shing byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur cing /lung
196b3('dul ba): mnod pa dang /klag pa dang /kha ton dang rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba dang nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/dge slong rnams la stan mang
196b4('dul ba): ba nyid 'di lta bu byung bar gyur te/'di dag stan 'di ni ha cang rings so//'di ni ha cang thungaso zhes de bor nas gzhon byed du 'jud/stan 'di ni ha cang dog go//'di ni ha cang yangs so//
196b5('dul ba): 'di ni thaMd kyi tham cad du bug rdol dang sha zad pa dang /bcos bka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pas/dge slong 'di dag stan byas shing byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba
196b6('dul ba): mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur cing /lung mnod pa dang /klag pa dang /kha ton dang /rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba dang /nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed pas smod par
196b7('dul ba): byed kha zer por byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gling gzhi 'di dang /
197a1('dul ba): 56/skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par
197a2('dul ba): mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung
197a3('dul ba): bar gyur te//khyed cig stan 'di ni ha cang rigs so//'di ni ha cang thung so//zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud/stan 'di ni ha cang dog go//'di ni ha cang yang so//'di ni thams cad kyi
197a4('dul ba): thams cad du bug rdol dang sha zad pa dang /bcos bka' ba dag nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
197a5('dul ba): kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /cho ga mi shes pa dang //tshogaso dka' ba dang /dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa
197a6('dul ba): dang /gso bla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /phri ba dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang mdzes pa dang /drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la
197a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba lo nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma
197b1('dul ba): bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o//gal te dge slong
197b2('dul ba): gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /ma spangs kyang rung stan ser po gzhan byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi
197b3('dul ba): bslab pa'i ba ni bca' ba mdzad do///sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas mchog na bzhug so//'brog gnas grang zhing rlung che bas dge slong lag gi bla
197b4('dul ba): dag lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa de dag grang ba dag gis las sar pa dag rgyun bcad par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa
197b5('dul ba): ste/mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/dus su rmed pa/dus las yol badri mi rmed pa/don dang ldan pa rmed pa/don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas/sangs rgyas bcom
197b6('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed par la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no//de la srangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dron dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin
197b7('dul ba): pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong lag gi bla dag gis las ser pa dag rgyun bcad par gyur//
198a1('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ngan skyong gos spyan sa ba spyon nam 'ad bzhon du la d+ha tu bsang bar bya//gal te dge slong gis /
198a2('dul ba): drug thun chud du smra rnyi pa d+d+he sa s+yAm+b+ha /ma s+sa s+yAT+Ted+d+hi rmA stan sar bu hUM shin byed na srung ba'i snying byed de zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi ga na
198a3('dul ba): bca' blam 'di pos/dge slong lag go zla dag dgung lo drug gi bar du spyan gyi 'i thub po de dag grang ba dag gros las sar ba dag rgyun bkum par gyur to//bcom ldan
198a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong lag gi bla gang lo lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa'i dge sbyong des dge 'dun las le drug tshun tshod du stan gyi gnang
198a5('dul ba): ba gsol bar bya'o//'di ltar gsol bar bya ste/gnas mil ba sham pa byis nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsku nas/dge
198a6('dul ba): 'dun thams cad 'ag ci 'thun par gyur pa la/dge slong lag gi shA des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te nan rims kyis bya ba 'tshul nas/rban+d+ra pa'i mtha'i logs
198a7('dul ba): tsog pur 'dug ste/zil mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson dugs pa/bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lo drug
198b1('dul ba): tu stan mi bgyid pa las/bdag dge slong lag ge bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba gsol na/thugs rtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs bcu
198b2('dul ba): ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyis lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal du gsol/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/dge slong de dag gis dge slong lag gi bla
198b3('dul ba): de la dad pa 'am/yid ches pas 'gro bar mi bya bar dge 'dun thams cad der 'dong bar bya ba 'am/dge 'dun gyis bsgos pa'i dge slong dag btang bar bya zhing /de dag gis stan de rang gi mig
198b4('dul ba): sngar bab par bya ba 'am/yang na stan de dge 'dun gyi dbus su dbyung bar bya ste/gal te stan de ha cang ring ba yin na de dag gis gcad par bya'o//gal te ha cang yangs pa yin na de dag
198b5('dul ba): gis bcad par bya'o//gal te ha cang dog pa yin na bal sbyin par bya'o//gau pa te ral ba dang rdol pa yin na bal sbyin par bya'o//gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang sha zad pa
198b6('dul ba): dang bcos dka' ba nyid yin na/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun po rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
198b7('dul ba): li drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las/dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi bad/dge 'dun las la drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba gsol na/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
199a1('dul ba): bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug chun chad du stan gnang ba stsal to//'dun
199a2('dul ba): gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lo drug tu stan ma bgyid pa las/dge slong lag gi bla
199a3('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba gsol te/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang
199a4('dul ba): ba stsol na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
199a5('dul ba): gsungs shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang
199a6('dul ba): kha stsal lags twa/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla gang la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba byin pa des lo drug tshun chad du stan
199a7('dul ba): gnang ba byin pa des lo drug tshun chad du snyan byed du bzhug ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslar pa 'dod pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab
199b1('dul ba): pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod de//dge slong rnams la yang ded 'thun pa dang /da'i shas che ba dang /da dang 'tsham pa chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchod mdzad nas/dge slong
199b2('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na sgyu ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/
199b3('dul ba): dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o//gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan
199b4('dul ba): byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spangs pa'i ltung byed do//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so//stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/nang tshangs can dang
199b5('dul ba): blings pa ste/don 'dir ni blings pa yin par dgongaso//sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/gsar pas sar pa dang /rnyed pas sar pa ste/don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa
199b6('dul ba): yin par dgongaso//byed na zhes bya ba ni/bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan byed du 'jud pang gi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o//zhes bya ba ni lo drug tshun chad du bcang bar bya'o//
199b7('dul ba): gal te dge slong giso lo drug tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni de tshun chad du'o//stan rnying pa zhes bya ba ni stan gang yod de'o//spangs kyang rung /mo spangs kyang rung /stan sar pa gzhan
201a1('dul ba): rgyun tu du smya gnan rdzu ga / na su na /sa na ngas ngas /
201a2('dul ba): dazlas nas myung byed kyi ltung ba ba shags par bya ste/des na sang ba'i ltung byed dgas gsung so//de lo ltung ba'i sbyor 'gyur zhes na/bar zlum laM/gnyis po rnams phyi mngon pa dang /
201a3('dul ba): gnyis brnams skyom zin pa dang /gaN+DI gzin nos gcig slong dang /gcig po rnams te gtong ba dang /lo drug pa la nyes med pa/de ni stan gyis bsdu ba yin/dge slong gis gang la sbyin
201a4('dul ba): rnam par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa rtsom par byed na/gnyis pa rlom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/byas zin na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//snga ma la ni ltung ba med do//de
201a5('dul ba): nyid la skyon gnyis pa mi rtsom ying lo gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lo lnga pa la sbyin gnyis po rtsom par byed na/gnyis pa rnam pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/
201a6('dul ba): sa zin na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//snga ma la ltung ba med do//dge slong gis lo gang la stan rnam par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa ba rnams nas/snum zin par byed na/
201a7('dul ba): gnyis pa rtsom pa de la/nyes byas su 'gyur la/byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//lo de nyid lo snyan pa brtsams nas/zin par mi byed kyang lo gnyis pa dang /gsum
201b1('dul ba): pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas/snga ma zin par byed na de rtsom pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis lo gang la
201b2('dul ba): stan byas pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa yang byas nas/des snga ma shos bzhag ste/phyi ma shos gtong bar byed dam/phyi mAM shos bzhag ste/snga ma shos gtong bar byed na/gnyis pa rtsom
201b3('dul ba): pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//snga ma la ni ltung ba med do//lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa ma byas kyang lo gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa
201b4('dul ba): dang /lnga pa la stan gnyis pa byas nas/des snga ma shos bzhag ste/phyi ma shos gtong bar byed dam/phyi ma shos bzhag ste/snga ma shos gtong bar byed na/gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes
201b5('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la/byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//snga ma la ni ltung ba med do//dge slong gis lo gang la stan rtsom pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa yang brtsams nas/
201b6('dul ba): do ma zin par gtong bar byed dam/lo gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa la brtsams nas/de mi zin par gtong bar byed na/de rtsom par byed pa la nyes byas su
201b7('dul ba): 'gyur la/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do//dge slong gis lo gang la stan byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa mi byed cing /lo gnyis pa la yang mi byed/gsum po la yang mi byed/bzhi
202a1('dul ba): pa la yang mi byed/lnga ba la yang mi byed par/lo drug pa la byed na ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis
202a2('dul ba): nyen pa la ltung ba med do//lo drug tu bcang ba'i spang ba ste/bcu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho////'dul ba rnam por 'byed pa//bam po so gnyis pa//sangs
202a3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugasu
202a4('dul ba): chud pa de'i tshe na/thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes sgra grags so//byang lam na tshong pa dag gis yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/
202a5('dul ba): gang dag de la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang /phan yon che ba dang /gsal ba che ba dang /rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes
202a6('dul ba): thos so//thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag zong dag thogs te mnyan yod du 'dong zhing der bdag cag gis khe spogs kyang bsgrubs par bya/bcom
202a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du rig nas/tshong pa lnga brgya byang lam nas zong dag thogs te yul dbus su 'phags so//de dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du
202b1('dul ba): phyin nas/de dag gis zong mkhos su phab ste/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ga la ba der drong nas phyin pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so//
202b2('dul ba): khyim bdag bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod do//shes ldan dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
202b3('dul ba): blta bar bya ba rin po che kho na yin te/de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di lta ste/dper na/u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar blta ba dang //
202b4('dul ba): 'byung ba dkon pa yin no//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag khrid nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
202b5('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das tshong pa de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
202b6('dul ba): dag par ston par mdzad yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jud par mdzad//yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du mas chos
202b7('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung ngo ///
203a1('dul ba): de nas tshong pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi gtsug lag khang blta bar brtsams
203a2('dul ba): pa dang /tshong pa de dag gis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi mal dag nA gdi ba dbus rdol ba dag mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas
203a3('dul ba): sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so//khyim bdag ci'i phyir dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan 'di dag gi gding ba dag dbus rdol bar gyur/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/
203a4('dul ba): bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni phal cher mtshan mo skyil mo krung gis 'da' bar byed do//de dag sems mngon par dad par gyur nas dad pa skyes pa de dag gis dge slong rnams la ras
203a5('dul ba): yug chen lnga brgya phul lo//dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag khang pa chen po'i gtsug khang bla gab med pa zhig tu bzhag go//de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la
203a6('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang //dge slong gi dge 'dun zhug so//bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba ni bzhugs shing bsod
203a7('dul ba): snyoms mngon par bsgrub so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing /bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub par mdzad de/lnga gang zhe na/nang du
203b1('dul ba): yang dag 'jog bzhed pa dang /lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /gnas mal rtog par bzhed pa dang /'dul ba lnga nyan thos rnams kyi bslab par
203b2('dul ba): gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o//don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas rdzas las
203b3('dul ba): byung ba na bzhugs shing /bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma ldon par thug su chud nas lde mig bsnam
203b4('dul ba): te/kun dga' ra bar/gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/khang khyim nas khang khyim du/'chags nas 'chag sar dang /gol ba gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa
203b5('dul ba): na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gsheg so//de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang /ral pa sa rdul gyi phye ma dang /'dres pa rab
203b6('dul ba): tu mang po dag sra la bkram zhing 'dug go/bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang ral byas rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug pa dag
203b7('dul ba): gzig so//gzigs nas kyang e ma'o zhes gsung zhing rmad nas/'di snyam du dgongs te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang go dang khrag dag btsir tsang btsir
204a1('dul ba): cing sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drong mi shes pa dang /so sa ru ma rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam
204a2('dul ba): du dgongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag legs par brtul cing sprugs nas/bting zhing bskams te rtsig pa la mi reg par mdzad nas/gtsug lag khang
204a3('dul ba): gogi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshig so//de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas bsod snyoms blangs nas/bcom ldan
204a4('dul ba): 'das ga la ba der song ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/dge slong gi dge 'dun cim pa hA
204a5('dul ba): sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la/dge slong ji lta zas
204a6('dul ba): bsod dam/dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /des gsol pa/btsun pa te por zas bsod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim
204a7('dul ba): par bgyis so//de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag
204b1('dul ba): khang du gshegaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas bcom
204b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di na ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par shes nas lde mig khyer te kun dga'i re ba nas kun dga'i
204b3('dul ba): ra ba ra/gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/khang khyim nas khang khyim du/'chag sa nas 'chag sar dang /gol bar song zhing mthar gyis 'gro ba na khang pa chen po'i gtsug
204b4('dul ba): lag khang zhig pa der phyin nas/ngas khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang ral bas rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug pa
204b5('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas A ma zhes byas te smad nas 'di snyam du bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa n+dan dag gis phyogs pa dang /sha dang khrag btsir cing be tsir cing sbyin pa dag
204b6('dul ba): sbyin/bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /so sor mi rtog par yongasu longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs kyis/dge slong dag khyed kyis
204b7('dul ba): dod pas sbyin par bya ba la drod ran par yongasu longs spyad pa dang /spang zhing yongasu longs spyod pa dang /dus su yongasu longs spyad pa dang /brtag cing yongasu longs spyad pa dang /
205a1('dul ba): khyad kyis yongasu longs spyod na leg so//bar sdom la/drod ran pa dang snang ba dang /de bzhin dus dang brtag pa dang /khad kyis yongasu spyad pa yin/
205a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod ran pa dang spang ba dang /dus dang brtag pa dang /khad kyis yongasu longs spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
205a3('dul ba): dge slong dag de lte bas na/phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la/nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no///
205a4('dul ba): de'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gis gding ba sar pa byed na sar pa kha dog mi sdug por bya ba'i phyir/gding ba rnying
205a5('dul ba): pa bde ba gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas klan par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir/gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor
205a6('dul ba): pas ma glan par gding ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas/gding po zhes bya ba ni so sor gding ba'o//sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis
205a7('dul ba): te gsar pas sar pa dang rnyed pas sor pa ste/doni 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongaso//byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan byed du 'jud na'o//sar pa kha dog
205b1('dul ba): mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sar pa sra bar bya ba'i phyir ro//gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/gal te de la gding ba rnying pa bang
205b2('dul ba): bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba gzhan yod na'o//bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i'o khru'i khyu phyed dang de yod do//
205b3('dul ba): 'khor bas shes bya ba ni kun nas mtho ris yod pas so//glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyar bar bya ba'o//ma glan par zhes bya ba ni ma sbyar bar ro//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po
205b4('dul ba): de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsung so///de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis
205b5('dul ba): gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par ji tsom cung zad du gding ba sar pa spyod par byed na/thams cad kyi thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro///
205b6('dul ba): gding ba snying pa thams cad kyi thams cad du sha zad pa dang /bug rdol du gyur pa dang /btsas su mi rung ba yin na ltung ba med do//de tsam med na ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang /smyos

206a1('dul ba): mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//drug sde dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nyi dka' lhung bzed nag po n+dan
206a2('dul ba): 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa bsgrub par byed 'ong na yang glo bur 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /skye bo mang po dga' ba dang yid du
206a3('dul ba): 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro//yu bu cag ni khron pa'i ru sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dod gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa thob pa dang /skye bo mang po dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar ga la
206a4('dul ba): 'gyur gyis yu bu cag kyang 'dong ngo //gang du 'dong /gang du don 'thun 'grub par ro//de dag gis bsams pa/gal te thams cad dong bar 'gyur na/bdag cag gi nye bar spyod pa'i
206a5('dul ba): khyim gang dag yin pa de dag kyang lhung bzed nag po can dag gis rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyis/bdag cag gis gcig bzhag ste 'dong bar bya na su gzhag par bya//btsun
206a6('dul ba): po 'char kha'o//btsun pa 'char kha khyod 'di nyid du 'dug shig/kho bo cag 'dong bar bya'o//de bzhin gyis shig ces 'char kha de nyid du 'dug go/lnga pa dag gis don 'thun
206a7('dul ba): brtsal bar brtsams pa dang /de dag gis bal yul du 'gro ba'i don 'thun mthong nas/de'i drung du song ste smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag khyed gang du 'phags/'phags pa
206b1('dul ba): dag bal yul du'o//bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag kyang khyed dang lhan cig 'dong ngo //'phags pa dag bal yul ni rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba lags pas khyed cag der dgyes par mi//

206b3('dul ba): dag don 'thun de dang lhan cig bal yul du 'phags nas mthar gyis bal yul du phyin pa dang /nyi mo gang kho na la bal yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi

206b7('dul ba): bgyis sam/bzhin bzangs dag ci de ltar na 'gro'am/'dong ngo //'phags pa dag bdag cag gis thod ma sbyar te/de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag cag dang bshes
207a1('dul ba): pa'i tshong pa gzhan dag mchis pa de dag gis zong bsgyur bas/de dag la gtad par bgyis/de dag dang thabs cig bzhud cig/drug sde dag gis

207a3('dul ba): dang lhan cig 'phags so//drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rdul gyis 'jigs pas yang na ni don 'thun gyi mdun du 'gro/yang na ni phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bas/de dag don 'thun gyi
207a4('dul ba): phyi bzhin 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na tshong pa de dag gi shing rta'i srog shing chags nas tshong pa de dag gis bsams pa/gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na sgras chom rkun
207a5('dul ba): dag 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis dang por bdag cag bsad par 'gyur la/de'i 'og tu ner yang phrogs par 'gyur gyis/bdag cag gis gcas pa dag khyer te 'dong ngo snyam nas/

207a7('dul ba): ste/gal te shing rta'i srog shing btsos ni sgras chom rkun pa dag mche bar 'gyur zhing /de dag gis dang por bdag cag 'akum par 'gyur la/de'i 'og tu nor yang phrogs par
207b1('dul ba): 'gyur bas/bdag cag gis gces pa dag 'tshal te mtsho'o snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing mchi so//bzhin bzangs dag khyod kyis balnga dag yongs btung ngam yongs su btang ngo //gal rta
207b2('dul ba): khyed cag la mI gnod na\u0f89\u0fa4 dang lAm sgrog bu can dang stod kor nang tshangs can dang rgyu cang dang lhag pad dang shur bu phre'u la sogs pa'i don du cung zhig bkur ro//'phags pa dag bdag cag

208a4('dul ba): thams cad skrags nas nags khrod du byer ro//de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/'di dag ni glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag ma yin gyi/'di ltar rnga mo dag cig 'ong ba yin no//

208a6('dul ba): de dag thag nye bar gyur pa dang /yang rgod de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag khyed cag 'di lta bu'i khur dag thogs pa de'i phyir ri brags pa thams cad skrag ste/nags khrod

208b1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dga'o nye dga' gal trai lam du 'dod na tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis lam gol por 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam gol bar zhugs te dong ba dang /sho gam pA dag gis tshong pa na
208b2('dul ba): gam 'dral ba bskugs pa'i phyir 'gre 'gu ba'i mi mang po dag bkod cing 'khod pa dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/e ma'o tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag ci'i phyir sho gam dral te

208b6('dul ba): yin/tshe dang ldan pa drug sde dag gam/yin no//tshe dang ldan pa dag byon po legs so//byon pa legaso//de dag nang du zhugs nas de dag gis bal gyi khur dwa dag bi shig po dang //ri/
208b7('dul ba): rab kyi rnam pa 'dre ba'i phung po chen por rnam par gnas so//de dag lo dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dge khyed cag klur 'di lta bu dag thogs ni khyed la zo 'tsham pa dang /
209a1('dul ba): mi 'byung ngam/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo cag gis bza' ba kho na'i phyir kha mngon par bsgrubs sam/gang kho bo cag la tho 'tsham par byed pa de la
209a2('dul ba): kho bo cag gis kyang nyis 'gyur sbyin par bya'o//dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs por byed ces
209a3('dul ba): smod par byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng
209a4('dul ba): gzhi 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par
209a5('dul ba): mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhen te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par
209a6('dul ba): gyur pa bden na mau/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa
209a7('dul ba): ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par rmad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par rmad pa mdzad nas/dge slong rnams la
209b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no///
