209b3('dul ba): khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o//de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de
209b4('dul ba): lta bu gang yin pa'o//lam du zhugs pa shes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pas so//lug bal dag ces bya ba ni lug gi ba la dag go//rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so///
209b5('dul ba): 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o//dge slong des blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mnod par bya'o//blangs nas khyer ba med na zhes bya ba ni rung ba byed pa med na'o//dpag
209b6('dul ba): tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dpag tshad gsum gyi mthar thugs pa'i bar tshun chad du'o//bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o//zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis bkur
209b7('dul ba): bar bya'o//de las 'ongs par khyer na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar khyer na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spang nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/
210a1('dul ba): /de nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso////de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis lug bal dag rnyed la khyer ba med
210a2('dul ba): na/bdag nyid kyis dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha' las 'das par khyer na rgyang grags byed du phyin na nyes byas su 'gyur la rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin na spang ba'i ltung byed
210a3('dul ba): du 'gyur ro//khyer ba yod bzhin du bdag nyid kyis khyar na rtsom pa'i dus kho na na nyes byas su 'gyur l-i/rgyang grags byed du phyin na nyes byas gzhan gcig tu 'gyur//
210a4('dul ba): rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//rdul phra rab drug la rdul phreM mo gcig go/rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig gi chu rdordul drug la lcags rdul
210a5('dul ba): gcig go/lcags rdul drug la ri bong rdul gcig go/ri bong rdul drug la lug rdul gcig go/lug rdul drug la glang rdul gcigo/glang rdul drug la gnyi zer gyi rdul
210a6('dul ba): gcig go/gnyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go/sro ma drug la shig gcig go/shig drug la nas gcig go/nas drug la sor ga cag go/sor bzhi drug la khru
210a7('dul ba): gang ngo //khru phyed dang bzhi la mi'i srid do//khru bzhi la gzhu'o//gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags gtsogo/rgyang grags brgyad la dpag tshad gcig go//de la dge slong dgon pa
210b1('dul ba): pa lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la de blangs te khyer ba med na rgyud grags kyis chod pa'i grong bdun po dag gi grong phyed du ni nyes byas su 'gyur la/glong gi mtha' ni spang bar
210b2('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//grong nas dgon pa'i lam du 'jug na rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/rgyang grags re rer spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhwa dang lham sgro gu can
210b3('dul ba): dedang stod kor nang tshangs can dang rgya cang dang lhag bod dang /shur bu bye'u la sdigs pa'i don du de tsam dag khyer ba la ni ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems
210b4('dul ba): 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//bal thogs pa'i spang ba ste bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho///sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na//
210b5('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nu bzhug so//drug sde dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' ba la bgo bar bya'o//cha dur bya/de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag
210b6('dul ba): gas btsun pa 'char kha 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pa la ci'i phyir skal ba sbyin/cha lngar bya'o//'char khas thos nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyad kyis der rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang
210b7('dul ba): khyed kyis gyis shig/kho bo 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang kho bo nyid kyir bya'o//nye dgas bsams pa/'di 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa mang po grub gor
211a1('dul ba): mchag snyam nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dag cag dus thams cad dud+d+ha/ sbyinan du mi'i myur rtswa snrem gyur bar /rlum+bu//na /
211a2('dul ba): sus dgod du gzhug/btsun pa 'tshar kha ma dub pa yin gyis de 'god du gzhug go//'char khas drug tu byas te bdag nyid kyi skal ba rang gi gnas khang du bcug sde bzhag go//de dag gi
211a3('dul ba): smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha khyod kyis rnyed pa glang grub pa de khyer shog bgo'o//'char khas smras pa/kho bos de'i bar du ka ka ni gcig tsam yang ma rnyed do//khyad kyis kho bo cag
211a4('dul ba): bslus so//'char khas pasamos pa/bdag gis bal du mo zhig nad pa 'di su rmel du gzhug/gal te khyim po dag la btsal na ni de dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa yin
211a5('dul ba): pas thams cad brkus par 'gyur ro//gal te bcu bdun sde dag la btsal na n+do bca' bo'i rin du 'jog par 'gyur ro//chos sbyin la bcol du yang chas sbyin ma ni mdo sde'i mtha'
211a6('dul ba): pa yin la 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang ldan pa yin pas de mdo sde'i tshig dag sems pan dus 'byungs par 'gyur//gau'u ta ma skem mo la bcol du yang go'u te ma skye ma
211a7('dul ba): mo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin la 'khor yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ldan pa yin pas de 'di ni ltung ba yin no//'di ni ltung ba ma yin no zhes sems pa na dus 'gyangs par 'gyuraro//
211b1('dul ba): skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ni spong ba pa yin la 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin pas/de sems rtse gcig tu 'jog pa la bal rmel ba mi gnod kyis bdag gis de la bral
211b2('dul ba): rmel du bcol snyam nas/de de snyam zhing 'dug pa na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ge'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs pa de tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas thag ring po kho na nas
211b3('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub ste/de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsal pa/
211b4('dul ba): de legs par gsungs pa yin te/da gzod kho na bdag kye ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam pa'i blo skyes na khyed kyang 'dir 'ongs so//bdag gis bal nyung
211b5('dul ba): zhig rnyed pa de khyod kyis rmel du chug ste byin cig/'phags pa byedage bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/slar mchis nas dge slong ma gnyis btang gis de gnyis kyi sdug
211b6('dul ba): par stsol cig/'char khas bi liM de dag bzar thag gis bam po gnyisu dam rab tu bcings te/sgo glegs kyi phag du bzhag go//de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi bcom
211b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/dbyar khang du song nas des de'i gan du dge slong ma gnyis btang ste/'dags pa 'char kha'i gan du dang la bal de snyam du gsol zhes gyis
212a1('dul ba): shig ces bsgo'o//de gnyis dong ste smras pa/'phags pa go'u ta ma'i mchid nas/bral de skur du gsol zhes mchi'o//'char khas de gnyis la smras pa/
212a2('dul ba): sgo glegs kyi phag na bam po gnyis 'dug pa de gnyis khyer la dang shig/de gnyis gnas khang du zhugs te gdeg par brtsams pa dang /bskul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas de gnyis
212a3('dul ba): kyis smras pa/'phags pa ci 'dir rang thag gi gor ma dag sprul tam gzhon nu ma gnyis ci khyed gnyis gzhon nu ma gte gum pa yin nam zhes des mthe'u cung gis bteg ste//
212a4('dul ba): cig ni cig gi mgor bskur/cig ni cig gi rked du bskur ro//de gnyis mgo chag la thug go rked pa chag la thug go zhes zer cing dbyar khang du dong nas khur sa la bzhag ste
212a5('dul ba): khri'i steng du skyel cing 'dag go/dge slong ma rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa/'phags ma gnyis gzhon nu ma gte gam pa yin nam/de gnyis kyis smras pa/khyed cag
212a6('dul ba): las stobs dang ldan pa gang yin pa des je 'di theg shig/de dag gis de bdag par brtsams pa dang bskul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas de dag gis smras pa/'phags ma
212a7('dul ba): gnyis ci 'dir rang thag gi rdo dag bcug gam zhes de dag gis bam po de gnyis pashig pa dang /ji tsam nA phung po chen po rnam par gnas par gyur to//dge slong ma
212b1('dul ba): rnams kyis rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa/'phags pa 'char kha na re bal cung zhig ces zer na/gal te mang bar gyur na ni ji lta bur 'gyur/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa/
212b2('dul ba): nu bo dag mgo bregs shing mtsha ni khung ral bu can dag yin na dgod du ci yod/'phags pa 'char kha'i mchid nas bal nyung zhig ces mchi ni//gal te mang bar gyur na ji lta bur
212b3('dul ba): 'gyur/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa/nu ba dag de dag ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag yin pas/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la 'drums pa ltung
212b4('dul ba): bas ltung bar byed do//nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gnyis ni gnyi ga skyes bu dam pa yin to//khur ma blangs pa mi len pa gang yin pa dang /khur blangs pa mthar phyin par byed pa
212b5('dul ba): gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pas/'di ni/khur blangs pa yin pas mthar phyin par bya dgos kyis khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam rmel bar spro ba des de tsam rmel la de'i gan du khyer te
212b6('dul ba): byin cig/de dag yun ring du thogs pa dang 'char khas bsams pa/de dag gis byol de bca' ba'i rin du gzhag go ma chag/bdag gis ma legs pa zhig byas te bdag gis bal de ni
212b7('dul ba): tshor bas 'jigs pas/deng la khar bzhag pa dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam mo//dge slong ma gnyis kyis 'i kha /rmel te phyir te 'ongs nas smras pa/'phagos pa 'char kha bal dag
213a1('dul ba): 'tshal te mchis nas gang du gzhag par bgyi/'char khas byasams pa/da dung spyod yul lcug ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/gnas khang du
213a2('dul ba): chug ste zhog shig/de gnyis kyis bzhag ste song ba dang /gzhan dag gis kyang khyer te 'ong so//ci tsam ni thams cad kyis kyang khyer te 'ong so//de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta
213a3('dul ba): mi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/de'i tshe na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u tA mi'i
213a4('dul ba): lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste dper na//btso smag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar dmar ba shin tu dmar bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
213a5('dul ba): go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//go'u ta mi ci'i phyir khyed kyi lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/dper na/btso slag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar dmar ba dang shin tu dmar
213a6('dul ba): bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bgyi ba gzhan lags na gzhan bgyid do ji ltar gyur/'phags pa 'char khas bdag bal rmel du stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
213a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong drug dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jud dam/bskrun pa rmel du stsol to//de nas
213b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
213b2('dul ba): kyis mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la rmos pa/'char kha khyod dge slong
213b3('dul ba): ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'dzud pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung
213b4('dul ba): ba ma yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de na rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad
213b5('dul ba): nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba le nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bci'i
213b6('dul ba): bAr bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nyi du ma
213b7('dul ba): yin pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jud dam/'chad du 'jud dam/rmil du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char kha 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang
214a1('dul ba): yin pa'o//dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'dra ba'o//nye du ma yin pa la zhes b+hA ba nI b+hI m+bo dang /mes po dang /phyugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nyedu
214a2('dul ba): yin la/de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no//lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug bal lo//'khrur 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur skyug pa byed du 'jud na'o//'chid du 'jud
214a3('dul ba): dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshun du skyug pa byed du 'jud nang//rmel du 'dzud na zhes bya ba ni tha na 'di' bar byed du 'jud na'i/ ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dengs
214a4('dul ba): de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba ba shags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsung so///de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge
214a5('dul ba): slong gis dge slong mnye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug pa la dge 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'ched du 'jung na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//
214a6('dul ba): rmel du 'jud ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'thud po dang rmel du 'dzud dam/'chad du/'jud pa dang 'akru ro da dam/
214a7('dul ba): 'tshad du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/rdul du 'jud pa dang /'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'dzud pa dang /'tshad du 'dzud pa dang /rmal du 'dzud na spang ba'i
214b1('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas lug pa la dag 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'chad du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du/
214b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//rmel du 'jud pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'khrur 'dzud pa dang /'tshed du 'dzud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /rmil du 'dzud dam/'tshod du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'dzun
214b3('dul ba): dam/'tshed du 'jud pa dang /rmel du 'jud dam/rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/rmel du 'jud pa dang 'ched du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /
214b4('dul ba): rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug ba la dag 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'tshed du
214b5('dul ba): 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//rmil du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshad du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/'ched du 'jud pa dang 'khrur
214b6('dul ba): 'dzud dam/'chad du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam+b+ha/rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/rmel du 'jud dang /'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang /'chid du 'jud na/
214b7('dul ba): dang rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge sbyong mo nye du la yid gnyis zabs lug brale dge 'khrur 'jud ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'chad du 'jud na nyes byas su
215a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/'tshed du 'jud pa
215a2('dul ba): dang 'khrur 'jud dam/'tshed du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/rmel du 'jud pa dang /'khrur 'jud dam/rmel du 'jud pa dang /'tshed du 'jud dam/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed
215a3('dul ba): du 'jud pa dang /rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang //sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//bal rme la
215a4('dul ba): du 'jud pa'i spang ba ste/bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas
215a5('dul ba): na bzhug so//de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' cig tu 'dug
215a6('dul ba): go/mtha' cig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la grong dpon gtsug na nor bus 'di skad ces gsil to//btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyi ches snga ba zhig na/rgyal
215a7('dul ba): po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang /blon po'i 'khor mchis shing 'thun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka' mched kun tu brjod pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to//shos ldan
215b1('dul ba): dag ci dge slong rnams mtshan can rung ngam/shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge
215b2('dul ba): slong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid ces mchi nas/de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir
215b3('dul ba): bgyid do zhes mchi/kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchi na/btsun
215b4('dul ba): pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi na/btsun pa ji ltar gang dag
215b5('dul ba): de skad mche ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mo bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang /de dag bcom ldan 'das
215b6('dul ba): kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang chos smra ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang gsungs pa'i rje su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun pas
215b7('dul ba): smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam/grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser
216a1('dul ba): bdag gir byed do zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na/nga la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang /de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes
216a2('dul ba): su smra ba ma yin pa dang /chos smra ba ma yin pa dang /chos kyi rjesu 'thun pa'i chos brda sprad par byed pa ma yin pa dang /smras pa'i rjesu smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las
216a3('dul ba): chos dang 'thun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong
216a4('dul ba): rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni/shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin
216a5('dul ba): pa'i phyir ro//grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can me rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge
216a6('dul ba): spyod rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no///
216a7('dul ba): btsun pa gang gi slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/
216b1('dul ba): gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing /de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lag so//zhes bka' stsal te/ci tsam du bcom
216b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i ngo mtshar to//btsun pa gang gi slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar
216b3('dul ba): du brjod par bya ste/dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing //shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir
216b4('dul ba): bgyid pa de ni/dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing /de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lagaso zhes bka' stsal pa'i/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya cher bzang ba lags so//btsun pa bdag kyang
216b5('dul ba): 'di snyam bgyid do//dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser
216b6('dul ba): bdag gir bgyid pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lagaso grong doponi do de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /
216b7('dul ba): shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i
217a1('dul ba): sras kyi chos ma yin no//de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bus bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /rjes su yi rang ba byas
217a2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi
217a3('dul ba): snum logs ni 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te/bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dpon gtsug na nor bu song nas ring
217a4('dul ba): po ma lon par thugasu chud nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing
217a5('dul ba): gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'od ma'i
217a6('dul ba): tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na/dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
217a7('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
217b1('dul ba): ces gsol to//btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas par de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing /'thun par gyur
217b2('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te bon nas/dge slong gi
217b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ci grong dpon gtsug na
217b4('dul ba): nor bu de ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/nga la grong dpon gtsug na nor bu
217b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyis ches snga ba zhig ni/rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang /blon po'i 'khor mchis shing 'thun par gyur pa rnams la bar
217b6('dul ba): skabs kyi bka' mchid kun tu brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/shes ldan dag ci'i dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung nga ma shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser
217b7('dul ba): bdag gir bgyid dam/'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid ces mchis na/de na kha cig ni 'di skad
218a1('dul ba): ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi/kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge
218a2('dul ba): slong rnams la mngon mtshan mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchi na/btsun pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la
218a3('dul ba): mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams pas raM bdag gir bgyid de zhes mchi na/btsun pa ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na/
218a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi bgyod cing ha cang thal ba mi bgyid pa dang /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang /chos smra ba dang /chos kyi
218a5('dul ba): rjes su 'thun pa'i chos brda' spyod par bgyid pa dang /gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos 'thun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba legs
218a6('dul ba): sam zhes zer na/ngas de la 'di skad ces grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do zhes
218a7('dul ba): zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa ni nga la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang /de dag nges smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang /chos smra ba ma
218b1('dul ba): yin pa dang /chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos brda sbed par byed pa ma yin pa dang /smra ba'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin
218b2('dul ba): tu 'ong ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can
218b3('dul ba): rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing /de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro//grong dpon ngas khyed la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum
218b4('dul ba): gyi bar du brjod pa bya ste/dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed do/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing
218b5('dul ba): gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin na zhes smras pa dang /de nga la 'di skad ces btsun pa gang gi slad du/bcom ldan 'das
218b6('dul ba): kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser
218b7('dul ba): bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing /de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lagaso so zhes bka' stsal te ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshwa to///
219a1('dul ba): bdun pagang gi/smad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis da grang ban das rgyud ma dan kyi kyir//na gnyis pan gsum bAr du rjod ra b+h+yaH/dag
219a2('dul ba): slong rnams la mngon mtshan n+dan mi rung zhing shrIkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gis mi bgyid de/gang la la la mngon mtshan+da can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa dem
219a3('dul ba): dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing /de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lag so zhes bka' stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya cher bzang ba lag so//btsun pa 'dag kyang 'di snyam
219a4('dul ba): 'byed de/dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/gang lo la la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing gser bdag gir

219a7('dul ba): chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras pa/de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bu des ngas byas pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang po byas nas/
219b1('dul ba): nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te nga'i drung nas srong ngo //dge slong dag de ltar grong dpon gtsug na nor bu des rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du dge slong rnams la mngon
219b2('dul ba): mtshan can mi rung zhing /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag ga re mi byed du/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
219b3('dul ba): po dag kyang gdon mi za bar rung ba yin no zhes cha gcig bzung ste/khyu mchog gi tshig rgya chen po smras shing 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra bsgragaso//dge slong dag ngas kyang
219b4('dul ba): de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir
219b5('dul ba): byed pa de ni/dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkyal sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so//dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis gang deng phyin chad shing 'dod pa dag gis shing yongasu
219b6('dul ba): btsal bar bya/rtswa 'dod pa dag gis nar+dz+dza/shing r+N+Na'i las 'dod pa dag gis ni shing rta'i las/mi blas 'dod pa rnams kyis ni mi zlas yongasu btsal bar bya'o zhes smra'i/'di skad ces
219b7('dul ba): rnam grangs gong gis kyang gser bdag gir bya ba ni mi smra'o//'di ni re shig byung ba yin gyi//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi
220a1('dul ba): bca' bar ni mi mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na/
220a2('dul ba): dge slong drug sde dag rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len parabyed len du 'jud par byed phung po gcig tu byed/phung po gnyis su byed/khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung ngu
220a3('dul ba): dag tu 'jog par byed nas/gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu dge sbyong dag ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/'di ltar rang gi lag gis gser
220a4('dul ba): dang dngul len por byed len tu 'jud pa phyed bu mo gcig tu byed/phung po gan+thi tu byed khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog par byed do//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang rang gi lag gis
220a5('dul ba): gser dang dngul len par byed/len du 'jud par byed/phung po gcig tu byed/phung po gnyi su byed/khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog par byed na/shes ldan dag
220a6('dul ba): shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'di la bye brag ni ci yang bsams pa ni ci yod/the dad tu bya ba ni ci yod/su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg
220a7('dul ba): 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems shes smod par byed/byar kha gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
220b1('dul ba): gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas
220b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmad par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa//
220b3('dul ba): dge slong dag khyed rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len pa dang len tu 'jud par byed pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa
220b4('dul ba): rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam
220b5('dul ba): grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab
220b6('dul ba): pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis
220b7('dul ba): gser dang dngul len ta ma len tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//rang gi lag gis shes bya
221a1('dul ba): ba ni rang gi lags pas so//gser dang dngul zhes bya ba ni dbyig dang gser so//len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so//len tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhano//
221a2('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshegs par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byedo zhes gsungs so///
221a3('dul ba): de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/gzhi bco brgyad kyis te/'di long shig/'di nas long shig/'di tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /'di khyer shog/'di nas khyer shog/'di
221a4('dul ba): tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang /'di zhog shig/'dir zhog shig/'di tsam zhog shig ces bya ba dang /de long shig/de nas long shig/de tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /de khyer
221a5('dul ba): shog/de nas khyer shog/de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang /de zhog shig/der zhog shig/de tsam zhog shig ces bya bas so//de la 'di long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur
221a6('dul ba): ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/gser 'di ldong shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'di nas
221a7('dul ba): long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu zangs po che nas sam zangs nas sam rdza bo nas sam/sgom nas sam/ko lpags nas sam/b+h+ra ma to nas long shig ces
221b1('dul ba): skyo bar byed pa ste/de sko bar byed pa las nyes byas su 'gyur la/blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'di tsam ldong shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su brgya 'am

221b5('dul ba): spro bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am stong ngam 'bum khyer shog
221b6('dul ba): ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'di zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu dbyig gam/gser
221b7('dul ba): 'di zhog shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhig pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'dir zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu
222a1('dul ba): 9/zangs po cher ram/zangs su 'am/rdza bor ram/sgrom du 'am ko lpags su 'am/za ma tog du zhog shig ces sgo bar byed ste sgo bar byed pa la nyes byasu 'gyur la bzhag

222a3('dul ba): nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//da ling shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu dbyig gam/gser de long shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/
222a4('dul ba): de sgo bor byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la blangs pa ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de nas long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su zangs po che nas sam zangs nas sam//
222a5('dul ba): rdzab nas sam/sgom nas sam/kau lpags nas sam/za ma tog nas long shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du
222a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro//de tsam long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu brgya'am/stong ngam 'bum long shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/
222a7('dul ba): blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su dbyig gam gser de khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la
222b1('dul ba): nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de nas khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su zangs po che nus sam zangs nas sam rdza bo nas sam sgom nas sam//
222b2('dul ba): ko lpags nas sam/za ma tog nas khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur lo blangs na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni/

222b5('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//der zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu zangs po cher ram zangs sam rdza bor ram sbom bu 'am/ko lbog su 'am za ma tog tu zhog shig
222b6('dul ba): ces sgo bar byed pa ste/de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de tsam zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su/
222b7('dul ba): brgya'am/stong ngam 'bum zhog shig ces sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'di long shig/'di nas long shog/'di tso ma long
223a1('dul ba): shig ces bya ba dang /'di khyer shing /'di nas khyer shi lta 'di tsam Sh+yeng shig ces bya ba dang /'di zhog shig//'dir zhog shig/'di tsam zhog shig

223a3('dul ba): shig/de tsam zhog shig ces bya ba de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyogasu sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/blangs pa dang khyer ba dang bzhag pa na yang nyes
223a4('dul ba): byas su 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dbyig la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gser la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dbyig dang gser lnga reg na
223a5('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi dbyig gam gser brdungs pa la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dbyig dang gser mngon mtshan can l-i ragA na spang ba'i ltung byed
223a6('dul ba): du 'gyur ro//dngul la rig na spyang bi'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nor bu la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//mu ti gau la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bai DUR+Ya la reg naM
223a7('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nor bu dang mu tigi dang bai DUR+Ya la reg nA spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis yul gyi tha snyed can gyi debyug dang gser la rig na
223b1('dul ba): /nyes byas su 'gyur ro//rA gan dang zangs ma dang lcags dang rno lcags dang ro nye dang zha nye dang khro chu la reg pa la ltung ba med do zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan
223b2('dul ba): thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do//'dul ba rnam par 'byung pa///bam po so gsum pa//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
223b3('dul ba): yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na tsam pa ka na khyim bdag dad pa tsan dang ldan pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can bzang po sbyin pa zhig
223b4('dul ba): 'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang skar kung dang skar kung dra ba can dang lan kan gyis brgyan pa'i stong dang /mig
223b5('dul ba): 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi tham skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug nas der dge slong mang po dag dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/de dag gis dgag dbye byas nas smras pa/khyim bdag bdag cag
223b6('dul ba): mnyan yod du ston pa dang /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gros bdag cag la gros dgra byin cigau/byin bdag des smras pa/'phags pa dag 'di
223b7('dul ba): na gos bzang po dag ma mchis te/don 'thun dag mchis shes grag gis don 'thun dag mchis kyi bor du re shig gzhes shig dang de nas gos bzang po dag
224a1('dul ba): na pagadu gan sdug sgyu sa ma sananas na du cig/la gas pa dag pa dag ni lung ba skrun
224a2('dul ba): lags na de ltar dran pa drug gsul bar bgyi/sa skye skyed cig pas gas kyi nu kA r+ya shu pA nI dag sas lta ba'adu TIg/ma drad bu bcom ldan 'das kyis kar shi pa na
224a3('dul ba): dag bkag pa bdag cag mi yin to//phags pa dag 'di ltar bdug la me byin pa ni mi dngo'o//gis nA~M pa dag sbyin du mi dzang ngo //dge slong de dag gi sde kar sha pa na dag sa rna
224a4('dul ba): gas ngan pa dag ldanas da ste/mubar gyis rkyen yid du byin pa dang /de dag la dge slong rnams kyis skyes pa/tshe dang ldan pa dge khyed cig gis dbyung gnas pa'i gas
224a5('dul ba): b+hin+ti bu m+b+ha n+tad dam skyed bye ci ga zhes da do n+do dAr rgyud ma rnyed du/rgyud cig klung du dbyung gnas par khas blang sa rnam par//khyi mo bdag gang la
224a6('dul ba): na //khyim bad sbyin pa zhes bya//de byur mi de byor de dag gis skye sa de n+tas bAr brjod pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis banam ldan 'as
224a7('dul ba): la gsal to//denaso bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du gos te/chom bram ze dang khyim bdeg dang pa can dag kyang gis kyi ni dag sbyin par byed la//'a nyan thos rnams
224b1('dul ba): gos kyi rin dag 'drod kyis ngas nyan thos rnams la rung bar bya ba chung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blang bar bya zhing blangs nas
224b2('dul ba): kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o//gzhan yang dge slong gis zhal ta byed pa spro bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis zhal ta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes nas/
224b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga'i rab pa 'am/dge bsnyen spro bar bya ste/kun dge'i ra ba zhes bya ba ni rung byed pa'o//dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabasu
224b4('dul ba): song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'o//dge slong dag yul gzhan du 'dong ba ni de dag 'di na bdag cag la sbyin pa dag 'ga' yang med do zhes 'gyod po skyes pa dang /bcomo ldan
224b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin bdag de nyid ji srid du gson pa dang /'dug pa dang 'tsho ba dang sdod pa'i bar du shin tu ring du song ba yang nyams pa med do//dge slong rnams kyis chos
224b6('dul ba): gos kyi rin dag rnyed la sbyin bdag med nas/de dag 'gyod pa skyes te ma len pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
224b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/blangs par bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong gi mdun du 'phreng ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//de tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/bdag dge slong ming 'di
225a1('dul ba): zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa'idi rnyed de/bdag dge slong med 'di zhes bgyi sa das po rlung bya ma lagrus g+hA ts+tshid+hA gyis bzla ga/
225a2('dul ba): po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o//de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/'dri la 'gyod par mi bya'o//bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
225a3('dul ba): pa can dag gris mtha' 'khob dag tu gtsug lcag khang drug byed du bcug nas/de nas dus dang dus su skrag pa dag byung nus dge slong dag gis gtsug ldog khang stong byu bor te byer ro//
225a4('dul ba): ma byin par len pa dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par rig nos gautsug lag khang bcom pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi dbyig
225a5('dul ba): dang gser sbas te 'gro bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sba bar bya'i zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gis gang gis sba bar bya mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
225a6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba pa'am/dge bsnyen gyis sba bar bya'o//gang dag spod par byed pa de dag nyid slu bar byeng nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis sba ba
225a7('dul ba): bya'o//dge bsnyen dad pa can med na dge tshul gyis sba bar bya'o//dge tshul med na dge slong dag gis rang gis sba bar bya'o//de la dong rko bar bya ba yod nas gang gis brko bar bya
225b1('dul ba): sa /ts+tshomam+b+ha rmug rgyas gan g+sa du ra m+b+ha Sh+T+r-I d+h+r-i hU~M na/hU~M ma m+b+ha glu /
225b2('dul ba): sbyin dadu ba chen gyisna ni per //dge bsnyen dad pa cani med na den tshul gyis byin par bya'o///tshul mngon dge slong dge gis nga gyis bde bar bya'o//'jigs pa dang byASh+TAn

225b6('dul ba): 'as 'di du b+h+ya ts+tshin rnams snod du yul dbus sa sa namos no 'do byung nis nasate/ rkye ces rnams 'byur ba dang gas smra ba dang

226a1('dul ba): gsal ba che ba dang rgyas pa che bar 'gyur ro zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag yul dbus su 'dong ngo //

226a3('dul ba): nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to//mnyan yod na shes pa can rtsis mkhas pa zhig 'dug pa des byang lam nas tshong pa don 'thun 'ongs shes thos nas des bsams pa/

226a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba 'ongs pa leg so//'ongs pa leg so//khyod kyi ma ni ming 'di zhes bya/khyod kyi pho ni ming 'di zhes bya/khyod kyi rdzas ni 'di snyed cig 'ongaso//nyi ma ga ge mo zhig la ni

226b2('dul ba): rnams kyi gan du song ba dang /de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/shes pa can khyod kyis mgo bzlog ste nyal ba gang zhig las thob/des smras pa/byang lam nas tshong ba don 'thun
226b3('dul ba): 'ongs nas der kho bo ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas/des kho bo la dad pas dad par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no//de dag gis smras pa/shes pa can bdag cag shAkya'i bu'i
226b4('dul ba): dge sbyong de dag rtag tu khyed cag la thag pa dag dang phreng rgyud dag dang 'bru mar mkhan dag las gzhan pa mi gtso bo 'ga' yang mngon par dad par mi byed do zhes tho 'tshem par byed
226b5('dul ba): kyis khyod la ba 'di gyon te song la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag gi snying dag gas par gyis shig/de ltar bya'o zhes smras te/de nas shes pa can de la ba de gyon nas rgyal byed kyi tshul

226b7('dul ba): sgri ba yang bsgrags par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung ba nga rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa de nye ba rna de zag
227a1('dul ba): [।]/mas saHsama.a maHtha sa \u0f7fShas[।।।ऽऽ]
227a2('dul ba): po kho na nas mthong ngo //de nas nye dgas bsams pa/gcer bu pa ngan pa 'di la ba bzang po zhig gyon te 'ongs kyis gal te bdag gis de ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo/
227a3('dul ba): snyam nas/des de la smras pa/shes pa can khyod gcer bu pa yin la la ba 'di lta bu gyon na phyir babs sam ci/kho bo phyir ma babs te/'di ltar byang lam nas tshong pa don 'thun 'ongs nas dar kho
227a4('dul ba): bos ded dpon la ming dang rus brjod nas/nges kho bo la dad pas dang ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no//ma legs so//ma legs so//khyod kyis rgas pa'i gnas skabasu tshul khrims 'chal da/
227a5('dul ba): kun tu spyod do//tshur shog 'dug shig dang chos bstan par bya'o//shes pa can de nye dga'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /nyi ga'i yid dga' zhing yid dga' de la sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par
227a6('dul ba): brtsams so//drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnamasu skyes snyam du sems la/gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na
227a7('dul ba): nyaldanyan pa po dag rang gi sha glang yin pa de yang bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems so//gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byung na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnam su skyes so snyam du
227a8('dul ba): sems par 'gyur ba yin pas/nye dgas shes pa can de la smras pa/shes pa can khyod kyi ston pa ni ngan pa la mos pa yin te/gal te de bzang po 'dod par gyur na/des khyed
227b1('dul ba): cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang /zas ro brgya pa dang ldan pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya pa yang gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig na mi gnang ngo //kho bo cag gi ston pa ni
227b2('dul ba): bzang po la mos pa yin pas des kho bo cag la gros 'bum ri ba dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang khyad pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya pa yang gnang ngo //gal te khyod la pa 'di lta bu
227b3('dul ba): gyon te slongs mo la 'gro bar gyur na/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis shes pa can 'dis tshul khrims 'chal pa kun tu spyod do snyam du shes pas khyod kyis slongs mo
227b4('dul ba): yang ma rnyed par 'gyur gyis khyod la ba 'di kho bo la byin cig dang /kho bos khyod la lab gzhan zhig sbyin no//kho bo la ba 'di gyon d+ha bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na bram ze dang khyim
227b5('dul ba): bdag dad pa can dag gis kho bo mthong nas btsun pa nye dgas la ba 'di lta bu ga las rnyed ces zer na kho bos de dag la 'di skad ces shes pa can che ge mo zhig gis byin no zhes brjod par bya
227b6('dul ba): ste/des na de dag gis shes pa can dad pa dang ldan par gyur to snyam du shes par 'gyur zhing /de dag gis khyod slongs mo la zhugs pa la chang dang nu rtsis slong phor bkang ste sbyin par
227b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro//des smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' ba zhes shig/nye dgas smras pa/shes pa can khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin pas khyod de dag
228a1('dul ba): gi tshig zlos na/yang phyir 'phrog tu 'ong 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod//btsun pa nye dga' ci kho bo'i lwa ba 'di tshad pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/
228a2('dul ba): ba 'di ni kho bo nyid dbang ba yin gyis bzhes shig dang /slar 'phrog tu mi mchi'o//nyi dgas la ba de blangs nas/la btsub ma gzhan zhig de la byin na shes pa tsan de la brngub po byon nas tshangs pa
228a3('dul ba): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du phyir song ba dang /de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/shes pa can khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur te nyal ba gang zhig las thob/des smras pa/'di ni glo gzhan nu grub
228a4('dul ba): pa ya no//ji ltar gyur/kho bos la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas/des kyang kho bo la ba 'di byi no//de dag gis spyos te smras pa/shes pa can shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams ni yu bu cig gson pas
228a5('dul ba): kyang mi dga' ba yino//drug sde dag ji ltar gzhan de lta ma yin la/nye dga' ji lta bar drug sde gzhan da lta ma yin//gal te khyod kyis dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig la byin par gyur na//
228a6('dul ba): kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed na khyod kyis nye dga' la byin te/de ni bdag cag las zong gis kyang khrig gi phyis bu len par 'dod pa yin gyis gal te lwa ba khyer te 'ong na de lta na
228a7('dul ba): legs//gal te khyer te mi 'ong na kho bo cag gis khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas dbyung bar bya zhing /tshul shing yang dbyung bar bya/spang lob khri'u yang bsgyur bar bya/

228b2('dul ba): can 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni bdag gi la ba 'phrogs par byed pa yin snyam nas/de gtsug lag khang ga nang du zhugs nas sgo bcad de 'dug go//shes pa can des bsgo brdung bar

229a5('dul ba): las mnyan nas/nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang /nye dgas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/des bsams pa/shes pa can gyis pho nye 'di lta bu///

230a3('dul ba): ba yin gyi/bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni ma 'dzad do////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
230a4('dul ba): yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do//kun tu sbyor
230a5('dul ba): bar byed/rab tu sbyor bar byed/bun 'gyed por byed/skyed 'gyed par byed/byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /byis pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang /mi byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /ma byas po'i
230a6('dul ba): phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do//ji ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed ce na/kun tu rlom par byed/yul tshol bar byed/shing rta sogs par byed/yul du 'gro 'gro ba'i rjes shom par
230a7('dul ba): byed/lo'u ba dang gro ga dang snag cha dang smyu gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed do//de ltar kun tu sbyor ba byed//ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ce na/brgya shas dang bcu shes dang nyis
230b1('dul ba): shas kyi phyir dbang po dang gro ga dang snag tsha dang smyug gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/de ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed do//ji ltar bun 'gyed par byed ce na/nas dang 'bru spring pa gsar phye
230b2('dul ba): dang nyi sde'i phyir gtong ba dang gzhal ba'i snod dang bre'u chung dang phul dang grog dang snag tsha dang smyug gu dang /yi ge pa tshol bar byed do//de ltar bun 'gyed par byed do//ji ltar skyed 'gyed pa byed
230b3('dul ba): ce na/dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /mu tig tshogs kyi phyir bai DUr+ya tshogs gtong bar byed
230b4('dul ba): cing /dbang po dang grog dang snag tsha dang skyug gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed do//de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed do//ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/gser mngon mtshan can
230b5('dul ba): gyi phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do//ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir
230b6('dul ba): myomangon mtshan med pa gtong bar byed do//de ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do//ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/gser mngon mtshan can ma
230b7('dul ba): yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do//ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma sa po gtong bar byed ce na/gser mngon
231a1('dul ba): mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin pa gtang bar byed de/ ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma b+h+yas byug dbar byud du//gzhan
231a2('dul ba): stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/'di ltar mngon mtshan gyi spyod pa rnam po sna tshogs byed do//
231a3('dul ba): kun tu sbyor bar byed/rab tu sbyor bar byed/bun 'gyed par byed/byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang /ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /ma byas pa'i
231a4('dul ba): phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do//bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshon can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/kun tu sbyor ba byed//rab tu sbyor bar byed/bun 'gyed
231a5('dul ba): par byed//skyed 'gyed par byed/byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang /mo byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na/
231a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang khyimo bdag rnams lo bye brag ci yod/bsam po ni tso yod/tha dad du bya ba ci yod/su zhig dge sbyong mgo rog 'di
231a7('dul ba): dag la bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems shes smod par byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to///
231b1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom
231b2('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dgrogu la rmas pa/
231b3('dul ba): dge slong dag khyed mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul me yin pa/rjes su
231b4('dul ba): 'thun pa ma yin pa/rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa/de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
231b5('dul ba): rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong drug de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos
231b6('dul ba): rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bci'i bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//de'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong
231b7('dul ba): gang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam po sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//mngon mtshan cen
232a1('dul ba): gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba ni rnam pa du ma'o//byed na zhes bya ba ni kun tu spyod par byed pa dang /rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang /bun 'gyed par
232a2('dul ba): byed pa dang /skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod pa byed na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spongs nas/ltung byed kyi ltung po bshags par bya ba ste/des na
232a3('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so////de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas yul gyi tha snyad kyi zong kun tu sbyor bar byed cing /de de
232a4('dul ba): la shing rta dang glang dang gla mi dang dbang po dang gro ga dang snag tshe dang smyug gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas sbyin par byed na/ji srid du rnyed pa
232a5('dul ba): bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dbyig gam gser rab tu sbyor bar byed
232a6('dul ba): cing /de de la dbang po dang gro ga dang snag tsha dang smyug gu dang /yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la rnyed pa bdag gir byed
232a7('dul ba): na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang 'bru'i bu ni 'gyed par byed cing //de de la gzhal glugs dang bre'u chung dang phul dang dbang po dang gro ga dang
232b1('dul ba): sdug tshwa dang smyug gu dang /yi ge bya tshol bar byed na/ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyos byas su 'gyur lnga rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong
232b2('dul ba): gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir/nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir
232b3('dul ba): baiDUr+ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing /de de la dbang po dang gro ga dang /srog cha dang smyug gu dang /yige pa tshol bar byed na/ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas
232b4('dul ba): 'gyur la/rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung bye'i du 'gyu ro zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu' bar mdzad do//
232b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so//de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i lid tsa byi dag gi khang
232b6('dul ba): pa drug rtseg dang bdun rtsig tu byed do//yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug rtseg dang bdun rtseg tu byed pas/
232b7('dul ba): de dag mtho ches pas brtsigs shing brtsigs shing rdib nas sbyin bdag dag gis bsams pa/bdag cag gson zhing 'dug ste/'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag
233a1('dul ba): khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na shi ba rnams kyi ji ltar 'gyur/bdag cag gis mkhar lan gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa dbul bar bya'o snyam nas
233a2('dul ba): de dag mi zad pa thogs ste dge slong rnams kyi gan du srung nas phyin pa dang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa dag mkhar lan gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di pa
233a3('dul ba): drag pa zhes shig/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi gca' bar mdzad pas/bdag cag mi len to zhes zer ba'i
233a4('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyi phyir 'khar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa blang bar bya'o///
233a5('dul ba): gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni sum rtseg tu bya'o//dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyar khang ni nyes rtsog tu bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis bcom
233a6('dul ba): ldan 'das las menyan nas mi pad+ma pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste bzhag bro//sbyin bdag 'ongs te smras pa/'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gtsug lag
233a7('dul ba): khang gi mkhar lan mi bgyid/kar sha pa na dag med do//'o na bdag cag gis khyed la mi zad pa dang ma phul lam/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ci kho bo cag
233b1('dul ba): gis mi zad pa dag zos snyam 'am drag 'dun gyi mdzod na 'dug go//'phags pa dag de ltar na mi zad par mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar zad par 'gyur te/ci bdag cag gi sdum pa
233b2('dul ba): na gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor mi mdzad/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas/bdag cag
233b3('dul ba): rab tu sbyor bar mi byed zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar/
233b4('dul ba): lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas/bcom ldan
233b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya zhing de las skyed gang grub pa des sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mched
233b6('dul ba): bar bya'o//de dag gis de dag nyid la byin nas de dag la bdas pa na rtsod par byed cing /'ophabs po dag ci'i phyir badrag nyid kyi nor lus rtsod pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs dge slong
233b7('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o//de dag gis phyug po dag byin nas/de dag bdas pa ni
234a1('dul ba): mthu dang ldan pA la rten cing ma ster ba dang bla'i glu'i mthus mi ster na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag la sbyin par mu bya'o//de dag gi/
234a2('dul ba): dbul po rnams la byin nas de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gta' nyi rir blangs te dbang po dang bcas pa'i dom rgyu'i glegs
234a3('dul ba): bu bris te sbyin par bya'o//glegs bu de la yang lo dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang dge skos dang len pa po dang /rdzas dang skyed rnams kyi ming bri bar bya'o//gang la
234a4('dul ba): sbyin par bya ba dge bsnyen dang pa can la slab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi kha nas sbyin par bya'o//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /se mos 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis
234a5('dul ba): nyon pa la ltung ba med do//mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa'i spang ba ste/bcu dgu pa rdzog so////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
234a6('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyi tshod rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/len par byed/gtong bar byed/nyo bar byed/'tshong bar byed do//ji ltar len par
234a7('dul ba): byekhyod ca na/gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong khyer du l-i nyes pa de'i tshe na ljongs nas grong khyer du len por byed de/de ltar len par byed//ji ltar gtong bar byed ce na/gang gi tshe
234b1('dul ba): grong khyer du mo lags shing ljongs su mnyes pa de can/grong khyod nas ltung su gto ba dpyod do/de ltar gtong bar byed do//de m+WAr nye bar byung can/gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i cha na tsA bar byud /
234b2('dul ba): de ltar tsA bair byed de//ji ltar 'a myong bar byed ce na/gang gi tshun ron che ba de'i tshen 'tshong por byed de/de ltar 'tshang bar byed do//gzhan mu sdigs can dag shes ljon dag da kyar bu'i don
234b3('dul ba): rnams nim log mya spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/'di ltar nyo tshang rnam pa sna tshogs byed /len pa spyod/ga bar byed/nye ba skyed 'chang bar byed cing bram ze dang //khyim bad rnams kyang
234b4('dul ba): 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/len par byed/gtong bar byed/nyo bar byed/'ching bar byeng na/shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di la bye brag ni ci yod bsam pa ni
234b5('dul ba): ci yod/tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dag bya bar snyi mas shes smod par byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed//kha ber bla brang ba ni skabs de dge
234b6('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung po 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de/zhes bya ba la
234b7('dul ba): gas pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmad par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
235a1('dul ba): dge sbyong drug sde dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/len par byed/gtong bar byed/nyo bar byed/'tshong bar byed pa bden nam btsun pa
235a2('dul ba): mad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/rung ba ma yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma
235a3('dul ba): yin no//zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu
235a4('dul ba): yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab
235a5('dul ba): pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin
235a6('dul ba): pa'o//nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba ni rnam pa mang po'o//byed na zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa dang /gtong bar byed pa dang /nyo bar byed pa dang /'tshong bar byed pa dag lhag
235a7('dul ba): par spyod par byed na'o//spring ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsung so//de la ltung ba
235b1('dul ba): ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed/'tshong bar byed na de nyo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/'tshong ba la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong
235b2('dul ba): gris rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas/'tshong bar byed ni nyo bar byed pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/'tshong bar byed pa la ltung ba maud//dge slong gis rnyed pa
235b3('dul ba): mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa 'dod pas/'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa la ltung ba med la/'tshong bar byed pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis rnyed pa mi
235b4('dul ba): 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing //rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na gnyi ga la ltung ba medado//yul gzhan gyi sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do zhes bcom
235b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs
235b6('dul ba): pa'i khang bzangs na bzhug so//de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshong pa lam gyi bgrod par zhugs pa dog gis gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa sker khung skar khung dra ba can
235b7('dul ba): dang lan kan gyis brgyan pa/mig dang snying 'phrog par mtho ris kyi them smras su gyur pa dag mthong nas de dag dad par gyur te/de dag gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la/
236a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa dag/bdag cag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston bgyi'o//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/mchod ston gyi yo byad dag khyer te
236a2('dul ba): shog shig/de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag blo bur du lhag pa dag lags te/'di ltar bdag cag rin dbul gyis khyed kyis 'bras dag stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis
236a3('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag 'bras dag mi 'tshong ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
236a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar gang dge 'dun gyi phyir mchod ston byed pa de la rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o//dge slong dag ri ba kho nas sbyin
236a5('dul ba): par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gtsug lag khang de nyid du mchod ston byed pa de la 'theb dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
236a6('dul ba): rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad pas/mang po dag mchod ston byed nas thams cad la byin nas/'bras dag spyod pas spyi bungs chad par gyur pa'i
236a7('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar rin des 'bras gzhan dag nyo
236b1('dul ba): bar bya'o//'bras snying pa dag kyang so sor brtags nas gal te srog chags med na dus su btsongs te 'bras gsar pas bang ba dag dgang bar bya'o//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang

236b3('dul ba): byin 'phrog ston zla tha chungs dang //dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang //bsngos pa dang ni sogs 'jog go/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med

236b5('dul ba): khyab par byas pas phyin chad gang nas kyang rnyed pa bsgrub par mi nus so snyam nas/de de snyam sems pa na dga' 'dun drug cu bskyed mos tshal du deng ba deg nye dgu mthong ngo //mthong
236b6('dul ba): nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/gal te 'di dgra las rnyed pa ma grub na/nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming gzung bar mi bya'o snyam mo//drug sde drug gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te sbyin pa'i
236b7('dul ba): gtam dag byed na/nyan pa po dag bdag cag gis rang gi sha dag bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems la/gal te tshul khrims kyi gtim dag byed na/nyon pa po
237a1('dul ba): dag bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso snyam du sems so//gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan srong rnams su skyeso snyam
237a2('dul ba): du sems pa yin pas/des lhung bzed gsal ba zlum po longs spyad par bzod pa mtshan khung gis khyer te dga' 'dun de dag ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/dga' 'dun
237a3('dul ba): pa gcig la ci nas kyang de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba/de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas sems dad par gyur te smras pa/'phags pa ci'i phyir byon/
237a4('dul ba): dgas smras pa/bzhin bzangs bdag la lhung bzed dgos so//'phags pa bdag la lhung bzed ma mchis te/gal te ran gyis rnyed na bdag gis 'jal to gsol

237a6('dul ba): tsam/kar sha pa na drug cu'o//bdag gis 'di'i rin ka sha pa na drug cu 'bu lo//bzhin bzangs a rog kha/de dag khyod kyis gyur cig/sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang /
237a7('dul ba): sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog thob pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig/de bzhin du des dga' 'dun drug cu po
237b1('dul ba): dag rI rI yang kAr sha pA na drug cu drug cu sbyor du bcug nas song ngo //dga' 'dun de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/do na dag la dun gcig gis smras pa/shes ldan//
237b2('dul ba): dag kho bos btsun pa nye dga' shAkya ri r-iglai las rab tu byung ba chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa la lhung bzed kyi rin du kar sha pa ni drug cu phul gyis
237b3('dul ba): rjes su yi rang par gyis shig/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/kho bos kyang phul lo//yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/kho bos kyang phul lo//de bzhin du thams cad kyis kho bos kyang

237b6('dul ba): 'drod pas zil gyis non pa dag yin no zhes smad par brtsam so//de ni re shig byung ba yin gyi/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab
237b7('dul ba): pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mi mdzad do/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe na dge slong
238a1('dul ba): drug sde dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog/sogs par byed cing /bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas/dge slong
238a2('dul ba): don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog sogs par byed cing /bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed ces smod par
238a3('dul ba): byed phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi
238a4('dul ba): 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//gsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par
