238a6('dul ba): par byed cing /bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
238a7('dul ba): sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa
238b1('dul ba): mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs
238b2('dul ba): pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di
238b3('dul ba): ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gi lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o//de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos
238b4('dul ba): 'di pas so//lhung bzed lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ba las lhag pa'o//zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan bcu'i mtha'i bar du'o//btsong bar bya'o/
238b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya'o//de las 'das par 'chad na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang bar bya'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed
238b6('dul ba): kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byedado zhes gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong gis tshe so la lhung bzed rnyed na/dge slong nges
238b7('dul ba): lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtags par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob
239a1('dul ba): par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang bar
239a2('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyuraro//chos la lhung bzed ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam tshes gsum mam/chos dgu 'am/ches bcu tshun chad kyi lhung bzed rnyed na/dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag
239a3('dul ba): bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis bslab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/
239a4('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis tshes
239a5('dul ba): la lhung bzed gcig rnyed cing //des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan zhig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma btang bar bya ba
239a6('dul ba): 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na phyi ma byin gyis bslab par bya zhing snga ma bting por bya ba 'am/rnam par brtog par bya ba'am//
239a7('dul ba): gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya
239b1('dul ba): ring shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//tshes dang tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang tshes bcu tshun cad kyis lhung bzed cig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid
239b2('dul ba): kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis bslabs par bya zhing phyi ma gtang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na byi ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga
239b3('dul ba): ma btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dom/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed
239b4('dul ba): dam/gzhan lo sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis tshas la lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na/dge slong des lhung
239b5('dul ba): bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin
239b6('dul ba): gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam//rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi mo bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shararA na spong ba'i ltung
239b7('dul ba): byed du 'gyuraro//chos la lhung bzed gnyis mo rnyed kyang chos gnyis sam/chos gsum 'am/tshe so dgu 'am/tshes bcu tshun tshad kyis lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na/dge slong
240a1('dul ba): des lhung bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la smyon par
240a2('dul ba): bya'o//byin gyi rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya ring shar na spang ba'i ltung
240a3('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang lhung bzed gzhon gnyis shig rnyed na/dge slong des zhago bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga
240a4('dul ba): ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par
240a5('dul ba): bya zhing snga ma gnyis btabs su ka ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par
240a6('dul ba): mo byed dam gzhan la sbyin par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya red shar na spang ba'i yang byed du 'gyur//tshes dang tshes gnyis la ma
240a7('dul ba): rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang //tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /
240b1('dul ba): phyi ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na phyi mya gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga mA gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/
240b2('dul ba): rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya ba'am/byin gyis brlab par mi byed dum/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog parare mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin
240b3('dul ba): par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//dge slong gis chos la lhung bzed mang po rnyed na/dge slong des lhung bzed de dag zhag bcu po de
240b4('dul ba): nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya po 'am/gtang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlo par mi byed dam/gtong bar
240b5('dul ba): mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skra rang shar ni spyang pa'i ltung byeng du 'gyuraro//tshes la lhung bzed mang
240b6('dul ba): mo rnyed kyang /tshes gnyis sam/chos gsum mam/chos dgu 'am/tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po rnyed na/dge slong des lhung bzed de zhig bcu po de
240b7('dul ba): nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'am/btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlod par mi byed dam
241a1('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shwar na sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'byung
241a2('dul ba): dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan mong po dag cig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du sdo mo dge byin
241a3('dul ba): gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya //yang phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma
241a4('dul ba): dag btang bar bya ba dang/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob por mi byed dam/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par
241a5('dul ba): mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skyo reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//tshes dang tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum
241a6('dul ba): dang chos bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed na/dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag btang bar
241a7('dul ba): bya ba 'am/rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am/rnam
241b1('dul ba): bar rtag par bya ba 'am/gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//byin gyis rlob par mi byed dram/gtong bar mi byed dam/rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/
241b2('dul ba): nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar mo byas la ltung ba ma bshags par
241b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis lhung bzed spang bar gyur na/de ma spangs shing dral bar mi byas la ltung ba ma bshags par
241b4('dul ba): gzhan zhig rnyed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur//dge slong gis lhung bzed spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas nas ltung ba bshegs par gzhan zhig rnyed na
241b5('dul ba): de yang snga mo'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis lhung bzed spang bar gyur na/de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas/gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba
241b6('dul ba): med do//de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po ma bshags shing //so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/chos gos sam/dra ba 'am/phor bu 'am/ska rags
241b7('dul ba): sam/dge sbyong gi 'tshe ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na/de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyuraro//lhung bzed chung ngu dang lhung bzed skye ba dang /
242a1('dul ba): lhung bzod che ba dang /sbrang 'azed ma tshos pa 'chang ba la ltung ba med do//rab tu byung ba la ltos pa'i don du lhung bzed 'chang ba thams cad du ltung ba med de/
242a2('dul ba): las dang po dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med//lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho///sangs rgyas
242a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//mnyan yod na spos mchong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal
242a4('dul ba): ba dbyibs legs pa longs spyod par bzod pa zhig rnyed do//bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod
242a5('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs nas/des bsod snyoms brgyas te srang du phyin pa dang /spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis lhung bzed shin tu gsal
242a6('dul ba): ba dbyibs legs pa longs spyad par bzod po zhig rnyed kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig/bzhin zangs bdag la lhung bzed yod do//'phags pa gal te dge slong gzhan
242a7('dul ba): 'ga' zhig lhung bzed 'tshal ba mchis na/de btang du gsol/btang bar bya'o//de nas bsod snyoms pa des mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas/rgyal byed kyi tshal du
242b1('dul ba): sor song ste des zan zos nas lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dang /srang ga ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal
242b2('dul ba): pa dbyibs legs pa/longs spyod par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis khyed cag las gang lhung bzed 'dod pa de song shig/de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na nye dga' 'dug pa des thos nas des
242b3('dul ba): bsams pa/lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis thos nas rab tu rgyug par gyur na mi rung gis smad par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod dad pas byin pa
242b4('dul ba): zos nas lhung bzed kyi gtam dang chos gos kyi gtam las gzhan po'i gtami 'ga' yang med med/des bsams pa/'jig rten na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed pa de
242b5('dul ba): dag dang nye dga' mtshungs pa yin na 'dis kyang re shig bdag smad par gyur na/gal te dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos par gyur na/des rgya cher smad par
242b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go//nye dgas de bkar te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang kho bo bshes pas de'i phyir kho bos khyod slad kyis mi ga she
242b7('dul ba): cig gnas brtan gal te bdag yang smra bar gyur na khyod kyis bdag la yang smad par mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan pa kho bos yang nye bar ma zhi bo tsam du zad kyi ci lhung bzed de ltung
243a1('dul ba): babad mA yan+t+ra nam+b+ha/gan sa brnyan snga ma yang smra bar mAM bag+h+nAM ba lags kyi 'tshulo//rgyu dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang sh+log+sa sa shinanagan
243a2('dul ba): brtan srad che ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig mchis pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal pa/dbyibs legs pa longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed nas de'i mchod nas/
243a3('dul ba): gal te dge slong lhung bzed 'chal ba 'ga'o mchis na de btang du gsil//zhes mchi'o//de ni de tsam du zad de de yang nye bar ma zhi bcum kho nar zad de//de nas nye dga'
243a4('dul ba): snam sbyar sbyin te 'gros bskyed nas/phya rar stong ba dang spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de 'gros bskyed de'i nga ba zag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa/dge sbyo
243a5('dul ba): dril po 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'dis bdag gi lhung bzed 'di phrogs par 'ong ngo snyam nas/des lhung bzed de blangs te 'dzang tshe'i 'og tu bcug ste bzhag pa dang /
243a6('dul ba): dgas de sbed pa'i tshe mthong nas des smras pa/bzhin bzangs ci lhung bzed 'di nal rje bu yin nam ci ni daphyir skyed par byed ces des lag pa ban+d+hang ste/lhung bzed blangs
243a7('dul ba): nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs a rig kha/sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang //sems kyi yo byad dang //rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mche gri thob pa dang /
243b1('dul ba): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig/'phags pa bdag cag tshong pa drug kho spogs 'tshal bas 'tsho ba lags pas 'di rin mya mchis par mi 'bul te/'di ltar/
243b2('dul ba): rin gyi phyir 'bul lo//bzhin bzangs ci khyod drang song gi snod 'tshong bar byed dam/tshig su bcad pa yang smras pa/gal te skyes bus sa snod kyis//gser gyi snad ni thob rgyung
243b3('dul ba): na//de yis mya ngan ci phyir bya//bslus pa med par kho bos mthong //'phags pa khyod mang du gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang rin ma mchis par mi 'bul lo//nye dgas smras pa
243b4('dul ba): khyod kyi lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis yi dgras lkog lnga can dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgos so zhes de de skad smyo bar byed pa na/khyim bdag cig phyogs der 'ongs nas
243b5('dul ba): des smras pa/'phags pa la phyag 'tshalo//btsun pa nye dga' la phyag 'tshalo//nye dag sa smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phyag skam pa 'dis ci bya/'phrogs pa bdag la
243b6('dul ba): btsun pa nye dgas bka' stsal po/gang zhig bdag gis ma bsgrubs/lhung bzed 'di nyos te byin cig/khyim bdag des spos 'tshong gi khye'u de lde smras pa/bzhin bzangs lhung
243b7('dul ba): bzed 'di rin ji tsam/'di dang 'di tsam mo//kho bos khyod la sbyin no//spos 'tshong gi khye'u des lhung bzed de/khyim bdag dri la byin nas khyim bdag des kyang nye dgra' la phu'o//
244a1('dul ba): nye dgas smras pa/a rog la/sbyin pa 'dis khyod kyi sems kyi brgyan dang /sems kyu ya byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog thob pa
244a2('dul ba): dang drawA dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig//khyim bdag de song ba dang /nye dgas spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/bkren pa khyod kyis nyi dgas lhung bzed
244a3('dul ba): kye rin sbyor du mi 'jud mi nus snyam du shes sam khyod kyi lhung bzed la lhags par chags pa 'dis yi dgas lto ba can dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgos so//'phags pa
244a4('dul ba): ci zhig sbyor mchis/khyod kyis kyang lhung bzed thob la/bdag gis kyang ri ni thob kyis bzhud cig/nye dga' yang lhung bzed khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des lhung
244a5('dul ba): bzed do dge slong rnams la bstan te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltos shig kho bo'i lhung bzed ci 'dra/gzhon nu zhig gis smos pa/gnas brtan ci khyod la lhung bzed
244a6('dul ba): gzhan ma mchis sam/'o na gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed yod cing bdag bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal du rung ngam/dgra bo rnams kyi bre byar rkang pas mnan
244a7('dul ba): nas so//gnas brtan la dgra bo dag kyang mchis sam/gang gi phyir khyod kho bo'i lhung bzed gnyis pa yang mi bzod pas rje khyod kho bo'i dgra bo mthu po yin no//
244b1('dul ba): dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzod gzhan tshal bar byed cing smod par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed
244b2('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la/dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu
244b3('dul ba): ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin//
244b4('dul ba): te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/nye dga' khyed lhung bzed yod cing /bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol ba bden nam/btsun pa med
244b5('dul ba): do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma
244b6('dul ba): yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lto bas
244b7('dul ba): na/dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa///bam po so bzhi pa/
245a1('dul ba): badz+ra ma ldan 'das kyis dge sdang gis ltung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du ltung bzod gzhan brtsal bar mi bya'o//zhes b+hakaSh+Na su la nas/bsod sto/
245a2('dul ba): bzhig gi lhung bzed cung zhig rdul nas des de thogs te many+dzun yod na bsod snyoms la zhugs po dang /des phye dag rten nas des de dog lcung bad kyis snod kyis mnos so//
245a3('dul ba): 'dras can ga sher ba rnyed nas des de dag lhung bzed kyis mnos pa dang /de nas zags pas bye dag ga shar bar gyur pa de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod ma rung bar gyur nas
245a4('dul ba): de sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa dang /de la khye'u dang bu mo dag gi sa smras pa/'phags pa nor n+dan dang tshong dpon dang ded dpo ni dag bzhin du 'khyor ma
245a5('dul ba): par 'gyur ba'i las byas pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de mthong nas smras pa/byis pa dag ci'i phyir
245a6('dul ba): 'phags pA la tho 'tsham par byed/khyim bdag 'phags pa la tho brtsam du ci mchis/'phags pa nor can dang tshong dpon dang ded dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang po
245a7('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i las bgyis pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dge slong de la smras pa/'phags pa bcom ldan
245b1('dul ba): 'das kyi bstan pa kun tu mdzes pa la khyod ci cal col byed/khyim bdag 'di la cal col du gyur pa ci yod/khyod kyis kho bo rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang 'jud 'thun ma'i
245b2('dul ba): khyim dang tshang ma'i khyim dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang /gdol pa'i khyim du zhugs par mthong ngam/'phags pa'o na ci'i phyir khyod byis pa dag gis bskor te 'phya bar byed/khyim
245b3('dul ba): bdag kho bo'i lhung bzed zag go//'o na ci'i phyir lhung bzed gzhan mi tshol/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi
245b4('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs so//'phags pa khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di 'dra ba yod cing bdog pa yin nam zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom
245b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gi lhung bzed rdol ba des klan par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi lhung bzed rdol pa des glan par bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad nas/
245b6('dul ba): dge slong dag lhan pa snyi ba lnga po bu ram dang /rgya skyegs kyi tshigs ma dang spra tshil dang /ro nye dang chen mo sted dag gis klon par byed nas/de dag tsha ba dang phrad nas yang zag par gyur
245b7('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lhan pa snyi ba lnga po de dag spangs te lhan pa sra ba lnga po gzhan
246a1('dul ba): dag gis glan par bya'o//dge slong dag gis lhan pa sra ba lnga po dag ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lhan rings dang tham phran/
246a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa dang chu srin gyis so lta bu dang phyi mas so//dge slong rnams kyis phye me du yod mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phye ma gnyis te lcags kyi phyi
246a3('dul ba): ma dang rdo'i phye mas so//lcags kyi lhung bzed la lcags kyi phye mas klan par bya'o//sa'i lhung bzed la ni rdo'i phye mes klan par bya'o//de dag chur phyi ma bdar to gron par byed
246a4('dul ba): nas de de bzhin du gogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'bru mar du bdare bas klan par bya'o//de dag ha cang drag tu sreg pas dgogs pa dang /ha cang chung
246a5('dul ba): drang srod pas mi 'chags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ran tsam du bsro bar bya'o//ha cang rtsub por gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
246a6('dul ba): bdar bar bya'o//de dag chus blugs te badrar bar byed pas de yang gogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/'bru mar blugs te bdur bar bya'o//sa las byas po'i ltung
246a7('dul ba): bzed dag rdol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu ma dang 'jibs klan nas de dag bsro bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar ljon pa lnga po dag gis klan
246b1('dul ba): par bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad nas/dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig gis sa las byas pa'i lhung bzed lag pa nas shor te/gyo dum lngar gyur nas des de dag bug gu phug ste/gyo dum
246b2('dul ba): dag skud pas brgyus nas bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed la zas med par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/des de rung bar byed pa na bshig cing brgyud
246b3('dul ba): par byed pas snga dro thams cad zad par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa ci khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs 'di lta ste bcings pa grol po 'di kho na yin nam/des
246b4('dul ba): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed chags pa la lhan pa bsra ba lnga po dag gis klan par bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'dra
246b5('dul ba): lde gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas bslab pa 'dod pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i sngags pa brjod nas//
246b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams la de dang rje su 'thun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mi chad mdzad na/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de
246b7('dul ba): lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste//zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams
247a1('dul ba): kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir
247a2('dul ba): lhung bzed gsar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o//dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzod tha
247a3('dul ba): memor gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la/dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/btang bar mi bya gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug
247a4('dul ba): pa'i bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/de la de ni cho ga yin no//yang dge slong gang zhes pa ni chos 'di pa'o//lhung bzed ldan pa lnga med pa
247a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed lhan pa lngar ma tshang ba'o//spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yongs su longs spyad par bzod pa yod bzhin du'o bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
247a6('dul ba): mchog 'dod pa'i phyir ram yang dang yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro//lhung bzed sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te gsar pas sar pa dang rnyed pas sar pa ste don 'dir ni gnyi ga yin
247a7('dul ba): par dgongaso//gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o//tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni tshol bar byed cing ngo //lhung bzed grub na zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed thob na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya
247b1('dul ba): ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so//lhung bzed de zhes
247b2('dul ba): bya ba ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa de'o//dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa la'o//dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa
247b3('dul ba): gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya btang bar mi bya/gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chags pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis
247b4('dul ba): dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang lhung bzed 'brel pa me pa 'drim po'i dge slong sko bar bya ste/lhung bzed 'dral pa
247b5('dul ba): 'drim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan po ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/lce gang zhe na/'dun pas 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /gti mug
247b6('dul ba): gris 'gro ba dang 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa'o//lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'drim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa
247b7('dul ba): ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /

248a2('dul ba): bzed 'brel ba med pa 'drim par spro'am/gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas te graN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge

248b3('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'drim pa'i dge slong gis tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang dge/

249b2('dul ba): dbul bar bya'o//gal te gsar bu gnyis pas ma blangs na gsar bu la dbul bar bya'o//gal te dge 'dun gyi gsor bus blangs pa na gsar bu gsum pa slong bar byed na//brjod

250a2('dul ba): snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel pa med pas blang bar bya'o//gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa blang

250a5('dul ba): bas drud pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o//gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing cig shos su lhung bzed
250a6('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o//gal te ngos khung cig yod la gal te shed bzang na shod du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bzhag par bya zhing ngos khung du lhung bzed byin gyis
250a7('dul ba): borlabs pa gzhug par bya'o//gal te ngos khung bzang ni ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhig par bya'o//
250b1('dul ba): lhung bzed kyis las byed pa na gal te rdza bo gnyis yod na rdza po bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bsreg par bya zhing /cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa

250b6('dul ba): gal te khrur tsha ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g.yon pas lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bkur bar bya zhing phrag pa g.yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya'o//'di ni

251a1('dul ba): ts+tshan su sgyur bcus pa dag yadu dag pa rgyas te 'jun pa ma pyod na 'gal cha kunanA du 'gyur//rnal du chag san zhes bya ba ni/de la de ni rnam pa
251a2('dul ba): 'thun pa'i chos yin pa'o//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang ldan pa gcig gis mun par 'os shing ma thun la snying brjod pa yin na/de ltang
251a3('dul ba): dbod spyad brjod pa de yod bzhin du ltung bzed sar pa gzhan rgyal bar byed 'tshal ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gi lhung bzed chag rdung
251a4('dul ba): ldan pa gnyis kyis klan par 'asgo shing mgran la spyad bzod bu yin na de lhung bzed spyad po rjod pa de yod bzhin du lhung brde des ra ba gzhan tshal bar byed na/de tshol ba la nyes
251a5('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang ldan pa gsum gyis klan par 'os shing ma klan la spyad bzod pa ma yin na de la ltung
251a6('dul ba): bzed spyod pazod pa spyod bzhin du snying po ser po gzhan tshil byar bye na de tsham pa la rjes byas su 'gyur la thob bA na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur//dge slong gi lhung banyid
251a7('dul ba): chag kyang ldan pa bzhis glan pir 'os shing mgran pa spyad bzod po yin la de lhung bzed spyod bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sor po gzhan tshal bar byed ni/de chom

251b3('dul ba): sa shing kun la spyad brjod bya sbyin na de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du ltung brnyed sar pa gzhan tshol byar byed na/de tshal bI la nyes byas su 'gyur la thob na spang
251b4('dul ba): byed du 'gyur//de slong gyi ltung ba nag kyad ldan pa gsum skyes zin phyir 'os shing kun la snang brjod du smin na de lhung bad snang bzod pa de 'a di bzhin du ltung das
251b5('dul ba): gon ni tshol bar byed na de tshal pA la nyes byas sgyu 'gyur la thob na snang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis lhung bzed tshig kyang ldan pa bzhis klan pa'i 'om

251b7('dul ba): hUM 'gyur ro//dge slong gis sbyang bzod chag cing ldan pa lus kyin phyir 'os pa yin na de des kun yong rung ma tshan yang rung spyad pozod kyang rlung spyad me bze kyi
252a1('dul ba): bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la yang ltung ba med la thob na ltung ba med do//rin gyis len pa dang brje bas len pa la ltung ba med do//
252a2('dul ba): las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho/
252a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//nye dgas bsams pa 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag
252a4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas/phyin cad ras yug phan sbom po gcig gi rin yang gang dag las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis song ste bltas na/
252a5('dul ba): gal te la la las bslang bar nus kyang srid do snyam nas de sta dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du shwar sgra nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
252a6('dul ba): dang /bskyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa mkhal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa
252a7('dul ba): dag cig ste nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyu dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas nges de dag
252b1('dul ba): smras pa/sring mo dag a rog kha a rog kha/de dag cang mi smra bas 'khod pa dang des de dag la smras pa/sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang /skye bo mang po mi dga'
252b2('dul ba): bi dang skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dngaskye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mang po/'di lta ste/'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar
252b3('dul ba): 'gyur bso khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro//de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan las langs te nye dga'i
252b4('dul ba): bsten bting ba dang nye dga' de la 'dug nas/des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/nye dgas de dag la smras pa sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i
252b5('dul ba): chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so//sring mo dag ma legs//bu mo 'dis ni re shig dge ba'i chos gnyis
252b6('dul ba): byas shing bsags te 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no//'dis kho bo la
252b7('dul ba): sngon du ldang ba byas shing snyan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin po de ni 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsogs pa yin no//gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na///
253a1('dul ba): de ni 'dri'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no//sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung /'phags pa bsgyur ba 'di nyid las so//gos dag
253a2('dul ba): ga las 'byung bsgyur ba 'di nyid las so//khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du
253a3('dul ba): ma mchis so//sring mo dag ma leg so ma legaso//'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/khyed cag las te khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la 'di
253a4('dul ba): nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do//'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi ba'i shul brgyags cung zad bkur ba'i thabs ci
253a5('dul ba): mchis/sring mo dag gal te khyod kyis dge sbyong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la
253a6('dul ba): ras yug chen po bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de lta bu ga las rnyed/
253a7('dul ba): sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrog pa/rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam
253b1('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis sring mo dag khyod kyis bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/'di ni bdag la mi 'ong min//chu yi thigs pa 'jig pa yis//
253b2('dul ba): snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin//brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni/cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs//shes bya ba de ni shes sam/khyod kyis re shig dog pa smad cig
253b3('dul ba): sbyin nus sam/rdo thog go/gzhan zhig gris smras pa/bdag gis kyang sang phyed 'bul lo//gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo//de bzhin
253b4('dul ba): du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas blangs so//nye dgas smras pa/sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig/'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba
253b5('dul ba): dag lagaso//bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo//sring mo dag de je bos shig/de dag gis de bos pa dang /nye dgas de la smras pa/bu mo je dog pa phrar/
253b6('dul ba): khol cig/des phrar bkal ba dang nye dgas smras pa/bu mo de bas kyang phyur khol cig/des de bas kyang phrar bkal bya dang /nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo des kyang phrar khol cig
253b7('dul ba): ces smras pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go/nye dgas de dag la smras pa/sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dag pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin
254a1('dul ba): cig/'dugs pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra bar 'khol rngo mi thog go/bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam ci/khyed cag gis 'di'i don du khol la 'di khyed
254a2('dul ba): cag gi don du 'khal du cug shig/'phags pa gal te btub na'o//nye dgas de la smras pa/bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro//'phags pa dog po 'di ni
254a3('dul ba): phra ba dar che ba lags pas yun ring por bkal 'tshal gyis/ha cang des drag tu ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyan cig/nye dgas de la a rog kha zhes smras nas stan las
254a4('dul ba): langs te song ngo //bde gnas mu des dus de srid kyi dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo//nye dgas de dag
254a5('dul ba): la a rog kha sbyin pa 'di khyod kyi sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog thob pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob
254a6('dul ba): par gyur cig/ces smras te song ngo //de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
254a7('dul ba): dag kha bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos/gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo //gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur pa'i tha ga pa 'ga' btsal ba mchi sa ma/tshe dang
254b1('dul ba): ldan pa dag ci khyod kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnan ta ma/gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro//nas brtan bdag cag gis gnas
254b2('dul ba): brtan ga la zil gyis gnan/'di ltar rab ga ge mo'i drung na tho ga pa spyi cher khyo shug mchis te/gal te des dog pa 'di snyed du lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen
254b3('dul ba): 'grub par 'gyur ro//bu dag a rog kha don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i ros yu ga chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes de dog pa de khyer te thA ga paM de'i khyim du song ba dang des tha ga pa de thag
254b4('dul ba): ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshig su bcad pa smras pa/mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba//gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin//mi mkhas rab tu mi snang ba//mun pa'i nang du
254b5('dul ba): mda' 'phangs bzhin//bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no//dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos shig//
254b6('dul ba): 'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo //dog pa ni 'di lags la tha ga pa ni bdag lags na/chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro//bzhin bzangs thogs shig/'phags
254b7('dul ba): pa bdag la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags kyang bkur bar
255a1('dul ba): nan dung sun du /smra sa ga na tu smra sum du dus smra du /
255a2('dul ba): An y-i/rgyu rdzun pa das pa shA sa smra chen m+b+hi sa/nis rgyunas su/rgyun gyur// smres
255b1('dul ba): bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/nyin mtshan du zong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyud ga 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas
255b2('dul ba): des de dag la smras pa/sring mo dag a rog kha a rog kha de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang dris de dag la smras pa/sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang /skye bo mang po
255b3('dul ba): mi dga' ba dang /skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang /skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang /'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba/'di lta ste/'che ba zhes bya ba'i chos de
255b4('dul ba): 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe/tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi num par 'gyur ro//de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa gcig 'dug pa des stan las langs te/nye
255b5('dul ba): dga'i stan bting ba dang /nye dga' de la 'dug nas/des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/mdun du 'dug go/nye dgasad dag la smras pa/sring mo dag khyed cag la
255b6('dul ba): dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so//sring mo dag mA legs so//bu mo 'dis ni ri shig dge ba'i chos
255b7('dul ba): gnyis byas shing bsags te/'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'dis phyug par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no//'dis
256a1('dul ba): kho bo la mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa de ni/'dis rigs mngon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsngags pa yin//
256a2('dul ba): gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no//sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung /'phags po sgyur ba 'di nyid las so//
256a3('dul ba): gos dag ga las 'byung sgyur ba 'di nyid las so//khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bas lam rgyags chung zad khyer ba yod dan/'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams
256a4('dul ba): cad du mchis so//sring mo dag ma lig so ma legaso//'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzod khyed cag las te khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la/
256a5('dul ba): 'di nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do//'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi ba'i shul brgyags cung zad bkur ba'i
256a6('dul ba): thabs ci mchis sring mo dag gal to khyed kyis dge slong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrog pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang
256a7('dul ba): yin pa de las ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags mang por khyer bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de
256b1('dul ba): lta bu ga las rnyed/sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par
256b2('dul ba): mi shes sam/'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa go las mchis/sring mo dag khyed kyis bsod nams chung yang brnyes mi bya//de ni bdag la mi 'ong min//
256b3('dul ba): chu yi rig pa 'dzag pa yi//snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin//brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni//cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs//shes bya ba de ni mi shes sam//

256b6('dul ba): pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lagaso//bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo//sring mo dag de je bos shig/de dag gis de bos pa
256b7('dul ba): dang /nye dgas de la smras pa/bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig/dog pa de des sngar bkal ba dang /nye dgas smras pa/bu mo do bas kyang phrar khol cig/des de bas kyang phrar

257a4('dul ba): khyod cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig/'phags pa gal te btub na'o//nye dgas de la smras pa/bu mo gyis shig dang khyed la bsod nams su 'gyuraro//'phags pa dog

257a6('dul ba): tan las langs te spong ngo //bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyi dog pa dkal nas/de gzhan gyi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lho//nye dgas de
257a7('dul ba): dag la a rog kha sbyin pa 'dis khyed sems kyi rkyen dang /sems kyi yo byad dang rnal 'byor gyi tsho gas dang /don gyi mchog thob pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob
257b1('dul ba): par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo //de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa dag khro ba'i dog pa

257b3('dul ba): zil gyis gnon tam/gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro//gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan ga las zil gyis gnon 'di ltar ra ba

257b5('dul ba): khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'o thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang /des tha ga pa ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/mkhas

258a1('dul ba): chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyuraro//bzhin bzangs 'di yang thogs shig/'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/bzhin bzangs
258a2('dul ba): khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags kyang bkur bar gyis shig 'phags pa ras yug chen snga ma de 'thag pa na bdag gis

258a4('dul ba): nye dgas spros te smras pa/kA'e tha ga pa spyi cer nyon cig/kho bos gal te khyod ras yug chen 'di 'thag tu ma bcug na/spyi cer gyi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro//tha ga pa des
258a5('dul ba): kyang spyos te smras pa/klu'i dge sbyong mgo reg nyon cig/kho bo gal te khyod kyi ras yug chen 'tshog na mgo reg gi mgo 'ongs mna' 'dor ro//nye dgas spyos te song nas/
258a6('dul ba): ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsalo rgyal gyi pho brang gi yid brtan ma che ba zhes bya ba nye dga'i mdza' bo zhig yod do//nye dga' de'i sdum par song ste g.yog 'khor dag la smras
258a7('dul ba): pa/kye nang rje dag che ba gar song /de dag gis smras pa 'phags pa srang du mtshos so//nye dgas de 'ong ba'i srang du song ba dang /che ba chang 'tshong ba'i tshod brdal zhig tu zhugs so//
258b1('dul ba): nye dgas tshong rdal de'i sgor bsdad de/che ba la nye dga' sgo na sdod kyis phyir byung shig ces b+hin spring pa dang /che ba phyir phyung nas smras pa dang /btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tsha lo phyag
258b2('dul ba): 'tshal lo//nye dgas smras pa/che ba kho bos ko khyod rgyal po'i bya ba dang /rgyal po'i byed pa dag la brtson par gyur snyam du bsams kyis/kho bos khyod 'di ltar tshang 'tshong
258b3('dul ba): ba'i khyim nas chang 'tshong ba'i khyim du 'phyan par ni ma bsams so//'phags pa bdag rgyal po'i dgos pas 'dir zhugaso//btsun pa nye dga' byon po'i dgos pa ci mchis
258b4('dul ba): che ba dog pa cung zhig rnyed pa 'dis re shig ras yug chen 'thag tu chug shig/bdag gis btsun pa nye dga' la ras yug chen nyid dbul lo//de yang bkur na ci dad pas sbyin
258b5('dul ba): par bya ba 'di dor ba bya 'am/che bas mi zhig la bsgo ba/kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna po'i gan du song la/'phags pa nya dga'i ras yug chen 'di thogs la phul cig ces gyis
258b6('dul ba): shig/nye dgas smras pa/'di tha ga pa'i sna po 'thag tu ma gzhug par 'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo zhig gi drung na tha ga pa spyi cher khyo shug 'dug pa des 'di btag par bya'o//che bas
258b7('dul ba): de la smras pa/kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cer do'i gan du song la 'di skad ces che ba na re ras yug chen 'di thogs shig ces zer ro zhes byos shig/mo des dog pa de khyer te thag pa
259a1('dul ba): cher gyi gan du song nas smras pa/che ba'i zhal nas khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces gsung ngo //spyi cer gyis dog pa de ro shes nas des
259a2('dul ba): smras pa/bdag gi res khor ro//mi de song ste che ba la smras pa/tha ga pa spyi cer gyi mchid nas bdag gi res khor ro//zhes mchi'o//tsho bas smras pa/kye nang rje spyi cer gyi
259a3('dul ba): gan du song la/'di skad ces res gzhan byed du mi gzhug go zhes gyis shig/mi de song ste smras pa/kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas res gzhan du byed du mi gzhug go zhes gsung
259a4('dul ba): ngongo//spyi cer gyis smras pa/kye nang rje che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod du mi gnas par zad mod/kho bo bskal ba ma yin pa'i las mi byed do//mi de che
259a5('dul ba): ba'i gan du song ste smras pa/spyi tsar gyi mchid nas che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na/kho bo mnyan yod du mi gan par zad mod//kho bo'i skal pa ma yin pa'i lha mi byed do//zhes mchi'o//che bas smras pa/
259a6('dul ba): kye nang rje tha ga pa'i skye bo'i gan du song la dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces gyis shig/nye dgas smras pa/'di tha ga pa'i sna bos btag par mi bya
259a7('dul ba): bar 'di ltar tha ga pi spyi cer gyis btag par bya'o//che bas mi de la smras pa/kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cher gyi gan du song la/che ba na re skom zing sbyin gyis ras yug/
259b1('dul ba): chen thogs shig ces zer ro//zhes gyis shig/ri 'phags pa dang nye dgas de la smras pa/bkren pa khyod su zhig gis rgyal po'i mir bzhag/khyod lcag rgod mang
259b2('dul ba): pos brdabs te sa dang shing dag skyed du gzhug par bya ba yin no//tha ga pa spyi cher gyi gan du song ste//'di skad ces che ba'i zhal nas ras yug chen thogs shig ces
259b3('dul ba): byabyung ngo zhes zor mi nus sam/gal te mi 'thag go zhos na thor to dag na bzung ste khug la khu tshur gyis gtogs shig/gal te du na thags mi mthun par dril shig/gal te de'i
259b4('dul ba): chung ma dun lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar bya zhing khyed gnyis che ba'i mchid nas bcag pas khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kar sha pa na lnga brgya gzhal
259b5('dul ba): dgos pa'i gyod la bskrin no zhes brjod par bya'o//de lta na kho bo'i ras yug chen yang 'grub par 'gyur la/khyod kyis kyang gsug mang po 'thob par 'gyuraro//de song ste/
259b6('dul ba): smras pa/che ba'i zhal nas skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo //spyi cher gyis smras pa/kho bo skal pa ma yin pa 'thag mi nus so//des de'i thor tho
259b7('dul ba): dag nas bzung ste bkug nas khu tshur gyis btag so//des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /des de'i thags mi 'thun par dril bar brtsams so//de'i chung mas ngu bar brtsams
260a1('dul ba): pa dang /des de'i lan bu nas bzung ste dUng bar brtsams shing khyod kyis che ba'i mchid nas bcag pas khyod gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
260a2('dul ba): gsal rgyal la kar sha pa na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i khyod la bskrin par byas chur shog/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes des de gnyis khrid de 'phags pa dang nung rtswa spyi cer
260a3('dul ba): la smras pa/rje'i sras gal te bdag cag gnyis brtson rar bcug par gyu rA na/bdag cag gnyis la thar par byed pa 'ga' yang med pa/btson rAr gnod pa dag gis
260a4('dul ba): 'chi bar bya dgro kyi ras yug chen 'di thogs shig/spyi cer gyis smras pa/kyi nang po bdag cag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma bkri bar dog pa zhog la bzhud cig dang //bdag cog
260a5('dul ba): gis ras yug che ni yang btag cing khyod la yang bsugs mang po dbul lo//des dog pa bzhag ste song ba dang /spyi cer gyis chung ma la smras pa/bzang mo ras yug chen
260a6('dul ba): 'di gang gis dog par yang mi rung la ras yug chen du yang mi rung bar 'gyur pa de ltar btag par bya'o//chung mos smras pa/rje'i sras de dge sbyong hral po de lta bu yin
260a7('dul ba): pas bdag cag gis ras yug chen de lta bur byas na/des btang re skan/des ras yug tshan de btogs nas/des ris yug chen de thags las 'grol zhing 'dug pa/
260b1('dul ba): nyi ga' yang 'ongs nas/nye dgas ra sA y+ya gA ts+tshin dro blangs pa dang /skyo nor myos smras pa/'phags pa bdag sa smyom zong snyam cig/bkr-in+d+ha b+hU kha Ta khyud kyi sgrom thong 'dul
260b2('dul ba): pa yin na/dug ci'i phyir mi rgyud/nu rtsi ci'i phyir mi brgyud de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste 'di ltar kha'i chos
260b3('dul ba): cung zad kyis kyang mthag tu bcug go/rgyal po'i pho brang gi mthu cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go zhes smod par byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i
260b4('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba
260b5('dul ba): mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs
260b6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
260b7('dul ba): kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung po ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa da nI rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yino zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas
261a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag
261a2('dul ba): par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la
261a3('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang rang gis blangs pa'i dog pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na gos grub na spang ba'i ltung
261a4('dul ba): byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//rang gis blangs pa'i dog pas shes bya ba ni 'dun pas la las srang cig/
261a5('dul ba): la la las srang phyed/la la las zho gnyis/la la las zho gcig blangs pa'i dog pas so//tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan//nye du ma yin pa las zhes bya ba ni phyi
261a6('dul ba): mo dang /mes po dang /phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yino//gos 'thag tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni/bdun po bal gos dang //
261a7('dul ba): sha na'i gos dang /zar ma'i gos dang du gu la'i gos dang /nas bal gyi gos dang /ko tam pa'i gos dang nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o//gos grub na zhes bya
261b1('dul ba): ba ni gos thob na'o//spyang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos pa de spangs nas/ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags su bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung bye zhes gsung so//de la ltung du rdza
261b2('dul ba): ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/tha ga pa nye du
261b3('dul ba): ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa blangs te/tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jug na/de slong ba la nyes
261b4('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la/tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'dzud na ltung ba med do//dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa blangs te/bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/de slong ba la nyes
261b5('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa blangs te/thag pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa la gos
261b6('dul ba): 'thag tu 'jud na slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba medo//tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du
261b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa blangs te/bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/
262a1('dul ba): bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas su 'gyu ro//tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis nye du ma
262a2('dul ba): yin pa las dog pa blangs te/bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du laM gos 'thag tu 'jud na/de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid
262a3('dul ba): du 'gyur ro//tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do//dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/de slong ba
262a4('dul ba): la ltung ba med la tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur//dge slong gis nye du las dag pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du la gros
262a5('dul ba): 'thag tu 'jud na/de slong ba la ltung ba med la tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba med//dge slong gis nye du la dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis
262a6('dul ba): 'thag par byed na/de slong ba la ltung ba med la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro//de dge slong gis nye du las dog pa blangs te/thag pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa
262a7('dul ba): la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba mdo//tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thog tu 'jug pa la
262b1('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la bdag nyid
262b2('dul ba): kyis 'thag pa la nyos byas nyid du 'gyur ro//tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis nye du las dog pa blangs te/bdag
262b3('dul ba): nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/de slong ba la ltung ba med la/bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyos byas nyid du 'gyur ro//tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa
262b4('dul ba): la ltung ba med do//gla rngan gyis 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyan pa la ltung ba med do//
262b5('dul ba): 'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba ste nye shu gsum pa rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
262b6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de dr-i dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga'o par byed/dga'/
262b7('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed do//khyim bdag de dus gzhon zhig na gzhan gyi chung ma la chags par gyur nas/de la chung mas rje'i sras de ltar ma mdzad cig ces phyir bzlog na/
263a1('dul ba): tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang ma log pa de tsam du de'i chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do//khyim bdag de yang bud
263a2('dul ba): med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas/de ltar khyim bdag de gnyi ga nas rgud par gyur na/de gnyis la bu mo
263a3('dul ba): mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas/khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'das khyimo rgud par byas zhes khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do//bu mo des smras pa/
263a4('dul ba): bdag gis khyim rgud par gyur pa da ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bgyir
263a5('dul ba): rung nye dgas tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste/ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba
263a6('dul ba): de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /tshul khrims 'chal pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas/des de gnyis skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi
263a7('dul ba): dag la gnas par byaso//khyim bdag de gtum pa rtun nges pa drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang /chung mas de la smras pa/rje'i
263b1('dul ba): sras gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe rdeg par mdzad mod/da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' las brten nas
263b2('dul ba): las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas/'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas/su zhig su'i bran lags/bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma
263b3('dul ba): mdzad cig/bzang mo khyod zer ba ma nyoso//bu mo chur shog khrus kyis la shog shig bu mo des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /des de la gos drugs cig bskon nas/smras pa/
263b4('dul ba): bu mo dga' zhing las byos shig/bu mo des bsams pa khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa brtun nges pa drag shul che ba yin te/yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang
263b5('dul ba): thal lcag gis rdeg par byed cing zas dang gos dran pa dag sbyin par byed na/da 'di dag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam nas yang bsams pa/glang tshun chad nas 'phags
263b6('dul ba): pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brnams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas/bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya
263b7('dul ba): snyom nas/ngos bsams pa/gal te bdag gis 'di las cung zhig rkus te dbul du na khyim bdag 'dis bdag brdeg bcog mang po byas te sngon gyi gnasu gzhag par
264a1('dul ba): na dus nas na ca ga/ma ga sgyu na sa smra / mas martson du //gas tu
264a2('dul ba): dag ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gasbyin gsags pa / gcig d+hi n+te na dang zlus nas sgyu ng+ge da bsgreb 'i gan+d+he ga
264a3('dul ba): bgrod de/yang dang yang du bdag cug la chos kyis spyong bar byed pas bdag cag bris kyang del zang zing cung zad kyis br-isnu ba bgyir//bzang mo de bzhin bya'o//
264a4('dul ba): 'i zlas bdag gis dog pa 'jam po bkal te/dog bI de las theg pa che ga mo zhig la ras yug chen 'thag tu stsol cing srid kyis ras yug chen ston par bgyi'o//
264a5('dul ba): khyim bdag dod pa de zag pa la byin nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig dang /'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar
264a6('dul ba): bya'o//de ltar bya'o//bu mo des dri thos nas bsams pa/bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sman par bya'o snyam//nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs
264a7('dul ba): dgos srung bzod dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la thugs nas mthar byis bsod mes la rgyo ba ni khyim der zhugs pa deng /du ma des khyim/
264b1('dul ba): legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nus/des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par
264b2('dul ba): bgyi'o//nye dgas smras po bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sbran par bya/khyim bdag 'dri khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro//nye dgas bsams
264b3('dul ba): pa s+ya'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrig so snyam du rig nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//
264b4('dul ba): bu mo khyod ci kho bo la tho 'tsham par byed dam/bu mos smras pa/bdag ci'i slad du 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid/nye dgas smras pa/bu mo gal te bden
264b5('dul ba): par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la tshugs ma bya'o//ji ste brdzun par gyur na ni brdeg gtsog mang po byed du bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji ltar bar gzhag par bya'o//
264b6('dul ba): 'phags pa gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogasau ga ge mo zhig na thag pa mchis pa der bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro//de der ste tha ga pa la smras pa//
264b7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs ras yug chen 'thag pa 'di su yi yin/'phags pa btsun pa nye dga'i lag so//khyod kyis nye dga' bshes sa mo//ma 'tshal to//de ni kho bo yin no//bzhin
265a1('dul ba): /bzangs srid du 'di rnam gyis bskyis shig/'phags pa dag pa sus stsol bar b+hUk+ShA /sa bdag de nyid kyus sbyin par 'gyur//kha bas dang
265a2('dul ba): khyod la cung zhig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o//nye dga' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas
265a3('dul ba): de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim na zhugs nas/des de'i stan bting ba dang /de de la 'dug nas btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas nye dga'i
265a4('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun na 'dug go//des dri la chos bstan nas/des smras pa/'phags pa ci lags deng spyan drangs sam bsod snyoms
265a5('dul ba): mdzad/bsod snyoms bgyid do//des bsams pa su zhig gis bsod snyoms ches bzang ba la 'bul bar 'gyur snyam nas/des de lo hwags kyi la du dag gis lhung
265a6('dul ba): bzed bkang ste phul lo//nye dgas de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i gan du song nA dwe de la smras pa/bzhin bzangs rdo lag pa gnyis zed cig/des lag pa gnyis bzod
265a7('dul ba): pa dang /des de la la du gcig byin nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs je zo shig/des zos pa dang /des de la smras pa bzhin bzangs la du'i ro ci 'dra/'phags pa
265b1('dul ba): 'da'o//khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' la du 'di 'dra ba zos sam/'phags pa lanA 'ga' yang ma 'chal to//thu bzed cig des zhu ba bzod pa dang /des de'i thu bar la du thams cad
265b2('dul ba): blugs te smras pa/bzhin bzangs kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thog shig/kho bos khyod la phyis kyang cung zad nye bar bsgrub par byas/zhang du 'di tsam gyis bskyed cig/
265b3('dul ba): 'phags pa dog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur/khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro//des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na dog pa de zad nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang /
265b4('dul ba): ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma ni med/khyim bdag ni 'dug nas/the ga pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/khyim bdag ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig
265b5('dul ba): khyim bdag des byin te btang ngo //yang 'thag pa na dog pa zad nas de yang khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang /ji tsam na khyim bdag ni med khyim bdag gi chung ma ni 'dug nas tha
265b6('dul ba): ga pa des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la smras pa/sru ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dag pa byin cig/des byin te btang //yang 'thag pa na dog pa zad nas/de khyim
265b7('dul ba): bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /ji tsam ni khyim bdag dang /khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi ga 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdab de la smras pa/khyim bdag yang ras yug chen de btag
266a1('dul ba): pa'i dge bzad kyis kyang dog pa byin cig khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyod dam/khyim bdag gis rgyud ma la smras pa/
266a2('dul ba): bzang mo ci khyod kyis kyang 'di la dog pa byin nam stsal to//khyim bdag gis smras pa/kye tha ga pa tsa ras yug chen de bskyed dam/tho ga pas smras pa khyim bdag ci dang bskyed par
266a3('dul ba): brtsams snyam 'am/nyi ma gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas 'di skad ces srid du 'di tsam gyis bsrings shog/zheng du 'di tsam gyis bskyed cig ces mche ba'i nyi ma de
266a4('dul ba): kho na la skyed par brtsam so//khyim bdag gi chung mas bsams pa ras yug de ci 'dra/ji ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /ji tsam na chen po la 'os nga'i ras yug chen
266a5('dul ba): mthong ngo //de mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste smras pa/kho mos ras yug chen 'di 'phags pa nye dga' la mi sbyin no//kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'thag
266a6('dul ba): tu gzhugo zhes zer te song ngo //nye dga' dus dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/kye tha ga pa rung ngam/'phags pa bdog gi ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo //kye tha ga pa ji ltar
266a7('dul ba): gyur/des smras pa khyim bdag gi chung ma mchis par gyur te/des ras yu chen mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste/kho mos 'phags pa nye dga' lnga ras yug chen
266b1('dul ba): 'di mi sbyin no//kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan 'thag tu gzhugo zhes mchi ste mchi so//kye thag pa khyod la kho bas cung zhig byas pa yod pa shes sam/des smras pa ci'i
266b2('dul ba): slad du ma 'tshal/bdag da dung yang khyod kyi la du dag 'tshal zhing mchis//kye tha ga pa gang gi tshe kho bo khyim der 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis ras yug chen de khyer te shog
266b3('dul ba): shig/'phags pa je bzhud cig dang /bdag gis kyang kha tshar bkal te mchi'o//nye dga' de'i khyim du so ba ste/sgo'i thad kar 'dug pa dang /khyim bdag gi chung ma des rkang pa la
266b4('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te kha sgor lta zhing mdun du 'dug go/tha ga pa des kyang ras yug chen de'i kha char dril nas de khyer te song ba dang /khyim bdag gi chung ma des de thag ring po kho na nas
266b5('dul ba): mthong nas/des lag brdas ma 'ong shog ces byas pa dang /tha ga pa des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas/ltos bzung bas mgo smad de/nang du zhugs nas des ras yug
266b6('dul ba): chen de khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i pang du bzhag pa dang /nye dgas tsham chom med par blangs te smras pa/a rog kha sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /sems kyi yo byad dang
266b7('dul ba): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /don gyi mchog thob pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi gos thob par gyur cig/khyim bdog gi chung mas smras pa/'phags pa khyim ba dag gis rang gi
267a1('dul ba): sug pa nas dbul gyis slar stsol cig/nye dgas smras pa/kho bos 'di rdo rung bar byas de'i 'og tu khyim bdag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du gzhug/
267a2('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dkar po bsngagaso//nye dgas smras pa/drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du chug shig ces smras
267a3('dul ba): nas langs te song ngo //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa////bam po sa lnga pa//tha ga pas smras pa/khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la bla byin cig/des smras
267a4('dul ba): pa/kho mo'i ras yug chen gcig kyang 'phrog tu bcug nas gla gzhan yang ded dam/song la khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig/de nye dga'i
267a5('dul ba): gan du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag la gla stsol cig/song la khyim bdag gi chung ma de nyid la dos shig/'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang de mchi 'bo zhing /
267a6('dul ba): 'di skad ces khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig ces mchi'o//nye dgas smras pa/song shig dang byin par 'gyur ro//tha ga pa dri yang de'i gan
267a7('dul ba): du song ste smras pa/khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig/des smras pa kwa'e khyo ga khyod 'dug mi bod dam/gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig/mi 'dug na kho ma
267b1('dul ba): khyod kyi mgrin par tshol zangs btags te/mnyan yod thams cad du bskor bar bya'o//thug pa de yang nye dga'i thad du song ste smras pa/'phags pa khyim brlag gi mchis
267b2('dul ba): brang des bdag spyos te/kra'e khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/gal te 'dug na 'dug shig/mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyi mgrin par chol bzangs btags te mnyan yod thams
267b3('dul ba): cad du skor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis 'phags pa bdag la gla stsol cig/nye dgas smras pa/kye nang rje gal te gang gis khro bo'i ras yug chen 'thug tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo
267b4('dul ba): 'jal bar gyur na/kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas/khyod kyis kho bo las bag phye'i rin dang /zhun mar dang
267b5('dul ba): hwadwags la sogs pa ji tsam khyer ba dag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang /ji tsam na ches lhag por khyer bar gyur nas/nye dgas tha ga pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la btags
267b6('dul ba): te btang ngo //tha ga pa de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gri tshul ni tshig go/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/'di ltar lhag pa kho na bya'o zhes zer la 'bri ba kho nar byed
267b7('dul ba): zhes smod par byed/phyar khe gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba
268a1('dul ba): 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
268a2('dul ba): rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/nye dga' khyod kyis mi
268a3('dul ba): mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma
268a4('dul ba): yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par
268a5('dul ba): smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong drag de lta bas na/phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gag bca'
268a6('dul ba): bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam
268a7('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam por rtog pa
268b1('dul ba): 'ga' zhig byung nas/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig/gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan//
268b2('dul ba): pa tha ga pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang /khrun ring ba dang thar gyis zhag pa dang /thag ran bzang bar legs pa gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan
268b3('dul ba): 'di lta ste/bza' ba 'am bca' ba tsam bza' rgyu chung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/bza' ba 'am/
268b4('dul ba): bca' ba tsam+ba 'am/bza' rgyu chung zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed//dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/gzhan yang de lta bu
268b5('dul ba): gang yin pa'o//khyim bdag ces bya ba ni smyos pa'o//khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do//nye du ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang mes po dang /phrugs
268b6('dul ba): kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la dri phan chad ni nye du ma yino//thug pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no//nye du me yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /mes po dang /
268b7('dul ba): phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yin//gos 'thag tu bcug pa las shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang sha ni'i gos dang zar
269a1('dul ba): mA'i gos dang dugu la'i gos dang /ras bal gyi gros dang /kau tam bya'i gos dang /nyid 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o//don gal te dan/
269a2('dul ba): slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'o//sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bros par ro//rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas shes bya ba ni bsgra
269a3('dul ba): bkur byed pa 'ga' zhig byung nas so//tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o//'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa ba gA bi shes par gyis shig/
269a4('dul ba): gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis shes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o//zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba'o//khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni chur ring ba'o//thar gyis
269a5('dul ba): zhag pa zhes bya ba ni mjur mdud med pa'o//thag na bzang bar zhes bya ba ni byer zug snyoms pa dang /shAs bzang ba dang /sang seng mod pa'o//bza' ba 'am zhes bya ba
269a6('dul ba): ni bza' ba lnga pa dag go/bca' ba tsumra mam zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag go/bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza' bu'i rgyu'o//de la gam te dge slong des shes bya ba ni
269a7('dul ba): shAkya'i bu nye dag so//gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//gos grub na zhes bya ba ni go so thob na'o//spang ba'i ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni dngos
269b1('dul ba): po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so///de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis
269b2('dul ba): ji tsam du gos bsgrub pa'i phyir khri las ldang bar byed/gos dag drang sham thabs gon par byed/lag pa dang lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/bsod snyoms la 'jug par
269b3('dul ba): byedabaca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga dge slong bar byed/tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing ji srid du gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur ro//gos thod na spang ba'i
269b4('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gal te phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu gos 'thag tu bcug gos de khyed kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sbyor bstabs par gyur na ltung ba med do//las da po go dang
269b5('dul ba): sgros po dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tsho ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so//hAdang //sangs byas
269b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugaso//dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa chos shes bya ba ngo tsho shes
269b7('dul ba): pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srong du de gnas dran len kun tu spyod par mi shwe \u0f7fsridu de dang lhan cig phanas so//gang gi tshe
270a1('dul ba): des de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na/de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/bcom
270a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' shig byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
270a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang
270a4('dul ba): thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gror spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces sgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
270a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko swa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/khyed cag las gang
270a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sA la dag tu ljongs sgyur 'gro bar sko bar des chos gos kyi las gyis shig/dga' bos thos te thos nas kyang nye dga' la smras pa/
270a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag
270b1('dul ba): tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgon//gal te
270b2('dul ba): bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya drug 'das te/ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so//ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu 'gro na ni/bcom ldan
270b3('dul ba): 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar
270b4('dul ba): 'gyur bas/gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na re shig chu yang rnyog ma can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la shing ljon pa'i drung du yang gos thob par mi
270b5('dul ba): 'gyur gyis bdag cag dge slong rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dang na de lta na bdag cag bde
270b6('dul ba): bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur nye dgas smras pa/slob dpon re shig gser gyi snod spangs te/sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu ba byed dam/
270b7('dul ba): khyod kyi lhan cig gnas pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa su la yod/des kho bo mthong bar mi 'dod do//slob dpon bcom
271a1('dul ba): kun 'das kyis bsdu ba'i das po dz+nyAn da na bu dang snun brnyi/pa dang /don spyod pa dang don thun pa dang da/dka' stsal pad pa las skro
271a2('dul ba): rjes 'gra' zhig yang dang blangs te 'jug par byas pa yod dam/de ni thams cad kyi sa thams cad du myed do//de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to//tshe dang ldan
271a3('dul ba): bcos kyi snam sbyar rnyings nas des ras yug tshon zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par bya'o snyam nas/des de khyed te dag
271a4('dul ba): po'i gan du'i dgos pa dang /de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod gir 'gro//des smras pa/khro bo'i snam sbyar snying sa te/
271a5('dul ba): bos ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdage slong ste mkhan po la zhus te/d+hUm+b+ha sbyar bcom par bya'o//bsod snyoms pas smras pa/gal te khyod snam sbyar sar pa gzhan 'jo
271a6('dul ba): nA/snum ste rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig/de bzhin bya'o de dga' bo'i sngon du song ste/smos pa/mkhan pa bdag gi snum sbyar d+hI sa twaM/bdag gis ras yug tshun 'di
271a7('dul ba): rnyed pas snam sbyang btsem pa zhu'o//nye dgas smras pa/slob dpon 'di ni de'i dus lag so//dga' bos smras pa/tshad ldan pa khyod kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa
271b1('dul ba): khye bos khyod la sbyin no//mkhan po mi 'tshal te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di nyid las snam sbyar drubs te bcang byar bgyi'o//nye dgas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kho bosna
271b2('dul ba): ko gzhan thos l-I gzhan mthong ste/kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa drung ldan pa/brisna mos pa bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi kho bos khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i
271b3('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes so//ci khyod mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dram/de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra
271b4('dul ba): bar 'dug pa dang /dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no//des de skrangs nas smras pa/mkhan po khyod ras yug chen 'di bzhes shig/tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci kho bos khyod la//
271b5('dul ba): brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin nam ras yug chen gang khyod nyid khyer cig/des bsams pa bdag la yo byad ngan med pa 'dis ci bya/bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun
271b6('dul ba): la dbul bar byi zhing sna mi sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o snyam nas smras pa/mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la
271b7('dul ba): dbul bar dgyi zhing /kA mi spyo rtirnying pa 'di gang bsod snyoms pa zhog gis bslangs pas de la stsal bar bkye ba mkhan po la zhu'o//de bzhin gyis shig/des ras
272a1('dul ba): yug chen de dge 'dun la 'phul zhing snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la byino//phyi de nyin par de snam sbyar de gyon te mkhan po'i rkang pa la
272a2('dul ba): phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /dga' bas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod shes par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes
272a3('dul ba): par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro
272a4('dul ba): ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dge 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bye dgoso//ci ste
272a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/srog chags brgya stong phrag du
272a6('dul ba): ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na re shig chu yang rnyog ma can dgu btung dgos par
272a7('dul ba): 'gyur la/shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags brjod cing mdun du dang ni de lta na/bdag
272b1('dul ba): cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro//mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad mchis par bka'
272b2('dul ba): stsal pa/gang dag lags pa de mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te/bdag ni re shig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs gcig mchi'o//dga' bos smras pa/kho bo dang
272b3('dul ba): lhan cig 'dong ngo //des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das nyin dang lhan cig mchi'o//dga' bos smyos te smras pa/ngan pa ci kho bos khyod la chos kyi chos nyid bzang pos snam sbyar
272b4('dul ba): phyin snyam nas/khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin pa yin na/gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gro na/snam sbyar 'on cig/khyod la mi sbyin no//tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis
272b5('dul ba): bsams pa bdag la chos gos phrogs pa ni bla'i/bdag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas/des de la snam sbyar phyir byin no//
272b6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs byin pa dang ldan
