272b7('dul ba): pa/thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/mdzes pa
273a1('dul ba): 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su
273a2('dul ba): bskor ba/seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/na mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis
273a3('dul ba): yongasu bskor ba/bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongasu
273a4('dul ba): bskor ba/sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongasu
273a5('dul ba): bskor ba/mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'khor lo sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis
273a6('dul ba): yongasu bskor ba/nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'phags skyes po ltar grul
273a7('dul ba): bum gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor po/zag zangs ris
273b1('dul ba): ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/brgya byin ltar sum cu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/tshangs pa ltar dwangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/dbang po rnams
273b2('dul ba): shin tu dul ba spyod lAm dang /spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/chu gter ltar ting nge ba/sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po'i
273b3('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis logs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus sku rnam par mdzes pa/drod 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag
273b4('dul ba): pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang thugs rje
273b5('dul ba): chen po ldan pa/'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pu paM/nyag gcig dpa' ba/gnyis pa med pa/gnyisu mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong
273b6('dul ba): gis zhugs pa/rig pa gsum gsal byer mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bsgrubs pa/dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las
273b7('dul ba): rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongasu sbyang ba mdzad pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhi
274a1('dul ba): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/yan lag lnga spang sde pa/'gro ba lnga las yung dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug
274a2('dul ba): yongasasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa//mthor gyis snyoms//
274a3('dul ba): par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du
274a4('dul ba): 'phags pa/'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung dang /chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang /tshe dang
274a5('dul ba): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te kro sa la dag tu ljongs rgyar gshigaso//sangs rgyas
274a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nA/sku thams cad kyis g.yum phyogasu glang po che'i lta ltangs kyis l-i las legs par ma bgro
274a7('dul ba): pa dang /legs par ma sbyangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam par gzigs par ma dzad pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad kyi g.yas phyogasu glang po che'i lta
274b1('dul ba): stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na/tshe dang ldan pa chos gos stong g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzig so//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun
274b2('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam/bcom ldan 'das grub bo//'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos gos
274b3('dul ba): stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/des skabs te bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
274b4('dul ba): dga' bo dge slong ga dge slong la gos byin nas/'phrog par byed dam/btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang /
274b5('dul ba): skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa
274b6('dul ba): ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'o la rmas pa/dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong l-i gas byin nas yang phyir phrogs
274b7('dul ba): pa bden nom/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rung ba ma yin pa/rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa/tshul dang 'thun
275a1('dul ba): pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par
275a2('dul ba): smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu ying dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi
275a3('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang
275a4('dul ba): dge slong la gros byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas 'phrogs gam 'phrog tu 'dzud cing de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyed la
275a5('dul ba): gos mi sbyin gyis phyir phyin ces zer na/dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu
275a6('dul ba): dga' bo 'am/gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//dge slong la zhes bya ba ni/chos 'dri bya'o//gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /sha na'i gos dang
275a7('dul ba): zar ma'i gos dang du bu la'i gos dang /ras bal gyi gos dang /ko ta ma pa'i gos dang /nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o//byin nam shes bya ba ni phyir sbyin
275b1('dul ba): me dgos par ro//de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhano//khros 'khrugs rngam par 'gyur te/yi mA rangs nas shes bya ba ni khro ba mA sangs b.ru ro//'phrog gam+b+ha zhes bya ba ni
275b2('dul ba): bdag nyid kyiso//'brog tu 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni gzha no//dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so//lkog ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o//
275b3('dul ba): phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni btang bar bya zhing ngo //btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang bral bar byas na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas/ltung byed kyi ltung
275b4('dul ba): bo bshegs par bya ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/lus g.yo bar byed pa dang /tshig brjod par byed pa dang /de gnyi ga
275b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa dang /gzhan dag giso//de la ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas shre na/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs
275b6('dul ba): nas/lus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par byed khrid par byed la tshig gis dge slong khyed la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin ces ni mi zer na/ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral ba
275b7('dul ba): mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/de ltar lus g.yo bar byed paso//ji ltar tshig brjod
276a1('dul ba): bar byed pas she na/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin
276a2('dul ba): gyis phyir byin cig ces tshig rjod par byed la lus kyis rtul bar ni mi byed na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/gos kyi glo
276a3('dul ba): lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/de ltar tshig brjod par byed pas so//ji ltar de gnyi ga dang ldan pas she na/dge slong gis dge slong la gos
276a4('dul ba): byin nas/de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas/lus kyis kyang rtul bar byed cing /tshig gis kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig
276a5('dul ba): ces zer na/ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/
276a6('dul ba): de ltar gnyi ga dang ldan pas so//ji ltar gzhan dag gis she na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas/de'i 'og tu khros khrugs rngam par gyur te/ye ma rangs nas/dge
276a7('dul ba): slong 'phrog tu 'dzud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/gnyi ga la spang ba'i
276b1('dul ba): ltung byed re rer 'gyuraro//dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin na de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog tu 'jud na/ji srid du gos kyi glu lus las
276b2('dul ba): bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//
276b3('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi me rangs nas dge slob ma 'phrog tu 'dzud na ji srid du gos kyi glu lus las bral bar mi byed pa
276b4('dul ba): de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/dge slob ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la dge slong la ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong
276b5('dul ba): gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas dge tshul 'phrog tu 'jud na/ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mo byed pa de srid du
276b6('dul ba): gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/gos kyi gra lus las bral bar byed na/dge tshul la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis dge
276b7('dul ba): slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas dge tshul ma 'phrog tu 'jud na/ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga
277a1('dul ba): la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/dge tshul ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
277a2('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong lagro byin nas/de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/yi ma rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jud na/ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed
277a3('dul ba): pa de srid du khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing /dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/gos kyi phra lus las bral bar byed na/khyim pa la bsod
277a4('dul ba): nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing /dge sbyong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas/des de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur
277a5('dul ba): te/yi ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing //
277a6('dul ba): dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing /dge slong la spang ba'i ltung
277a7('dul ba): byed du 'gyur te/de ltar gzhan dag gis so//don gzhan dang 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni ltung ba med do/ji ltar don gzhan gyiso she na/'di lta ste slob dpon dang /mkhan
277b1('dul ba): bo'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang /chu klung gi kha 'am/yur po che'i khar 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang mkhan pos
277b2('dul ba): chom rkun pa dang /g.yon can dag gis gros dag phrogs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/de ltar dron gzhan gyis so//ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis
277b3('dul ba): she na/'di lta ste dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gra nas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i zla bo dang /sdig pa'i sten grogs dag dang lhan cig sdig pa sten cing
277b4('dul ba): lam du 'gro bar gyur na/de dag la mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig po'i grogs po dang /sdig pa'i zla bo dang /sdig pa'i ston grogs la sten par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas
277b5('dul ba): gos dag 'brog gram 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /
277b6('dul ba): tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba medo//'phrogs pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
277b7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//ri brag zhig na/khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa de dgon par dge 'dun gyi
278a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa mthong khung dang skar khung drang can dang lan kan gyis brgyan pa snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa mtho ras kyi them
278a2('dul ba): smras su gyur pa khyi dang khri'u dang /yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/dri na dge slong drug cu gnas pa de dag la khyim bdag des chos gos dang bsod snyoms la
278a3('dul ba): sogs pas mkho ba bstab par byed do//de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas khyim bdag de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du/dge slong de dag
278a4('dul ba): dong ste smras pas/bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur na/khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge
278a5('dul ba): slong drug cu la chos gos dang /bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs par byed nus sam/des smras pa/'phags pa dag la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/la la ni
278a6('dul ba): stong la/la la ni 'bum lnga bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/la lA ni bdag nyid kyang gso bar dka' bas bdag nyid rngo mi thog go/de nas dge slong de dag gtsug lag khang
278a7('dul ba): do nas dong ngo //rgan zhugs ri brags do nyid nas/rab tu byung ba gnyis shig/bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang de nyid na 'khod do//byang lam nas don 'thun
278b1('dul ba): dag lhags nas de dag gis gtsug lag khang de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dag der dong ste/tshig su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas/gtsug lag khang du
278b2('dul ba): zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par 'dug nas/de dag gis bsams pa dge slong dug nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs som/yang na nyin mo sbyang du dong gror
278b3('dul ba): ma chog snyam nas/de dag de ni yongasu bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis de gnyis la smras pa/'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong /gnyis kyis
278b4('dul ba): smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'dod/ji'i slad du khyim bdag gang gis gtsug lag khang 'di byed du bcug pa des dge slong drug nu la chos gos drang /brjod snyoms
278b5('dul ba): la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur te/de dus kyis chos dang ldan par gyur nas/dge slong rnams kyis de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste/bzhin bzungs
278b6('dul ba): khyod kyis phas dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang /bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs byas par gyur na/khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang //
278b7('dul ba): bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs par byed nus sam/zhes smras pas/de na ro 'phags pa dag la la ni r-i rgyal bsnyen bkur byed/la la ni stong la/la la ni
279a1('dul ba): 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/lA lus ni bdag nyid kyang gso par dka' bas badrag gis rngo ma thog go zhes zer nas/dge slong de dag dong //
279a2('dul ba): kho bo cag gnyis ni bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na 'khod do//ded dpon gyis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag yun ring po nas smon pa/kyi
279a3('dul ba): ma bdag cag gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du gzhug cing gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o//snyam na/gtsug
279a4('dul ba): lag khang 'di ni byas zin pa yin pas/gtsug ldeg khang 'di nyid du dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o zhes des ras yug chen bting ste/shes ldan dag
279a5('dul ba): khyed cag gang gis ji yongasu gtang ba de 'dir phul cig ces smras pa dang /de dag gis kyang ji 'byor pa de phul nas der rnyed pa mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang /ded
279a6('dul ba): dpon gyis rgyan zhugs de gnyis la smras pa/'phags pa gnyis 'di ni dge slong drug cu'i zla bo gsum gyi bsod snyoms lag so//'dri ni brgyad ston dang bcu bzhi
279a7('dul ba): rten dang nya ston gyi bsod snyoms lag so//'di ni na ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byed legs so//'di ni rnyed pa lagaso//'di ni chos gos kyi zong lags kyis dge slong
279b1('dul ba): bzang po dag sbyin drongs shig/bdag cag dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong brgya la mkhro ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes smras te dong ngo //rgan zhugs cig gis smras pa/
279b2('dul ba): rgan zhugs dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sus sba bor bya/cig shos kyis smras pa/gang gzhon pas so//de gnyis las gang gzhon pas rnyed pa de smras nas des smras pa/rga ni zhugs
279b3('dul ba): mnyan yod nas dge slong dag bod na der gang 'gro bar bya/rgan pas smras pa/gang gzhon pa 'gro bar bya'o//gzhon pas smras pas/kho bos rnyed pa sbas kyis khyod dere
279b4('dul ba): song shig/rgan bshos mnyan yod du dge slong sgron du song ngo //drug snga dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang /khyim bdag 'ongs shing /lhags pa
279b5('dul ba): rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/rgol ba dag kyang tsher gcad par bya rang gi grags po yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas/rgyal byed kyi
279b6('dul ba): chel gyi sgo stong par mi 'dzegs pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'/rgyal byed kyi tshal phye sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo smra ba'i me tog
279b7('dul ba): ltar skye ba smin ma 'phyar ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsams po/dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ongs pa 'di gang yin pa su'o snyam nas des de la gnas brtan byon
280a1('dul ba): ba leg so//byon pa leg so phyag 'tshalo zhes smras pa dang /de na re slob dpon phyag 'tsha lo zhes zer nas nye dgas bsams pa/kye ma 'di ni
280a2('dul ba): rgan zhugs shig te slob dpon yang mi shes mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas des de la smras po/rgan zhugs ga las 'ongs/ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang
280a3('dul ba): ga ge mo zhig nas mchis so//rgan zhugs ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/'on te phongs sa yin/gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra phongs sa ni ci 'dra/gang na yo byad
280a4('dul ba): thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/gang na yo byad bams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yino//de sngon ni phongs par gyur la da ni gtsug lag khang du gyur to///
280a5('dul ba): ji ltar gyur/byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas/de dag gis der dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang brgyad ston dang /bcu bzhi ston dang /
280a6('dul ba): nyanyo ston dang na bo'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dang rnyed pa dang /chos gos kyi zong dag phul nas/'di skad ces 'phags pa dge slong bzang po dag pos shig/bdag cag kyang
280a7('dul ba): dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te/dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o//nye dgas smras pa/'on tang khyod dge slong rkur 'ongs mod lag so//
280b1('dul ba): rgan zhugs ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bla mkhyen drang srong byin
280b2('dul ba): dang rnying pa dang /khyim bdag gi chung mA ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /legs skyes dang bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can mang po gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong rnams la yo byad
280b3('dul ba): thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas shing /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyi ma re re zhing yon bshad pa byed pa na yang gnas 'dir dge slong gang dag ma 'ongs pa de dag kyang 'ong bar
280b4('dul ba): 'gyur zhing 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par dga' bar gyur cig ces zer la de dag kyang 'di lta ste/chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang /na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad dag
280b5('dul ba): gis brel ba med cing /bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon sum du chos ston par mdzad pas/'di na chos kyi longs spyod dang /zang zing gi longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yin pas
280b6('dul ba): gal te dge slong rnams kyis khyod dge slong rkur 'dir 'ongs par shes par gyur na/khyod gnas nas dbyung ba'i los byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par
280b7('dul ba): 'gyur gyis/dge slong gzhan la de skad ma zer cig/'di ltar kho bo cag mi drug re re la yang 'khor bcu bcu yod pas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo //slob dpon bdag
281a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchis te slad kyis mchi'o//nye drugs bsamus pa lhung bzed nag b+h+yo 'ga' zhig gis 'di mthong zhing
281a2('dul ba): de thos nas dang po kho nar 'gro bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis lha ni yid kyis bskor ba yin gyi/lus kyis bskor ba ma yino//zhes bya ba ma
281a3('dul ba): thos sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos rnams yid kyis 'dren byed cing /yid gtso yid kyi 'gros can yin/zhes gsungs kyis 'di nyid nas bcom ldan 'das
281a4('dul ba): kyi zhabs la phyag tshol cig ces des de'i gnyal ba nas bzung ste/rgan zhugs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshalo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhes gyis
281a5('dul ba): shig ces 'dud du bcug go/slob dpon skom gyis je skom 'thung du michi'o//'di nyid du sdod cig dang kho bos skom gyis phor bu bkang ste/khyer te 'ong ngo zhes des
281a6('dul ba): skom gyis phur bu bkang ste blung nas smras pa/rgan zhugs dri song shig ces des de thag ring por bskyal nas da phyi ma ldog cig ces bsgo ste bdag nyid phyir log go//
281a7('dul ba): drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni gang cung zad ci thos pa de phye 'bred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin pas/nye dga' gtsug lag khang du/
281b1('dul ba): song ste/drug sde rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/khyod kyis thos pa cung zhig yod dam/yod de ri brags kyi gtsug lag
281b2('dul ba): khang gi ge mo zhig tu byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug cu'i dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang /brgyad ston dang bcu bzhi ston dang /
281b3('dul ba): ston dang na ba'i rkyen dang /sman gyi yo byad dang rnyed pa dang /chos gos kyi zong dag phul gyis der dong ngo //ci de nyid du dbyar gnas par bya 'am/mi bya ste/'di ltar dbyar gyi
281b4('dul ba): nang nyid du de dag zos te/'di nyid du 'ongs la dbyar phyi ma nye bar bsgrub pa'i dus su gnas par khas blang bar bya'o//de dag der dong ba dang /rgan zhugs gnyis kyis de dag
281b5('dul ba): thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legaso//'ongs pa legaso zhes de gnyis kyis de dag gi gnas khang dag sgos shing /gnas mal dang /
281b6('dul ba): khri dang khri'u dang /chu ra dang phor bu dang chu tshags dang /lde mag kyog po dag phog go//de dag gis bsams pa bdag cag don gang gi phyir lhags pa de je brtag par bya'o snyam nas
281b7('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/rgan zhugs gnyis rnyed pa ci grub pa dag ji ltas 'on cig/rgan zhugs gnyis ni drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas/de gnyis kyis 'di ni dge slong drug
282a1('dul ba): nu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyom so//'di ni brgyad ston no//'di ni bcu bzhi ston no//'di ni nya ston no//'di ni na pa'i rkyen to//'di ni sman gyi yo byad do//
282a2('dul ba): 'di ni rnyed pa'o//'di ni chos gos kyi zong ngo zhes rnyed pa de dag thams cad bstan to//de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs ser sna can yin pas zas bsod pa
282a3('dul ba): sbyin par mi nus la/'di ltar rgan zhugs 'di gnyis kyis dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pas yongasu spang ba sbyin no zhes de dag gis de gnyis la yongasu spyad pa byin nas
282a4('dul ba): dode gnyis kyis kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis yongasu spang ba thob bo zhes dga' bar gyur to//de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong lto mdun
282a5('dul ba): can 'ga' zhig la bcol na/dge 'dun la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba
282a6('dul ba): yang 'drim par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis dge slong lto mdun can zhig la bcol ba dang /des de dag li nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang chod mo snum bag can
282a7('dul ba): mang po sna tshogs dag dang legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'drim par byed pas dus cung zad cig gis bsod snyoms thams cad spyad pa dang /dge skos kyis rgan pa'i mahA
282b1('dul ba): log su 'dug ste smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs shig mchi so//de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag bslab pa yang dag par
282b2('dul ba): ma blangs pa de dag ni brgyad ston dang /bcu bzhi ston dang nya ston byed kyi bdag cag bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa dag de mi byed kyis de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos pa dang /
282b3('dul ba): dge skos kyis yang rkun pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste smras bya/tshe dang ldan pa dag da ni dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs shig mchis so//drug sde dag gis smras pa/
282b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'tsho ba de srid du bdag cag rtag tu nad pa yin pas na ba'i sman de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos nas de dag gis
282b5('dul ba): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khur ya cig ni 'dug par dga' ba yin gyis gos kyi rnyed pa 'di yang bgos la khur do mnyam pas/bde bar 'dong bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de
282b6('dul ba): yang bgos pa dang /dge rkos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste smras pa/da ni dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs lngam mchiso//de dag gis smras pa
282b7('dul ba): rgan zhugs gnyis khyed gnyis na re dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms yod zhes zer na dbyar gyi nang du zad par gyur to//de gnyis kyis smras pa/ci de dag gis
283a1('dul ba): bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang /legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sha stag rim+ba zhig ce smras mde dag gi smras pa/
283a2('dul ba): rgan zhugs gnyis gnya' ba smad de skyid spyod la da smod par byed kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las gyis shig/kha cig gis smras pa/rgan zhugs
283a3('dul ba): gnyis myur du bzod pa gsol cig phyi re bzod pa gsol na/lhag pa'i spu byi bar 'gyur ro//de gnyis kyis bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /kha T+wAMg gis smras pa
283a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs 'di gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin gyis 'di gnyis la bzod pa gyis shig/de dag gis smras pa/rgan zhugs gnyis bzod par bya'o//
283a5('dul ba): ri brags 'di na ma drad pa mang pos 'dir bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis/gal te lhag rol chung zad yod na de yang byin cig/'on te med na ni kho bo cag 'dong ngo //tshe dang ldan
283a6('dul ba): pa dag ci yang med kyis dengs shig/de dag de nas drong ste mnyan yod du song nas de dag drir phyin pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas pa khas blangs so//dbyar 'dus pa dang den
283a7('dul ba): 'thun de dag yang lhags nas/de dag gis de bzhin du tshig su bcid bya'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/gtsug lag khang du zhugs po dang ji tsam na gnan
283b1('dul ba): lag khang stong par mthong nas/de dag gis bsams pa/dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/nyin mo spyod du drong gor mu chog snyam nas/de dag de na yongasu bskor ba na/
283b2('dul ba): rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong /bzhin bzangs dog 'di ni dge slong dag mi 'khod do//'phags pa gnyis bdag
283b3('dul ba): cag gis dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms ma phul lam/de gnyis kyis smras pa/dge slong dag lhags par gyur nas/de dag gis dbyar gyi nang nyid du thams
283b4('dul ba): cad zos te dong ngo //khyed gnyis kyis dge slong ga dag khrid de 'ongs/drug sde dag go/'phags pa gnyis khyed gnyis rgya mtsho chen por dong nas nor bu mching bu dag
283b5('dul ba): khyer te 'ongaso//de na dge slong gzhan dag med dam ci na drug sde dag khrid de 'ongs/de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste
283b6('dul ba): 'di ltar bdag cag gi dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag tu bcom mo zhes smod par byed phyar kha gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan
283b7('dul ba): 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin//
284a1('dul ba): no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom
284a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgos pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
284a3('dul ba): kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjesu 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//
284a4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/
284a5('dul ba): 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslabs pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca'
284a6('dul ba): bar bya ste/de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis dbyar rnyed pa dbyer gyi nang du 'god par byed na/'gal tshabs
284a7('dul ba): can du 'gyuraro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la/nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do////sangs rgyas bcom ldan
284b1('dul ba): 'dus mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//mnyan yod na dge sbyong ma skye dbu'i bdag mo chen mo gauSh+ma tA me dang chos byin
284b2('dul ba): gnyis lngas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ni spong ba mo 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin+da la/chos byin ni mdo sde'i mtha' bya 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang
284b3('dul ba): ldan pa yin to//de gnyis dbyar khang cig tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas gang gi tshe/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u te mi'i 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa/de'i tshe
284b4('dul ba): nachos byin gyis rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po rjesu gnang ba gang yin pa de
284b5('dul ba): thams cad skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi las brten pa yin la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang du skyed par byed
284b6('dul ba): do zhes gsungs kyis khyed cag kyang re shig mi rtag pa nyid yid lu bya ba bsgoms shig ces 'doms par byed cing /de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya bla sgom par rtsom
284b7('dul ba): mo//gang gi tshe chos byin gyi 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na skye dgu'i bdag mo go'u ta mi yang rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa
285a1('dul ba): grangs med pa gsum gyis bka' ba spyod pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis/pha rol tu phyin pa drug mongasu rdzogs par mdzad de/bla na med pa'o/
285a2('dul ba): mkhyen pa thugasu chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad sems can lnga phan po'i rgyu yin la/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams
285a3('dul ba): mang po bskyed par byed do zhes gsungs kyis khyed cag kyang re shig/mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton gyis shig ces 'doms par byed cing de dag
285a4('dul ba): kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton byed par rtsom mo//dge slong ma dag de ltar phan tshun sems rjesu srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi
285a5('dul ba): 'phel te/chu med pa nas ud pa la bzhi no//chos byin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas nges yo byad thams cad kyis de mgron du byos so//dus gzhan
285a6('dul ba): zhig na dge bsnyen sa ga chos sbyin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /chos sbyin gyis de la smras pa/bzhin bzangs dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar khang gcig
285a7('dul ba): tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa/de dag phan tshun sems rje su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/chu med pa nas ud pa la bzhin du gyur no//khyod kyis
285b1('dul ba): dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar khang byed du 'jug nus snyam/des smras pa/'phags ma bdug la kar shAb na ga ni mchis na/gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du/rgyal po la
285b2('dul ba): gsol ba mdzod cig dang /der bdag gis dbyar khang bgyid du stsal to//dge slong ma chos byin btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang /btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/
285b3('dul ba): 'phags ma byon pa legaso byon pa leg so//'phags ma sku don ci zhig gi slad du byon/bdag dge slong ma'i dbyer khang zhig bgyid du stsol par 'tshal na//gzhi rgyal po mnga'
285b4('dul ba): bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol pa bgyi ba 'tshalo//'phags ma khyod bzhud cig dang /bdag gis 'phags ma'i slad du lha la gsol bgyi'o//chos byin song ba
285b5('dul ba): dang /btsun mo phreng ljon ma kro sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste/dris smras pa/lha khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags ma chos byin byon par gyur pa ni/
285b6('dul ba): khyed kyis rnyed pa logs par brnyes so//ci'i slad du byon/de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid du stsol bar bzhed na/dog sa rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad du/rgyal po
285b7('dul ba): la gsol ba bgyid ces mchi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te 'phags mo chos byin re shig gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs la rag ste/de'i pho brang
286a1('dul ba): gzhan du byed du gzhug go/gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag go/btsun mo phreng ldan mas chos byin la lhas 'phags
286a2('dul ba): ma la dam pa gsol te/gal te 'phags ma chos byin gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de nyi du bzhugs la rag ste/nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug/gal te mi bzhad
286a3('dul ba): na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du sprul la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo //chos byin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga la ko sa la re byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag la dam
286a4('dul ba): pa byin te/gal te 'phags ma chos byin re shig gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de nyid du bzhugs la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhugo//gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa
286a5('dul ba): der dbyar khang bgyid du stsal la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo //ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom
286a6('dul ba): gnyis yod pa las ral gri mthu can gyi khrom dmag gi gan su song ba dang /de dag gi chung ma skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par byed pas phyogs de go skabs
286a7('dul ba): dben par gyur nas/chos byin gyis smras pa/phyogs 'dir dbyar khang byed du drug shig/dge bsnyen sa gas phyogs der dbyar khyadang byed du bcug nas/dge slong ma rnams kyi
286b1('dul ba): de gnas par bajam po//ral gri'i mthu can gyi rlom de dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ongs te/de dag gis chung ma de dag bkug cing bkug cing brdeg par brtsams pa dang /srang dag
286b2('dul ba): na de dag ngu ba'i klu'i rta skad dang /glang po che'i skad lta bu'i skad mthon pa dang skad chen po drag byung ngo //dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/'phags ma bdag cag dgung char gyis 'jigs
286b3('dul ba): pas dang la kha'i 'og tu zhugs so//chos byin gyis bsams pa/'di dag las kha cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod dam snyam du bsams pa yod par mthong //suM la rag lus snyam du
286b4('dul ba): bsams na bdag nyid la rag lus par mthong nas/des smras pa/nu mo dge gdul ba la ltos pas thams cad bzod par bya'o//chos byin gyis phyogs gcig tu gyo mo snar pa bzhin
286b5('dul ba): ste/dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/nu mo dag khyed cig gang la sder lhag yod pa de thams cad gyo mo 'dir chug shig/de dag la sder lhag ci yod pa de thams cad gyo mo der 'jud par
286b6('dul ba): spyod do//de nas byis la dag dir 'ong bar gyur nas chos byin gyis de ni khye'u gang dag yin pa de dag la ni 'bru mar byin nas cig gis cig gi mgo skud du bcug ste rang gi lag gis
286b7('dul ba): boce' ba dag sbyin par byed de//bu mo gang dag yin po de dag la ni bdag nyid kyi 'bru mar gyis mgo bskus nis rang gI la bA gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed de/byis pa de dag gis
287a1('dul ba): de dag khyer te rang rang gi khyim drug tu dong ba dang /de dag gyi ma dag gis dris pa khyed drug la 'di dag sus byin/de dag gis smras pa/'phags ma chos
287a2('dul ba): byin gyiso//chung ma de dag gis bsams pa/don gyis na 'phags mA chos byin ni bdag cag la mo ma'i bya ba mdzad snyam du rig nas de la mngon par dad par gyur te/de dag
287a3('dul ba): gis bsams pa gang gi tshe/bdag cag gi khyim thabs dag dmag gi gnas 'dong ba de'i tshe na/bdag cag gis khyim thab dag bskyal nas/'phags ma chos byin la
287a4('dul ba): bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo//dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi khyim thabs dag dmag gi gnasu 'phags pa dang /chos byin gyis de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang
287a5('dul ba): chags chag btab legs par byugs lci ba sar pa'i byugs pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang /chu dang dri dang bdug po dang /me tog dang pog phor bzhag nas dge slong ma skad
287a6('dul ba): snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang /chung ma de dag kyang khyim thab dag bskyal te/chos byin gyi drung du lhags nas/chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang lag pa bskal
287a7('dul ba): ba'i chu dang dri dang /bdug pa dang me tog dang /pog phor dag byin nas tshig su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du ston
287b1('dul ba): ba nyid la 'dug//de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do//chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa drang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du
287b2('dul ba): chung nas ji nas kyang de dag gis 'jigs tshigs la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos
287b3('dul ba): bstan pa byas so//de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas/'phags mas bdag cag la gang
287b4('dul ba): mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha myes rnams kyis kyang ma gyis//
287b5('dul ba): dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/rus pa'i ri
287b6('dul ba): dag las ni bsgral ngani song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi
287b7('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchi pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/
288a1('dul ba): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bran thob ste/'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pA lagas+ho//'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos
288a2('dul ba): dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchis bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/dreng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabasu mchi'o//de dag mngon
288a3('dul ba): par dad par gyur nas/khyim khyim du dong ste khyim chag chag btab/legs par byugs lci bsar pa'i byugs pas bskus te/spyod lam zhi bas 'khod do//de dag gi
288a4('dul ba): khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas nos phyir 'ong ba na bsnams pa bdag cag gi chung ma glang po che 'tsho ba 'am/ba lAng rdzi'im su zhig dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par
288a5('dul ba): byed cing 'dug snyam mo//de dag giso bdag cag gi khyim thab dag 'ongs shes thos so//thos nas kyang bshes pa'i tshig gis rje'i sras dag byin pa legaso logs zhes
288a6('dul ba): byisu nas de dag rang rang gi khyim du dong ba dang /de dog rang rang gi chung ma dag gis bsku mnye dang dril phyi byas te/khrus byas nas leg pas bskus te zas byin no//de dag
288a7('dul ba): gis bsams pa 'di dag go spyod lam 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung ngo snyam nas de dag la dris pa/bzang mo dag khyod kyi spyod lam 'di lta bu 'di sngon ma byung ba yin na rje
288b1('dul ba): las gyur/de dag gis smras pa/rje'i sras dag 'phags mchos byin gyis bdag cag la ji nas kyang bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba rnams skun chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu kun tu
288b2('dul ba): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do//de dag gis bsams pa 'phags ma chos byin ni ma dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin te/des 'di dag btul ba lta
288b3('dul ba): ste gang gi phyir bdag cag gis 'di dag gsad pa dang /bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang /smyo bas gdul bar ma nus pa dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis chos bstan pas btul
288b4('dul ba): pas/'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag cag la phan btags kyis/bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po lta ste/'phags ma chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo//chos
288b5('dul ba): byin gyis kyang de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas/gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/legs par byugs lci ba sar pa'i byug pas skus te/'dog rdzas dang chu dang dri
288b6('dul ba): dang bdug pa dang /me tog dang /pog phor bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang /de dag kyang rgyal po bltas nas chos byin gyi drung du
288b7('dul ba): lhags pa dang /chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang lag pa skal ba'i chu dang dri dang 'dug pa dang /me tog dang pog khor dog byin nas tshig su bcad pa'i skad kyis
289a1('dul ba): chud rgyun k+Sha r+m+ma/na hUM/dge slong ma dun 'dun gyi grod du stan pa shams pa nyid la 'gahU~M/rgyungan tung du rlung pa lnga dz+nyAn tu r+m+mAd+d+ha
289a2('dul ba): chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do//chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang bag po nyi lnga dang /khams dang rang bzhini khong du chud na ci nas kyang de dog gis 'jig
289a3('dul ba): tshogs la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shos kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan par byas pa//de dag
289a4('dul ba): gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/'phags ma padog cig gis dge ba'i shos gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas/'phag sna mas bdag cig la gang mdza
289a5('dul ba): 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis//lha rnams kyis kyang mya bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis
289a6('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang /mdzad pa shes dang /rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang mi bgyis te/khrag dang
289a7('dul ba): mchi ma'i rgya mtshon po skams rus pa'i re dag la so ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phyi sems can dmyal ba dang /dung
289b1('dul ba): 'gro dang /yi dgas nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas pa sogs pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'o//
289b2('dul ba): rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lag so//'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon
289b3('dul ba): par zhugs pa lags ter 'phags ma bdag cag bco ma ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la sgrub su mchi/bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/deng sman
289b4('dul ba): chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyebasu mchi'o//de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas yang smras pa/'phags ma 'dag cag gis de ni srog tshogs grog sbur la yang
289b5('dul ba): bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi zlog la bdag cag ni mtshon chas 'tsho ba lags ni/bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/chos byin gyis smras pa/gzhu rgyud
289b6('dul ba): med pa dag dang mdo'i mde'u med pa dang shing gi rAl gri dag thogs shing /de dag gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang /mda' mde'u med pa dag dang /shing gau ral gri dag thog so//gong gi
289b7('dul ba): tshe de dag gis bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na/phyin ched brgyan pos rtse bar mi byed/'chir 'thung bar mi byed/bud med gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par ma byin
290a1('dul ba): bas/de dag longs spyod dag gis phyug pa dang nye bar bstsags par gyur to//de dag gis glang po che dag dang /rta dag kyang yongasu ma spyad pas/tshor ba dang /
290a2('dul ba): bags pa dang /sha dang khrag rgyas par gyur to//ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log nas der dmag ru cig btang nas bcom pa dang /rab tu
290a3('dul ba): bcom pa dang /so sor bcom par 'gyur te phyir 'ongs so//de bzhin du ru gnyis pa btang na de yang bcom pa dang /rab tu bcom pa dang /so sor bcom par gyur te/
290a4('dul ba): phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes shing lha'i dpung ni nyams te/gal te lha nyid der ma gshegs na ri brags pa sgrub dka'
290a5('dul ba): bur 'gyur ro//rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byas te nga'i yul na mtshon chas 'tsho po ji srid 'khod pa de dag thams cad der 'gro bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas/rgyal po yang dpung
290a6('dul ba): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te chas so//ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gasngal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang /rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom gnyis

298a1('dul ba): du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang /khyim bdag de rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste/smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug

302a1('dul ba): slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang /nam gyi chu smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjesu brtson par gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam ma

303b1('dul ba): chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'phrul bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/khyed cag bsams bzhin du zhag bdun du mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral ba du byed pa bden nam/btsun pa
303b2('dul ba): med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/rung ba ma yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya
303b3('dul ba): ba ma yino zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba dge slong dag de lta bas na phan
303b4('dul ba): yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste des bya ba la sog pa snga ma bzhi no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la
303b5('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa/
303b6('dul ba): 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jig su rung ba dang ban+d+ha pA grag pa dag tu dbyar phyi mur gyur la/dge slong dgon pa bas 'dod na chos gis gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim
303b7('dul ba): gzhan du bzhag par bya'o//dge slong dgon pa pi la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad
304a1('dul ba): du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar bya'o//de las 'das pararwa 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o///
304a2('dul ba): rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni gnyis yAn tsad rab tu mang po dag yino//gau nas mal zhes bya ba ni gtsug lagu khang ngo //dgon pa zhes pa rdul phra rab drug la rdul phra mo
304a3('dul ba): gcig go/rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/chu rdul drug la lcags rdul gcig go/lcags rdul drug la ri bong rdul gcig go/ri bong rdul drug lA lug rdul gcig/

304a6('dul ba): phan chad dgon pa'o//dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni/tshim rkun pa dang g.yon can gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o//'jigs pa dang bcas
304a7('dul ba): par grags pa zhes bya ba ni/seng ge dang stag dang gung gis 'jigs par grags pa'o//'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jig su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu/
304b1('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni/sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu rings dang /rlung dang nyi ma dang /sdig sbrul gyis 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jig su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu'o//dbyar phyi mar
304b2('dul ba): gyur la zhes bya ba ni/dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs par gyur pa'o//dge slong dgon pa pas zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so//'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don
304b3('dul ba): du gnyer na'o//chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung zhes bya ba ni/snam sbyar dang bla gos dang /mthang gos las gang 'dod pa'o//khyim gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gang na lam
304b4('dul ba): bo che dang /srang dang gzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag yod par ro//gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/gdams par bya ba'o//dge slong dgon pa pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa
304b5('dul ba): de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi 'amachod rten gyi laM gang zag bya ba'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na'o//dge slong dgon pa pa des shes
304b6('dul ba): bya ba ni/dge slong gang yin pa nges so//zhag dug gi mtha' tshun can du zhes bya ba ni/nyin mtshan drug gi mtha' tshun cad do//chos kos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rom du 'bral
304b7('dul ba): bor bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos gos bzhag pa gang yin pa de dang po de las 'das par 'bral na zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par skya reng 'char bar byed na'o//spang ba'i ltung byed do//
305a1('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/des na spung ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur na/
305a2('dul ba): na/'di ltar de dge slong dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang /mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'brel na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
305a3('dul ba): 'di 'am der bar chad brgyad po 'di lta ste/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang /me'i 'jigs pa dang /chu'i 'jigs pa dang /sing ge'i 'jigs
305a4('dul ba): pa dang /stag gi 'jigs pa dang /mi'i 'jigs pa dang /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas pa la ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang smyos
305a5('dul ba): pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//zhag bdun gyis 'bral ba'i spang ba ste/nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho////sangs
305a6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dbyar gyi gos ras chen
305a7('dul ba): bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/de na dge slongs gang dag snga mas dbyar gnas pa khas len pa de dag ni rang gi dus yin no zhes tshol bar byed cing bdag cag gis
305b1('dul ba): ci'i phyir mi bcang zhes 'chang bar byed do//phyi mas dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag kyang rang gi dus yino zhes tshol bar byed cing bdag cag gis ci'i phyir mi btsal zhes tshol
305b2('dul ba): bar byed do//de dag ha cang myur bar tshol ba dang /ha tsong yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas/bya ba mang ba dang /byed pa mang bar gyur te/lung mnod pa dang /kha don dang rnal 'byor
305b3('dul ba): yid la bya ba dang /nang gi sems kyis zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dog bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes
305b4('dul ba): gsungs na ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha cang myur du tshol bar byed cing /ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas/bya ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur te/lung mnod pa dang /kho don dang /
305b5('dul ba): rnal 'byor yid la bya ba dang /nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtod par byed ces skrod par byed/phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha brer dar byed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis
305b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dong skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzado zhes bya ba la sogs
305b7('dul ba): pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
306a1('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la smras pa/dge slong dag khyed ngas dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/khyed cag ha cang myur du tshol ba
306a2('dul ba): dang /ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso dka' ba dang dgang dka' ba dang 'dod pa che ba dang cho ga mi
306a3('dul ba): shes pa rnam par smad par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso bla ba dang dgang bla ba dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /cho ga shes pa dang /phri ba dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
306a4('dul ba): mdzes pa dang drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba
306a5('dul ba): la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon
306a6('dul ba): par bya ste/dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na dbyar gyi gosra ras chen btsal bar bya'o//dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o//gal
306a7('dul ba): te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol tu dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam/dbyar zad nasaM 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'o chang na spang
306b1('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'debs so//so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig na dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa 'brung 'gyur ba no//dbyar gyi gos ras
306b2('dul ba): chen zhes bya ba ni char 'bab pa'i gos so//btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so//dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba byed kyi ba ro bcang bar bya'o//zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye byas nas
306b3('dul ba): zla ba phyed kyi bar du'o//gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i ston rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam zhes bya ba de ni de'i mdun rol tu'o//dbyar
306b4('dul ba): zed nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro//spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshugs par bya
306b5('dul ba): ba ste/des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/snga ma dang phyi ma las te//de las gang dag dbyar sgyu mar gnas par khas len pa de dag
306b6('dul ba): la na ha cang yang yun ring du 'tshod na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//gang dag dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas len pa de dag ni ha cang myur du tshol na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
306b7('dul ba): de ltar na dge slong gis ji tsam du ha cang myur du tshol bar byed pa dang /zhal yang yun ring du 'chang bar byed na thams cad spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang smyos pa
307a1('dul ba): dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba ste/nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho//
307a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshogs can zhes bya ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis rang gi dad pa dang rang gi gtsugs/
307a3('dul ba): pa dang /rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin l-I gang zag gir phul lo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang
307a4('dul ba): der ji tsam pa de tsam 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo //khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang der ji tsam pa de tsam
307a5('dul ba): 'dug nas/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song zhes thos so//thos nas kyang khyim bdag des gtsug leg khang de dge 'dun la phulo//de nas tshe dang ldan
307a6('dul ba): pa sgra gcan zin ci dgar ljongasu 'dug nas shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshogs can ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i tshe na wa tshogs can du phyin
307a7('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis khyim bdag des/gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul zhes thos so//thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin do///
307b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis
307b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'di na khyim podag gcig gis rang gi dad pa dang rang gi gcugs pa dang /rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal nas/bdag la
307b3('dul ba): gang zag gir stsal te/bdag gtsug lag khong der ci tsam pa de tsam mchis nas/lhung bzed dang chos gos 'tshal te ljongs rgyur mchis pa dang /khyim bdag des 'phags
307b4('dul ba): pa sgra gcan zin gtsug lag khang dar ji tsam pa de tsam mchis nas/lhung bzed dang chos gos 'tshal te/ljongs rgyur mchis shes thos te thos nas kyang khyim bdag des
307b5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul na/btsun pa de la bdag gis da ji ltar bgyi sgra gcan zin tshur shog khyod khyim bdag de ga la ba der song la phyin nas khyim bdag
307b6('dul ba): de la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam dag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam zhes smros shig/tshe dang ldan pa sgra granan zin gyis btsun pa bka' bzhin
307b7('dul ba): 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/khyim bdag pa la bi der song ste phyin nas/khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so//khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam
308a1('dul ba): dkyu la cung zad skrod par mi byed dam/'phags pa sku gcan zin bdag khyod kyi sku'am gsung la cung zad kyang spyod par mi bgyid do//de nas rgyu dang
308a2('dul ba): ldan pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bo sa phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/
308a3('dul ba): mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'dzin bdag khyim bdag de ga la ba der mchis
308a4('dul ba): byin nas/khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam ngag la cung zad smod pa med dam zhes bgyis na/de 'di skad ces 'phags pa sgra gcan zin
308a5('dul ba): blodage khyod kyi sgra 'am/gsung la spyod pa cung zad kyang mya mchis zhes mchi'o//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs na 'dug par gyur
308a6('dul ba): cing bstsal ya ba thogs te/bcom ldan 'das lnga g.yob cing 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'i stsal pa/kun dga' bo song
308a7('dul ba): la dge slong ji snyed wa tshogs can na nye bar rten cing 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka'
308b1('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/dge slong ji snyed la tshogs can na nye bar rten cis 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpong sra'i khang par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das/
308b2('dul ba): gu la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la
308b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa dge slong ji snyed wa tshegs can na nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing //
308b4('dul ba): 'thun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das pong ba sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon
308b5('dul ba): nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang gis
308b6('dul ba): gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin pa byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/longs spyad du rung ba
308b7('dul ba): ma yin no//gzhon gnyis sam rab tu mang po 'tsho/dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing /chos dang ldan pa'i len pa
309a1('dul ba): /ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin//dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas/gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan
309a2('dul ba): pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i lon pa ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no//gzhin gnyis sum rab tu myeng po 'am/dge 'dun la sbyin par byed
309a3('dul ba): pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing /chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyang du rung ba ma yino//dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin pa
309a4('dul ba): byin nas/gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin te/gzhan
309a5('dul ba): gnyis sam+b+ha rab tu mang po 'om/dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan+d+ra pa'i sbyin be ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i ljon pa ma yin lnga longs spyad du
309a6('dul ba): rung ba ma yino//dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin nus/gzhan gcig lo sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing zlos dang ldan
309a7('dul ba): pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyod du rung ba ma yono//gzhan gnyis sam rab tu mang po 'o ma dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa mi
309b1('dul ba): yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa mA yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yino//dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun bye zhing gaN+DI su gyur te/phyogs dang gzhan gyis phyogs rnam par
309b2('dul ba): gnas pa phyogs gcig la sbyin pa byin nas/phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i smyon pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa maM yi na la longs
309b3('dul ba): smad du rung ba ma yino//dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin nas/gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang
309b4('dul ba): ljon pa'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yin//gzhan gnyis snom rab tu mang po 'am druge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan
309b5('dul ba): pa'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yino//dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i
309b6('dul ba): sbyin+da pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yin no//gzhan gnyis sam rab tu mang po 'om dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan
309b7('dul ba): po'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yi no//dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin po byin nas/gzhan gcig la sbyin par
310a1('dul ba): mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yin//gzhan gnyis sum rab tu mang
310a2('dul ba): 'am dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ljon pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin lo longs spyad du rung ba yin//dge slong dag gang gis
310a3('dul ba): dge 'dun la sbyin po byin nas/gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la longs spyod du rung ba
310a4('dul ba): yin no//gzhon gnyis sam rab tu mang po 'am dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la
310a5('dul ba): ljolongs spyad du rung ba yino//dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun bye zhing gnyisu gyur la phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogasu rnam par gnas pa na/phyogs gcig la sbyin pa
310a6('dul ba): byin nas/phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan po'i len pa yin la longs spyad du rung ba yin no//dge slong
310a7('dul ba): dog de lta bas na snga ma ni sbyin pa yin la phyi ma ni ma yino//rgyal po ni so gzhi la dbang la bdag po ni gnas mal la dbang dge slong ni lhung bzed dang ches gos la
310b1('dul ba): dbang ngo //sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis rang gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba ni rung gi/gzhan la sbyin du ni mi rung ngo //dge slong dag dge slong sgra gcan zin la
310b2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang de phyir byin cig/dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin lo gtsug lag khang de phyir byin no//'di ni re shig byung ba yin gyi bcom ldan 'das re
310b3('dul ba): shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
310b4('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//bsod snyoms pa zhig gis khyim bdag cig sgrubasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas/dus gzhan zhig na bsod
310b5('dul ba): snyoms pa des khyim bdag de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang khyim bdag des smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis kyang
310b6('dul ba): re shig rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i gzhi bcung zhig bgyi'o//de bzhin gyis shig/ci zhig bgyi/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston
310b7('dul ba): gsol cig/de bzhin bgyi'o//na bza' dbul ba yang cung zad yod dam/'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa logs mod kyi/ras zung shig dbul//'phags pa
311a1('dul ba): khyod kyis sang bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drang du gsol/dasod snyoms pa des tshogs pa'i
311a2('dul ba): dus su khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la sbyin drangs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/
311a3('dul ba): bsod snyoms pa khyod khyim dad par byed par gyur to//bsod snyoms pa ci khyim bdag gis yon dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gsol lam 'on te yon med pa'i mchod
311a4('dul ba): rten gsol/tshe dang ldan pa dag yon dang bcas pa ste/'on kyang khyim bdag de longs spyod srab pa lags pas 'di ltar ras zung cig 'bulo//nye dgas thos nas des
311a5('dul ba): bsams pa/gang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la raso zung cig 'bul ba de ni chen po la 'os pa zhig 'byung gor ma chag gis
311a6('dul ba): gal te bdag gis ras zung de ma phrogs na/nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo //snyam nas nye dga' de'i phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang
311a7('dul ba): chos gos thogs te/khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang ji tsam na des khyim bdag de mchod ston sbyor ba mthong nas/des khyim bdag de la dris pa/khyim bdag tse byed//
311b1('dul ba): 'phags pa mchod ston sbyor ro//khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gang dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/lus kyis legs par spyad cing spyod/ngag dang yid kyis
311b2('dul ba): legs par spyad cing spyod pa'i sems can de dag la dus de la snga dro bzang por nye bar gnas par 'gyur la sems can gang dag gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe dang /phyi 'bred kyi dus
311b3('dul ba): kyi tshe lus kyis legs par spyad cing spyod ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad cing spyod pa'i sems can de dag la dus de nas gung tshigs bzang po dang phye 'bad bzang por nye bar
311b4('dul ba): gnas par 'gyur ro//zhes bka' stsol pa de ni legs par gsungs po yino//khyim bdag gos sbyin pa yang cung zad yod dam/'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa
311b5('dul ba): lags te 'on kyang ras zung cig 'bulo//khyim bdag ras zung de ci 'dra blta'o//des bstan pa dang ji tsam na bza' bar mthong nas nye dgas smras pa/khyim bdog khyod la
311b6('dul ba): yongasu btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na yongasu longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni lan 'ga' yang med de/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya
311b7('dul ba): lnga bcu la ras zung stong nyis brgya lnga bcus 'grub pas 'dis ni re shig chos gos kyi rdang kho na yongasu zad par bya dgos par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zas kyi
312a1('dul ba): /spyad pa byung nu ni pu las sa'i mdab mas kyang bgro bar bya la gos kyi rnyed pa byung na ni mar me'i snying por rung bas kyang bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs nu ga la
312a2('dul ba): te bged par mi byed na ni khyod kyi 'di yang longs spyad par mi 'gyur ro//des smras pa 'phags pa gang gis bdag la yongasu btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis la
312a3('dul ba): yongasu longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci mchis/khyim bdag gal te khyod kyis shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod
312a4('dul ba): gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gang yin pa de la ras zung 'di bskon na de lta na khyod la yongasu btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams dang /
312a5('dul ba): yongasu spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams yang 'gyuraro//des smras pa 'phags pa shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrog pa ribs pa
312a6('dul ba): dang /grol ba'i spobs pa can su mchis/khyim bdag kho bo nyid shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs
312a7('dul ba): pa can yin no//khyim bdag des nye dga' lo 'phags pa khyod ras zung 'di bzhes shig ces sbyin parari brtsams pa dang /nye dgas smras pa/khyim bdag khyod sbyin
312b1('dul ba): pa sbyin yang mi shes sam/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas lnga sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba de'i tshe na khyod kyis rgan pa'i mtha' log su rjesu yi rang bar byed du
312b2('dul ba): chu go la kho bo la byin cig/'phags pa de bzhin bgyi'o//zhes khyim bdag des dri las mnyan nas/khyim bdag nges dri'i 'og tu sangs rgyas le sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
312b3('dul ba): mchod ston gsol nas ras zud de rgan pa'i ma'i mtha' log su yi rang bar mdzod cig/'phags pa NAM su yi rang mdzod cig ces rje su yi rong bar byed du bcug nas nye dga' la
312b4('dul ba): byin no//dge slong rnams kyi dge skos la smras pa/nye dga' las ras zung long shig/dge skos kyi nye dgu' la smras pa/ras zung de 'on cig/ci gtsug lag khang du khyer te

312b6('dul ba): bor mi byed/'di ni kho bo la byin pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yin bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang bsod snyoms pa dri skyengs nas
312b7('dul ba): de nyid du 'dug go/de nas bsod snyoms pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhud nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smraso///

313b1('dul ba): dal pa'i stobs pa can gang yon pa d+mol ras zung 'di basmras na/de lta na khyod la yod su byutang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams dang ma su yongs spyad pa las byung ba/
313b2('dul ba): bsod nam su yang 'gyur//zhes mchi'o//bdag gi de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa shAkya'i rigs lngas rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos skyug pa rig pa dang
