354a6('dul ba): gi bzo 'di lta ste/lhung bzed dang /lhung bzed chung ngu dang /kha ba dang gri dang sen gri dag dang /lcags mkhar gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/
354a7('dul ba): dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung mi gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i
354b1('dul ba): gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgur las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas
354b2('dul ba): rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/khar gzhong dag dang gzhong bu dag dang cha lang dag dang sbom por dang ril ba dag dang /rdungs mgar gyi gzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras
354b3('dul ba): na/dge slong spa gang ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i
354b4('dul ba): gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang
354b5('dul ba): ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/lham sgeg gu can dog dang /lham yu chad dag dang /mchil lham dag dang /ske dag dang dong pa dag dang /ko lpags mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa
354b6('dul ba): dge bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spu gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur//dge slong gis mi'i skyon smra ba'i bsam pas/rdza mkhan
354b7('dul ba): las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis//
355a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/zlu ma dag dang /bum pa dag dang /ril ba dag dang /rje'u dag dang /kham por dag dang /rdza mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang /
355a2('dul ba): yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong snga gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam
355a3('dul ba): pas/'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni 'dreg
355a4('dul ba): mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/smre breg pa dang /sen mo breg pa dang /kha spu breg pa dang /byin pa bcos pa dang /'dreg mkhan
355a5('dul ba): gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spu gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i
355a6('dul ba): skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan los rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/
355a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/khri dag dang khri'u dag dang an dag dang /a ne khri'u dag dang /sgo glegs
355b1('dul ba): dag dang /shing mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong skra gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong
355b2('dul ba): gis mi'i skyon nus smra ba'i bsam pas/smig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/
355b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ni smig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/skon bu dag dang /sgrog ma dag dang /gdugs dag dang /bsil yab dag dang /
355b4('dul ba): dud gze ba dag dang /smig ma mkhan gyi bze gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur//
355b5('dul ba): dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ge la yod/
355b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa ni bran los rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/bsku mnye dang /dril phyi dang /khrus dang //pho nyar 'gro ba dang /mngag pa dang /bran gyi bzo
355b7('dul ba): gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//
356a1('dul ba): bam so so dgu pa//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong
356a2('dul ba): gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/bram ze'i spyod tshul dang/
356a3('dul ba): spyod pa dang /gtsang sbra dang /kun tu spyod pa dang /thal ba blang ba dang /bya ma bum blang ba dang /lag stangs dang /ther tshugs dang /rab bsngags bya ba dang /kye zhes bya ba dang /
356a4('dul ba): ngos brjod kyi rig byed dang /mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /srid srung gi rig byed dang /mchod sbyin byed pa dang /mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /klog pa
356a5('dul ba): dang /klog du 'jug pa dang /sbyin pa dang /len+da pa dang /bram ze'i las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes smras no/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung //
356a6('dul ba): dge slong la nyes bya su 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi
356a7('dul ba): tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/glang po che'i gnyer ngo zhon
356b1('dul ba): pa dang /rtul bzhon pa dang /shing rta'i thabs dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /'thong dang phyir bsnun pa dang /mdun du bsdu ba dang /lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang /zhugs pa gdab pa dang //
356b2('dul ba): mda' bo che 'phen thabs dang /'dzin stangs dang gom stangs dang /thor tshugs dang /gcad pa dang /dral ba dang /dbug pa dang /rgyang nas phog pa dang /sgra grag lnga phog pa dang /gan du phog pa dang /
356b3('dul ba): mi 'tshor ba phog pa dang /tshabs che ba dang rgyal rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la nyes
356b4('dul ba): byasu 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i
356b5('dul ba): tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/zhing rmo ba dang ba lang bsrung ba dang /tsheng bya ba dang rje'u rigs
356b6('dul ba): kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon na smra ba'i ngasam
356b7('dul ba): pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/me ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni dmings rigs
357a1('dul ba): las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/zor ba dang phrag rdang dang /dmangs rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang
357a2('dul ba): bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa go dra ba nyid du gyur kyang rung me gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/tha ga pA las
357a3('dul ba): rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin
357a4('dul ba): byis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/thag bzangs dang /son pa dang /dru gu dang /snas la sogs pas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang
357a5('dul ba): rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'dri skad ces
357a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ge la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/
357a7('dul ba): rgyab shing dang /sgud po dang /tshen dang phur pa dang /so mangs kyis rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la
357b1('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan lngas rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod//
357b2('dul ba): bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/khab dang skud pa dang gri deng chan pa dang /lhung mos rang gi
357b3('dul ba): las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spre gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas lcags
357b4('dul ba): mkhar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mkhar las rab
357b5('dul ba): tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'dri lta ste/sdud pa dang sbung ru dang /tri tsha dang /skam pa dang /tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang
357b6('dul ba): rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/rdungs mkhar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces
357b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mkhar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/sdud pa
358a1('dul ba): dang sdud ru dang /tri tshwa dang /skam pa dang /tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras nas/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong
358a2('dul ba): la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung bI gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi
358a3('dul ba): tshul gA la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni kro lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/rgyus pa dang rmyi'u dang 'breng bu
358a4('dul ba): dang dru gri dang /sbyang du dang sbyang bus rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spu gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la lhung byed du 'gyu ro//dge slong gis
358a5('dul ba): mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga le yod/bram ze'i tshul gri la yod//
358a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ni rje mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/'khor lo dang dbyigs gu dang /tho gu dang 'khor lo'i rten me dang gsal gyis rang gi
358a7('dul ba): las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/'dreg
358b1('dul ba): mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni 'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung ba
358b2('dul ba): yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/spu gli dang chun pa dang gdar dang /skrod tshe dang sen gyis rang gi las bya'o zhes smras nu/dge sbyong sde gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang
358b3('dul ba): rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshwa dang ldan pa la dge
358b4('dul ba): sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul gA la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ste'u dang /skya re dang /gzong dang
358b5('dul ba): sogs la dang /tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyu ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra
358b6('dul ba): ba'i bsam pas smig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan po ni smig
358b7('dul ba): ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/smig ma dang gri dang tshen dang skyug tho dang lhang tsher gyis rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur
359a1('dul ba): kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/
359a2('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/sku
359a3('dul ba): mnye dang dril phyi dang khrus dang po ny+dzaro 'gro dang /mdags pas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na/dge slong spu gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed
359a4('dul ba): du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/dge slong gau gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul go la
359a5('dul ba): yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni theng po dang smad 'tshal dang /zhar ba dang lag sor rdum po dang /sgur po dang mi'u thung dang sba ba cen dang /glen pa dang /lkug pa dang grum po dang /'on pa dang //
359a6('dul ba): rten byed dang /rkang bam las rab tu byung ba yino zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i
359a7('dul ba): skyon nos smra ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul gau la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni mdze
359b1('dul ba): can dang /'brum bu phra mo can dang /dal skyen pa can dang /shu ba can dang /g.yan pa can dang /khyi rdo can dang /glog pa can dang /rkang shu can dang skyigs du can dang /skyug bro
359b2('dul ba): can dang khong skom can dang /rims can dang rims drag po can dang /lud pa can dang /dbugs mi bde ba can dang /skem nad can dang /brjed byed can dang /bkres pa can dang /
359b3('dul ba): skya rbab can dang /tshil po che dang /skran can dang /khrag nad can dang /khris nad can dang /mtshan par rdol ba las rab tu byung ba yino zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du
359b4('dul ba): gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/dge slong gi gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge
359b5('dul ba): sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni pham par 'gyu ro ba dang /dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang /so sor bshag par bya ba dang /nyes byas kyis
359b6('dul ba): ltung ba byung ba yin zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/dge
359b7('dul ba): slong gi gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ge la yod/cha dang ldan pa ni khro ba dang kho na du 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /
360a1('dul ba): dang /ngan dus can dang phyag dog can dang /ser sna can dang /g.yon nan dang /sgyu can dang /ngo chu med pa dang /khrel med pa dang /sdig pa 'dod pa dang /log par
360a2('dul ba): lta ba yin zhes smras na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/dge slong gi
360a3('dul ba): gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul gi la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni mo lta bu yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyod pa dag
360a4('dul ba): gis spyo bar byed na/dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung /dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyuraro//gal te ming de lta bu mang po dag yod par gyur na/de la lan
360a5('dul ba): gang ba pos spro ba sangs rgyas skyong gang yin zhes zer ba la/bram ze las rab tu byung bya gang yin pa de'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdo ma lta bu dag rjod pa la ltung ba med//lus dang
360a6('dul ba): po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang/tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba medo//mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed de gnyis pa rdzogs////sangs rgyas bcom ldan
360a7('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bi na bzhug so//de'i tshe na dge slong drug sngo dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun tu spyod par byed de/
360b1('dul ba): bla mas kun tu spyod pa na dge sbyong dag sdig pa de dang gzeng dmas pa dang /zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /klag pa dang kha don dang /rnal 'byor dang /yid la bya ba dang nang gi
360b2('dul ba): sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/'di ltar dus yun ring po nas nye bar byesags pa/chos dang ldan pa'i btsugs pa'i rgyun yang gcod par byed nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dag
360b3('dul ba): ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun tu spyod par byed ces smod par byed/phyar ka gtid par byed/kha zer por byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
360b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gling gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//
360b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag
360b6('dul ba): la smras pa/dge slong dag khyed dge slong rnams la phra mas kun tu spyod pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rjes su
360b7('dul ba): 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yino zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags
361a1('dul ba): tshal zhig nA seng ge mo sgyum ma zhig 'dug ste/seng gre mo rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe/'byung ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe na sha'i tshogs byas te
361a2('dul ba): 'brang bar byed pas/seng ge mo de ba lang gi tshogs chen po 'og gi phyi bzhin du rje su song ba dang /ba 'brangs nas ring po ma lon pa be'u rjesu skyong bar byed pa zhig khyu'i phyi
361a3('dul ba): bzhin 'brang zhing bgro ba de seng ge mo des bsad nas des de bshal te/rang gi tshang du song //be'u de yang mi'i nu ma 'thung 'dod pas de'i phyi bzhin du phyi bzhin spong ba
361a4('dul ba): dang /seng ge mos bsams pa/be'u 'di yang gsad par bya'o snyam nA yA bsams pa/gal te bdag gis bu 'brangs par gyur na 'di de'i tshong po grog su 'gyur gyis mi
361a5('dul ba): gsado snya mo//seng ge mo 'brangs nas de las phru gu pho zhig byung ba dang /seng ge mo des rang gi phru gu dang be'u de gnyis ka nu ma bstan par brtsams nas/ji tsam dus
361a6('dul ba): gzhan zhig na de gnyi ga chen por gyur to//dus gzhan zhig ni seng gai de na bar gyur nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/smras pa bu gnyis khyod gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun
361a7('dul ba): yin la phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes smras nas/bsags pa
361b1('dul ba): kun gyi mtha' zad cing //mthon po rnams kyis mtha' ltung 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ljon par
361b2('dul ba): gyur to//seng ge de ri dgas dam pa dam pa dgra bsad nas/sha dam pa dag za zhing khrag mang po dag 'thung bas chen por gyur to//khyu mchog de yang seng ges bsrungs pa'i rtsa
361b3('dul ba): bzang po dag za zhing chu gtsang ma dag 'thung bas chen ber gyur to//ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge de la wa rgan po rab tu brkam pa lhag ma za ba zhig 'khor zhing phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes
361b4('dul ba): su 'brang nas/seng ge des ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag mthungs nas/bgra tsha ba med par de na 'dug pas phyogs der gcan
361b5('dul ba): zan pa mo gzhan dag gis nye mi phod pas/wa rgan po de seng ge des ri dgas dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa 'thungs pa'i sha'i ltag ma dang khrag
361b6('dul ba): lhag me dag za zhing 'thung bas pags pa dang sha dang khrag rgyas par gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ge de ri dgas dam pa dag bsad nas/sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag
361b7('dul ba): dam pa dge 'thungs nas/myur ba myur bar kho nar tshong du song ste/khyu mchog de dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug par byed nas/sha'i lhag ma de dag kyang gcan zan phra mo gzhan dag
362a1('dul ba): gis zos nas/wa rgan po des bsams pa/seng ge 'di gang du 'gro ba je blta bar bya'o snyam nas/de de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /ji tsam na khyu mchog
362a2('dul ba): dang lhan cig rje zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/des bsams pa khyu mchog 'di bdag gi lce'i dgrar gyur pa yin gyis/bdag gi 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o/ma nas/waM rgan po
362a3('dul ba): de'i khyu mchog de'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /khyu mchog gis smras pa/zhang po rlung che ba dag mi ldang ngam/lhas smras pa/tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag lhung ngo //
362a4('dul ba): ci nyes seng ge 'di na re kho bo'i sha tshogs rgyu khyu mchog de gar song /gang gi tshe kho bos sha gzhan mi rnyed pa de'i tshe/kho bos khyu mchog 'di bza' bar bya'o zhes ze ri//khyu
362a5('dul ba): mchog gis smras pa/zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la mus 'chi khar/bu gnyis khyed nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spyan yin la phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gi 'jig rten gang
362a6('dul ba): byar 'khod kyis/kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis 'gu' yang gnyen par mi bya'o zhes kha chems gzhug gis khyod de skad ma zin cig las smras pa/tshwa ba khyod
362a7('dul ba): kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na/chud zos par 'ong //khyu mchog giso smras pa/zhang po go rims ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/was smras pa/tsha bo seng ge 'dri/
362b1('dul ba): tshang nas byung nas bya sbyangs byed par 'gyur la/byA spangs byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing glal nus phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar 'gyur/phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas song //
362b2('dul ba): ge'i skad zab gsum phyung ste/khyod kyis mdun du 'babar 'gyur ba ne/khyod kyis bdag 'dis bsodo snyams du shes par gyis shig/s+phu di de'i 'og tu seng ge rI mdun du rna ba
362b3('dul ba): phab ste 'dug pa dang /seng ges smras pa/zhang po rlung tsha bdag mi ldang ngam/wa sa smras pas/tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldangango //ci nyes khyu mchog 'di na raM kho bo'i rtsa'i
362b4('dul ba): seng ge gar song /'di'i mas kho bo'i ma bsad kyis/ba ri'i lto nges par dral bar bya'o zhes ze ro//seng ges smras pa/zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la/mas 'chi khar bu gnyis
362b5('dul ba): khyod gnyis nu ma cig la nu nu ba'i sman yin la phra ma can stod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed cag gnyis kyis dga' yang mnyan
362b6('dul ba): por mi bya'o zhes khwa tshams bzhag khyed de skad ma zer cig/skyes smras pa/tsha bo khyod de kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na chud zos par 'ong ngo //seng ges smras pa
362b7('dul ba): zhang po go rims ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/was smras pa/tsha bo khyu mi cho ga 'di lhas nas byung nas/bya spangs byed par 'gyur la/bya skrangs byas nas 'bu sgra 'byin pa ra
363a1('dul ba): 'gyur zhing 'bu sgra phyung nas/phug thig byed par 'gyur/phug thig byas nas rngam pa byas te/khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na khyod kyis bdag 'dis
363a2('dul ba): bsado snyam du shes par gyis shig/de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyis lan 'ga' yang phan tshun mtshan mar ma bzung ngo //de nas dus gzhan zhig
363a3('dul ba): na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge de tshang nas byung nas/bya sbyangs byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung nas/khyu mchog gi
363a4('dul ba): mdun du song ngo //khyu mchog de yang bltas nas byung nas bya sbyangs byas te 'bu sgra phyung nas phug thig byas te rngam pa byas nas/seng ge'i mdun du song ngo //de gnyis
363a5('dul ba): rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de lta byed mod kyi lan 'ga' yang mtshon mor mo bzung ste/gang gi tshe rgyud la dbyen gyi sa bon btab pa de'i tshe na mtshan mar bzung bas/khyu mchog
363a6('dul ba): kyang bdag 'dris bsado snyam du bsams la/seng ges kyang bdag 'dis bsado snyam bsams nas/seng ges khyu mchog gi byad la sder mo btab pa dang /khyu mchog gis kyang
363a7('dul ba): ras seng ge'i lho dral nas/de gnyis ka dus la bab pa dang /lhas tshig su bcad pas smras pa/bzang po dag la lta ba'i mis//skye bo ngan pa bsten mi bya//seng ge khyu
363b1('dul ba): mchog mdza' ba la//wa yis tha dad phye la ltos//dge slong dag re shig dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa'i srog chu gA des kyang phra mas kun nas spyad pa na bsod par sems na/mi rnams
363b2('dul ba): lha mos kyang ci dgos/dge slong dag de lta bas nas/dge slong gis dge slong la phra mos kun tu spyad par mi bya'o//dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun tu spyod par byed na/'gal
363b3('dul ba): tshabs can 'gyu ro//dge slong dag sngon byung 'das pa'i dus ni nags tshal zhig na/seng ge mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig dang /lhag mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug ste/seng ge mo
363b4('dul ba): spyod yul du song ba dang /de'i phru gu de'i khyam pa na stag mo'i gan du song nas/stag mos de mthong nas bsam pa 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/yang bsams pa 'di bdag
363b5('dul ba): glo bu'i chung po grogasu 'gyur gyi mo bsod snyam nas/des de nu ma bsnun par brtsamaso//seng ge mo des kyang spyod yul ba rgyus tau phyir 'ongs pa dang ci tsam na phru gu mi snang nas
363b6('dul ba): des de btsal bar brtsams pa dang /des phru gu stag mos bsnun pa mthong //stab mo des kyang seng ge mo de mthong nas/skrag ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /seng gi mo des stag
363b7('dul ba): mo la smras pa/nu mo ma 'bros shig dang lhan cig 'khod par bya ste/'di ltar kho mo spyod yul du song na khyod kyis kho mo'i phru gu la mkho ba bstabs pas/gal te spyod yul
364a1('dul ba): du 'gro bar gyur na/kho mos kyang khyod kyi phru gu la bltabs par bya'o//de gnyis lhan cig 'khod par brtsams nas/de gnyis kyis sang ge'i phru gu'i
364a2('dul ba): ming ni mche bzangs zhes bya bar btags/stag gi phru gu'i ming ni dpung bzangs zhes bya bar btags nas/de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na chen por gyur to//dus gzhan zhig
364a3('dul ba): na seng ge mo dang stag mo gnyis na bar gyur nas de gnyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/bu gnyis la smras pa/bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin pa phra ma can snod
364a4('dul ba): 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten grang bar 'khod kyis//kho mo cag gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan pa mi bya'o zhes smras nas/bsags pa kun gyi mtha'
364a5('dul ba): zad cing /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to//
364a6('dul ba): seng ge ni ri dgas dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas/sha dam pa dag za bar byed khrug dam pa dag 'thung bar byed cing /de sha dam pa dag zos shing /khrag dam pa dag
364a7('dul ba): 'thungs nas myur ba myur ba kho nar chang du 'gro bar byed do//stag ni spyod yul du song nas/tshegs chen posau ri dgas dag bsad de/sha dang khrag zos shing 'thungs nas yun
364b1('dul ba): ring pos phyir 'ong ngo //dus gzhan zhig na stag gis lhag rol dag sbas nas des de zos te/myur du phyir 'ongs pa dang /seng ges stag la smras pa/khyod sngon chad ni yun ring zhig
364b2('dul ba): gis phyir 'ong na deng myur du phyir 'ongs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/stag gis smras pa/kho bos ni lhag rol du sbas par gyur pa de zos te/phyir 'ongs so//seng ges smras pa/khyod lhag
364b3('dul ba): rol sprod dam/stag gis smras pa/sbed do//seng ges smras pa/kho ba ni rI dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas/sha dam pa zos shing khrag dam pa 'thungs nas ltos pa med par
364b4('dul ba): 'gro'o//stag gis smras pa/khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa yin gyis/kho bos ni de ltar byed mi nuso//seng ges smras pa/bdag cag lhan cig 'o //de gnyis lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams
364b5('dul ba): so//ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng gi de la wa rgan po rab tu gdub lhag ma za ba zhig 'adz+ra ni phyi zhin phyi bzhin du 'brang ba des bsams pa/stag 'di bdag gi lto'i dgrar gyur pa yin gyis/
364b6('dul ba): 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas wa rgan po des seng ges mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /seng ges smras pa/zhang pos rlung cha ba dag mi ldang ngamo/was smras pa/tsha/
364b7('dul ba): bo rlung rab tu 'o bar ba~M dag ldang //ci nyes/stag 'di na re kho bo'i rtsa'i seng ge de gar song /des kho ba lhag ma zar gtsug gis kho bos de nges par bsad par bya'o zhes ze ro//seng ges
365a1('dul ba): smras pa/zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la ma gnyis kyis mchi khar bu gnyis khyod gnyis dum cig la nu nu ba'i spyan yin la phra mA can snod 'byed pa dag gis
365a2('dul ba): 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/kho mo cagu gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu khyad gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyam par mi bya'o zhes khra tshoms bzhag gis khyod de skad ma zer cig
365a3('dul ba): was smras pa/tsha bo khyod de kho bo ngan par 'dod dri tshig mi nyan na/chud zos por 'ong ngo //seng ges smras pa/zhang po gau rims ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/was smras pa/tsha bo stag
365a4('dul ba): 'di chang nas bya sbyangs byed par 'gyur la/bya sbyangs byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing /glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar 'gyur/phyogs bzhir rnam par ltas nas/
365a5('dul ba): stagi skad thang gsum phyung ste/khyod kyis mdun du 'ongs par 'gyur ba ni/khyod kyis bdag 'dis gas //snyam du shes par gyis shig/de'i 'og tu sa gi mdun du rna ba
365a6('dul ba): babra ste/'dug pa dang /stug gis smras pa/zhang po rlung tsha ba dag mi ldung ngam/was skyes pa/tsha bo rlung rab tu che ba 'bar ba dag lgang //sa/seng ge 'di na ra~M kho bo'i
365a7('dul ba): rtsa'i stag de gar song /de nges par gsad par bya'o zhes zer//stag gis smras pa/zhang po kho bo cag+na gnyis la ma gnyis kyis 'tsho khar bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig
365b1('dul ba): la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes kha tshems gzhag gi khyod de skad ma
365b2('dul ba): zer tsog/tri pa smras pa/cha bo khyed de kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig minyan na/chud zos por 'ang //zhang po go rims ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/was smras pa/tsho ba seng ge 'di
365b3('dul ba): tshang nas byung nas byi sbyangs byed par 'gyur la/bya spangs byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing /glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar 'gyur/phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas//
365b4('dul ba): seng go'i skad thang gsum phyung ste/khyod kyis mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na//khyod kyis bdag 'dis bskyod par 'gyur ro//snyam du shes par bya'o//de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu
365b5('dul ba): de ltar byed mod kyi/len 'ga' yong mchen mar ma mazung //dus gzhan zhog ni ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge de ching nas bya sbyangs byas te/grol nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/
365b6('dul ba): seng ge'i skad bang gsum phyung nas stag mdun du song ngo //stag kyang tshang nas byung nas bya spangs byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/stog skud thang gsum phyur nas/
365b7('dul ba): seng ge'i mdun du song ba dang /seng gos kyang bdag 'dis bsod snyam du bsams la/ga gis kyang bdag 'dis bso do snyam bsam so//yang song gis bsams pa/bdag ni stongs
366a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa yin la/stag ni de ma yin pas 'dis bdag la rgol mi nus kyis/rje skrag par byar snyam+ba nas/des tshig su bcad pas smras pa//chu zheng phun
366a2('dul ba): sum tshogs pa dang //rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yis//mche ba bzang la rgol byed pa/dpung bzeng de ni rigs pa min/stug gis kyang tshig su bcad pas smras pa//chu zheng
366a3('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa dang /rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yis//dpung bzang la ni rgol byed pa//mche bzangs de ni rigs pa min//seng ges smras pa/khyod la sus smras/stag
366a4('dul ba): gos smras pa/wa 'diso//stag gis smras pa/khyod la sus smras/seng ges smras pa/wa 'dri so//seng ges bsams pa/'dis bdag cag gnyis 'byed par byed snyam nas/
366a5('dul ba): des waM de thal lhag gis bsnun te bsod pa dang /lhas tshogasu bcad pa smras pa/gzhan gyi tshig gis mdza' bshes mi spang zhing //gzhan gyis smras pa dag la rtag par bya/
366a6('dul ba): 'byed par 'dod pa skabs tshe yi byed pas na//skye bo phra ma can la yid mi rton//wa skyes grong pa brdzun du smra byed pa//mdza' bshes 'byed par byed pa skyes ta re//phra ma smra ba don
366a7('dul ba): bsad gyur nas//bde bas mdza' bshes dga' bar byed pa ltos/dge slong dag ro shig dud 'phro'i skye gnas skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun tu spyad pa na gsod par
366b1('dul ba): sems na ma rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun tu spyad par mi bya'o//dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas spyad nga byed na
366b2('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/phan yon po
366b3('dul ba): yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i
366b4('dul ba): gni 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong la phra ma byed na ltung byed//dge slong la phra ma byed no zhes bya ba ni dge slong la bla me bya ba'i bsam pasdu dag dang tshig dang tha snyad dang /skad dang
366b5('dul ba): rjod pa dang /nges pa'i tshig dang tshig gi lam deng tshig gi sgra dang /ngag gi las dang /dog gi rnam par rig byed smra ba'o//ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro
366b6('dul ba): dang yi dbus ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing /so sor ma bshags
366b7('dul ba): na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/de la ltung bye'o zhes gsung so//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/bar sdom la/rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni//rtags nad ltung
367a1('dul ba): /ba sngo lnga dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams dang ni//smyo bar byed pa tha ma yin//dge slong gi phram bya ba'i byasam pas bram ze lngas rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste//
367a2('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong go tshul ga lnga yod/bram ze'i tshul gau lnga yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze lasde rab tu byung ba yin
367a3('dul ba): zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la nyes bya su 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod
367a4('dul ba): pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra maM bya ba'i bsam pas/rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la/
367a5('dul ba): dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yino zhes zer te/dge slong gang
367a6('dul ba): zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya//rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la nyes bya su 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor
367a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i snyan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i
367b1('dul ba): tshul gru l+ya yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/mi nI 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'dri zhes bya rus ni 'di zhes bya/zhes smras na/
367b2('dul ba): ming ni brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyuraro//dge slong gi bya ba'i bsam pos/dmangs rigs los rab tu byung ba'i gan du spong ste/
367b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod lnga dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram zla'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni dmang rig las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer
367b4('dul ba): te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang /rus brjod pa la nyes byasu
367b5('dul ba): 'gyuraro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bas pa thabra pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na rI tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/
367b6('dul ba): bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa lngas rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge sbyong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes
367b7('dul ba): smras na/ming brjod pa las lhung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byasu 'gyur//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i
368a1('dul ba): gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gri tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan
368a2('dul ba): pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yino zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/mying ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa
368a3('dul ba): la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad
368a4('dul ba): ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong nu re tshwa dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin zhes
368a5('dul ba): zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa
368a6('dul ba): la nyes byas 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas lcags mkhar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong nA re tshe dang ldan
368a7('dul ba): pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mkhar las rab tu byung ba yino zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya
368b1('dul ba): rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la lhung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes bya su 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas
368b2('dul ba): rdungs mkhar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul grwa la yod/bram ze'i tshul-i ga la yod/tshe dang
368b3('dul ba): ldan pa ni rdungs mkhar las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed
368b4('dul ba): du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas 'gyur ro//dge slong gi phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas kau lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod
368b5('dul ba): la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul gau la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zho na/
368b6('dul ba): ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes bya su 'gyuraro//dge slong gis phra ma
368b7('dul ba): bya ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod//
369a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yi no zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes
369a2('dul ba): smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byasu 'gyur ro//dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas 'dre ga mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan
369a3('dul ba): du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyed la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ge la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni 'dreg mkhan
369a4('dul ba): las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur

369a7('dul ba): gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa le ltung byed du 'gyur ro//rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes bya su 'gyuraro//
369b1('dul ba): dge sbyong gis phra mu bya ba'i bsam pas/smig ma mkhan lus rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge stong nA re tshe dang ldan pa la dpe sbyong gi tshul gra
369b2('dul ba): la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni smig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni

369b5('dul ba): byung ba yin zhes zer te/dge slong gang zhe na/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus na 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/rigs dang rus

370a1('dul ba): /spyod pa dang gtsu sna dang kun tu spyod pa dang /thal bu zung ba dang /byam bum byung ba d+ma/sa blang ba dang /lag sbyangs dang /thor tshugs dang /rab bsngags

376a1('dul ba): rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul ga la yod//

379a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/bram ze'i tshul gra la yod/tshe dang ldan pa ni khro ba drung /khon du 'dzin pa dang /
379a2('dul ba): 'chab pa dang /dang na 'dus can dang /phrag dog can dang /se ra sna n+dan dang /g.yon can dang smra ba can dang /dro tshwa med pa dang /khrel med pa dang /sdig pa 'dod pa dang /

380a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng bzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom

380b1('dul ba): gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa sda ma bzhi no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bsgrub pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon

382b1('dul ba): klud kyis byung bar 'du nus shing yang las rgyas sgra sogs byud na spyad byed du 'gyur//da kyis byung ba la yod gnyis panong yang las kyis b+h+yo stsogs byed na sbyang byud smra b+h+ya/

382b3('dul ba): sa s+ho 'o//dgaslong byung 'didi pa la ltung ba'i phy-i da rig byung bam sh-ing gis byung ba 'du shes shing yang las kyis sgro stegs byidon rgyu
382b4('dul ba): byed du 'gyur//shad kyis bying ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sde gas byed na myung byeng du 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byung ba ye shwad kyis byung bar 'dud nas shing yang las kyis
382b5('dul ba): skye sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byang ba la yod gnyis ze zhing yang las kyis skye sde khyed nyes byam 'gyuraro//dge slong gis ltung ba'i phyir brtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir
382b6('dul ba): snod per 'du shes nas/shad kyis byung ba la shad kyis byung bar 'du nas shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed ni rlung byed du 'gyuraro//shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang los
382b7('dul ba): gyis sgo sngags byed na ltung byed du 'gyur//shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang mos kyim skye sdegs byed na nyis byasu 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byang ba la yid
383a1('dul ba): /gnyis bzhung yang las kyis sgro sdugs byed na nyes byas 'gyuraro//dge slong gis sbyad ba'i phyir da pa la mi glang mas pa'i phyir tshod par byad+ma shes nas/nga/
383a2('dul ba): kyis byung ba la shud kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//shid kyis byung ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na
383a3('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyuraro//shod kyis ma byung ba la shad kyis byung ba d+mo 'dre shiso shing ya la sa ky-is b+h+yo sgrogs byed no nyas byas 'gyur//shad kyis ma byung ba la yid gnyis ze zhing
383a4('dul ba): yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byasu 'gyuraro//dge slong gis ltung ba'i rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas/shad kyis byung ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes
383a5('dul ba): shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byeng na ltung byed du 'gyur//shad kyis byung ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis smyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byung ba
383a6('dul ba): la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yid los kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas 'gyur//shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gonyis za zhing yang las kyis skye stsogs byed na nyes byas sgyu
383a7('dul ba): 'gyuraro//dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la byang ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas/shad kyis byeng ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis spyi sngogs byed na ltung byed du
383b1('dul ba): 'gyur//shad kyis byung ba la yod gnyis za zhing yang las kyis sgyu sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur//shad kyis ma byung ba la shad kyis byung bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngags
383b2('dul ba): byed na nyes byas 'gyur//shad kyis ma byung ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang los kyi skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas 'gyuraro//dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes
383b3('dul ba): nas/shad kyis byed pa la shad kyis byang por 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur//shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na
383b4('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//shad kyis ma byung ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngags byed na nyes bya su 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las
383b5('dul ba): kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas 'gyuraro//dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas/shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing
383b6('dul ba): yang las kyis skyo sngog byed na ltung byed 'gyur//shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//shod kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du
383b7('dul ba): shes shing /yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes bya su 'gyur ro//shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes bya su 'gyuraro//dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir//
384a1('dul ba): rjod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas/shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing /yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
384a2('dul ba): shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//shad kyis ma byang pa la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing /yang las kyis skye sngogs

384a4('dul ba): byed pa dang /'dun pa 'bul ba dang /lta ba smra ba dang /glo bur du 'ongs pa dag go/dri le gang zag gnyug mar gnas pa gang zhe na/gang gis brtsod pa de'i thog ma dang dbus dang

384a6('dul ba): de bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa phul bar gyur pa'o//gang zag lta ba smra ba gang zhe na gang gis rtsod pa de la rang gi lta ba smras par gyur pa'o//gang zag glo bur du 'ongs pa gang zhe na/
384a7('dul ba): gang gis rtsod pa de'i thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma dag mi shes pa'o//de la gang zag dang po gsum po gnyug mar gnas pa dang las byed pa dang 'dun pa 'bul ba'i ga
384b1('dul ba): ga do sum gyis dag 'dun 'thun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyis skye sgrogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur//gang zag tha ma gnyis po lta ba smra
384b2('dul ba): ba dang /glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gang zag de gnyis dge 'dun 'thun pas chos bzhin du rkyod pa sgyus pa shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byasu 'gyuraro//lus dang
384b3('dul ba): po pa dang skyes pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyes pa la ltung ba medo//skyo sngogs byed pa'i ltung byed bzhi pa rdzog so///sangs rgyas bcom
384b4('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha sha mtshan gyi rig pa shes te/de sngo dro sham
384b5('dul ba): thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'jug/de bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu song ste chos ston par byed cing /chos

384b7('dul ba): nyes pa yin snyam 'am 'di ltar de la gtum pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang mdoms kyi bar dang /rked pa'i bar dag na she sman dang mdzer bu dang sme ba dang /sme ba dmar po dang

385a7('dul ba): yon tan min//de'i 'og tu da'i mna' ma'i rin du song ste dris pa/sku ma khyod kyi skyug mo ci 'dra/'phags pa ma 'am bu num ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o//su mo deni 'di'i yon d+han
385b1('dul ba): ma yin te/'di ltar de la nges pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang mdoms kyi bar dang rked pa'i bar dag na/'di lta ste dpal be'u dang bum pa gang ba dang bkra shis dang g.yung drung dag yod///
385b2('dul ba): pas de ni de'i yon tan yin//de nas dus gzhan zhig na bud med de dag bsku mnye dang dril phyi dang khrus bdag gir byed pa'i tshe/cig la cig gsang ba'i gnas kyi mtshan ma
385b3('dul ba): rtog par byed pa ni tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char las ji skad bstan pa de kho na lta bu'i mtshan bzang po dang mtshan ngan pa dag mthong ngo //de dag gang gi tshe thab mo byung ba de'i
385b4('dul ba): tshen cig la cig gleng bar byed/khyod kyang kho mo dang lhan cig smra bar byed dam/khyod skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'di dang 'dri lta byed do//sdig pa zhi'o//'o na khyod kyi
385b5('dul ba): mdoms kyi bar dge na mtshon dang mtshan ngan pa dag yod pa skyes pa gzhan gyis ji ltar shes/gal te de lta na kho mo yang ci'i phyir mau skye/khyod kyang kho mo dang lhan cig smra bar
385b6('dul ba): byed dam/khyod skyes pa na zhun dag dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di lta byeda'o//sdug bzhi'o//'o na khyod kyi mdoms kyi bar dag na mtshan ma dang mtshan ngan pa dag yod pa skyes pa gzhan
385b7('dul ba): gyis ji ltar shaso/gang gi cha de dag gis cig la cig bzod pa gsol ba de'i tshe na/cig gis cig la dris pa khyod la sus smras 'phag pa 'char kha po//khyod lo yang sus
386a1('dul ba): smras 'phags pa 'char kha so//de dag 'phags pa 'cha re khas bsam bzhin du bdag cag 'thab tu bcu go zhes smong par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed

386a3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'char kha dge slong ji lta bu lags/sring mo dag de ni mdun ni 'dron gyi bu las rab tu byung ba dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no//'phags pa dag gal
386a4('dul ba): tede dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags na/des ji ltar bud med kyi yul gyi gsang ba'i phyogs dag na sha rma na mchis pa dag 'tshal/de dag gis smras pa/sring mo dag

386a6('dul ba): ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gang gi phyir
386a7('dul ba): nyes dmigs cung zad ci byung ba de dag thams cad dge slong bud med kyi yul la chos ston pa las gyur pa yin gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gis bud med kyi yul la chos
386b1('dul ba): bsnun par ma bya'o//snyam du dgongs nas/de lta byas na dge slong gis bud med kyi yul la rmas bstan par mi byan zhes bkar stsal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
386b2('dul ba): gis bud med kyi yul la chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dge bsod snyoms la zhugs pa nra/bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dang /
386b3('dul ba): chos bsten du gsal/sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gan //de dag gis smras pa/gal te khyed chos mi ston na bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms mi 'bulo zhes zer ba'i
386b4('dul ba): skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshig lngas chos bstan par bya ste/sring mo dag 'di ltar gzugs
386b5('dul ba): ni mi rtag pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bya bas so//dge slong dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/bud med

386b7('dul ba): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes tshig lngas chos bstan pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag yang chos bstan du gsol/sring mo dag bcom ldan
387a1('dul ba): 'das kyis re shig de tsam zhig rjesu gnang ngo //de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag legs kyis bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms cung zhig 'bul zhes

387a6('dul ba): zhig rje su gnang ngo //de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag legs kyis bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms cung zhig 'bulo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom

387b1('dul ba): bud mod kyi yul dag gis smras pa/'phags pa chos bstan du gsol/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/sring mo dag skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid du shag/'phags pa dag skyes pas
387b2('dul ba): ce bgyi/snying mo dge bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes pa bzhig ste/ci 'dod pas chas bstan par bya'o zhes bsgrub pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzod//'phags pa dag legs te bdag
387b3('dul ba): cag kyang shin tu smras pa dang /shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur la 'phags pa dag kyang mi snyengs par chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis skyes pa khrid de 'ongs nas/dge slong
387b4('dul ba): dag gis kyang ci 'dod par chos bstan de dong ngo //drug sde dag bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/de dag gis bud med kyi yu ya dag la smras pa/srid mi dag 'khod cig dang ches
387b5('dul ba): bstan par bya'o//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dge skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de 'chi'i bar du re shig yud tsam zhig gzhesu gsil/drug sde dag gis smras pa/khyi dang
387b6('dul ba): spri'u dang be'u dang khyi rgan du nyal ba dang /gog pa dang khye'u 'dug pa 'di las gzhan pa'i skyes pa ci dgos shes de dag la chos bstan nas dong ngo //dge slong gnas brtan
387b7('dul ba): gnas brtan dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/sring mo dag skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid shog
388a1('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag ci'i lags/khyi dang sgye'u dang be'u dang /phyi sngun du nyal ba dang /gog pa dang khye'u 'di dag ma mchis sam/sring
388a2('dul ba): mo dag kho kho cag skyes pa 'di lta bu dang chos mi ston te/khyed cag la skyes pa 'di lta bu dang chos ston par byed pa de su yin/de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa drug sde
388a3('dul ba): dag go/de kho na'i phyir de dag gis gnas skabs de 'dre'o zhes zer ba'i skyabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis

388a6('dul ba): pa la 'jug par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig lnga 'am drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal ni

388b1('dul ba): byed dam/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la tshig lnga pa rung ba de la tshig drug pa yang rung la tshig drug pa rung ba de tshig bdun yang rung ba snyam tshig drug pa dang bdun pas
388b2('dul ba): sku 'dod zos sam/tshang 'thungs sam dzi na dmigs kyis dgag par bya/dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga 'am drug gis chos
388b3('dul ba): bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ci'i phyir dge slong dag tshig lngas chos ston pa bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams
388b4('dul ba): bzhin du tshig bdun pa la 'jug par byed ces/smod par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de
388b5('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /glang gzhi 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzadado//zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
388b6('dul ba): 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la smras pa/dge slong
388b7('dul ba): dag ngas bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga 'am drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes bsten na/khyed tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /
389a1('dul ba): tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la 'jug pa bdun nam/btsun pa mdo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi
389a2('dul ba): tshul ma yin pa/rjesu 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das
389a3('dul ba): kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba/nyan thos rnams
389a4('dul ba): kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong //
389a5('dul ba): gang bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga 'am drug las lhag par chos ston na/rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do//yang dge slong gang zhi bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta
389a6('dul ba): bu gang yin pa'o//bud med kyi yul la zhes bya ba ni bud med dmaM/gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun tu shes par nus pa la'o//
389a7('dul ba): tshig lnga 'am drug las lhag par zhes bya ba ni/tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed pa dang /tshig drug gis chos ston pa na/yang
389b1('dul ba): bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la thal bar byed pa'o//chos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o//ston na zhes bya ba ni 'chad
389b2('dul ba): na'o//rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i skyes pa bzhag ste'o//ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal pa dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas dang ngan song dang ngan
389b3('dul ba): 'gro dang log par lhong ba dag tu sreg par byed/'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la
389b4('dul ba): sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byedo zhes gsungaso//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong steng gi khang thog tu bud med kyi yul la chos ston par byed na/des tshig lnga 'am
389b5('dul ba): drug gis chos bstan par bya ste/dge slong gis tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//tshig drug gis chos ston pa na
389b6('dul ba): bsam bzhin du tshig bdun pa la thal bur byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//chos bstan nas khang tog bar mar zhugs pa na de'i phyi bzhin du 'ong zhing 'phags pa chos bstan du gsol
389b7('dul ba): zhes zer ba la sring mo khyod la chos bstan zin to zhes byas nas/'phags pa 'dir yang chos bstan du gsol zhes zer na/der yang tshig lnga 'am drug gis chos bstan par
390a1('dul ba): bya ste/dge slong gis tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur//tshig drug gis chos ston pa na bsam
390a2('dul ba): bzhin du/tshig bdun pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//'og gzhi'i sa dang sgo gang dang bang rim gyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyaro//bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
390a3('dul ba): can gyi gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang /slob gnyer bsod pa dang /kha ton zhu ba dang /dmigs kyis 'dro ba dang /dus khrims dpog pa dang /yon
390a4('dul ba): bshad pa byed pa la ltung ba med//dge slong gis dzAHmA 'dod pa bkag pa dang /lngab ste nAn+ta dang /sgra sgyur ba la ltung ba med do//wa dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems
390a5('dul ba): 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//ston pa'i ltung byed de lde pa rdzogs///sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
390a6('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dag dang tshig gis chos 'don par byed de/des kun
390a7('dul ba): dga'i ra ba'i mthor sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po skye bo bal po che'i tshogs kyi sgra lte bu 'di lta ste/dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang /rtsis mkhan
390b1('dul ba): rnams rtsis kyis gnas na smra ba lta bu grag par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga'i ra ba'i mthar de dag gis sgyu mthon po dang sgra chen po skye bo phal po chu'i tshogs kyi
390b2('dul ba): sgra lta bu de gsan to//gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo kun dga'i ra ba'i mthar na sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i
390b3('dul ba): tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 'di lta ste/dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsung tshig 'dzin pa lta bu dang /rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu 'di ni yin/btsun pa dge
390b4('dul ba): skyoslong drug sde dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dag dang /tshig gis chos 'don par bgyid des kun dga'i ra ba'i mthar sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i
390b5('dul ba): tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na bram ze rnams bram ze'i grwasang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu 'di grag par gyur to//
390b6('dul ba): kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig tshig gis chos 'don par byed dam/btsun pa bgyi //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di
390b7('dul ba): dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du
391a1('dul ba): rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/dge slong dag/
391a2('dul ba): khyed gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang /lhan cig tshig gis chos 'don par byed pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi
391a3('dul ba): tshul ma yin pa rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yino//zhes rnam par smad pa mdzadado//de nas bcom
391a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul
391a5('dul ba): ba la nyan thonas kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par
391a6('dul ba): bya ste/yang dge slong gang zag rdzogs par ma bstan pa dang /tshig gis chos 'dod na ltung byed//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang
391a7('dul ba): yin pa'o//gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs par bsnyen pa ni gnyis te dge slong dang dge slong ma'o//de las gzhan pa rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa'o//
391b1('dul ba): tshig gis zhes bya ba ni tshig mnyam pa dang /tshig snga ba dang /yi ge mnyam pa dang yi ge sdu ba so//ji ltar tshig mnyam pas she na slob dpon 'di skad ces sdig pa thams cad ma
391b2('dul ba): bya ste zhes 'don pa na/nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'dzin pa ste de ltar tshig mnyam paso//ji ltar tshig snga bas shes na slob dpon gyis re shig
391b3('dul ba): pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes ma bton par nye gnas dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya zhes 'don pa ste de ltar tshig snga bso//ji ltar yi ge mnyam pas shes ni slob dpon a zhes
391b4('dul ba): 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu a zhes 'don pa ste de ltar yi ge mnyam pas so//ji ltar yi ge snga bas she na slob dpon gyis re shig a zhes ma bton par/nye gnas a
391b5('dul ba): zhes 'don pa ste/de ltar yi ge snga bso//chos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o//'don na zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'jud na'o//
391b6('dul ba): ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags ngan song dang /ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshod par byed ltung ba byed pa'o//gzhan yang
391b7('dul ba): snying po de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des ni ltung byed zhes gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong

393a1('dul ba): ltung ba med do//rje su bsgrags te lung 'bog pa la ltung ba med do//las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen

393b1('dul ba): dri dag spyod par byed pa na drug sde dag gis thos nus de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag ci 'di dag chos bzang po'i chos kyi dge 'dun la chu 'drim par byed snyam 'am/'di ltar 'di dag

393b5('dul ba): par byed pa na drug sde dag gis de dag gi lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag la dris pa/dge tshul dag khyod kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon dog gar dor/de dag gis smras pa bsod nams

394a1('dul ba): gis de dag la dris pa/de dag gis ci byas/drug ste dag gi lag pas bya ba ma yin par byas te/'di lta 'di ltar bya'o zhes smraso//gang gi tshe dge slong

394a3('dul ba): smras pa khyed rang ci'i phyir mi byed/kho bo cag gis byar mi rung ngo //de dag gis smras pa khyed kyis 'di lta 'di ltar byar rung na 'di ci'i phyir byar mi rung /de dag gis

395a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad//mnyan yod na dge slong 'phrul ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma

395a3('dul ba): la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong khyed kyis dge slong 'phral ba dang /dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnamasu so sor go bar byed pa'i ngag

397a1('dul ba): sgyong gnas brtan gnas brten rnams sa shig nas brjod par b+ha/dge slong khyim rnams so sor go bur byed pa de khyim rnamasas sbyor go bar
